original: BhP_04.01.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.01.001/1 manos tu śatarūpāyāṃ tisraḥ kanyāś ca jajñire
analyzed: manoḥ tu śatarūpāyām tisraḥ kanyāḥ ca jajñire

original: BhP_04.01.001/2 ākūtir devahūtiś ca prasūtir iti viśrutāḥ
analyzed: ākūtiḥ devahūtiḥ ca prasūtiḥ iti viśrutāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.002/1 ākūtiṃ rucaye prādād api bhrātṛmatīṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: ākūtim rucaye prādāt api bhrātṛmatīm nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.002/2 putrikā-dharmam āśritya śatarūpānumoditaḥ
analyzed: putrikā dharmam āśritya śatarūpā anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.003/1 prajāpatiḥ sa bhagavān rucis tasyām ajījanat
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ sa bhagavān ruciḥ tasyām ajījanat

original: BhP_04.01.003/2 mithunaṃ brahma-varcasvī parameṇa samādhinā
analyzed: mithunam brahma varcasvī parameṇa samādhinā

original: BhP_04.01.004/1 yas tayoḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣād viṣṇur yajña-svarūpa-dhṛk
analyzed: yaḥ tayoḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ yajña sva rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_04.01.004/2 yā strī sā dakṣiṇā bhūter aṃśa-bhūtānapāyinī
analyzed: yā strī sā dakṣiṇā bhūteḥ aṃśa bhūta anapāyinī

original: BhP_04.01.005/1 āninye sva-gṛhaṃ putryāḥ putraṃ vitata-rociṣam
analyzed: āninye sva gṛham putryāḥ putram vitata rociṣam

original: BhP_04.01.005/2 svāyambhuvo mudā yukto rucir jagrāha dakṣiṇām
analyzed: svāyambhuvaḥ mudā yuktaḥ ruciḥ jagrāha dakṣiṇām

original: BhP_04.01.006/1 tāṃ kāmayānāṃ bhagavān uvāha yajuṣāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tām kāmayānām bhagavān uvāha yajuṣām patiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.006/2 tuṣṭāyāṃ toṣam āpanno ' janayad dvādaśātmajān
analyzed: tuṣṭāyām toṣam āpannaḥ a janayat dvādaśa ātmajān

original: BhP_04.01.007/1 toṣaḥ pratoṣaḥ santoṣo bhadraḥ śāntir iḍaspatiḥ
analyzed: toṣaḥ pratoṣaḥ santoṣaḥ bhadraḥ śāntiḥ iḍaspatiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.007/2 idhmaḥ kavir vibhuḥ svahnaḥ sudevo rocano dvi-ṣaṭ
analyzed: idhmaḥ kaviḥ vibhuḥ su ahnaḥ su devaḥ rocanaḥ dviṣaṣ

original: BhP_04.01.008/1 tuṣitā nāma te devā āsan svāyambhuvāntare
analyzed: tuṣitāḥ nāma te devāḥ āsan svāyambhuva antare

original: BhP_04.01.008/2 marīci-miśrā ṛṣayo yajñaḥ sura-gaṇeśvaraḥ
analyzed: marīci miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yajñaḥ sura gaṇa īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.01.009/1 priyavratottānapādau manu-putrau mahaujasau
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapādau manu putrau mahā ojasau

original: BhP_04.01.009/2 tat-putra-pautra-naptṝṇām anuvṛttaṃ tad-antaram
analyzed: tad putra pautra naptṝṇām anuvṛttam tad antaram

original: BhP_04.01.010/1 devahūtim adāt tāta kardamāyātmajāṃ manuḥ
analyzed: devahūtim adāt tāta kardamāya ātmajām manuḥ

original: BhP_04.01.010/2 tat-sambandhi śruta-prāyaṃ bhavatā gadato mama
analyzed: tad sambandhi śruta prāyam bhavatā gadataḥ mama

original: BhP_04.01.011/1 dakṣāya brahma-putrāya prasūtiṃ bhagavān manuḥ
analyzed: dakṣāya brahma putrāya prasūtim bhagavān manuḥ

original: BhP_04.01.011/2 prāyacchad yat-kṛtaḥ sargas tri-lokyāṃ vitato mahān
analyzed: prāyacchat yatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ trilokyām vitataḥ mahān

original: BhP_04.01.012/1 yāḥ kardama-sutāḥ proktā nava brahmarṣi-patnayaḥ
analyzed: yāḥ kardama sutāḥ proktāḥ nava brahmarṣi patnayaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.012/2 tāsāṃ prasūti-prasavaṃ procyamānaṃ nibodha me
analyzed: tāsām prasūti prasavam procyamānam nibodha me

original: BhP_04.01.013/1 patnī marīces tu kalā suṣuve kardamātmajā
analyzed: patnī marīceḥ tu kalā suṣuve kardama ātmajā

original: BhP_04.01.013/2 kaśyapaṃ pūrṇimānaṃ ca yayor āpūritaṃ jagat
analyzed: kaśyapam pūrṇimānam ca yayoḥ āpūritam jagat

original: BhP_04.01.014/1 pūrṇimāsūta virajaṃ viśvagaṃ ca parantapa
analyzed: pūrṇimā asūta virajam viśvagam ca parantapa

original: BhP_04.01.014/2 devakulyāṃ hareḥ pāda- śaucād yābhūt sarid divaḥ
analyzed: devakulyām hareḥ pāda śaucāt yā abhūt sarit divaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.015/1 atreḥ patny anasūyā trīñ jajñe suyaśasaḥ sutān
analyzed: atreḥ patnī anasūyā jajñe suyaśasaḥ sutān

original: BhP_04.01.015/2 dattaṃ durvāsasaṃ somam ātmeśa-brahma-sambhavān
analyzed: dattam durvāsasam somam ātma īśa brahma sambhavān

original: BhP_04.01.016/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.01.016/1 atrer gṛhe sura-śreṣṭhāḥ sthity-utpatty-anta-hetavaḥ
analyzed: atreḥ gṛhe sura śreṣṭhāḥ sthiti utpatti anta hetavaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.016/2 kiñcic cikīrṣavo jātā etad ākhyāhi me guro
analyzed: kiñcid cikīrṣavaḥ jātāḥ etat ākhyāhi me guro

original: BhP_04.01.017/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.01.017/1 brahmaṇā coditaḥ sṛṣṭāv atrir brahma-vidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇā coditaḥ sṛṣṭau atriḥ brahma vidām varaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.017/2 saha patnyā yayāv ṛkṣaṃ kulādriṃ tapasi sthitaḥ
analyzed: saha patnyā yayau ṛkṣam kula adrim tapasi sthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.018/1 tasmin prasūna-stabaka- palāśāśoka-kānane
analyzed: tasmin prasūna stabaka palāśa aśoka kānane

original: BhP_04.01.018/2 vārbhiḥ sravadbhir udghuṣṭe nirvindhyāyāḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: vārbhiḥ sravadbhiḥ udghuṣṭe nirvindhyāyāḥ samantataḥ

original: BhP_04.01.019/1 prāṇāyāmena saṃyamya mano varṣa-śataṃ muniḥ
BhP_04.01.019/2 atiṣṭhad eka-pādena nirdvandvo 'nila-bhojanaḥ
analyzed: atiṣṭhat eka pādena nirdvandvaḥ anila bhojanaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.020/1 śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadye 'haṃ ya eva jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: śaraṇam tam prapadye aham yaḥ eva jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.01.020/2 prajām ātma-samāṃ mahyaṃ prayacchatv iti cintayan
analyzed: prajām ātma samām mahyam prayacchatu iti cintayan

original: BhP_04.01.021/1 tapyamānaṃ tri-bhuvanaṃ prāṇāyāmaidhasāgninā
analyzed: tapyamānam tribhuvanam prāṇāyāma edhasā agninā

original: BhP_04.01.021/2 nirgatena muner mūrdhnaḥ samīkṣya prabhavas trayaḥ
analyzed: nirgatena muneḥ mūrdhnaḥ samīkṣya prabhavaḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.022/1 apsaro-muni-gandharva- siddha-vidyādharoragaiḥ
analyzed: apsaraḥ muni gandharva siddha vidyādhara uragaiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.022/2 vitāyamāna-yaśasas tad-āśrama-padaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: vitāyamāna yaśasaḥ tad āśrama padam yayuḥ

original: BhP_04.01.023/1 tat-prādurbhāva-saṃyoga- vidyotita-manā muniḥ
BhP_04.01.023/2 uttiṣṭhann eka-pādena dadarśa vibudharṣabhān
analyzed: uttiṣṭhan eka pādena dadarśa vibudha ṛṣabhān

original: BhP_04.01.024/1 praṇamya daṇḍavad bhūmāv upatasthe 'rhaṇāñjaliḥ
analyzed: praṇamya daṇḍa vat bhūmau upatasthe arhaṇa añjaliḥ

original: BhP_04.01.024/2 vṛṣa-haṃsa-suparṇa-sthān svaiḥ svaiś cihnaiś ca cihnitān
analyzed: vṛṣa haṃsa suparṇa sthān svaiḥ svaiḥ cihnaiḥ ca cihnitān

original: BhP_04.01.025/1 kṛpāvalokena hasad- vadanenopalambhitān
analyzed: kṛpā avalokena hasat vadanena upalambhitān

original: BhP_04.01.025/2 tad-rociṣā pratihate nimīlya munir akṣiṇī
analyzed: tad rociṣā pratihate nimīlya muniḥ akṣiṇī

original: BhP_04.01.026/1 cetas tat-pravaṇaṃ yuñjann astāvīt saṃhatāñjaliḥ
analyzed: cetaḥ tad pravaṇam yuñjan astāvīt saṃhata añjaliḥ

original: BhP_04.01.026/2 ślakṣṇayā sūktayā vācā sarva-loka-garīyasaḥ
analyzed: ślakṣṇayā sūktayā vācā sarva loka garīyasaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.027/0 atrir uvāca
analyzed: atriḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.01.027/1 viśvodbhava-sthiti-layeṣu vibhajyamānair
analyzed: viśva udbhava sthiti layeṣu vibhajyamānaiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.027/2 māyā-guṇair anuyugaṃ vigṛhīta-dehāḥ
analyzed: māyā guṇaiḥ anuyugam vigṛhīta dehāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.027/3 te brahma-viṣṇu-giriśāḥ praṇato 'smy ahaṃ vas
analyzed: te brahma viṣṇu giriśāḥ praṇataḥ asmi aham vaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.027/4 tebhyaḥ ka eva bhavatāṃ ma ihopahūtaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ kaḥ eva bhavatām me iha upahūtaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.028/1 eko mayeha bhagavān vividha-pradhānaiś
analyzed: ekaḥ mayā iha bhagavān vividha pradhānaiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.028/2 cittī-kṛtaḥ prajananāya kathaṃ nu yūyam
analyzed: cittīkṛtaḥ prajananāya katham nu yūyam

original: BhP_04.01.028/3 atrāgatās tanu-bhṛtāṃ manaso 'pi dūrād
analyzed: atrā āgatāḥ tanubhṛtām manasaḥ api dūrāt

original: BhP_04.01.028/4 brūta prasīdata mahān iha vismayo me
analyzed: brūta prasīdata mahān iha vismayaḥ me

original: BhP_04.01.029/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.01.029/1 iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā trayas te vibudharṣabhāḥ
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā trayaḥ te vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.029/2 pratyāhuḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā prahasya tam ṛṣiṃ prabho
analyzed: pratyāhuḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā prahasya tam ṛṣim prabho

original: BhP_04.01.030/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.01.030/1 yathā kṛtas te saṅkalpo bhāvyaṃ tenaiva nānyathā
analyzed: yathā kṛtaḥ te saṅkalpaḥ bhāvyam tena eva na anyathā

original: BhP_04.01.030/2 sat-saṅkalpasya te brahman yad vai dhyāyati te vayam
analyzed: sat saṅkalpasya te brahman yat vai dhyāyati te vayam

original: BhP_04.01.031/1 athāsmad-aṃśa-bhūtās te ātmajā loka-viśrutāḥ
analyzed: atha asmad aṃśa bhūtāḥ te ātmajāḥ loka viśrutāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.031/2 bhavitāro 'ṅga bhadraṃ te visrapsyanti ca te yaśaḥ
analyzed: bhavitāraḥ aṅga bhadram te visrapsyanti ca te yaśaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.032/1 evaṃ kāma-varaṃ dattvā pratijagmuḥ sureśvarāḥ
analyzed: evam kāma varam dattvā pratijagmuḥ sura īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.032/2 sabhājitās tayoḥ samyag dampatyor miṣatos tataḥ
analyzed: sabhājitāḥ tayoḥ samyak dampatyoḥ miṣatoḥ tatas

original: BhP_04.01.033/1 somo 'bhūd brahmaṇo 'ṃśena datto viṣṇos tu yogavit
analyzed: somaḥ abhūt brahmaṇaḥ aṃśena dattaḥ viṣṇoḥ tu yoga vid

original: BhP_04.01.033/2 durvāsāḥ śaṅkarasyāṃśo nibodhāṅgirasaḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: durvāsāḥ śaṅkarasya aṃśaḥ nibodha aṅgirasaḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.034/1 śraddhā tv aṅgirasaḥ patnī catasro 'sūta kanyakāḥ
analyzed: śraddhā tu aṅgirasaḥ patnī catasraḥ asūta kanyakāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.034/2 sinīvālī kuhū rākā caturthy anumatis tathā
analyzed: sinīvālī kuhuḥ rākā caturthī anumatiḥ tathā

original: BhP_04.01.035/1 tat-putrāv aparāv āstāṃ khyātau svārociṣe 'ntare
analyzed: tad putrau aparau āstām khyātau svārociṣe antare

original: BhP_04.01.035/2 utathyo bhagavān sākṣād brahmiṣṭhaś ca bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: utathyaḥ bhagavān sākṣāt brahmiṣṭhaḥ ca bṛhaspatiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.036/1 pulastyo 'janayat patnyām agastyaṃ ca havirbhuvi
analyzed: pulastyaḥ ajanayat patnyām agastyam ca haviḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_04.01.036/2 so 'nya-janmani dahrāgnir viśravāś ca mahā-tapāḥ
analyzed: saḥ anya janmani dahra agniḥ viśravāḥ ca mahā tapāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.037/1 tasya yakṣa-patir devaḥ kuberas tv iḍaviḍā-sutaḥ
analyzed: tasya yakṣapatiḥ devaḥ kuberaḥ tu iḍaviḍā sutaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.037/2 rāvaṇaḥ kumbhakarṇaś ca tathānyasyāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ ca tathā anyasyām vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.038/1 pulahasya gatir bhāryā trīn asūta satī sutān
analyzed: pulahasya gatiḥ bhāryā trīn asūta satī sutān

original: BhP_04.01.038/2 karmaśreṣṭhaṃ varīyāṃsaṃ sahiṣṇuṃ ca mahā-mate
analyzed: karma śreṣṭham varīyāṃsam sahiṣṇum ca mahāmate

original: BhP_04.01.039/1 krator api kriyā bhāryā vālakhilyān asūyata
analyzed: kratoḥ api kriyā bhāryā vālakhilyān asūyata

original: BhP_04.01.039/2 ṛṣīn ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi jvalato brahma-tejasā
analyzed: ṛṣīn ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi jvalataḥ brahma tejasā

original: BhP_04.01.040/1 ūrjāyāṃ jajñire putrā vasiṣṭhasya parantapa
analyzed: ūrjāyām jajñire putrāḥ vasiṣṭhasya parantapa

original: BhP_04.01.040/2 citraketu-pradhānās te sapta brahmarṣayo 'malāḥ
analyzed: citraketu pradhānāḥ te sapta brahmarṣayaḥ amalāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.041/1 citraketuḥ surociś ca virajā mitra eva ca
analyzed: citraketuḥ surociḥ ca virajāḥ mitraḥ eva ca

original: BhP_04.01.041/2 ulbaṇo vasubhṛdyāno dyumān śakty-ādayo 'pare
analyzed: ulbaṇaḥ vasubhṛt yānaḥ dyumān śakti ādayaḥ apare

original: BhP_04.01.042/1 cittis tv atharvaṇaḥ patnī lebhe putraṃ dhṛta-vratam
analyzed: cittiḥ tu atharvaṇaḥ patnī lebhe putram dhṛta vratam

original: BhP_04.01.042/2 dadhyañcam aśvaśirasaṃ bhṛgor vaṃśaṃ nibodha me
analyzed: dadhyañcam aśvaśirasam bhṛgoḥ vaṃśam nibodha me

original: BhP_04.01.043/1 bhṛguḥ khyātyāṃ mahā-bhāgaḥ patnyāṃ putrān ajījanat
analyzed: bhṛguḥ khyātyām mahābhāgaḥ patnyām putrān ajījanat

original: BhP_04.01.043/2 dhātāraṃ ca vidhātāraṃ śriyaṃ ca bhagavat-parām
analyzed: dhātāram ca vidhātāram śriyam ca bhagavat parām

original: BhP_04.01.044/1 āyatiṃ niyatiṃ caiva sute merus tayor adāt
analyzed: āyatim niyatim ca eva sute meruḥ tayoḥ adāt

original: BhP_04.01.044/2 tābhyāṃ tayor abhavatāṃ mṛkaṇḍaḥ prāṇa eva ca
analyzed: tābhyām tayoḥ abhavatām mṛkaṇḍaḥ prāṇaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_04.01.045/1 mārkaṇḍeyo mṛkaṇḍasya prāṇād vedaśirā muniḥ
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mṛkaṇḍasya prāṇāt vedaśirāḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_04.01.045/2 kaviś ca bhārgavo yasya bhagavān uśanā sutaḥ
analyzed: kaviḥ ca bhārgavaḥ yasya bhagavān uśanā sutaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.046/1 ta ete munayaḥ kṣattar lokān sargair abhāvayan
analyzed: te ete munayaḥ kṣattar lokān sargaiḥ abhāvayan

original: BhP_04.01.046/2 eṣa kardama-dauhitra- santānaḥ kathitas tava
analyzed: eṣa kardama dauhitra santānaḥ kathitaḥ tava

original: BhP_04.01.046/3 śṛṇvataḥ śraddadhānasya sadyaḥ pāpa-haraḥ paraḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ śraddadhānasya sadyas pāpa haraḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_04.01.047/1 prasūtiṃ mānavīṃ dakṣa upayeme hy ajātmajaḥ
analyzed: prasūtim mānavīm dakṣaḥ upayeme hi aja ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.047/2 tasyāṃ sasarja duhitṝḥ ṣoḍaśāmala-locanāḥ
analyzed: tasyām sasarja duhitṝḥ ṣoḍaśa amala locanāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.048/1 trayodaśādād dharmāya tathaikām agnaye vibhuḥ
analyzed: trayodaśa adāt dharmāya tathā ekām agnaye vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.01.048/2 pitṛbhya ekāṃ yuktebhyo bhavāyaikāṃ bhava-cchide
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ ekām yuktebhyaḥ bhavāya ekām bhava chide

original: BhP_04.01.049/1 śraddhā maitrī dayā śāntis tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ kriyonnatiḥ
BhP_04.01.049/2 buddhir medhā titikṣā hrīr mūrtir dharmasya patnayaḥ
analyzed: buddhiḥ medhā titikṣā hrīḥ mūrtiḥ dharmasya patnayaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.050/1 śraddhāsūta śubhaṃ maitrī prasādam abhayaṃ dayā
analyzed: śraddhā asūta śubham maitrī prasādam abhayam dayā

original: BhP_04.01.050/2 śāntiḥ sukhaṃ mudaṃ tuṣṭiḥ smayaṃ puṣṭir asūyata
analyzed: śāntiḥ sukham mudam tuṣṭiḥ smayam puṣṭiḥ asūyata

original: BhP_04.01.051/1 yogaṃ kriyonnatir darpam arthaṃ buddhir asūyata
analyzed: yogam kriyā unnatiḥ darpam artham buddhiḥ asūyata

original: BhP_04.01.051/2 medhā smṛtiṃ titikṣā tu kṣemaṃ hrīḥ praśrayaṃ sutam
analyzed: medhā smṛtim titikṣā tu kṣemam hrīḥ praśrayam sutam

original: BhP_04.01.052/1 mūrtiḥ sarva-guṇotpattir nara-nārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
analyzed: mūrtiḥ sarva guṇa utpattiḥ nara nārāyaṇau ṛṣī

original: BhP_04.01.053/1 yayor janmany ado viśvam abhyanandat sunirvṛtam
analyzed: yayoḥ janmani adaḥ viśvam abhyanandat su nirvṛtam

original: BhP_04.01.053/2 manāṃsi kakubho vātāḥ praseduḥ sarito 'drayaḥ
analyzed: manāṃsi kakubhaḥ vātāḥ praseduḥ saritaḥ adrayaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.054/1 divy avādyanta tūryāṇi petuḥ kusuma-vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: divi avādyanta tūryāṇi petuḥ kusuma vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.054/2 munayas tuṣṭuvus tuṣṭā jagur gandharva-kinnarāḥ
analyzed: munayaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ tuṣṭāḥ jaguḥ gandharva kinnarāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.055/1 nṛtyanti sma striyo devya āsīt parama-maṅgalam
analyzed: nṛtyanti sma striyaḥ devyaḥ āsīt parama maṅgalam

original: BhP_04.01.055/2 devā brahmādayaḥ sarve upatasthur abhiṣṭavaiḥ
analyzed: devāḥ brahma ādayaḥ sarve upatasthuḥ abhiṣṭavaiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.056/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.01.056/1 yo māyayā viracitaṃ nijayātmanīdaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ māyayā viracitam nijayā ātmani idam

original: BhP_04.01.056/2 khe rūpa-bhedam iva tat-praticakṣaṇāya
analyzed: khe rūpa bhedam iva tad praticakṣaṇāya

original: BhP_04.01.056/3 etena dharma-sadane ṛṣi-mūrtinādya
analyzed: etena dharma sadane ṛṣi mūrtinā adya

original: BhP_04.01.056/4 prāduścakāra puruṣāya namaḥ parasmai
analyzed: prāduścakāra puruṣāya namaḥ parasmai

original: BhP_04.01.057/1 so 'yaṃ sthiti-vyatikaropaśamāya sṛṣṭān
analyzed: saḥ ayam sthiti vyatikara upaśamāya sṛṣṭān

original: BhP_04.01.057/2 sattvena naḥ sura-gaṇān anumeya-tattvaḥ
analyzed: sattvena naḥ sura gaṇān anumeya tattvaḥ

original: BhP_04.01.057/3 dṛśyād adabhra-karuṇena vilokanena
analyzed: dṛśyāt adabhra karuṇena vilokanena

original: BhP_04.01.057/4 yac chrī-niketam amalaṃ kṣipatāravindam
analyzed: yat śrīniketam amalam kṣipata aravindam

original: BhP_04.01.058/1 evaṃ sura-gaṇais tāta bhagavantāv abhiṣṭutau
analyzed: evam sura gaṇaiḥ tāta bhagavantau abhiṣṭutau

original: BhP_04.01.058/2 labdhāvalokair yayatur arcitau gandhamādanam
analyzed: labdha avalokaiḥ yayatuḥ arcitau gandhamādanam

original: BhP_04.01.059/1 tāv imau vai bhagavato harer aṃśāv ihāgatau
analyzed: tau imau vai bhagavataḥ hareḥ aṃśau iha āgatau

original: BhP_04.01.059/2 bhāra-vyayāya ca bhuvaḥ kṛṣṇau yadu-kurūdvahau
analyzed: bhāra vyayāya ca bhuvaḥ kṛṣṇau yadu kuru udvahau

original: BhP_04.01.060/1 svāhābhimāninaś cāgner ātmajāṃs trīn ajījanat
analyzed: svāhā abhimāninaḥ ca agneḥ ātmajān trīn ajījanat

original: BhP_04.01.060/2 pāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ ca huta-bhojanam
analyzed: pāvakam pavamānam ca śucim ca huta bhojanam

original: BhP_04.01.061/1 tebhyo 'gnayaḥ samabhavan catvāriṃśac ca pañca ca
analyzed: tebhyaḥ agnayaḥ samabhavan catvāriṃśat ca pañca ca

original: BhP_04.01.061/2 ta evaikonapañcāśat sākaṃ pitṛ-pitāmahaiḥ
analyzed: te eva ekonapañcāśat sākam pitṛ pitāmahaiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.062/1 vaitānike karmaṇi yan- nāmabhir brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: vaitānike karmaṇi yat nāmabhiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.01.062/2 āgneyya iṣṭayo yajñe nirūpyante 'gnayas tu te
analyzed: āgneyyaḥ iṣṭayaḥ yajñe nirūpyante agnayaḥ tu te

original: BhP_04.01.063/1 agniṣvāttā barhiṣadaḥ saumyāḥ pitara ājyapāḥ
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ barhiṣadaḥ saumyāḥ pitaraḥ ājya pāḥ

original: BhP_04.01.063/2 sāgnayo 'nagnayas teṣāṃ patnī dākṣāyaṇī svadhā
analyzed: sa agnayaḥ an agnayaḥ teṣām patnī dākṣāyaṇī svadhā

original: BhP_04.01.064/1 tebhyo dadhāra kanye dve vayunāṃ dhāriṇīṃ svadhā
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dadhāra kanye dve vayunām dhāriṇīm svadhā

original: BhP_04.01.064/2 ubhe te brahma-vādinyau jñāna-vijñāna-pārage
analyzed: ubhe te brahma vādinyau jñāna vijñāna pārage

original: BhP_04.01.065/1 bhavasya patnī tu satī bhavaṃ devam anuvratā
analyzed: bhavasya patnī tu satī bhavam devam anuvratā

original: BhP_04.01.065/2 ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ putraṃ na lebhe guṇa-śīlataḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sadṛśam putram na lebhe guṇa śīlataḥ

original: BhP_04.01.066/1 pitary apratirūpe sve bhavāyānāgase ruṣā
analyzed: pitari apratirūpe sve bhavāya anāgase ruṣā

original: BhP_04.01.066/2 aprauḍhaivātmanātmānam ajahād yoga-saṃyutā
analyzed: aprauḍhā eva ātmanā ātmānam ajahāt yoga saṃyutā

original: BhP_04.02.001/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.02.001/1 bhave śīlavatāṃ śreṣṭhe dakṣo duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: bhave śīlavatām śreṣṭhe dakṣaḥ duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.001/2 vidveṣam akarot kasmād anādṛtyātmajāṃ satīm
analyzed: vidveṣam akarot kasmāt an ādṛtya ātmajām satīm

original: BhP_04.02.002/1 kas taṃ carācara-guruṃ nirvairaṃ śānta-vigraham
analyzed: kaḥ tam carācara gurum nirvairam śānta vigraham

original: BhP_04.02.002/2 ātmārāmaṃ kathaṃ dveṣṭi jagato daivataṃ mahat
analyzed: ātma ārāmam katham dveṣṭi jagataḥ daivatam mahat

original: BhP_04.02.003/1 etad ākhyāhi me brahman jāmātuḥ śvaśurasya ca
analyzed: etat ākhyāhi me brahman jāmātuḥ śvaśurasya ca

original: BhP_04.02.003/2 vidveṣas tu yataḥ prāṇāṃs tatyaje dustyajān satī
analyzed: vidveṣaḥ tu yatas prāṇān tatyaje dustyajān satī

original: BhP_04.02.004/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.02.004/1 purā viśva-sṛjāṃ satre sametāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: purā viśva sṛjām satre sametāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.004/2 tathāmara-gaṇāḥ sarve sānugā munayo 'gnayaḥ
analyzed: tathā amara gaṇāḥ sarve sa anugāḥ munayaḥ agnayaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.005/1 tatra praviṣṭam ṛṣayo dṛṣṭvārkam iva rociṣā
analyzed: tatra praviṣṭam ṛṣayaḥ dṛṣṭvā arkam iva rociṣā

original: BhP_04.02.005/2 bhrājamānaṃ vitimiraṃ kurvantaṃ tan mahat sadaḥ
analyzed: bhrājamānam vitimiram kurvantam tat mahat sadaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.006/1 udatiṣṭhan sadasyās te sva-dhiṣṇyebhyaḥ sahāgnayaḥ
analyzed: udatiṣṭhan sadasyāḥ te sva dhiṣṇyebhyaḥ saha agnayaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.006/2 ṛte viriñcāṃ śarvaṃ ca tad-bhāsākṣipta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: ṛte viriñcām śarvam ca tad bhāsā ākṣipta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.007/1 sadasas-patibhir dakṣo bhagavān sādhu sat-kṛtaḥ
analyzed: sadasaspatibhiḥ dakṣaḥ bhagavān sādhu satkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.007/2 ajaṃ loka-guruṃ natvā niṣasāda tad-ājñayā
analyzed: ajam loka gurum natvā niṣasāda tad ājñayā

original: BhP_04.02.008/1 prāṅ-niṣaṇṇaṃ mṛḍaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāmṛṣyat tad-anādṛtaḥ
analyzed: prāc niṣaṇṇam mṛḍam dṛṣṭvā na amṛṣyat tat an ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.008/2 uvāca vāmaṃ cakṣurbhyām abhivīkṣya dahann iva
analyzed: uvāca vāmam cakṣurbhyām abhivīkṣya dahan iva

original: BhP_04.02.009/1 śrūyatāṃ brahmarṣayo me saha-devāḥ sahāgnayaḥ
analyzed: śrūyatām brahmarṣayaḥ me saha devāḥ saha agnayaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.009/2 sādhūnāṃ bruvato vṛttaṃ nājñānān na ca matsarāt
analyzed: sādhūnām bruvataḥ vṛttam na ajñānāt na ca matsarāt

original: BhP_04.02.010/1 ayaṃ tu loka-pālānāṃ yaśo-ghno nirapatrapaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu lokapālānām yaśaḥ ghnaḥ nirapatrapaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.010/2 sadbhir ācaritaḥ panthā yena stabdhena dūṣitaḥ
analyzed: sadbhiḥ ācaritaḥ panthāḥ yena stabdhena dūṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.011/1 eṣa me śiṣyatāṃ prāpto yan me duhitur agrahīt
analyzed: eṣa me śiṣya tām prāptaḥ yat me duhituḥ agrahīt

original: BhP_04.02.011/2 pāṇiṃ viprāgni-mukhataḥ sāvitryā iva sādhuvat
analyzed: pāṇim vipra agni mukhataḥ sāvitryāḥ iva sādhu vat

original: BhP_04.02.012/1 gṛhītvā mṛga-śāvākṣyāḥ pāṇiṃ markaṭa-locanaḥ
analyzed: gṛhītvā mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ pāṇim markaṭa locanaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.012/2 pratyutthānābhivādārhe vācāpy akṛta nocitam
analyzed: pratyutthāna abhivāda arhe vācā api akṛta na ucitam

original: BhP_04.02.013/1 lupta-kriyāyāśucaye mānine bhinna-setave
analyzed: lupta kriyāya aśucaye mānine bhinna setave

original: BhP_04.02.013/2 anicchann apy adāṃ bālāṃ śūdrāyevośatīṃ giram
analyzed: an icchan api adām bālām śūdrāya iva uśatīm giram

original: BhP_04.02.014/1 pretāvāseṣu ghoreṣu pretair bhūta-gaṇair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: preta āvāseṣu ghoreṣu pretaiḥ bhūta gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.014/2 aṭaty unmattavan nagno vyupta-keśo hasan rudan
analyzed: aṭati unmatta vat nagnaḥ vyupta keśaḥ hasan rudan

original: BhP_04.02.015/1 citā-bhasma-kṛta-snānaḥ preta-sraṅ-nrasthi-bhūṣaṇaḥ
BhP_04.02.015/2 śivāpadeśo hy aśivo matto matta-jana-priyaḥ
analyzed: śiva apadeśaḥ hi aśivaḥ mattaḥ matta jana priyaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.015/3 patiḥ pramatha-nāthānāṃ tamo-mātrātmakātmanām
analyzed: patiḥ pramatha nāthānām tamaḥ mātra ātmaka ātmanām

original: BhP_04.02.016/1 tasmā unmāda-nāthāya naṣṭa-śaucāya durhṛde
analyzed: tasmai unmāda nāthāya naṣṭa śaucāya durhṛde

original: BhP_04.02.016/2 dattā bata mayā sādhvī codite parameṣṭhinā
analyzed: dattā bata mayā sādhvī codite parameṣṭhinā

original: BhP_04.02.017/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.02.017/1 vinindyaivaṃ sa giriśam apratīpam avasthitam
analyzed: vinindya evam sa giriśam apratīpam avasthitam

original: BhP_04.02.017/2 dakṣo 'thāpa upaspṛśya kruddhaḥ śaptuṃ pracakrame
analyzed: dakṣaḥ atha apaḥ upaspṛśya kruddhaḥ śaptum pracakrame

original: BhP_04.02.018/1 ayaṃ tu deva-yajana indropendrādibhir bhavaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu deva yajane indra upendra ādibhiḥ bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.018/2 saha bhāgaṃ na labhatāṃ devair deva-gaṇādhamaḥ
analyzed: saha bhāgam na labhatām devaiḥ deva gaṇa adhamaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.019/1 niṣidhyamānaḥ sa sadasya-mukhyair dakṣo giritrāya visṛjya śāpam
analyzed: niṣidhyamānaḥ sa sadasya mukhyaiḥ dakṣaḥ giritrāya visṛjya śāpam

original: BhP_04.02.019/2 tasmād viniṣkramya vivṛddha-manyur jagāma kauravya nijaṃ niketanam
analyzed: tasmāt viniṣkramya vivṛddha manyuḥ jagāma kauravya nijam niketanam

original: BhP_04.02.020/1 vijñāya śāpaṃ giriśānugāgraṇīr nandīśvaro roṣa-kaṣāya-dūṣitaḥ
analyzed: vijñāya śāpam giriśa anugā agraṇī nandīśvaraḥ roṣa kaṣāya dūṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.020/2 dakṣāya śāpaṃ visasarja dāruṇaṃ ye cānvamodaṃs tad-avācyatāṃ dvijāḥ
analyzed: dakṣāya śāpam visasarja dāruṇam ye ca anvamodan tad avācya tām dvijāḥ

original: BhP_04.02.021/1 ya etan martyam uddiśya bhagavaty apratidruhi
analyzed: yaḥ etat martyam uddiśya bhagavati a pratidruhi

original: BhP_04.02.021/2 druhyaty ajñaḥ pṛthag-dṛṣṭis tattvato vimukho bhavet
analyzed: druhyati ajñaḥ pṛthak dṛṣṭiḥ tattvataḥ vimukhaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_04.02.022/1 gṛheṣu kūṭa-dharmeṣu sakto grāmya-sukhecchayā
analyzed: gṛheṣu kūṭa dharmeṣu saktaḥ grāmya sukha icchayā

original: BhP_04.02.022/2 karma-tantraṃ vitanute veda-vāda-vipanna-dhīḥ
analyzed: karma tantram vitanute veda vāda vipanna dhīḥ

original: BhP_04.02.023/1 buddhyā parābhidhyāyinyā vismṛtātma-gatiḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: buddhyā para abhidhyāyinyā vismṛta ātma gatiḥ paśuḥ

original: BhP_04.02.023/2 strī-kāmaḥ so 'stv atitarāṃ dakṣo basta-mukho 'cirāt
analyzed: strī kāmaḥ saḥ astu atitarām dakṣaḥ basta mukhaḥ acirāt

original: BhP_04.02.024/1 vidyā-buddhir avidyāyāṃ karmamayyām asau jaḍaḥ
analyzed: vidyā buddhiḥ avidyāyām karma mayyām asau jaḍaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.024/2 saṃsarantv iha ye cāmum anu śarvāvamāninam
analyzed: saṃsarantu iha ye ca amum anu śarva avamāninam

original: BhP_04.02.025/1 giraḥ śrutāyāḥ puṣpiṇyā madhu-gandhena bhūriṇā
analyzed: giraḥ śrutāyāḥ puṣpiṇyāḥ madhu gandhena bhūriṇā

original: BhP_04.02.025/2 mathnā conmathitātmānaḥ sammuhyantu hara-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: ca unmathita ātmānaḥ sammuhyantu hara dviṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.026/1 sarva-bhakṣā dvijā vṛttyai dhṛta-vidyā-tapo-vratāḥ
analyzed: sarva bhakṣāḥ dvijāḥ vṛttyai dhṛta vidyā tapaḥ vratāḥ

original: BhP_04.02.026/2 vitta-dehendriyārāmā yācakā vicarantv iha
analyzed: vitta deha indriya ārāmāḥ yācakāḥ vicarantu iha

original: BhP_04.02.027/1 tasyaivaṃ vadataḥ śāpaṃ śrutvā dvija-kulāya vai
analyzed: tasya evam vadataḥ śāpam śrutvā dvija kulāya vai

original: BhP_04.02.027/2 bhṛguḥ pratyasṛjac chāpaṃ brahma-daṇḍaṃ duratyayam
analyzed: bhṛguḥ pratyasṛjat śāpam brahmadaṇḍam duratyayam

original: BhP_04.02.028/1 bhava-vrata-dharā ye ca ye ca tān samanuvratāḥ
analyzed: bhava vrata dharāḥ ye ca ye ca tān samanuvratāḥ

original: BhP_04.02.028/2 pāṣaṇḍinas te bhavantu sac-chāstra-paripanthinaḥ
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍinaḥ te bhavantu sat śāstra paripanthinaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.029/1 naṣṭa-śaucā mūḍha-dhiyo jaṭā-bhasmāsthi-dhāriṇaḥ
analyzed: naṣṭa śaucāḥ mūḍha dhiyaḥ jaṭā bhasma asthi dhāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.029/2 viśantu śiva-dīkṣāyāṃ yatra daivaṃ surāsavam
analyzed: viśantu śiva dīkṣāyām yatra daivam surāsavam

original: BhP_04.02.030/1 brahma ca brāhmaṇāṃś caiva yad yūyaṃ parinindatha
analyzed: brahma ca brāhmaṇān ca eva yat yūyam parinindatha

original: BhP_04.02.030/2 setuṃ vidhāraṇaṃ puṃsām ataḥ pāṣaṇḍam āśritāḥ
analyzed: setum vidhāraṇam puṃsām atas pāṣaṇḍam āśritāḥ

original: BhP_04.02.031/1 eṣa eva hi lokānāṃ śivaḥ panthāḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva hi lokānām śivaḥ panthāḥ sanātanaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.031/2 yaṃ pūrve cānusantasthur yat-pramāṇaṃ janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yam pūrve ca anusantasthuḥ yad pramāṇam janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.032/1 tad brahma paramaṃ śuddhaṃ satāṃ vartma sanātanam
analyzed: tat brahma paramam śuddham satām vartma sanātanam

original: BhP_04.02.032/2 vigarhya yāta pāṣaṇḍaṃ daivaṃ vo yatra bhūta-rāṭ
analyzed: vigarhya yāta pāṣaṇḍam daivam vaḥ yatra bhūta rāj

original: BhP_04.02.033/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.02.033/1 tasyaivaṃ vadataḥ śāpaṃ bhṛgoḥ sa bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: tasya evam vadataḥ śāpam bhṛgoḥ sa bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.033/2 niścakrāma tataḥ kiñcid vimanā iva sānugaḥ
analyzed: niścakrāma tatas kiñcid vimanāḥ iva sa anugaḥ

original: BhP_04.02.034/1 te 'pi viśva-sṛjaḥ satraṃ sahasra-parivatsarān
analyzed: te api viśva sṛjaḥ satram sahasra parivatsarān

original: BhP_04.02.034/2 saṃvidhāya maheṣvāsa yatrejya ṛṣabho hariḥ
analyzed: saṃvidhāya mahā iṣvāsa yatra ijyaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_04.02.035/1 āplutyāvabhṛthaṃ yatra gaṅgā yamunayānvitā
analyzed: āplutya avabhṛtham yatra gaṅgā yamunayā anvitā

original: BhP_04.02.035/2 virajenātmanā sarve svaṃ svaṃ dhāma yayus tataḥ
analyzed: virajena ātmanā sarve svam svam dhāma yayuḥ tatas

original: BhP_04.03.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.03.001/1 sadā vidviṣator evaṃ kālo vai dhriyamāṇayoḥ
analyzed: sadā vidviṣatoḥ evam kālaḥ vai dhriyamāṇayoḥ

original: BhP_04.03.001/2 jāmātuḥ śvaśurasyāpi sumahān aticakrame
analyzed: jāmātuḥ śvaśurasya api su mahān aticakrame

original: BhP_04.03.002/1 yadābhiṣikto dakṣas tu brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā
analyzed: yadā abhiṣiktaḥ dakṣaḥ tu brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā

original: BhP_04.03.002/2 prajāpatīnāṃ sarveṣām ādhipatye smayo 'bhavat
analyzed: prajāpatīnām sarveṣām ādhipatye sma yaḥ abhavat

original: BhP_04.03.003/1 iṣṭvā sa vājapeyena brahmiṣṭhān abhibhūya ca
analyzed: iṣṭvā sa vājapeyena brahmiṣṭhān abhibhūya ca

original: BhP_04.03.003/2 bṛhaspati-savaṃ nāma samārebhe kratūttamam
analyzed: bṛhaspatisavam nāma samārebhe kratu uttamam

original: BhP_04.03.004/1 tasmin brahmarṣayaḥ sarve devarṣi-pitṛ-devatāḥ
analyzed: tasmin brahmarṣayaḥ sarve deva ṛṣi pitṛ devatāḥ

original: BhP_04.03.004/2 āsan kṛta-svastyayanās tat-patnyaś ca sa-bhartṛkāḥ
analyzed: āsan kṛta svastyayanāḥ tad patnyaḥ ca sa bhartṛkāḥ

original: BhP_04.03.005/1 tad upaśrutya nabhasi khe-carāṇāṃ prajalpatām
analyzed: tat upaśrutya nabhasi khecarāṇām prajalpatām

original: BhP_04.03.005/2 satī dākṣāyaṇī devī pitṛ-yajña-mahotsavam
analyzed: satī dākṣāyaṇī devī pitṛ yajña mahā utsavam

original: BhP_04.03.006/1 vrajantīḥ sarvato digbhya upadeva-vara-striyaḥ
analyzed: vrajantīḥ sarvatas digbhyaḥ upadeva vara striyaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.006/2 vimāna-yānāḥ sa-preṣṭhā niṣka-kaṇṭhīḥ suvāsasaḥ
analyzed: vimāna yānāḥ sa preṣṭhāḥ niṣka kaṇṭhīḥ su vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.007/1 dṛṣṭvā sva-nilayābhyāśe lolākṣīr mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍalāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sva nilaya abhyāśe lola akṣīḥ mṛṣṭa kuṇḍalāḥ

original: BhP_04.03.007/2 patiṃ bhūta-patiṃ devam autsukyād abhyabhāṣata
analyzed: patim bhūtapatim devam autsukyāt abhyabhāṣata

original: BhP_04.03.008/0 saty uvāca
analyzed: satī uvāca

original: BhP_04.03.008/1 prajāpates te śvaśurasya sāmprataṃ niryāpito yajña-mahotsavaḥ kila
analyzed: prajāpateḥ te śvaśurasya sāmpratam niryāpitaḥ yajña mahā utsavaḥ kila

original: BhP_04.03.008/2 vayaṃ ca tatrābhisarāma vāma te yady arthitāmī vibudhā vrajanti hi
analyzed: vayam ca tatra abhisarāma vāma te yadi arthi tā amī vibudhāḥ vrajanti hi

original: BhP_04.03.009/1 tasmin bhaginyo mama bhartṛbhiḥ svakair dhruvaṃ gamiṣyanti suhṛd-didṛkṣavaḥ
analyzed: tasmin bhaginyaḥ mama bhartṛbhiḥ svakaiḥ dhruvam gamiṣyanti suhṛd didṛkṣavaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.009/2 ahaṃ ca tasmin bhavatābhikāmaye sahopanītaṃ paribarham arhitum
analyzed: aham ca tasmin bhavatā abhikāmaye saha upanītam paribarham arhitum

original: BhP_04.03.010/1 tatra svasṝr me nanu bhartṛ-sammitā mātṛ-ṣvasṝḥ klinna-dhiyaṃ ca mātaram
analyzed: tatra me nanu bhartṛ sammitāḥ mātṛṣvasṝḥ klinna dhiyam ca mātaram

original: BhP_04.03.010/2 drakṣye cirotkaṇṭha-manā maharṣibhir unnīyamānaṃ ca mṛḍādhvara-dhvajam
analyzed: drakṣye cira utkaṇṭha manāḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ unnīyamānam ca mṛḍa adhvara dhvajam

original: BhP_04.03.011/1 tvayy etad āścaryam ajātma-māyayā vinirmitaṃ bhāti guṇa-trayātmakam
analyzed: tvayi etat āścaryam aja ātma māyayā vinirmitam bhāti guṇatraya ātmakam

original: BhP_04.03.011/2 tathāpy ahaṃ yoṣid atattva-vic ca te dīnā didṛkṣe bhava me bhava-kṣitim
analyzed: tathā api aham yoṣit a tattva vid ca te dīnā didṛkṣe bhava me bhava kṣitim

original: BhP_04.03.012/1 paśya prayāntīr abhavānya-yoṣito 'py alaṅkṛtāḥ kānta-sakhā varūthaśaḥ
analyzed: paśya prayāntīḥ abhava anya yoṣitaḥ api alaṅkṛtāḥ kānta sakhāḥ varūthaśas

original: BhP_04.03.012/2 yāsāṃ vrajadbhiḥ śiti-kaṇṭha maṇḍitaṃ nabho vimānaiḥ kala-haṃsa-pāṇḍubhiḥ
analyzed: yāsām vrajadbhiḥ śitikaṇṭha maṇḍitam nabhaḥ vimānaiḥ kalahaṃsa pāṇḍubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.03.013/1 kathaṃ sutāyāḥ pitṛ-geha-kautukaṃ niśamya dehaḥ sura-varya neṅgate
analyzed: katham sutāyāḥ pitṛ geha kautukam niśamya dehaḥ sura varya na iṅgate

original: BhP_04.03.013/2 anāhutā apy abhiyanti sauhṛdaṃ bhartur guror deha-kṛtaś ca ketanam
analyzed: an āhutāḥ api abhiyanti sauhṛdam bhartuḥ guroḥ dehakṛtaḥ ca ketanam

original: BhP_04.03.014/1 tan me prasīdedam amartya vāñchitaṃ kartuṃ bhavān kāruṇiko batārhati
analyzed: tat me prasīda idam amartya vāñchitam kartum bhavān kāruṇikaḥ bata arhati

original: BhP_04.03.014/2 tvayātmano 'rdhe 'ham adabhra-cakṣuṣā nirūpitā mānugṛhāṇa yācitaḥ
analyzed: tvayā ātmanaḥ ardhe aham adabhra cakṣuṣā nirūpitā mā anugṛhāṇa yācitaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.015/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.03.015/1 evaṃ giritraḥ priyayābhibhāṣitaḥ pratyabhyadhatta prahasan suhṛt-priyaḥ
analyzed: evam giritraḥ priyayā abhibhāṣitaḥ pratyabhyadhatta prahasan suhṛd priyaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.015/2 saṃsmārito marma-bhidaḥ kuvāg-iṣūn yān āha ko viśva-sṛjāṃ samakṣataḥ
analyzed: saṃsmāritaḥ marma bhidaḥ ku vāc iṣūn yān āha kaḥ viśvasṛjām samakṣataḥ

original: BhP_04.03.016/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_04.03.016/1 tvayoditaṃ śobhanam eva śobhane anāhutā apy abhiyanti bandhuṣu
analyzed: tvayā uditam śobhanam eva śobhane an āhutāḥ api abhiyanti bandhuṣu

original: BhP_04.03.016/2 te yady anutpādita-doṣa-dṛṣṭayo balīyasānātmya-madena manyunā
analyzed: te yadi an utpādita doṣa dṛṣṭayaḥ balīyasā anātmya madena manyunā

original: BhP_04.03.017/1 vidyā-tapo-vitta-vapur-vayaḥ-kulaiḥ satāṃ guṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhir asattametaraiḥ
analyzed: vidyā tapaḥ vitta vapuḥ vayaḥ kulaiḥ satām guṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ asattama itaraiḥ

original: BhP_04.03.017/2 smṛtau hatāyāṃ bhṛta-māna-durdṛśaḥ stabdhā na paśyanti hi dhāma bhūyasām
analyzed: smṛtau hatāyām bhṛta māna durdṛśaḥ stabdhāḥ na paśyanti hi dhāma bhūyasām

original: BhP_04.03.018/1 naitādṛśānāṃ sva-jana-vyapekṣayā gṛhān pratīyād anavasthitātmanām
analyzed: na etādṛśānām sva jana vyapekṣayā gṛhān pratīyāt anavasthita ātmanām

original: BhP_04.03.018/2 ye 'bhyāgatān vakra-dhiyābhicakṣate āropita-bhrūbhir amarṣaṇākṣibhiḥ
analyzed: ye abhyāgatān vakra dhiyā abhicakṣate āropita bhrūbhiḥ amarṣaṇa akṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.03.019/1 tathāribhir na vyathate śilīmukhaiḥ śete 'rditāṅgo hṛdayena dūyatā
analyzed: tathā aribhiḥ na vyathate śilīmukhaiḥ śete ardita aṅgaḥ hṛdayena dūyatā

original: BhP_04.03.019/2 svānāṃ yathā vakra-dhiyāṃ duruktibhir divā-niśaṃ tapyati marma-tāḍitaḥ
analyzed: svānām yathā vakra dhiyām duruktibhiḥ divāniśam tapyati marma tāḍitaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.020/1 vyaktaṃ tvam utkṛṣṭa-gateḥ prajāpateḥ priyātmajānām asi subhru me matā
analyzed: vyaktam tvam utkṛṣṭa gateḥ prajāpateḥ priya ātmajānām asi subhru me matā

original: BhP_04.03.020/2 tathāpi mānaṃ na pituḥ prapatsyase mad-āśrayāt kaḥ paritapyate yataḥ
analyzed: tathā api mānam na pituḥ prapatsyase mad āśrayāt kaḥ paritapyate yatas

original: BhP_04.03.021/1 pāpacyamānena hṛdāturendriyaḥ samṛddhibhiḥ pūruṣa-buddhi-sākṣiṇām
analyzed: pāpacyamānena hṛdā ātura indriyaḥ samṛddhibhiḥ pūruṣa buddhi sākṣiṇām

original: BhP_04.03.021/2 akalpa eṣām adhiroḍhum añjasā paraṃ padaṃ dveṣṭi yathāsurā harim
analyzed: akalpaḥ eṣām adhiroḍhum añjasā param padam dveṣṭi yathā asurāḥ harim

original: BhP_04.03.022/1 pratyudgama-praśrayaṇābhivādanaṃ vidhīyate sādhu mithaḥ sumadhyame
analyzed: pratyudgama praśrayaṇa abhivādanam vidhīyate sādhu mithas sumadhyame

original: BhP_04.03.022/2 prājñaiḥ parasmai puruṣāya cetasā guhā-śayāyaiva na deha-mānine
analyzed: prājñaiḥ parasmai puruṣāya cetasā guhāśayāya eva na deha mānine

original: BhP_04.03.023/1 sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ vasudeva-śabditaṃ yad īyate tatra pumān apāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: sattvam viśuddham vasudeva śabditam yat īyate tatra pumān apāvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.03.023/2 sattve ca tasmin bhagavān vāsudevo hy adhokṣajo me namasā vidhīyate
analyzed: sattve ca tasmin bhagavān vāsudevaḥ hi adhokṣajaḥ me namasā vidhīyate

original: BhP_04.03.024/1 tat te nirīkṣyo na pitāpi deha-kṛd dakṣo mama dviṭ tad-anuvratāś ca ye
analyzed: tat te nirīkṣyaḥ na pitā api dehakṛt dakṣaḥ mama dviṣ tad anuvratāḥ ca ye

original: BhP_04.03.024/2 yo viśvasṛg-yajña-gataṃ varoru mām anāgasaṃ durvacasākarot tiraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasṛj yajña gatam vara ūru mām anāgasam durvacasā akarot tiras

original: BhP_04.03.025/1 yadi vrajiṣyasy atihāya mad-vaco bhadraṃ bhavatyā na tato bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yadi vrajiṣyasi atihāya mad vacaḥ bhadram bhavatyāḥ na tatas bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_04.03.025/2 sambhāvitasya sva-janāt parābhavo yadā sa sadyo maraṇāya kalpate
analyzed: sambhāvitasya sva janāt parābhavaḥ yadā sa sadyas maraṇāya kalpate

original: BhP_04.04.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.04.001/1 etāvad uktvā virarāma śaṅkaraḥ patny-aṅga-nāśaṃ hy ubhayatra cintayan
analyzed: etāvat uktvā virarāma śaṅkaraḥ patnī aṅga nāśam hi ubhayatra cintayan

original: BhP_04.04.001/2 suhṛd-didṛkṣuḥ pariśaṅkitā bhavān niṣkrāmatī nirviśatī dvidhāsa sā
analyzed: suhṛd didṛkṣuḥ pariśaṅkitā bhavān niṣkrāmatī nirviśatī dvidhā āsa sā

original: BhP_04.04.002/1 suhṛd-didṛkṣā-pratighāta-durmanāḥ snehād rudaty aśru-kalātivihvalā
analyzed: suhṛd didṛkṣā pratighāta durmanāḥ snehāt rudatī aśru kalā ati vihvalā

original: BhP_04.04.002/2 bhavaṃ bhavāny apratipūruṣaṃ ruṣā pradhakṣyatīvaikṣata jāta-vepathuḥ
analyzed: bhavam bhavānī a pratipūruṣam ruṣā pradhakṣyatī iva aikṣata jāta vepathuḥ

original: BhP_04.04.003/1 tato viniḥśvasya satī vihāya taṃ śokena roṣeṇa ca dūyatā hṛdā
analyzed: tatas viniḥśvasya satī vihāya tam śokena roṣeṇa ca dūyatā hṛdā

original: BhP_04.04.003/2 pitror agāt straiṇa-vimūḍha-dhīr gṛhān premṇātmano yo 'rdham adāt satāṃ priyaḥ
analyzed: pitroḥ agāt straiṇa vimūḍha dhīḥ gṛhān premṇā ātmanaḥ yaḥ ardham adāt satām priyaḥ

original: BhP_04.04.004/1 tām anvagacchan druta-vikramāṃ satīm ekāṃ tri-netrānucarāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: tām anvagacchan druta vikramām satīm ekām trinetra anucarāḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_04.04.004/2 sa-pārṣada-yakṣā maṇiman-madādayaḥ puro-vṛṣendrās tarasā gata-vyathāḥ
analyzed: sa pārṣada yakṣāḥ maṇimat mada ādayaḥ puras vṛṣā indrāḥ tarasā gata vyathāḥ

original: BhP_04.04.005/1 tāṃ sārikā-kanduka-darpaṇāmbuja- śvetātapatra-vyajana-srag-ādibhiḥ
analyzed: tām sārikā kanduka darpaṇa ambuja śveta ātapatra vyajana sraj ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.04.005/2 gītāyanair dundubhi-śaṅkha-veṇubhir vṛṣendram āropya viṭaṅkitā yayuḥ
analyzed: gītāyanaiḥ dundubhi śaṅkha veṇubhiḥ vṛṣa indram āropya viṭaṅkitāḥ yayuḥ

original: BhP_04.04.006/1 ābrahma-ghoṣorjita-yajña-vaiśasaṃ viprarṣi-juṣṭaṃ vibudhaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: ā brahma ghoṣa ūrjita yajña vaiśasam vipra ṛṣi juṣṭam vibudhaiḥ ca sarvaśas

original: BhP_04.04.006/2 mṛd-dārv-ayaḥ-kāñcana-darbha-carmabhir nisṛṣṭa-bhāṇḍaṃ yajanaṃ samāviśat
analyzed: mṛd dāru ayaḥ kāñcana darbha carmabhiḥ nisṛṣṭa bhāṇḍam yajanam samāviśat

original: BhP_04.04.007/1 tām āgatāṃ tatra na kaścanādriyad vimānitāṃ yajña-kṛto bhayāj janaḥ
analyzed: tām āgatām tatra na kaścana ādriyat vimānitām yajña kṛtaḥ bhayāt janaḥ

original: BhP_04.04.007/2 ṛte svasṝr vai jananīṃ ca sādarāḥ premāśru-kaṇṭhyaḥ pariṣasvajur mudā
analyzed: ṛte svasṝḥ vai jananīm ca sādarāḥ prema aśru kaṇṭhyaḥ pariṣasvajuḥ mudā

original: BhP_04.04.008/1 saudarya-sampraśna-samartha-vārtayā mātrā ca mātṛ-ṣvasṛbhiś ca sādaram
analyzed: sa audarya sampraśna samartha vārtayā mātrā ca mātṛṣvasṛbhiḥ ca sādaram

original: BhP_04.04.008/2 dattāṃ saparyāṃ varam āsanaṃ ca sā nādatta pitrāpratinanditā satī
analyzed: dattām saparyām varam āsanam ca sā na adatta pitrā a pratinanditā satī

original: BhP_04.04.009/1 arudra-bhāgaṃ tam avekṣya cādhvaraṃ pitrā ca deve kṛta-helanaṃ vibhau
analyzed: a rudra bhāgam tam avekṣya ca adhvaram pitrā ca deve kṛta helanam vibhau

original: BhP_04.04.009/2 anādṛtā yajña-sadasy adhīśvarī cukopa lokān iva dhakṣyatī ruṣā
analyzed: an ādṛtā yajña sadasi adhi īśvarī cukopa lokān iva dhakṣyatī ruṣā

original: BhP_04.04.010/1 jagarha sāmarṣa-vipannayā girā śiva-dviṣaṃ dhūma-patha-śrama-smayam
analyzed: jagarha sa amarṣa vipannayā girā śiva dviṣam dhūma patha śrama smayam

original: BhP_04.04.010/2 sva-tejasā bhūta-gaṇān samutthitān nigṛhya devī jagato 'bhiśṛṇvataḥ
analyzed: sva tejasā bhūta gaṇān samutthitān nigṛhya devī jagataḥ abhiśṛṇvataḥ

original: BhP_04.04.011/0 devy uvāca
analyzed: devī uvāca

original: BhP_04.04.011/1 na yasya loke 'sty atiśāyanaḥ priyas tathāpriyo deha-bhṛtāṃ priyātmanaḥ
analyzed: na yasya loke asti atiśāyanaḥ priyaḥ tathā apriyaḥ dehabhṛtām priya ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.04.011/2 tasmin samastātmani mukta-vairake ṛte bhavantaṃ katamaḥ pratīpayet
analyzed: tasmin samasta ātmani mukta vairake ṛte bhavantam katamaḥ pratīpayet

original: BhP_04.04.012/1 doṣān pareṣāṃ hi guṇeṣu sādhavo gṛhṇanti kecin na bhavādṛśo dvija
analyzed: doṣān pareṣām hi guṇeṣu sādhavaḥ gṛhṇanti kecid na bhavādṛśaḥ dvija

original: BhP_04.04.012/2 guṇāṃś ca phalgūn bahulī-kariṣṇavo mahattamās teṣv avidad bhavān agham
analyzed: guṇān ca phalgūn bahulīkariṣṇavaḥ mahattamāḥ teṣu avidat bhavān agham

original: BhP_04.04.013/1 nāścaryam etad yad asatsu sarvadā mahad-vinindā kuṇapātma-vādiṣu
analyzed: na āścaryam etat yat asatsu sarvadā mahat vinindā kuṇapa ātma vādiṣu

original: BhP_04.04.013/2 serṣyaṃ mahāpūruṣa-pāda-pāṃsubhir nirasta-tejaḥsu tad eva śobhanam
analyzed: sa īrṣyam mahā pūruṣa pāda pāṃsubhiḥ nirasta tejaḥsu tat eva śobhanam

original: BhP_04.04.014/1 yad dvy-akṣaraṃ nāma gireritaṃ nṛṇāṃ sakṛt prasaṅgād agham āśu hanti tat
analyzed: yat dvi akṣaram nāma girā īritam nṛṇām sakṛt prasaṅgāt agham āśu hanti tat

original: BhP_04.04.014/2 pavitra-kīrtiṃ tam alaṅghya-śāsanaṃ bhavān aho dveṣṭi śivaṃ śivetaraḥ
analyzed: pavitra kīrtim tam a laṅghya śāsanam bhavān aho dveṣṭi śivam śiva itaraḥ

original: BhP_04.04.015/1 yat-pāda-padmaṃ mahatāṃ mano-'libhir niṣevitaṃ brahma-rasāsavārthibhiḥ
analyzed: yad pāda padmam mahatām manaḥ alibhiḥ niṣevitam brahma rasa āsava arthibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.04.015/2 lokasya yad varṣati cāśiṣo 'rthinas tasmai bhavān druhyati viśva-bandhave
analyzed: lokasya yat varṣati ca āśiṣaḥ arthinaḥ tasmai bhavān druhyati viśva bandhave

original: BhP_04.04.016/1 kiṃ vā śivākhyam aśivaṃ na vidus tvad anye brahmādayas tam avakīrya jaṭāḥ śmaśāne
analyzed: kim vā śiva ākhyam aśivam na viduḥ tvat anye brahma ādayaḥ tam avakīrya jaṭāḥ śmaśāne

original: BhP_04.04.016/2 tan-mālya-bhasma-nṛkapāly avasat piśācair ye mūrdhabhir dadhati tac-caraṇāvasṛṣṭam
analyzed: tad mālya bhasma nṛ kapālī avasat piśācaiḥ ye mūrdhabhiḥ dadhati tad caraṇa avasṛṣṭam

original: BhP_04.04.017/1 karṇau pidhāya nirayād yad akalpa īśe dharmāvitary asṛṇibhir nṛbhir asyamāne
analyzed: karṇau pidhāya nirayāt yat akalpe īśe dharma avitari asṛṇibhiḥ nṛbhiḥ asyamāne

original: BhP_04.04.017/2 chindyāt prasahya ruśatīm asatīṃ prabhuś cej jihvām asūn api tato visṛjet sa dharmaḥ
analyzed: chindyāt prasahya ruśatīm asatīm prabhuḥ ced jihvām asūn api tatas visṛjet sa dharmaḥ

original: BhP_04.04.018/1 atas tavotpannam idaṃ kalevaraṃ na dhārayiṣye śiti-kaṇṭha-garhiṇaḥ
analyzed: atas tava utpannam idam kalevaram na dhārayiṣye śitikaṇṭha garhiṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.04.018/2 jagdhasya mohād dhi viśuddhim andhaso jugupsitasyoddharaṇaṃ pracakṣate
analyzed: jagdhasya mohāt hi viśuddhim andhasaḥ jugupsitasya uddharaṇam pracakṣate

original: BhP_04.04.019/1 na veda-vādān anuvartate matiḥ sva eva loke ramato mahā-muneḥ
analyzed: na veda vādān anuvartate matiḥ sve eva loke ramataḥ mahā muneḥ

original: BhP_04.04.019/2 yathā gatir deva-manuṣyayoḥ pṛthak sva eva dharme na paraṃ kṣipet sthitaḥ
analyzed: yathā gatiḥ deva manuṣyayoḥ pṛthak sve eva dharme na param kṣipet sthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.04.020/1 karma pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttam apy ṛtaṃ vede vivicyobhaya-liṅgam āśritam
analyzed: karma pravṛttam ca nivṛttam api ṛtam vede vivicya ubhaya liṅgam āśritam

original: BhP_04.04.020/2 virodhi tad yaugapadaika-kartari dvayaṃ tathā brahmaṇi karma narcchati
analyzed: virodhi tat yaugapada eka kartari dvayam tathā brahmaṇi karma na ṛcchati

original: BhP_04.04.021/1 mā vaḥ padavyaḥ pitar asmad-āsthitā yā yajña-śālāsu na dhūma-vartmabhiḥ
analyzed: mā vaḥ padavyaḥ pitar asmat āsthitāḥ yāḥ yajña śālāsu na dhūma vartmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.04.021/2 tad-anna-tṛptair asu-bhṛdbhir īḍitā avyakta-liṅgā avadhūta-sevitāḥ
analyzed: tad anna tṛptaiḥ asu bhṛdbhiḥ īḍitāḥ avyakta liṅgāḥ avadhūta sevitāḥ

original: BhP_04.04.022/1 naitena dehena hare kṛtāgaso dehodbhavenālam alaṃ kujanmanā
analyzed: na etena dehena hare kṛta āgasaḥ deha udbhavena alam alam ku janmanā

original: BhP_04.04.022/2 vrīḍā mamābhūt kujana-prasaṅgatas taj janma dhig yo mahatām avadya-kṛt
analyzed: vrīḍā mama abhūt ku jana prasaṅgataḥ tat janma dhik yaḥ mahatām avadya kṛt

original: BhP_04.04.023/1 gotraṃ tvadīyaṃ bhagavān vṛṣadhvajo dākṣāyaṇīty āha yadā sudurmanāḥ
analyzed: gotram tvadīyam bhagavān vṛṣadhvajaḥ dākṣāyaṇi iti āha yadā su durmanāḥ

original: BhP_04.04.023/2 vyapeta-narma-smitam āśu tadāhaṃ vyutsrakṣya etat kuṇapaṃ tvad-aṅgajam
analyzed: vyapeta narma smitam āśu tadā aham vyutsrakṣye etat kuṇapam tvad aṅga jam

original: BhP_04.04.024/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.04.024/1 ity adhvare dakṣam anūdya śatru-han kṣitāv udīcīṃ niṣasāda śānta-vāk
analyzed: iti adhvare dakṣam anūdya śatru han kṣitau udīcīm niṣasāda śānta vāc

original: BhP_04.04.024/2 spṛṣṭvā jalaṃ pīta-dukūla-saṃvṛtā nimīlya dṛg yoga-pathaṃ samāviśat
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā jalam pīta dukūla saṃvṛtā nimīlya   yogapatham samāviśat

original: BhP_04.04.025/1 kṛtvā samānāv anilau jitāsanā sodānam utthāpya ca nābhi-cakrataḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā samānau anilau jita āsanā sā udānam utthāpya ca nābhi cakrataḥ

original: BhP_04.04.025/2 śanair hṛdi sthāpya dhiyorasi sthitaṃ kaṇṭhād bhruvor madhyam aninditānayat
analyzed: śanais hṛdi sthāpya dhiyā urasi sthitam kaṇṭhāt bhruvoḥ madhyam aninditā anayat

original: BhP_04.04.026/1 evaṃ sva-dehaṃ mahatāṃ mahīyasā muhuḥ samāropitam aṅkam ādarāt
analyzed: evam sva deham mahatām mahīyasā muhur samāropitam aṅkam ādarāt

original: BhP_04.04.026/2 jihāsatī dakṣa-ruṣā manasvinī dadhāra gātreṣv anilāgni-dhāraṇām
analyzed: jihāsatī dakṣa ruṣā manasvinī dadhāra gātreṣu anila agni dhāraṇām

original: BhP_04.04.027/1 tataḥ sva-bhartuś caraṇāmbujāsavaṃ jagad-guroś cintayatī na cāparam
analyzed: tatas sva bhartuḥ caraṇa ambuja āsavam jagadguroḥ cintayatī na ca aparam

original: BhP_04.04.027/2 dadarśa deho hata-kalmaṣaḥ satī sadyaḥ prajajvāla samādhijāgninā
analyzed: dadarśa dehaḥ hata kalmaṣaḥ satī sadyas prajajvāla samādhi ja agninā

original: BhP_04.04.028/1 tat paśyatāṃ khe bhuvi cādbhutaṃ mahad hā heti vādaḥ sumahān ajāyata
analyzed: tat paśyatām khe bhuvi ca adbhutam mahat hā hā iti vādaḥ su mahān ajāyata

original: BhP_04.04.028/2 hanta priyā daivatamasya devī jahāv asūn kena satī prakopitā
analyzed: hanta priyā daivatam asya devī jahau asūn kena satī prakopitā

original: BhP_04.04.029/1 aho anātmyaṃ mahad asya paśyata prajāpater yasya carācaraṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: aho anātmyam mahat asya paśyata prajāpateḥ yasya carācaram prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.04.029/2 jahāv asūn yad-vimatātmajā satī manasvinī mānam abhīkṣṇam arhati
analyzed: jahau asūn yad vimata ātmajā satī manasvinī mānam abhīkṣṇam arhati

original: BhP_04.04.030/1 so 'yaṃ durmarṣa-hṛdayo brahma-dhruk ca loke 'pakīrtiṃ mahatīm avāpsyati
analyzed: saḥ ayam durmarṣa hṛdayaḥ ca loke apakīrtim mahatīm avāpsyati

original: BhP_04.04.030/2 yad-aṅgajāṃ svāṃ puruṣa-dviḍ udyatāṃ na pratyaṣedhan mṛtaye 'parādhataḥ
analyzed: yat aṅgajām svām puruṣa dviṣ udyatām na pratyaṣedhat mṛtaye aparādhataḥ

original: BhP_04.04.031/1 vadaty evaṃ jane satyā dṛṣṭvāsu-tyāgam adbhutam
analyzed: vadati evam jane satyāḥ dṛṣṭvā asu tyāgam adbhutam

original: BhP_04.04.031/2 dakṣaṃ tat-pārṣadā hantum udatiṣṭhann udāyudhāḥ
analyzed: dakṣam tad pārṣadāḥ hantum udatiṣṭhan udāyudhāḥ

original: BhP_04.04.032/1 teṣām āpatatāṃ vegaṃ niśāmya bhagavān bhṛguḥ
analyzed: teṣām āpatatām vegam niśāmya bhagavān bhṛguḥ

original: BhP_04.04.032/2 yajña-ghna-ghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇāgnau juhāva ha
analyzed: yajña ghna ghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇa agnau juhāva ha

original: BhP_04.04.033/1 adhvaryuṇā hūyamāne devā utpetur ojasā
analyzed: adhvaryuṇā hūyamāne devāḥ utpetuḥ ojasā

original: BhP_04.04.033/2 ṛbhavo nāma tapasā somaṃ prāptāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: ṛbhavaḥ nāma tapasā somam prāptāḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_04.04.034/1 tair alātāyudhaiḥ sarve pramathāḥ saha-guhyakāḥ
analyzed: taiḥ alāta āyudhaiḥ sarve pramathāḥ saha guhyakāḥ

original: BhP_04.04.034/2 hanyamānā diśo bhejur uśadbhir brahma-tejasā
analyzed: hanyamānāḥ diśaḥ bhejuḥ uśadbhiḥ brahma tejasā

original: BhP_04.05.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.05.001/1 bhavo bhavānyā nidhanaṃ prajāpater asat-kṛtāyā avagamya nāradāt
analyzed: bhavaḥ bhavānyāḥ nidhanam prajāpateḥ asatkṛtāyāḥ avagamya nāradāt

original: BhP_04.05.001/2 sva-pārṣada-sainyaṃ ca tad-adhvararbhubhir vidrāvitaṃ krodham apāram ādadhe
analyzed: sva pārṣada sainyam ca tad adhvara ṛbhubhiḥ vidrāvitam krodham apāram ādadhe

original: BhP_04.05.002/1 kruddhaḥ sudaṣṭauṣṭha-puṭaḥ sa dhūr-jaṭir jaṭāṃ taḍid-vahni-saṭogra-rociṣam
analyzed: kruddhaḥ su daṣṭa oṣṭha puṭaḥ sa dhūrjaṭiḥ jaṭām taḍit vahni saṭā ugra

original: BhP_04.05.002/2 utkṛtya rudraḥ sahasotthito hasan gambhīra-nādo visasarja tāṃ bhuvi
analyzed: utkṛtya rudraḥ sahasā utthitaḥ hasan gambhīra nādaḥ visasarja tām bhuvi

original: BhP_04.05.003/1 tato 'tikāyas tanuvā spṛśan divaṃ sahasra-bāhur ghana-ruk tri-sūrya-dṛk
analyzed: tatas atikāyaḥ tanuvā spṛśan divam sahasra bāhuḥ ghana ruj tri sūrya dṛś

original: BhP_04.05.003/2 karāla-daṃṣṭro jvalad-agni-mūrdhajaḥ kapāla-mālī vividhodyatāyudhaḥ
BhP_04.05.004/1 taṃ kiṃ karomīti gṛṇantam āha baddhāñjaliṃ bhagavān bhūta-nāthaḥ
analyzed: tam kim karomi iti gṛṇantam āha baddhāñjalim bhagavān bhūtanāthaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.004/2 dakṣaṃ sa-yajñaṃ jahi mad-bhaṭānāṃ tvam agraṇī rudra bhaṭāṃśako me
analyzed: dakṣam sa yajñam jahi mad bhaṭānām tvam agraṇī rudra bhaṭa aṃśakaḥ me

original: BhP_04.05.005/1 ājñapta evaṃ kupitena manyunā sa deva-devaṃ paricakrame vibhum
analyzed: ājñaptaḥ evam kupitena manyunā sa devadevam paricakrame vibhum

original: BhP_04.05.005/2 mene-tadātmānam asaṅga-raṃhasā mahīyasāṃ tāta sahaḥ sahiṣṇum
analyzed: meneta ātmānam asaṅga raṃhasā mahīyasām tāta sahaḥ sahiṣṇum

original: BhP_04.05.006/1 anvīyamānaḥ sa tu rudra-pārṣadair bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir vyanadat subhairavam
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ sa tu rudra pārṣadaiḥ bhṛśam nadadbhiḥ vyanadat su bhairavam

original: BhP_04.05.006/2 udyamya śūlaṃ jagad-antakāntakaṃ samprādravad ghoṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇāṅghriḥ
analyzed: udyamya śūlam jagadantaka antakam samprādravat ghoṣaṇa bhūṣaṇa aṅghriḥ

original: BhP_04.05.007/1 athartvijo yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ kakubhy udīcyāṃ prasamīkṣya reṇum
analyzed: atha ṛtvijaḥ yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ kakubhi udīcyām prasamīkṣya reṇum

original: BhP_04.05.007/2 tamaḥ kim etat kuta etad rajo 'bhūd iti dvijā dvija-patnyaś ca dadhyuḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ kim etat kutas etat rajaḥ abhūt iti dvijāḥ dvija patnyaḥ ca dadhyuḥ

original: BhP_04.05.008/1 vātā na vānti na hi santi dasyavaḥ prācīna-barhir jīvati hogra-daṇḍaḥ
analyzed: vātāḥ na vānti na hi santi dasyavaḥ prācīna barhiḥ jīvati ha ugra daṇḍaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.008/2 gāvo na kālyanta idaṃ kuto rajo loko 'dhunā kiṃ pralayāya kalpate
analyzed: gāvaḥ na kālyante idam kutas rajaḥ lokaḥ adhunā kim pralayāya kalpate

original: BhP_04.05.009/1 prasūti-miśrāḥ striya udvigna-cittā ūcur vipāko vṛjinasyaiva tasya
analyzed: prasūti miśrāḥ striyaḥ udvigna cittāḥ ūcuḥ vipākaḥ vṛjinasya eva tasya

original: BhP_04.05.009/2 yat paśyantīnāṃ duhitṝṇāṃ prajeśaḥ sutāṃ satīm avadadhyāv anāgām
analyzed: yat paśyantīnām duhitṝṇām prajā īśaḥ sutām satīm avadadhyau anāgām

original: BhP_04.05.010/1 yas tv anta-kāle vyupta-jaṭā-kalāpaḥ sva-śūla-sūcy-arpita-dig-gajendraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu antakāle vyupta jaṭā kalāpaḥ sva śūla sūci arpita diggaja indraḥ

original: BhP_04.05.010/2 vitatya nṛtyaty uditāstra-dor-dhvajān uccāṭṭa-hāsa-stanayitnu-bhinna-dik
analyzed: vitatya nṛtyati ucca aṭṭahāsa stanayitnu bhinna diś

original: BhP_04.05.011/1 amarṣayitvā tam asahya-tejasaṃ manyu-plutaṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ bhru-kuṭyā
analyzed: a marṣayitvā tam asahya tejasam manyu plutam durnirīkṣyam bhrukuṭyā

original: BhP_04.05.011/2 karāla-daṃṣṭrābhir udasta-bhāgaṇaṃ syāt svasti kiṃ kopayato vidhātuḥ
analyzed: karāla daṃṣṭrābhiḥ udasta bhā gaṇam syāt svasti kim kopayataḥ vidhātuḥ

original: BhP_04.05.012/1 bahv evam udvigna-dṛśocyamāne janena dakṣasya muhur mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: bahu evam udvigna dṛśā ucyamāne janena dakṣasya muhur mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.012/2 utpetur utpātatamāḥ sahasraśo bhayāvahā divi bhūmau ca paryak
analyzed: utpetuḥ utpātatamāḥ sahasraśas bhaya āvahāḥ divi bhūmau ca paryak

original: BhP_04.05.013/1 tāvat sa rudrānucarair mahā-makho nānāyudhair vāmanakair udāyudhaiḥ
analyzed: tāvat sa rudra anucaraiḥ mahā makhaḥ nānā āyudhaiḥ vāmanakaiḥ udāyudhaiḥ

original: BhP_04.05.013/2 piṅgaiḥ piśaṅgair makarodarānanaiḥ paryādravadbhir vidurānvarudhyata
analyzed: piṅgaiḥ piśaṅgaiḥ makara udara ānanaiḥ paryādravadbhiḥ vidura anvarudhyata

original: BhP_04.05.014/1 kecid babhañjuḥ prāg-vaṃśaṃ patnī-śālāṃ tathāpare
analyzed: kecid babhañjuḥ prāgvaṃśam patnīśālām tathā apare

original: BhP_04.05.014/2 sada āgnīdhra-śālāṃ ca tad-vihāraṃ mahānasam
analyzed: sadaḥ āgnīdhra śālām ca tad vihāram mahānasam

original: BhP_04.05.015/1 rurujur yajña-pātrāṇi tathaike 'gnīn anāśayan
analyzed: rurujuḥ yajña pātrāṇi tathā eke agnīn anāśayan

original: BhP_04.05.015/2 kuṇḍeṣv amūtrayan kecid bibhidur vedi-mekhalāḥ
analyzed: kuṇḍeṣu amūtrayan kecid bibhiduḥ vedi mekhalāḥ

original: BhP_04.05.016/1 abādhanta munīn anye eke patnīr atarjayan
analyzed: abādhanta munīn anye eke patnīḥ atarjayan

original: BhP_04.05.016/2 apare jagṛhur devān pratyāsannān palāyitān
analyzed: apare jagṛhuḥ devān pratyāsannān palāyitān

original: BhP_04.05.017/1 bhṛguṃ babandha maṇimān vīrabhadraḥ prajāpatim
analyzed: bhṛgum babandha maṇimān vīrabhadraḥ prajāpatim

original: BhP_04.05.017/2 caṇḍeśaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ devaṃ bhagaṃ nandīśvaro 'grahīt
analyzed: caṇḍeśaḥ pūṣaṇam devam bhagam nandīśvaraḥ agrahīt

original: BhP_04.05.018/1 sarva evartvijo dṛṣṭvā sadasyāḥ sa-divaukasaḥ
analyzed: sarve eva ṛtvijaḥ dṛṣṭvā sadasyāḥ sa divaukasaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.018/2 tair ardyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ grāvabhir naikadhādravan
analyzed: taiḥ ardyamānāḥ su bhṛśam grāvabhiḥ na ekadhā adravan

original: BhP_04.05.019/1 juhvataḥ sruva-hastasya śmaśrūṇi bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: juhvataḥ sruva hastasya śmaśrūṇi bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.019/2 bhṛgor luluñce sadasi yo 'hasac chmaśru darśayan
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ luluñce sadasi yaḥ ahasat śmaśru darśayan

original: BhP_04.05.020/1 bhagasya netre bhagavān pātitasya ruṣā bhuvi
analyzed: bhagasya netre bhagavān pātitasya ruṣā bhuvi

original: BhP_04.05.020/2 ujjahāra sada-stho 'kṣṇā yaḥ śapantam asūsucat
analyzed: ujjahāra sadasthaḥ akṣṇā yaḥ śapantam asūsucat

original: BhP_04.05.021/1 pūṣṇo hy apātayad dantān kāliṅgasya yathā balaḥ
analyzed: pūṣṇaḥ hi apātayat dantān kāliṅgasya yathā balaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.021/2 śapyamāne garimaṇi yo 'hasad darśayan dataḥ
analyzed: śapyamāne garimaṇi yaḥ ahasat darśayan dataḥ

original: BhP_04.05.022/1 ākramyorasi dakṣasya śita-dhāreṇa hetinā
analyzed: ākramya urasi dakṣasya śita dhāreṇa hetinā

original: BhP_04.05.022/2 chindann api tad uddhartuṃ nāśaknot tryambakas tadā
analyzed: chindan api tat uddhartum na aśaknot tryambakaḥ tadā

original: BhP_04.05.023/1 śastrair astrānvitair evam anirbhinna-tvacaṃ haraḥ
analyzed: śastraiḥ astra anvitaiḥ evam anirbhinna tvacam haraḥ

original: BhP_04.05.023/2 vismayaṃ param āpanno dadhyau paśupatiś ciram
analyzed: vismayam param āpannaḥ dadhyau paśupatiḥ ciram

original: BhP_04.05.024/1 dṛṣṭvā saṃjñapanaṃ yogaṃ paśūnāṃ sa patir makhe
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā saṃjñapanam yogam paśūnām sa patiḥ makhe

original: BhP_04.05.024/2 yajamāna-paśoḥ kasya kāyāt tenāharac chiraḥ
analyzed: yajamāna paśoḥ kasya kāyāt tena aharat śiraḥ

original: BhP_04.05.025/1 sādhu-vādas tadā teṣāṃ karma tat tasya paśyatām
analyzed: sādhuvādaḥ tadā teṣām karma tat tasya paśyatām

original: BhP_04.05.025/2 bhūta-preta-piśācānāṃ anyeṣāṃ tad-viparyayaḥ
analyzed: bhūta preta piśācānām anyeṣām tad viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.026/1 juhāvaitac chiras tasmin dakṣiṇāgnāv amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: juhāva etat śiraḥ tasmin dakṣiṇāgnau amarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.05.026/2 tad-deva-yajanaṃ dagdhvā prātiṣṭhad guhyakālayam
analyzed: tat devayajanam dagdhvā prātiṣṭhat guhyaka ālayam

original: BhP_04.06.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.06.001/1 atha deva-gaṇāḥ sarve rudrānīkaiḥ parājitāḥ
analyzed: atha deva gaṇāḥ sarve rudra anīkaiḥ parājitāḥ

original: BhP_04.06.001/2 śūla-paṭṭiśa-nistriṃśa- gadā-parigha-mudgaraiḥ
analyzed: śūla paṭṭiśa nistriṃśa gadā parigha mudgaraiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.002/1 sañchinna-bhinna-sarvāṅgāḥ sartvik-sabhyā bhayākulāḥ
analyzed: sañchinna bhinna sarva aṅgāḥ sa ṛtvij sabhyāḥ bhaya ākulāḥ

original: BhP_04.06.002/2 svayambhuve namaskṛtya kārtsnyenaitan nyavedayan
analyzed: svayambhuve namaskṛtya kārtsnyena etat nyavedayan

original: BhP_04.06.003/1 upalabhya puraivaitad bhagavān abja-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: upalabhya purā eva etat bhagavān abja sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.06.003/2 nārāyaṇaś ca viśvātmā na kasyādhvaram īyatuḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ ca viśvātmā na kasya adhvaram īyatuḥ

original: BhP_04.06.004/1 tad ākarṇya vibhuḥ prāha tejīyasi kṛtāgasi
analyzed: tat ākarṇya vibhuḥ prāha tejīyasi kṛta āgasi

original: BhP_04.06.004/2 kṣemāya tatra sā bhūyān na prāyeṇa bubhūṣatām
analyzed: kṣemāya tatra sā bhūyāt na prāyeṇa bubhūṣatām

original: BhP_04.06.005/1 athāpi yūyaṃ kṛta-kilbiṣā bhavaṃ ye barhiṣo bhāga-bhājaṃ parāduḥ
analyzed: athā api yūyam kṛta kilbiṣāḥ bhavam ye barhiṣaḥ bhāga bhājam parāduḥ

original: BhP_04.06.005/2 prasādayadhvaṃ pariśuddha-cetasā kṣipra-prasādaṃ pragṛhītāṅghri-padmam
analyzed: prasādayadhvam pariśuddha cetasā kṣipra prasādam pragṛhīta aṅghri padmam

original: BhP_04.06.006/1 āśāsānā jīvitam adhvarasya lokaḥ sa-pālaḥ kupite na yasmin
analyzed: āśāsānā jīvitam adhvarasya lokaḥ sa pālaḥ kupite na yasmin

original: BhP_04.06.006/2 tam āśu devaṃ priyayā vihīnaṃ kṣamāpayadhvaṃ hṛdi viddhaṃ duruktaiḥ
analyzed: tam āśu devam priyayā vihīnam kṣamāpayadhvam hṛdi viddham duruktaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.007/1 nāhaṃ na yajño na ca yūyam anye ye deha-bhājo munayaś ca tattvam
analyzed: na aham na yajñaḥ na ca yūyam anye ye dehabhājaḥ munayaḥ ca tattvam

original: BhP_04.06.007/2 viduḥ pramāṇaṃ bala-vīryayor vā yasyātma-tantrasya ka upāyaṃ vidhitset
analyzed: viduḥ pramāṇam bala vīryayoḥ vā yasya ātmatantrasya kaḥ upāyam vidhitset

original: BhP_04.06.008/1 sa ittham ādiśya surān ajas tu taiḥ samanvitaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sa-prajeśaiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham ādiśya surān ajaḥ tu taiḥ samanvitaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sa prajā īśaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.008/2 yayau sva-dhiṣṇyān nilayaṃ pura-dviṣaḥ kailāsam adri-pravaraṃ priyaṃ prabhoḥ
analyzed: yayau sva dhiṣṇyāt nilayam puradviṣaḥ kailāsam adri pravaram priyam prabhoḥ

original: BhP_04.06.009/1 janmauṣadhi-tapo-mantra- yoga-siddhair naretaraiḥ
analyzed: janma auṣadhi tapaḥ mantra yoga siddhaiḥ naretaraiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.009/2 juṣṭaṃ kinnara-gandharvair apsarobhir vṛtaṃ sadā
analyzed: juṣṭam kinnara gandharvaiḥ apsarobhiḥ vṛtam sadā

original: BhP_04.06.010/1 nānā-maṇimayaiḥ śṛṅgair nānā-dhātu-vicitritaiḥ
analyzed: nānā maṇi mayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ nānā dhātu vicitritaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.010/2 nānā-druma-latā-gulmair nānā-mṛga-gaṇāvṛtaiḥ
analyzed: nānā druma latā gulmaiḥ nānā mṛga gaṇa āvṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.011/1 nānāmala-prasravaṇair nānā-kandara-sānubhiḥ
analyzed: nānā amala prasravaṇaiḥ nānā kandara sānubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.011/2 ramaṇaṃ viharantīnāṃ ramaṇaiḥ siddha-yoṣitām
analyzed: ramaṇam viharantīnām ramaṇaiḥ siddha yoṣitām

original: BhP_04.06.012/1 mayūra-kekābhirutaṃ madāndhāli-vimūrcchitam
analyzed: mayūra kekā abhirutam mada andha ali vimūrcchitam

original: BhP_04.06.012/2 plāvitai rakta-kaṇṭhānāṃ kūjitaiś ca patattriṇām
analyzed: plāvitaiḥ raktakaṇṭhānām kūjitaiḥ ca patattriṇām

original: BhP_04.06.013/1 āhvayantam ivoddhastair dvijān kāma-dughair drumaiḥ
analyzed: āhvayantam iva uddhastaiḥ dvijān kāma dughaiḥ drumaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.013/2 vrajantam iva mātaṅgair gṛṇantam iva nirjharaiḥ
analyzed: vrajantam iva mātaṅgaiḥ gṛṇantam iva nirjharaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.014/1 mandāraiḥ pārijātaiś ca saralaiś copaśobhitam
analyzed: mandāraiḥ pārijātaiḥ ca saralaiḥ ca upaśobhitam

original: BhP_04.06.014/2 tamālaiḥ śāla-tālaiś ca kovidārāsanārjunaiḥ
analyzed: tamālaiḥ śāla tālaiḥ ca kovidāra āsana arjunaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.015/1 cūtaiḥ kadambair nīpaiś ca nāga-punnāga-campakaiḥ
analyzed: cūtaiḥ kadambaiḥ nīpaiḥ ca nāga punnāga campakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.015/2 pāṭalāśoka-bakulaiḥ kundaiḥ kurabakair api
BhP_04.06.016/1 svarṇārṇa-śata-patraiś ca vara-reṇuka-jātibhiḥ
analyzed: svarṇa arṇa śatapatraiḥ ca vara reṇuka jātibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.016/2 kubjakair mallikābhiś ca mādhavībhiś ca maṇḍitam
analyzed: kubjakaiḥ mallikābhiḥ ca mādhavībhiḥ ca maṇḍitam

original: BhP_04.06.017/1 panasodumbarāśvattha- plakṣa-nyagrodha-hiṅgubhiḥ
BhP_04.06.017/2 bhūrjair oṣadhibhiḥ pūgai rājapūgaiś ca jambubhiḥ
analyzed: bhūrjaiḥ oṣadhibhiḥ pūgaiḥ rājapūgaiḥ ca jambubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.018/1 kharjūrāmrātakāmrādyaiḥ priyāla-madhukeṅgudaiḥ
BhP_04.06.018/2 druma-jātibhir anyaiś ca rājitaṃ veṇu-kīcakaiḥ
analyzed: druma jātibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca rājitam veṇu kīcakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.019/1 kumudotpala-kahlāra- śatapatra-vanarddhibhiḥ
analyzed: kumuda utpala kahlāra śatapatra vana ṛddhibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.019/2 nalinīṣu kalaṃ kūjat- khaga-vṛndopaśobhitam
analyzed: nalinīṣu kalam kūjat khaga vṛnda upaśobhitam

original: BhP_04.06.020/1 mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ kroḍair mṛgendrair ṛkṣa-śalyakaiḥ
analyzed: mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ kroḍaiḥ mṛgendraiḥ ṛkṣa śalyakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.020/2 gavayaiḥ śarabhair vyāghrai rurubhir mahiṣādibhiḥ
analyzed: gavayaiḥ śarabhaiḥ vyāghraiḥ rurubhiḥ mahiṣa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.021/1 karṇāntraikapadāśvāsyair nirjuṣṭaṃ vṛka-nābhibhiḥ
analyzed: karṇa antra eka pada āśvāsyaiḥ nirjuṣṭam vṛka nābhibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.021/2 kadalī-khaṇḍa-saṃruddha- nalinī-pulina-śriyam
analyzed: kadalī khaṇḍa saṃruddha nalinī pulina śriyam

original: BhP_04.06.022/1 paryastaṃ nandayā satyāḥ snāna-puṇyatarodayā
analyzed: paryastam nandayā satyāḥ snāna puṇyatara udayā

original: BhP_04.06.022/2 vilokya bhūteśa-giriṃ vibudhā vismayaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: vilokya bhūteśa girim vibudhāḥ vismayam yayuḥ

original: BhP_04.06.023/1 dadṛśus tatra te ramyām alakāṃ nāma vai purīm
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ tatra te ramyām alakām nāma vai purīm

original: BhP_04.06.023/2 vanaṃ saugandhikaṃ cāpi yatra tan-nāma paṅkajam
analyzed: vanam saugandhikam ca api yatra tad nāma paṅkajam

original: BhP_04.06.024/1 nandā cālakanandā ca saritau bāhyataḥ puraḥ
analyzed: nandā ca alakanandā ca saritau bāhyatas puras

original: BhP_04.06.024/2 tīrthapāda-padāmbhoja- rajasātīva pāvane
analyzed: tīrtha pāda pada ambhoja rajasā atīva pāvane

original: BhP_04.06.025/1 yayoḥ sura-striyaḥ kṣattar avaruhya sva-dhiṣṇyataḥ
analyzed: yayoḥ sura striyaḥ kṣattar avaruhya sva dhiṣṇyataḥ

original: BhP_04.06.025/2 krīḍanti puṃsaḥ siñcantyo vigāhya rati-karśitāḥ
analyzed: krīḍanti puṃsaḥ siñcantyaḥ vigāhya rati karśitāḥ

original: BhP_04.06.026/1 yayos tat-snāna-vibhraṣṭa- nava-kuṅkuma-piñjaram
analyzed: yayoḥ nava kuṅkuma piñjaram

original: BhP_04.06.026/2 vitṛṣo 'pi pibanty ambhaḥ pāyayanto gajā gajīḥ
analyzed: vitṛṣaḥ api pibanti ambhaḥ pāyayantaḥ gajāḥ gajīḥ

original: BhP_04.06.027/1 tāra-hema-mahāratna- vimāna-śata-saṅkulām
analyzed: tāra hema mahā ratna vimāna śata saṅkulām

original: BhP_04.06.027/2 juṣṭāṃ puṇyajana-strībhir yathā khaṃ sataḍid-ghanam
analyzed: juṣṭām puṇyajana strībhiḥ yathā kham sa taḍit ghanam

original: BhP_04.06.028/1 hitvā yakṣeśvara-purīṃ vanaṃ saugandhikaṃ ca tat
analyzed: hitvā yakṣa īśvara purīm vanam saugandhikam ca tat

original: BhP_04.06.028/2 drumaiḥ kāma-dughair hṛdyaṃ citra-mālya-phala-cchadaiḥ
analyzed: drumaiḥ kāma dughaiḥ hṛdyam citra mālya phala chadaiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.029/1 rakta-kaṇṭha-khagānīka- svara-maṇḍita-ṣaṭpadam
BhP_04.06.029/2 kalahaṃsa-kula-preṣṭhaṃ kharadaṇḍa-jalāśayam
analyzed: kalahaṃsa kula preṣṭham kharadaṇḍa jalāśayam

original: BhP_04.06.030/1 vana-kuñjara-saṅghṛṣṭa- haricandana-vāyunā
analyzed: vana kuñjara saṅghṛṣṭa haricandana vāyunā

original: BhP_04.06.030/2 adhi puṇyajana-strīṇāṃ muhur unmathayan manaḥ
analyzed: adhi puṇyajana strīṇām muhur unmathayan manaḥ

original: BhP_04.06.031/1 vaidūrya-kṛta-sopānā vāpya utpala-mālinīḥ
analyzed: vaidūrya kṛta sopānāḥ vāpyaḥ utpala mālinīḥ

original: BhP_04.06.031/2 prāptaṃ kimpuruṣair dṛṣṭvā ta ārād dadṛśur vaṭam
analyzed: prāptam kimpuruṣaiḥ dṛṣṭvā te ārāt dadṛśuḥ vaṭam

original: BhP_04.06.032/1 sa yojana-śatotsedhaḥ pādona-viṭapāyataḥ
analyzed: sa yojana śata utsedhaḥ pāda ūna viṭapa āyataḥ

original: BhP_04.06.032/2 paryak-kṛtācala-cchāyo nirnīḍas tāpa-varjitaḥ
BhP_04.06.033/1 tasmin mahā-yogamaye mumukṣu-śaraṇe surāḥ
analyzed: tasmin mahā yoga maye mumukṣu śaraṇe surāḥ

original: BhP_04.06.033/2 dadṛśuḥ śivam āsīnaṃ tyaktāmarṣam ivāntakam
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ śivam āsīnam tyakta amarṣam iva antakam

original: BhP_04.06.034/1 sanandanādyair mahā-siddhaiḥ śāntaiḥ saṃśānta-vigraham
analyzed: sanandana ādyaiḥ mahā siddhaiḥ śāntaiḥ saṃśānta vigraham

original: BhP_04.06.034/2 upāsyamānaṃ sakhyā ca bhartrā guhyaka-rakṣasām
analyzed: upāsyamānam sakhyā ca bhartrā guhyaka rakṣasām

original: BhP_04.06.035/1 vidyā-tapo-yoga-patham āsthitaṃ tam adhīśvaram
analyzed: vidyā tapaḥ yoga patham āsthitam tam adhīśvaram

original: BhP_04.06.035/2 carantaṃ viśva-suhṛdaṃ vātsalyāl loka-maṅgalam
analyzed: carantam viśva suhṛdam vātsalyāt loka maṅgalam

original: BhP_04.06.036/1 liṅgaṃ ca tāpasābhīṣṭaṃ bhasma-daṇḍa-jaṭājinam
analyzed: liṅgam ca tāpasa abhīṣṭam bhasma daṇḍa jaṭā ajinam

original: BhP_04.06.036/2 aṅgena sandhyābhra-rucā candra-lekhāṃ ca bibhratam
analyzed: aṅgena sandhyā abhra rucā candralekhām ca bibhratam

original: BhP_04.06.037/1 upaviṣṭaṃ darbhamayyāṃ bṛsyāṃ brahma sanātanam
analyzed: upaviṣṭam darbha mayyām bṛsyām brahma sanātanam

original: BhP_04.06.037/2 nāradāya pravocantaṃ pṛcchate śṛṇvatāṃ satām
analyzed: nāradāya pravocantam pṛcchate śṛṇvatām satām

original: BhP_04.06.038/1 kṛtvorau dakṣiṇe savyaṃ pāda-padmaṃ ca jānuni
analyzed: kṛtvā ūrau dakṣiṇe savyam pāda padmam ca jānuni

original: BhP_04.06.038/2 bāhuṃ prakoṣṭhe 'kṣa-mālām āsīnaṃ tarka-mudrayā
analyzed: bāhum prakoṣṭhe akṣamālām āsīnam tarkamudrayā

original: BhP_04.06.039/1 taṃ brahma-nirvāṇa-samādhim āśritaṃ vyupāśritaṃ giriśaṃ yoga-kakṣām
analyzed: tam brahma nirvāṇa samādhim āśritam vyupāśritam giriśam yogakakṣām

original: BhP_04.06.039/2 sa-loka-pālā munayo manūnām ādyaṃ manuṃ prāñjalayaḥ praṇemuḥ
analyzed: sa lokapālāḥ munayaḥ manūnām ādyam manum prāñjalayaḥ praṇemuḥ

original: BhP_04.06.040/1 sa tūpalabhyāgatam ātma-yoniṃ surāsureśair abhivanditāṅghriḥ
analyzed: sa tu upalabhya āgatam ātmayonim sura asura īśaiḥ abhivandita aṅghriḥ

original: BhP_04.06.040/2 utthāya cakre śirasābhivandanam arhattamaḥ kasya yathaiva viṣṇuḥ
analyzed: utthāya cakre śirasā abhivandanam arhattamaḥ kasya yathā eva viṣṇuḥ

original: BhP_04.06.041/1 tathāpare siddha-gaṇā maharṣibhir ye vai samantād anu nīlalohitam
analyzed: tathā apare siddha gaṇāḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ ye vai samantāt anu nīlalohitam

original: BhP_04.06.041/2 namaskṛtaḥ prāha śaśāṅka-śekharaṃ kṛta-praṇāmaṃ prahasann ivātmabhūḥ
analyzed: namaskṛtaḥ prāha śaśāṅka śekharam kṛta praṇāmam prahasan iva ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_04.06.042/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_04.06.042/1 āne tvām īśaṃ viśvasya jagato yoni-bījayoḥ
analyzed: tvām īśam viśvasya jagataḥ yoni bījayoḥ

original: BhP_04.06.042/2 śakteḥ śivasya ca paraṃ yat tad brahmā nirantaram
analyzed: śakteḥ śivasya ca param yat tat brahmā nirantaram

original: BhP_04.06.043/1 tvam eva bhagavann etac chiva-śaktyoḥ svarūpayoḥ
analyzed: tvam eva bhagavan etat śiva śaktyoḥ sva rūpayoḥ

original: BhP_04.06.043/2 viśvaṃ sṛjasi pāsy atsi krīḍann ūrṇa-paṭo yathā
analyzed: viśvam sṛjasi pāsi atsi krīḍan ūrṇapaṭaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.06.044/1 tvam eva dharmārtha-dughābhipattaye dakṣeṇa sūtreṇa sasarjithādhvaram
analyzed: tvam eva dharma artha dugha abhipattaye dakṣeṇa sūtreṇa sasarjitha adhvaram

original: BhP_04.06.044/2 tvayaiva loke 'vasitāś ca setavo yān brāhmaṇāḥ śraddadhate dhṛta-vratāḥ
analyzed: tvayā eva loke avasitāḥ ca setavaḥ yān brāhmaṇāḥ śraddadhate dhṛta vratāḥ

original: BhP_04.06.045/1 tvaṃ karmaṇāṃ maṅgala maṅgalānāṃ kartuḥ sva-lokaṃ tanuṣe svaḥ paraṃ vā
analyzed: tvam karmaṇām maṅgala maṅgalānām kartuḥ sva lokam tanuṣe svar param vā

original: BhP_04.06.045/2 amaṅgalānāṃ ca tamisram ulbaṇaṃ viparyayaḥ kena tad eva kasyacit
analyzed: amaṅgalānām ca tamisram ulbaṇam viparyayaḥ kena tat eva kasyacid

original: BhP_04.06.046/1 na vai satāṃ tvac-caraṇārpitātmanāṃ bhūteṣu sarveṣv abhipaśyatāṃ tava
analyzed: na vai satām tvad caraṇa arpita ātmanām bhūteṣu sarveṣu abhipaśyatām tava

original: BhP_04.06.046/2 bhūtāni cātmany apṛthag-didṛkṣatāṃ prāyeṇa roṣo 'bhibhaved yathā paśum
analyzed: bhūtāni ca ātmani apṛthak didṛkṣatām prāyeṇa roṣaḥ abhibhavet yathā paśum

original: BhP_04.06.047/1 pṛthag-dhiyaḥ karma-dṛśo durāśayāḥ parodayenārpita-hṛd-rujo 'niśam
analyzed: pṛthak dhiyaḥ karma dṛśaḥ durāśayāḥ para udayena arpita hṛdrujaḥ aniśam

original: BhP_04.06.047/2 parān duruktair vitudanty aruntudās tān māvadhīd daiva-vadhān bhavad-vidhaḥ
analyzed: parān duruktaiḥ vitudanti aruntudāḥ tān mā avadhīt daiva vadhān bhavadvidhaḥ

original: BhP_04.06.048/1 yasmin yadā puṣkara-nābha-māyayā durantayā spṛṣṭa-dhiyaḥ pṛthag-dṛśaḥ
analyzed: yasmin yadā puṣkaranābha māyayā durantayā spṛṣṭa dhiyaḥ pṛthak dṛśaḥ

original: BhP_04.06.048/2 kurvanti tatra hy anukampayā kṛpāṃ na sādhavo daiva-balāt kṛte kramam
analyzed: kurvanti tatra hi anukampayā kṛpām na sādhavaḥ daiva balāt kṛte kramam

original: BhP_04.06.049/1 bhavāṃs tu puṃsaḥ paramasya māyayā durantayāspṛṣṭa-matiḥ samasta-dṛk
analyzed: bhavān tu puṃsaḥ paramasya māyayā durantayā a spṛṣṭa matiḥ samasta dṛś

original: BhP_04.06.049/2 tayā hatātmasv anukarma-cetaḥsv anugrahaṃ kartum ihārhasi prabho
analyzed: tayā hata ātmasu anukarma cetaḥsu anugraham kartum iha arhasi prabho

original: BhP_04.06.050/1 kurv adhvarasyoddharaṇaṃ hatasya bhoḥ tvayāsamāptasya mano prajāpateḥ
analyzed: kuru adhvarasya uddharaṇam hatasya bhoḥ tvayā asamāptasya mano prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_04.06.050/2 na yatra bhāgaṃ tava bhāgino daduḥ kuyājino yena makho ninīyate
analyzed: na yatra bhāgam tava bhāginaḥ daduḥ ku yājinaḥ yena makhaḥ ninīyate

original: BhP_04.06.051/1 jīvatād yajamāno 'yaṃ prapadyetākṣiṇī bhagaḥ
analyzed: jīvatāt yajamānaḥ ayam prapadyeta akṣiṇī bhagaḥ

original: BhP_04.06.051/2 bhṛgoḥ śmaśrūṇi rohantu pūṣṇo dantāś ca pūrvavat
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ śmaśrūṇi rohantu pūṣṇaḥ dantāḥ ca pūrvavat

original: BhP_04.06.052/1 devānāṃ bhagna-gātrāṇām ṛtvijāṃ cāyudhāśmabhiḥ
analyzed: devānām bhagna gātrāṇām ṛtvijām ca āyudha aśmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.06.052/2 bhavatānugṛhītānām āśu manyo 'stv anāturam
analyzed: bhavatā anugṛhītānām āśu manyaḥ astu anāturam

original: BhP_04.06.053/1 eṣa te rudra bhāgo 'stu yad-ucchiṣṭo 'dhvarasya vai
analyzed: eṣa te rudra bhāgaḥ astu yat ucchiṣṭaḥ adhvarasya vai

original: BhP_04.06.053/2 yajñas te rudra bhāgena kalpatām adya yajña-han
analyzed: yajñaḥ te rudra bhāgena kalpatām adya yajñahan

original: BhP_04.07.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.001/1 ity ajenānunītena bhavena parituṣyatā
analyzed: iti ajena anunītena bhavena parituṣyatā

original: BhP_04.07.001/2 abhyadhāyi mahā-bāho prahasya śrūyatām iti
analyzed: abhyadhāyi mahā bāho prahasya śrūyatām iti

original: BhP_04.07.002/0 mahādeva uvāca
analyzed: mahādevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.002/1 nāghaṃ prajeśa bālānāṃ varṇaye nānucintaye
analyzed: na agham prajā īśa bālānām varṇaye na anucintaye

original: BhP_04.07.002/2 deva-māyābhibhūtānāṃ daṇḍas tatra dhṛto mayā
analyzed: deva māyā abhibhūtānām daṇḍaḥ tatra dhṛtaḥ mayā

original: BhP_04.07.003/1 prajāpater dagdha-śīrṣṇo bhavatv aja-mukhaṃ śiraḥ
analyzed: prajāpateḥ dagdha śīrṣṇaḥ bhavatu aja mukham śiraḥ

original: BhP_04.07.003/2 mitrasya cakṣuṣekṣeta bhāgaṃ svaṃ barhiṣo bhagaḥ
analyzed: mitrasya cakṣuṣā īkṣeta bhāgam svam barhiṣaḥ bhagaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.004/1 pūṣā tu yajamānasya dadbhir jakṣatu piṣṭa-bhuk
analyzed: pūṣā tu yajamānasya dadbhiḥ jakṣatu piṣṭa bhuj

original: BhP_04.07.004/2 devāḥ prakṛta-sarvāṅgā ye ma uccheṣaṇaṃ daduḥ
analyzed: devāḥ prakṛta sarva aṅgāḥ ye me uccheṣaṇam daduḥ

original: BhP_04.07.005/1 bāhubhyām aśvinoḥ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ kṛta-bāhavaḥ
analyzed: bāhubhyām aśvinoḥ pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām kṛta bāhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.005/2 bhavantv adhvaryavaś cānye basta-śmaśrur bhṛgur bhavet
analyzed: bhavantu adhvaryavaḥ ca anye basta śmaśruḥ bhṛguḥ bhavet

original: BhP_04.07.006/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.006/1 tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni śrutvā mīḍhuṣṭamoditam
analyzed: tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni śrutvā mīḍhuṣṭama uditam

original: BhP_04.07.006/2 parituṣṭātmabhis tāta sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan
analyzed: parituṣṭa ātmabhiḥ tāta sādhu sādhu iti atha abruvan

original: BhP_04.07.007/1 tato mīḍhvāṃsam āmantrya śunāsīrāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: tatas mīḍhvāṃsam āmantrya śunāsīrāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.007/2 bhūyas tad deva-yajanaṃ sa-mīḍhvad-vedhaso yayuḥ
analyzed: bhūyas tat devayajanam sa mīḍhvat vedhasaḥ yayuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.008/1 vidhāya kārtsnyena ca tad yad āha bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: vidhāya kārtsnyena ca tat yat āha bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.008/2 sandadhuḥ kasya kāyena savanīya-paśoḥ śiraḥ
analyzed: sandadhuḥ kasya kāyena savanīyapaśoḥ śiraḥ

original: BhP_04.07.009/1 sandhīyamāne śirasi dakṣo rudrābhivīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: sandhīyamāne śirasi dakṣaḥ rudra abhivīkṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.009/2 sadyaḥ supta ivottasthau dadṛśe cāgrato mṛḍam
analyzed: sadyas suptaḥ iva uttasthau dadṛśe ca agratas mṛḍam

original: BhP_04.07.010/1 tadā vṛṣadhvaja-dveṣa- kalilātmā prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: tadā vṛṣadhvaja dveṣa kalila ātmā prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.010/2 śivāvalokād abhavac charad-dhrada ivāmalaḥ
analyzed: śiva avalokāt abhavat śarad hradaḥ iva amalaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.011/1 bhava-stavāya kṛta-dhīr nāśaknod anurāgataḥ
analyzed: bhava stavāya kṛta dhīḥ na aśaknot anurāgataḥ

original: BhP_04.07.011/2 autkaṇṭhyād bāṣpa-kalayā samparetāṃ sutāṃ smaran
analyzed: autkaṇṭhyāt bāṣpa kalayā samparetām sutām smaran

original: BhP_04.07.012/1 kṛcchrāt saṃstabhya ca manaḥ prema-vihvalitaḥ sudhīḥ
analyzed: kṛcchrāt saṃstabhya ca manaḥ prema vihvalitaḥ sudhīḥ

original: BhP_04.07.012/2 śaśaṃsa nirvyalīkena bhāveneśaṃ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: śaśaṃsa nirvyalīkena bhāvena īśam prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.013/0 dakṣa uvāca
analyzed: dakṣaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.013/1 bhūyān anugraha aho bhavatā kṛto me
analyzed: bhūyān anugraha aho bhavatā kṛtaḥ me

original: BhP_04.07.013/2 daṇḍas tvayā mayi bhṛto yad api pralabdhaḥ
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ tvayā mayi bhṛtaḥ yat api pralabdhaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.013/3 na brahma-bandhuṣu ca vāṃ bhagavann avajñā
analyzed: na brahmabandhuṣu ca vām bhagavan avajñā

original: BhP_04.07.013/4 tubhyaṃ hareś ca kuta eva dhṛta-vrateṣu
analyzed: tubhyam hareḥ ca kutas eva dhṛta vrateṣu

original: BhP_04.07.014/1 vidyā-tapo-vrata-dharān mukhataḥ sma viprān
analyzed: vidyā tapaḥ vrata dharān mukhatas sma viprān

original: BhP_04.07.014/2 brahmātma-tattvam avituṃ prathamaṃ tvam asrāk
analyzed: brahma ātma tattvam avitum prathamam tvam

original: BhP_04.07.014/3 tad brāhmaṇān parama sarva-vipatsu pāsi
analyzed: tat brāhmaṇān parama sarva vipatsu pāsi

original: BhP_04.07.014/4 pālaḥ paśūn iva vibho pragṛhīta-daṇḍaḥ
analyzed: pālaḥ paśūn iva vibho pragṛhīta daṇḍaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.015/1 yo 'sau mayāvidita-tattva-dṛśā sabhāyāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ asau mayā avidita tattva dṛśā sabhāyām

original: BhP_04.07.015/2 kṣipto durukti-viśikhair vigaṇayya tan mām
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ durukti viśikhaiḥ vigaṇayya tat mām

original: BhP_04.07.015/3 arvāk patantam arhattama-nindayāpād
analyzed: arvāk patantam arhattama nindayā apāt

original: BhP_04.07.015/4 dṛṣṭyārdrayā sa bhagavān sva-kṛtena tuṣyet
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā ārdrayā sa bhagavān sva kṛtena tuṣyet

original: BhP_04.07.016/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.016/1 kṣamāpyaivaṃ sa mīḍhvāṃsaṃ brahmaṇā cānumantritaḥ
analyzed: kṣamāpya evam sa mīḍhvāṃsam brahmaṇā ca anumantritaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.016/2 karma santānayām āsa sopādhyāyartvig-ādibhiḥ
analyzed: karma santānayām āsa sa upādhyāya ṛtvij ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.017/1 vaiṣṇavaṃ yajña-santatyai tri-kapālaṃ dvijottamāḥ
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam yajña santatyai tri kapālam dvijottamāḥ

original: BhP_04.07.017/2 puroḍāśaṃ niravapan vīra-saṃsarga-śuddhaye
analyzed: puroḍāśam niravapan vīra saṃsarga śuddhaye

original: BhP_04.07.018/1 adhvaryuṇātta-haviṣā yajamāno viśāmpate
analyzed: adhvaryuṇā ātta haviṣā yajamānaḥ viśām pate

original: BhP_04.07.018/2 dhiyā viśuddhayā dadhyau tathā prādurabhūd dhariḥ
analyzed: dhiyā viśuddhayā dadhyau tathā prādurabhūt hariḥ

original: BhP_04.07.019/1 tadā sva-prabhayā teṣāṃ dyotayantyā diśo daśa
analyzed: tadā sva prabhayā teṣām dyotayantyā diśaḥ daśa

original: BhP_04.07.019/2 muṣṇaṃs teja upānītas tārkṣyeṇa stotra-vājinā
analyzed: muṣṇan tejaḥ upānītaḥ tārkṣyeṇa stotra vājinā

original: BhP_04.07.020/1 śyāmo hiraṇya-raśano 'rka-kirīṭa-juṣṭo
analyzed: śyāmaḥ hiraṇya raśanaḥ arka kirīṭa juṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.020/2 nīlālaka-bhramara-maṇḍita-kuṇḍalāsyaḥ
BhP_04.07.020/3 śaṅkhābja-cakra-śara-cāpa-gadāsi-carma-
analyzed: śaṅkha abja cakra śara cāpa gadā asi carma

original: BhP_04.07.020/4 vyagrair hiraṇmaya-bhujair iva karṇikāraḥ
analyzed: vyagraiḥ hiraṇmaya bhujaiḥ iva karṇikāraḥ

original: BhP_04.07.021/1 vakṣasy adhiśrita-vadhūr vana-māly udāra-
analyzed: vakṣasi adhiśrita vadhūḥ vanamālī udāra

original: BhP_04.07.021/2 hāsāvaloka-kalayā ramayaṃś ca viśvam
analyzed: hāsa avaloka kalayā ramayan ca viśvam

original: BhP_04.07.021/3 pārśva-bhramad-vyajana-cāmara-rāja-haṃsaḥ
BhP_04.07.021/4 śvetātapatra-śaśinopari rajyamānaḥ
analyzed: śveta ātapatra śaśinā upari rajyamānaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.022/1 tam upāgatam ālakṣya sarve sura-gaṇādayaḥ
analyzed: tam upāgatam ālakṣya sarve sura gaṇa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.022/2 praṇemuḥ sahasotthāya brahmendra-tryakṣa-nāyakāḥ
analyzed: praṇemuḥ sahasā utthāya brahma indra tryakṣa nāyakāḥ

original: BhP_04.07.023/1 tat-tejasā hata-rucaḥ sanna-jihvāḥ sa-sādhvasāḥ
analyzed: tad tejasā hata rucaḥ sanna jihvāḥ sa sādhvasāḥ

original: BhP_04.07.023/2 mūrdhnā dhṛtāñjali-puṭā upatasthur adhokṣajam
analyzed: mūrdhnā dhṛta añjali puṭāḥ upatasthuḥ adhokṣajam

original: BhP_04.07.024/1 apy arvāg-vṛttayo yasya mahi tv ātmabhuv-ādayaḥ
analyzed: api arvāk vṛttayaḥ yasya tu ātmabhuvā ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.024/2 yathā-mati gṛṇanti sma kṛtānugraha-vigraham
analyzed: yathāmati gṛṇanti sma kṛta anugraha vigraham

original: BhP_04.07.025/1 dakṣo gṛhītārhaṇa-sādanottamaṃ
analyzed: dakṣaḥ gṛhīta arhaṇa sādana uttamam

original: BhP_04.07.025/2 yajñeśvaraṃ viśva-sṛjāṃ paraṃ gurum
analyzed: yajñeśvaram viśva sṛjām param gurum

original: BhP_04.07.025/3 sunanda-nandādy-anugair vṛtaṃ mudā
analyzed: sunanda nanda ādi anugaiḥ vṛtam mudā

original: BhP_04.07.025/4 gṛṇan prapede prayataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: gṛṇan prapede prayataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_04.07.026/0 dakṣa uvāca
analyzed: dakṣaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.026/1 śuddhaṃ sva-dhāmny uparatākhila-buddhy-avasthaṃ
analyzed: śuddham sva dhāmni uparata akhila buddhi avastham

original: BhP_04.07.026/2 cin-mātram ekam abhayaṃ pratiṣidhya māyām
analyzed: cit mātram ekam abhayam pratiṣidhya māyām

original: BhP_04.07.026/3 tiṣṭhaṃs tayaiva puruṣatvam upetya tasyām
analyzed: tiṣṭhan tayā eva puruṣa tvam upetya tasyām

original: BhP_04.07.026/4 āste bhavān apariśuddha ivātma-tantraḥ
analyzed: āste bhavān apariśuddhaḥ iva ātmatantraḥ

original: BhP_04.07.027/0 ṛtvija ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ ūcuḥ
