original: BhP_04.07.027/1 tattvaṃ na te vayam anañjana rudra-śāpāt
analyzed: tattvam na te vayam anañjana rudra śāpāt

original: BhP_04.07.027/2 karmaṇy avagraha-dhiyo bhagavan vidāmaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇi avagraha dhiyaḥ bhagavan vidāmaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.027/3 dharmopalakṣaṇam idaṃ trivṛd adhvarākhyaṃ
analyzed: dharma upalakṣaṇam idam trivṛt adhvara ākhyam

original: BhP_04.07.027/4 jñātaṃ yad-artham adhidaivam ado vyavasthāḥ
analyzed: jñātam yad artham adhidaivam adaḥ vyavasthāḥ

original: BhP_04.07.028/0 sadasyā ūcuḥ
analyzed: sadasyāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.028/1 utpatty-adhvany aśaraṇa uru-kleśa-durge 'ntakogra-
analyzed: utpatti adhvani aśaraṇaḥ uru kleśa durge antaka ugra

original: BhP_04.07.028/2 vyālānviṣṭe viṣaya-mṛga-tṛṣy ātma-gehoru-bhāraḥ
analyzed: vyāla anviṣṭe viṣaya mṛga tṛṣi ātma geha uru bhāraḥ

original: BhP_04.07.028/3 dvandva-śvabhre khala-mṛga-bhaye śoka-dāve 'jña-sārthaḥ
analyzed: dvandva śvabhre khala mṛga bhaye śoka dāve ajña sārthaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.028/4 pādaukas te śaraṇada kadā yāti kāmopasṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: pāda okaḥ te śaraṇa da kadā yāti kāma upasṛṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.029/0 rudra uvāca
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.029/1 tava varada varāṅghrāv āśiṣehākhilārthe
analyzed: tava vara da vara aṅghrau āśiṣā iha akhila arthe

original: BhP_04.07.029/2 hy api munibhir asaktair ādareṇārhaṇīye
analyzed: hi api munibhiḥ asaktaiḥ ādareṇa arhaṇīye

original: BhP_04.07.029/3 yadi racita-dhiyaṃ māvidya-loko 'paviddhaṃ
analyzed: yadi racita dhiyam mā avidya lokaḥ apaviddham

original: BhP_04.07.029/4 japati na gaṇaye tat tvat-parānugraheṇa
analyzed: japati na gaṇaye tat tvad para anugraheṇa

original: BhP_04.07.030/0 bhṛgur uvāca
analyzed: bhṛguḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.030/1 yan māyayā gahanayāpahṛtātma-bodhā
analyzed: yat māyayā gahanayā apahṛta ātma bodhā

original: BhP_04.07.030/2 brahmādayas tanu-bhṛtas tamasi svapantaḥ
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ tanubhṛtaḥ tamasi svapantaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.030/3 nātman-śritaṃ tava vidanty adhunāpi tattvaṃ
analyzed: na ātman śritam tava vidanti adhunā api tattvam

original: BhP_04.07.030/4 so 'yaṃ prasīdatu bhavān praṇatātma-bandhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ ayam prasīdatu bhavān praṇata ātma bandhuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.031/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.031/1 naitat svarūpaṃ bhavato 'sau padārtha- bheda-grahaiḥ puruṣo yāvad īkṣet
analyzed: na etat sva rūpam bhavataḥ asau padārtha bheda grahaiḥ puruṣaḥ yāvat īkṣet

original: BhP_04.07.031/2 jñānasya cārthasya guṇasya cāśrayo māyāmayād vyatirikto matas tvam
analyzed: jñānasya ca arthasya guṇasya ca āśrayaḥ māyā mayāt vyatiriktaḥ mataḥ tvam

original: BhP_04.07.032/0 indra uvāca
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.032/1 idam apy acyuta viśva-bhāvanaṃ vapur ānanda-karaṃ mano-dṛśām
analyzed: idam api acyuta viśva bhāvanam vapuḥ ānanda karam manaḥ dṛśām

original: BhP_04.07.032/2 sura-vidviṭ-kṣapaṇair udāyudhair bhuja-daṇḍair upapannam aṣṭabhiḥ
analyzed: sura vidviṣ kṣapaṇaiḥ udāyudhaiḥ bhuja daṇḍaiḥ upapannam aṣṭabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.033/0 patnya ūcuḥ
analyzed: patnyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.033/1 yajño 'yaṃ tava yajanāya kena sṛṣṭo vidhvastaḥ paśupatinādya dakṣa-kopāt
analyzed: yajñaḥ ayam tava yajanāya kena sṛṣṭaḥ vidhvastaḥ paśupatinā adya dakṣa kopāt

original: BhP_04.07.033/2 taṃ nas tvaṃ śava-śayanābha-śānta-medhaṃ yajñātman nalina-rucā dṛśā punīhi
analyzed: tam naḥ tvam śava śayana ābha śānta medham yajñātman nalina rucā dṛśā punīhi

original: BhP_04.07.034/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.034/1 ananvitaṃ te bhagavan viceṣṭitaṃ yad ātmanā carasi hi karma nājyase
analyzed: ananvitam te bhagavan viceṣṭitam yat ātmanā carasi hi karma na ajyase

original: BhP_04.07.034/2 vibhūtaye yata upasedur īśvarīṃ na manyate svayam anuvartatīṃ bhavān
analyzed: vibhūtaye yatas upaseduḥ īśvarīm na manyate svayam anuvartatīm bhavān

original: BhP_04.07.035/0 siddhā ūcuḥ
analyzed: siddhāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.035/1 ayaṃ tvat-kathā-mṛṣṭa-pīyūṣa-nadyāṃ mano-vāraṇaḥ kleśa-dāvāgni-dagdhaḥ
analyzed: ayam tvad kathā mṛṣṭa pīyūṣa nadyām manaḥ vāraṇaḥ kleśa dāva agni dagdhaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.035/2 tṛṣārto 'vagāḍho na sasmāra dāvaṃ na niṣkrāmati brahma-sampannavan naḥ
analyzed: tṛṣā ārtaḥ avagāḍhaḥ na sasmāra dāvam na niṣkrāmati brahma sampanna vat naḥ

original: BhP_04.07.036/0 yajamāny uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.036/1 svāgataṃ te prasīdeśa tubhyaṃ namaḥ śrīnivāsa śriyā kāntayā trāhi naḥ
analyzed: svāgatam te prasīda īśa tubhyam namaḥ śrīnivāsa śriyā kāntayā trāhi naḥ

original: BhP_04.07.036/2 tvām ṛte 'dhīśa nāṅgair makhaḥ śobhate śīrṣa-hīnaḥ ka-bandho yathā puruṣaḥ
analyzed: tvām ṛte adhīśa na aṅgaiḥ makhaḥ śobhate śīrṣa hīnaḥ kabandhaḥ yathā puruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.037/0 lokapālā ūcuḥ
analyzed: lokapālāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.037/1 dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ no dṛgbhir asad-grahais tvaṃ pratyag-draṣṭā dṛśyate yena viśvam
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kim naḥ asadgrahaiḥ tvam pratyak draṣṭā dṛśyate yena viśvam

original: BhP_04.07.037/2 māyā hy eṣā bhavadīyā hi bhūman yas tvaṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pañcabhir bhāsi bhūtaiḥ
analyzed: māyā hi eṣā bhavadīyā hi bhūman yaḥ tvam ṣaṣṭhaḥ pañcabhiḥ bhāsi bhūtaiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.038/0 yogeśvarā ūcuḥ
analyzed: yogeśvarāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.038/1 preyān na te 'nyo 'sty amutas tvayi prabho viśvātmanīkṣen na pṛthag ya ātmanaḥ
analyzed: preyāt na te anyaḥ asti amutas tvayi prabho viśvātman īkṣet na pṛthak yaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.038/2 athāpi bhaktyeśa tayopadhāvatām ananya-vṛttyānugṛhāṇa vatsala
analyzed: athā api bhaktyā īśa tayā upadhāvatām ananya vṛttyā anugṛhāṇa vatsala

original: BhP_04.07.039/1 jagad-udbhava-sthiti-layeṣu daivato bahu-bhidyamāna-guṇayātma-māyayā
analyzed: jagat udbhava sthiti layeṣu daivataḥ bahu bhidyamāna guṇayā ātma māyayā

original: BhP_04.07.039/2 racitātma-bheda-mataye sva-saṃsthayā vinivartita-bhrama-guṇātmane namaḥ
analyzed: racita ātma bheda mataye sva saṃsthayā vinivartita bhrama guṇa ātmane namaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.040/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.040/1 namas te śrita-sattvāya dharmādīnāṃ ca sūtaye
analyzed: namaḥ te śrita sattvāya dharma ādīnām ca sūtaye

original: BhP_04.07.040/2 nirguṇāya ca yat-kāṣṭhāṃ nāhaṃ vedāpare 'pi ca
analyzed: nirguṇāya ca yad kāṣṭhām na aham veda apare api ca

original: BhP_04.07.041/0 agnir uvāca
analyzed: agniḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.041/1 yat-tejasāhaṃ susamiddha-tejā havyaṃ vahe svadhvara ājya-siktam
analyzed: yat tejasā aham su samiddha tejāḥ havyam vahe su adhvare ājya siktam

original: BhP_04.07.041/2 taṃ yajñiyaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ sviṣṭaṃ yajurbhiḥ praṇato 'smi yajñam
analyzed: tam yajñiyam pañcavidham ca pañcabhiḥ su iṣṭam yajurbhiḥ praṇataḥ asmi yajñam

original: BhP_04.07.042/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.042/1 purā kalpāpāye sva-kṛtam udarī-kṛtya vikṛtaṃ
analyzed: purā kalpa apāye sva kṛtam udarīkṛtya vikṛtam

original: BhP_04.07.042/2 tvam evādyas tasmin salila uragendrādhiśayane
analyzed: tvam eva ādyaḥ tasmin salile uraga indra adhiśayane

original: BhP_04.07.042/3 pumān śeṣe siddhair hṛdi vimṛśitādhyātma-padaviḥ
analyzed: pumān śeṣe siddhaiḥ hṛdi vimṛśita adhyātma padaviḥ

original: BhP_04.07.042/4 sa evādyākṣṇor yaḥ pathi carasi bhṛtyān avasi naḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva adya akṣṇoḥ yaḥ pathi carasi bhṛtyān avasi naḥ

original: BhP_04.07.043/0 gandharvā ūcuḥ
analyzed: gandharvāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.043/1 aṃśāṃśās te deva marīcy-ādaya ete brahmendrādyā deva-gaṇā rudra-purogāḥ
analyzed: aṃśa aṃśāḥ te deva marīci ādayaḥ ete brahma indra ādyāḥ deva gaṇāḥ rudra purogāḥ

original: BhP_04.07.043/2 krīḍā-bhāṇḍaṃ viśvam idaṃ yasya vibhūman tasmai nityaṃ nātha namas te karavāma
analyzed: krīḍā bhāṇḍam viśvam idam yasya vibhūman tasmai nityam nātha namaḥ te karavāma

original: BhP_04.07.044/0 vidyādharā ūcuḥ
analyzed: vidyādharāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.044/1 tvan-māyayārtham abhipadya kalevare 'smin
analyzed: tvad māyayā artham abhipadya kalevare asmin

original: BhP_04.07.044/2 kṛtvā mamāham iti durmatir utpathaiḥ svaiḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā mama aham iti durmatiḥ utpathaiḥ svaiḥ

original: BhP_04.07.044/3 kṣipto 'py asad-viṣaya-lālasa ātma-mohaṃ
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ api asat viṣaya lālasaḥ ātma moham

original: BhP_04.07.044/4 yuṣmat-kathāmṛta-niṣevaka udvyudasyet
analyzed: yuṣmad kathā amṛta niṣevakaḥ udvyudasyet

original: BhP_04.07.045/0 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.045/1 tvaṃ kratus tvaṃ havis tvaṃ hutāśaḥ svayaṃ tvaṃ hi mantraḥ samid-darbha-pātrāṇi ca
analyzed: tvam kratuḥ tvam haviḥ tvam hutāśaḥ svayam tvam hi mantraḥ samidh darbha pātrāṇi ca

original: BhP_04.07.045/2 tvaṃ sadasyartvijo dampatī devatā agnihotraṃ svadhā soma ājyaṃ paśuḥ
analyzed: tvam sadasya ṛtvijaḥ dampatī devatāḥ agnihotram svadhā somaḥ ājyam paśuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.046/1 tvaṃ purā gāṃ rasāyā mahā-sūkaro daṃṣṭrayā padminīṃ vāraṇendro yathā
analyzed: tvam purā gām rasāyāḥ mahā sūkaraḥ daṃṣṭrayā padminīm vāraṇa indraḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.07.046/2 stūyamāno nadal līlayā yogibhir vyujjahartha trayī-gātra yajña-kratuḥ
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ nadan līlayā yogibhiḥ vyujjahartha trayī gātra yajñakratuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.047/1 sa prasīda tvam asmākam ākāṅkṣatāṃ darśanaṃ te paribhraṣṭa-sat-karmaṇām
analyzed: sa prasīda tvam asmākam ākāṅkṣatām darśanam te paribhraṣṭa sat karmaṇām

original: BhP_04.07.047/2 kīrtyamāne nṛbhir nāmni yajñeśa te yajña-vighnāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti tasmai namaḥ
analyzed: kīrtyamāne nṛbhiḥ nāmni yajñeśa te yajña vighnāḥ kṣayam yānti tasmai namaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.048/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.048/1 iti dakṣaḥ kavir yajñaṃ bhadra rudrābhimarśitam
analyzed: iti dakṣaḥ kaviḥ yajñam bhadra rudra abhimarśitam

original: BhP_04.07.048/2 kīrtyamāne hṛṣīkeśe sanninye yajña-bhāvane
analyzed: kīrtyamāne hṛṣīkeśe sanninye yajña bhāvane

original: BhP_04.07.049/1 bhagavān svena bhāgena sarvātmā sarva-bhāga-bhuk
analyzed: bhagavān svena bhāgena sarva ātmā sarva bhāga bhuj

original: BhP_04.07.049/2 dakṣaṃ babhāṣa ābhāṣya prīyamāṇa ivānagha
analyzed: dakṣam babhāṣa ābhāṣya prīyamāṇaḥ iva anagha

original: BhP_04.07.050/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.050/1 ahaṃ brahmā ca śarvaś ca jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param
analyzed: aham brahmā ca śarvaḥ ca jagataḥ kāraṇam param

original: BhP_04.07.050/2 ātmeśvara upadraṣṭā svayan-dṛg aviśeṣaṇaḥ
BhP_04.07.051/1 ātma-māyāṃ samāviśya so 'haṃ guṇamayīṃ dvija
analyzed: ātma māyām samāviśya saḥ aham guṇa mayīm dvija

original: BhP_04.07.051/2 sṛjan rakṣan haran viśvaṃ dadhre saṃjñāṃ kriyocitām
analyzed: sṛjan rakṣan haran viśvam dadhre saṃjñām kriyā ucitām

original: BhP_04.07.052/1 tasmin brahmaṇy advitīye kevale paramātmani
analyzed: tasmin brahmaṇi advitīye kevale paramātmani

original: BhP_04.07.052/2 brahma-rudrau ca bhūtāni bhedenājño 'nupaśyati
analyzed: brahma rudrau ca bhūtāni bhedena ajñaḥ anupaśyati

original: BhP_04.07.053/1 yathā pumān na svāṅgeṣu śiraḥ-pāṇy-ādiṣu kvacit
analyzed: yathā pumān na sva aṅgeṣu śiraḥ pāṇi ādiṣu kvacid

original: BhP_04.07.053/2 pārakya-buddhiṃ kurute evaṃ bhūteṣu mat-paraḥ
analyzed: pārakya buddhim kurute evam bhūteṣu mad paraḥ

original: BhP_04.07.054/1 trayāṇām eka-bhāvānāṃ yo na paśyati vai bhidām
analyzed: trayāṇām eka bhāvānām yaḥ na paśyati vai bhidām

original: BhP_04.07.054/2 sarva-bhūtātmanāṃ brahman sa śāntim adhigacchati
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātmanām brahman sa śāntim adhigacchati

original: BhP_04.07.055/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.07.055/1 evaṃ bhagavatādiṣṭaḥ prajāpati-patir harim
analyzed: evam bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ prajāpati patiḥ harim

original: BhP_04.07.055/2 arcitvā kratunā svena devān ubhayato 'yajat
analyzed: arcitvā kratunā svena devān ubhayatas ayajat

original: BhP_04.07.056/1 rudraṃ ca svena bhāgena hy upādhāvat samāhitaḥ
analyzed: rudram ca svena bhāgena hi upādhāvat samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.056/2 karmaṇodavasānena somapān itarān api
analyzed: karmaṇā udavasānena somapān itarān api

original: BhP_04.07.056/3 udavasya sahartvigbhiḥ sasnāv avabhṛthaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: udavasya saha ṛtvigbhiḥ sasnau avabhṛtham tatas

original: BhP_04.07.057/1 tasmā apy anubhāvena svenaivāvāpta-rādhase
analyzed: tasmai api anubhāvena svena eva avāpta rādhase

original: BhP_04.07.057/2 dharma eva matiṃ dattvā tridaśās te divaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: dharme eva matim dattvā tridaśāḥ te divam yayuḥ

original: BhP_04.07.058/1 evaṃ dākṣāyaṇī hitvā satī pūrva-kalevaram
analyzed: evam dākṣāyaṇī hitvā satī pūrva kalevaram

original: BhP_04.07.058/2 jajñe himavataḥ kṣetre menāyām iti śuśruma
analyzed: jajñe himavataḥ kṣetre menāyām iti śuśruma

original: BhP_04.07.059/1 tam eva dayitaṃ bhūya āvṛṅkte patim ambikā
analyzed: tam eva dayitam bhūyas āvṛṅkte patim ambikā

original: BhP_04.07.059/2 ananya-bhāvaika-gatiṃ śaktiḥ supteva pūruṣam
analyzed: ananya bhāva eka gatim śaktiḥ suptā iva pūruṣam

original: BhP_04.07.060/1 etad bhagavataḥ śambhoḥ karma dakṣādhvara-druhaḥ
analyzed: etat bhagavataḥ śambhoḥ karma dakṣa adhvara druhaḥ

original: BhP_04.07.060/2 śrutaṃ bhāgavatāc chiṣyād uddhavān me bṛhaspateḥ
analyzed: śrutam bhāgavatāt śiṣyāt uddhavāt me bṛhaspateḥ

original: BhP_04.07.061/1 idaṃ pavitraṃ param īśa-ceṣṭitaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam aghaugha-marṣaṇam
analyzed: idam pavitram param īśa ceṣṭitam yaśasyam āyuṣyam agha ogha marṣaṇam

original: BhP_04.07.061/2 yo nityadākarṇya naro 'nukīrtayed dhunoty aghaṃ kaurava bhakti-bhāvataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nityadā ākarṇya naraḥ anukīrtayet dhunoti agham kaurava bhakti bhāvataḥ

original: BhP_04.08.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.001/1 sanakādyā nāradaś ca ṛbhur haṃso 'ruṇir yatiḥ
analyzed: sanaka ādyāḥ nāradaḥ ca ṛbhuḥ haṃsaḥ aruṇiḥ yatiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.001/2 naite gṛhān brahma-sutā hy āvasann ūrdhva-retasaḥ
analyzed: na ete gṛhān brahma sutāḥ hi āvasan ūrdhvaretasaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.002/1 mṛṣādharmasya bhāryāsīd dambhaṃ māyāṃ ca śatru-han
analyzed: mṛṣā dharmasya bhāryā āsīt dambham māyām ca śatru han

original: BhP_04.08.002/2 asūta mithunaṃ tat tu nirṛtir jagṛhe 'prajaḥ
analyzed: asūta mithunam tat tu nirṛtiḥ jagṛhe aprajaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.003/1 tayoḥ samabhaval lobho nikṛtiś ca mahā-mate
analyzed: tayoḥ samabhavat lobhaḥ nikṛtiḥ ca mahāmate

original: BhP_04.08.003/2 tābhyāṃ krodhaś ca hiṃsā ca yad duruktiḥ svasā kaliḥ
analyzed: tābhyām krodhaḥ ca hiṃsā ca yat duruktiḥ svasā kaliḥ

original: BhP_04.08.004/1 duruktau kalir ādhatta bhayaṃ mṛtyuṃ ca sattama
analyzed: duruktau kaliḥ ādhatta bhayam mṛtyum ca sattama

original: BhP_04.08.004/2 tayoś ca mithunaṃ jajñe yātanā nirayas tathā
analyzed: tayoḥ ca mithunam jajñe yātanā nirayaḥ tathā

original: BhP_04.08.005/1 saṅgraheṇa mayākhyātaḥ pratisargas tavānagha
analyzed: saṅgraheṇa mayā ākhyātaḥ pratisargaḥ tava anagha

original: BhP_04.08.005/2 triḥ śrutvaitat pumān puṇyaṃ vidhunoty ātmano malam
analyzed: tris śrutvā etat pumān puṇyam vidhunoti ātmanaḥ malam

original: BhP_04.08.006/1 athātaḥ kīrtaye vaṃśaṃ puṇya-kīrteḥ kurūdvaha
analyzed: atha atas kīrtaye vaṃśam puṇya kīrteḥ kuru udvaha

original: BhP_04.08.006/2 svāyambhuvasyāpi manor harer aṃśāṃśa-janmanaḥ
analyzed: svāyambhuvasya api manoḥ hareḥ aṃśāṃśajanmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.007/1 priyavratottānapādau śatarūpā-pateḥ sutau
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapādau śatarūpā pateḥ sutau

original: BhP_04.08.007/2 vāsudevasya kalayā rakṣāyāṃ jagataḥ sthitau
analyzed: vāsudevasya kalayā rakṣāyām jagataḥ sthitau

original: BhP_04.08.008/1 jāye uttānapādasya sunītiḥ surucis tayoḥ
analyzed: jāye uttānapādasya sunītiḥ suruciḥ tayoḥ

original: BhP_04.08.008/2 suruciḥ preyasī patyur netarā yat-suto dhruvaḥ
analyzed: suruciḥ preyasī patyuḥ na itarā yat sutaḥ dhruvaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.009/1 ekadā suruceḥ putram aṅkam āropya lālayan
analyzed: ekadā suruceḥ putram aṅkam āropya lālayan

original: BhP_04.08.009/2 uttamaṃ nārurukṣantaṃ dhruvaṃ rājābhyanandata
analyzed: uttamam na ārurukṣantam dhruvam rājā abhyanandata

original: BhP_04.08.010/1 tathā cikīrṣamāṇaṃ taṃ sapatnyās tanayaṃ dhruvam
analyzed: tathā cikīrṣamāṇam tam sapatnyāḥ tanayam dhruvam

original: BhP_04.08.010/2 suruciḥ śṛṇvato rājñaḥ serṣyam āhātigarvitā
analyzed: suruciḥ śṛṇvataḥ rājñaḥ sa īrṣyam āha ati garvitā

original: BhP_04.08.011/1 na vatsa nṛpater dhiṣṇyaṃ bhavān āroḍhum arhati
analyzed: na vatsa nṛpateḥ dhiṣṇyam bhavān āroḍhum arhati

original: BhP_04.08.011/2 na gṛhīto mayā yat tvaṃ kukṣāv api nṛpātmajaḥ
analyzed: na gṛhītaḥ mayā yat tvam kukṣau api nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.012/1 bālo 'si bata nātmānam anya-strī-garbha-sambhṛtam
analyzed: bālaḥ asi bata na ātmānam anya strī garbha sambhṛtam

original: BhP_04.08.012/2 nūnaṃ veda bhavān yasya durlabhe 'rthe manorathaḥ
analyzed: nūnam veda bhavān yasya durlabhe arthe manorathaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.013/1 tapasārādhya puruṣaṃ tasyaivānugraheṇa me
analyzed: tapasā ārādhya puruṣam tasya eva anugraheṇa me

original: BhP_04.08.013/2 garbhe tvaṃ sādhayātmānaṃ yadīcchasi nṛpāsanam
analyzed: garbhe tvam sādhaya ātmānam yadi icchasi nṛpāsanam

original: BhP_04.08.014/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.014/1 mātuḥ sapatnyāḥ sa durukti-viddhaḥ śvasan ruṣā daṇḍa-hato yathāhiḥ
analyzed: mātuḥ sapatnyāḥ sa durukti viddhaḥ śvasan ruṣā daṇḍa hataḥ yathā ahiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.014/2 hitvā miṣantaṃ pitaraṃ sanna-vācaṃ jagāma mātuḥ prarudan sakāśam
analyzed: hitvā miṣantam pitaram sanna vācam jagāma mātuḥ prarudan sakāśam

original: BhP_04.08.015/1 taṃ niḥśvasantaṃ sphuritādharoṣṭhaṃ sunītir utsaṅga udūhya bālam
analyzed: tam niḥśvasantam sphurita adhara uṣṭham sunītiḥ utsaṅge udūhya bālam

original: BhP_04.08.015/2 niśamya tat-paura-mukhān nitāntaṃ sā vivyathe yad gaditaṃ sapatnyā
analyzed: niśamya tad paura mukhāt nitāntam sā vivyathe yat gaditam sapatnyā

original: BhP_04.08.016/1 sotsṛjya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa śoka- dāvāgninā dāva-lateva bālā
analyzed: sā utsṛjya dhairyam vilalāpa śoka dāva agninā dāva latā iva bālā

original: BhP_04.08.016/2 vākyaṃ sapatnyāḥ smaratī saroja- śriyā dṛśā bāṣpa-kalām uvāha
analyzed: vākyam sapatnyāḥ smaratī saroja śriyā dṛśā bāṣpa kalām uvāha

original: BhP_04.08.017/1 dīrghaṃ śvasantī vṛjinasya pāram apaśyatī bālakam āha bālā
analyzed: dīrgham śvasantī vṛjinasya pāram a paśyatī bālakam āha bālā

original: BhP_04.08.017/2 māmaṅgalaṃ tāta pareṣu maṃsthā bhuṅkte jano yat para-duḥkhadas tat
analyzed: mā maṅgalam tāta pareṣu bhuṅkte janaḥ yat para duḥkha daḥ tat

original: BhP_04.08.018/1 satyaṃ surucyābhihitaṃ bhavān me yad durbhagāyā udare gṛhītaḥ
analyzed: satyam surucyā abhihitam bhavān me yat durbhagāyāḥ udare gṛhītaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.018/2 stanyena vṛddhaś ca vilajjate yāṃ bhāryeti vā voḍhum iḍaspatir mām
analyzed: stanyena vṛddhaḥ ca vilajjate yām bhāryā iti vā voḍhum iḍaspatiḥ mām

original: BhP_04.08.019/1 ātiṣṭha tat tāta vimatsaras tvam uktaṃ samātrāpi yad avyalīkam
analyzed: ātiṣṭha tat tāta vimatsaraḥ tvam uktam sa mātrā api yat avyalīkam

original: BhP_04.08.019/2 ārādhayādhokṣaja-pāda-padmaṃ yadīcchase 'dhyāsanam uttamo yathā
analyzed: ārādhaya adhokṣaja pāda padmam yadi icchase adhyāsanam uttamaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.08.020/1 yasyāṅghri-padmaṃ paricarya viśva- vibhāvanāyātta-guṇābhipatteḥ
analyzed: yasya aṅghri padmam paricarya viśva vibhāvanāya ātta guṇa abhipatteḥ

original: BhP_04.08.020/2 ajo 'dhyatiṣṭhat khalu pārameṣṭhyaṃ padaṃ jitātma-śvasanābhivandyam
analyzed: ajaḥ adhyatiṣṭhat khalu pārameṣṭhyam padam jita ātma śvasana abhivandyam

original: BhP_04.08.021/1 tathā manur vo bhagavān pitāmaho yam eka-matyā puru-dakṣiṇair makhaiḥ
analyzed: tathā manuḥ vaḥ bhagavān pitāmahaḥ yam ekamatyā puru dakṣiṇaiḥ makhaiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.021/2 iṣṭvābhipede duravāpam anyato bhaumaṃ sukhaṃ divyam athāpavargyam
analyzed: iṣṭvā abhipede duravāpam anyatas bhaumam sukham divyam atha āpavargyam

original: BhP_04.08.022/1 tam eva vatsāśraya bhṛtya-vatsalaṃ mumukṣubhir mṛgya-padābja-paddhatim
analyzed: tam eva vatsa āśraya bhṛtya vatsalam mumukṣubhiḥ mṛgya pada abja paddhatim

original: BhP_04.08.022/2 ananya-bhāve nija-dharma-bhāvite manasy avasthāpya bhajasva pūruṣam
analyzed: ananya bhāve nija dharma bhāvite manasi avasthāpya bhajasva pūruṣam

original: BhP_04.08.023/1 nānyaṃ tataḥ padma-palāśa-locanād duḥkha-cchidaṃ te mṛgayāmi kañcana
analyzed: nā anyam tatas padma palāśa locanāt duḥkha chidam te mṛgayāmi kañcana

original: BhP_04.08.023/2 yo mṛgyate hasta-gṛhīta-padmayā śriyetarair aṅga vimṛgyamāṇayā
analyzed: yaḥ mṛgyate hasta gṛhīta padmayā śriyā itaraiḥ aṅga vimṛgyamāṇayā

original: BhP_04.08.024/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.024/1 evaṃ sañjalpitaṃ mātur ākarṇyārthāgamaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: evam sañjalpitam mātuḥ ākarṇya artha āgamam vacaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.024/2 sanniyamyātmanātmānaṃ niścakrāma pituḥ purāt
analyzed: san niyamya ātmanā ātmānam niścakrāma pituḥ purāt

original: BhP_04.08.025/1 nāradas tad upākarṇya jñātvā tasya cikīrṣitam
analyzed: nāradaḥ tat upākarṇya jñātvā tasya cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_04.08.025/2 spṛṣṭvā mūrdhany agha-ghnena pāṇinā prāha vismitaḥ
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā mūrdhani agha ghnena pāṇinā prāha vismitaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.026/1 aho tejaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ māna-bhaṅgam amṛṣyatām
analyzed: aho tejaḥ kṣatriyāṇām māna bhaṅgam a mṛṣyatām

original: BhP_04.08.026/2 bālo 'py ayaṃ hṛdā dhatte yat samātur asad-vacaḥ
analyzed: bālaḥ api ayam hṛdā dhatte yat sa mātuḥ asat vacaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.027/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.027/1 nādhunāpy avamānaṃ te sammānaṃ vāpi putraka
analyzed: na adhunā api avamānam te sammānam vā api putraka

original: BhP_04.08.027/2 lakṣayāmaḥ kumārasya saktasya krīḍanādiṣu
analyzed: lakṣayāmaḥ kumārasya saktasya krīḍana ādiṣu

original: BhP_04.08.028/1 vikalpe vidyamāne 'pi na hy asantoṣa-hetavaḥ
analyzed: vikalpe vidyamāne api na hi asantoṣa hetavaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.028/2 puṃso moham ṛte bhinnā yal loke nija-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ moham ṛte bhinnāḥ yat loke nija karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.029/1 parituṣyet tatas tāta tāvan-mātreṇa pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: parituṣyet tatas tāta tāvat mātreṇa pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.029/2 daivopasāditaṃ yāvad vīkṣyeśvara-gatiṃ budhaḥ
analyzed: daiva upasāditam yāvat vīkṣya īśvara gatim budhaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.030/1 atha mātropadiṣṭena yogenāvarurutsasi
analyzed: atha mātrā upadiṣṭena yogena avarurutsasi

original: BhP_04.08.030/2 yat-prasādaṃ sa vai puṃsāṃ durārādhyo mato mama
analyzed: yad prasādam sa vai puṃsām durārādhyaḥ mataḥ mama

original: BhP_04.08.031/1 munayaḥ padavīṃ yasya niḥsaṅgenoru-janmabhiḥ
analyzed: munayaḥ padavīm yasya niḥsaṅgena ūru janmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.031/2 na vidur mṛgayanto 'pi tīvra-yoga-samādhinā
analyzed: na viduḥ mṛgayantaḥ api tīvra yoga samādhinā

original: BhP_04.08.032/1 ato nivartatām eṣa nirbandhas tava niṣphalaḥ
analyzed: atas nivartatām eṣa nirbandhaḥ tava niṣphalaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.032/2 yatiṣyati bhavān kāle śreyasāṃ samupasthite
analyzed: yatiṣyati bhavān kāle śreyasām samupasthite

original: BhP_04.08.033/1 yasya yad daiva-vihitaṃ sa tena sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: yasya yat daiva vihitam sa tena sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: BhP_04.08.033/2 ātmānaṃ toṣayan dehī tamasaḥ pāram ṛcchati
analyzed: ātmānam toṣayan dehī tamasaḥ pāram ṛcchati

original: BhP_04.08.034/1 guṇādhikān mudaṃ lipsed anukrośaṃ guṇādhamāt
analyzed: guṇa adhikāt mudam lipset anukrośam guṇa adhamāt

original: BhP_04.08.034/2 maitrīṃ samānād anvicchen na tāpair abhibhūyate
analyzed: maitrīm samānāt anvicchet na tāpaiḥ abhibhūyate

original: BhP_04.08.035/0 dhruva uvāca
analyzed: dhruvaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.035/1 so 'yaṃ śamo bhagavatā sukha-duḥkha-hatātmanām
analyzed: saḥ ayam śamaḥ bhagavatā sukha duḥkha hata ātmanām

original: BhP_04.08.035/2 darśitaḥ kṛpayā puṃsāṃ durdarśo 'smad-vidhais tu yaḥ
analyzed: darśitaḥ kṛpayā puṃsām durdarśaḥ asmadvidhaiḥ tu yaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.036/1 athāpi me 'vinītasya kṣāttraṃ ghoram upeyuṣaḥ
analyzed: athā api me avinītasya kṣāttram ghoram upeyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.036/2 surucyā durvaco-bāṇair na bhinne śrayate hṛdi
analyzed: su rucyā durvacaḥ bāṇaiḥ na bhinne śrayate hṛdi

original: BhP_04.08.037/1 padaṃ tri-bhuvanotkṛṣṭaṃ jigīṣoḥ sādhu vartma me
analyzed: padam tribhuvana utkṛṣṭam jigīṣoḥ sādhu vartma me

original: BhP_04.08.037/2 brūhy asmat-pitṛbhir brahmann anyair apy anadhiṣṭhitam
analyzed: brūhi asmad pitṛbhiḥ brahman anyaiḥ api anadhiṣṭhitam

original: BhP_04.08.038/1 nūnaṃ bhavān bhagavato yo 'ṅgajaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
analyzed: nūnam bhavān bhagavataḥ yaḥ aṅgajaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.038/2 vitudann aṭate vīṇāṃ hitāya jagato 'rkavat
analyzed: vitudan aṭate vīṇām hitāya jagataḥ arka vat

original: BhP_04.08.039/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.039/1 ity udāhṛtam ākarṇya bhagavān nāradas tadā
analyzed: iti udāhṛtam ākarṇya bhagavān nāradaḥ tadā

original: BhP_04.08.039/2 prītaḥ pratyāha taṃ bālaṃ sad-vākyam anukampayā
analyzed: prītaḥ pratyāha tam bālam sat vākyam anukampayā

original: BhP_04.08.040/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.040/1 jananyābhihitaḥ panthāḥ sa vai niḥśreyasasya te
analyzed: jananyā abhihitaḥ panthāḥ sa vai niḥśreyasasya te

original: BhP_04.08.040/2 bhagavān vāsudevas taṃ bhaja taṃ pravaṇātmanā
analyzed: bhagavān vāsudevaḥ tam bhaja tam pravaṇa ātmanā

original: BhP_04.08.041/1 dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣākhyaṃ ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣa ākhyam yaḥ icchet śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.041/2 ekaṃ hy eva hares tatra kāraṇaṃ pāda-sevanam
analyzed: ekam hi eva hareḥ tatra kāraṇam pāda sevanam

original: BhP_04.08.042/1 tat tāta gaccha bhadraṃ te yamunāyās taṭaṃ śuci
analyzed: tat tāta gaccha bhadram te yamunāyāḥ taṭam śuci

original: BhP_04.08.042/2 puṇyaṃ madhuvanaṃ yatra sānnidhyaṃ nityadā hareḥ
analyzed: puṇyam madhuvanam yatra sānnidhyam nityadā hareḥ

original: BhP_04.08.043/1 snātvānusavanaṃ tasmin kālindyāḥ salile śive
analyzed: snātvā anusavanam tasmin kālindyāḥ salile śive

original: BhP_04.08.043/2 kṛtvocitāni nivasann ātmanaḥ kalpitāsanaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā ucitāni nivasan ātmanaḥ kalpita āsanaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.044/1 prāṇāyāmena tri-vṛtā prāṇendriya-mano-malam
BhP_04.08.044/2 śanair vyudasyābhidhyāyen manasā guruṇā gurum
analyzed: śanais vyudasya abhidhyāyet manasā guruṇā gurum

original: BhP_04.08.045/1 prasādābhimukhaṃ śaśvat prasanna-vadanekṣaṇam
analyzed: prasāda abhimukham śaśvat prasanna vadana īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_04.08.045/2 sunāsaṃ subhruvaṃ cāru- kapolaṃ sura-sundaram
analyzed: su nāsam su bhruvam cāru kapolam sura sundaram

original: BhP_04.08.046/1 taruṇaṃ ramaṇīyāṅgam aruṇoṣṭhekṣaṇādharam
analyzed: taruṇam ramaṇīya aṅgam aruṇa uṣṭha īkṣaṇa adharam

original: BhP_04.08.046/2 praṇatāśrayaṇaṃ nṛmṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ karuṇārṇavam
analyzed: praṇata āśrayaṇam nṛmṇam śaraṇyam karuṇā arṇavam

original: BhP_04.08.047/1 śrīvatsāṅkaṃ ghana-śyāmaṃ puruṣaṃ vana-mālinam
analyzed: śrīvatsa aṅkam ghanaśyāmam puruṣam vanamālinam

original: BhP_04.08.047/2 śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padmair abhivyakta-caturbhujam
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā padmaiḥ abhivyakta caturbhujam

original: BhP_04.08.048/1 kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ keyūra-valayānvitam
analyzed: kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam keyūra valaya anvitam

original: BhP_04.08.048/2 kaustubhābharaṇa-grīvaṃ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
analyzed: kaustubha ābharaṇa grīvam pīta kauśeya vāsasam

original: BhP_04.08.049/1 kāñcī-kalāpa-paryastaṃ lasat-kāñcana-nūpuram
analyzed: kāñcī kalāpa paryastam lasat kāñcana nūpuram

original: BhP_04.08.049/2 darśanīyatamaṃ śāntaṃ mano-nayana-vardhanam
analyzed: darśanīyatamam śāntam manaḥ nayana vardhanam

original: BhP_04.08.050/1 padbhyāṃ nakha-maṇi-śreṇyā vilasadbhyāṃ samarcatām
analyzed: padbhyām nakha maṇi śreṇyā vilasadbhyām samarcatām

original: BhP_04.08.050/2 hṛt-padma-karṇikā-dhiṣṇyam ākramyātmany avasthitam
analyzed: hṛd padma karṇikā dhiṣṇyam ākramya ātmani avasthitam

original: BhP_04.08.051/1 smayamānam abhidhyāyet sānurāgāvalokanam
analyzed: smayamānam abhidhyāyet sa anurāga avalokanam

original: BhP_04.08.051/2 niyatenaika-bhūtena manasā varadarṣabham
analyzed: niyatena eka bhūtena manasā vara da ṛṣabham

original: BhP_04.08.052/1 evaṃ bhagavato rūpaṃ subhadraṃ dhyāyato manaḥ
analyzed: evam bhagavataḥ rūpam su bhadram dhyāyataḥ manaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.052/2 nirvṛtyā parayā tūrṇaṃ sampannaṃ na nivartate
analyzed: nirvṛtyā parayā tūrṇam sampannam na nivartate

original: BhP_04.08.053/1 japaś ca paramo guhyaḥ śrūyatāṃ me nṛpātmaja
analyzed: japaḥ ca paramaḥ guhyaḥ śrūyatām me nṛpa ātmaja

original: BhP_04.08.053/2 yaṃ sapta-rātraṃ prapaṭhan pumān paśyati khecarān
analyzed: yam sapta rātram prapaṭhan pumān paśyati khecarān

original: BhP_04.08.054/0 oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya

original: BhP_04.08.054/1 mantreṇānena devasya kuryād dravyamayīṃ budhaḥ
analyzed: mantreṇa anena devasya kuryāt dravya mayīm budhaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.054/2 saparyāṃ vividhair dravyair deśa-kāla-vibhāgavit
analyzed: saparyām vividhaiḥ dravyaiḥ deśa kāla vibhāga vid

original: BhP_04.08.055/1 salilaiḥ śucibhir mālyair vanyair mūla-phalādibhiḥ
analyzed: salilaiḥ śucibhiḥ mālyaiḥ vanyaiḥ mūla phala ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.055/2 śastāṅkurāṃśukaiś cārcet tulasyā priyayā prabhum
analyzed: śasta aṅkura aṃśukaiḥ ca arcet tulasyā priyayā prabhum

original: BhP_04.08.056/1 labdhvā dravyamayīm arcāṃ kṣity-ambv-ādiṣu vārcayet
analyzed: labdhvā dravya mayīm arcām kṣiti ambu ādiṣu vā arcayet

original: BhP_04.08.056/2 ābhṛtātmā muniḥ śānto yata-vāṅ mita-vanya-bhuk
analyzed: ābhṛta ātmā muniḥ śāntaḥ yata vāc mita vanya bhuj

original: BhP_04.08.057/1 svecchāvatāra-caritair acintya-nija-māyayā
analyzed: sva icchā avatāra caritaiḥ acintya nija māyayā

original: BhP_04.08.057/2 kariṣyaty uttamaślokas tad dhyāyed dhṛdayaṅ-gamam
analyzed: kariṣyati uttamaślokaḥ tat dhyāyet hṛdayaṅgamam

original: BhP_04.08.058/1 paricaryā bhagavato yāvatyaḥ pūrva-sevitāḥ
analyzed: paricaryāḥ bhagavataḥ yāvatyaḥ pūrva sevitāḥ

original: BhP_04.08.058/2 tā mantra-hṛdayenaiva prayuñjyān mantra-mūrtaye
analyzed: tāḥ mantrahṛdayena eva prayuñjyāt mantramūrtaye

original: BhP_04.08.059/1 evaṃ kāyena manasā vacasā ca mano-gatam
analyzed: evam kāyena manasā vacasā ca manogatam

original: BhP_04.08.059/2 paricaryamāṇo bhagavān bhaktimat-paricaryayā
analyzed: paricaryamāṇaḥ bhagavān bhaktimat paricaryayā

original: BhP_04.08.060/1 puṃsām amāyināṃ samyag bhajatāṃ bhāva-vardhanaḥ
analyzed: puṃsām amāyinām samyak bhajatām bhāva vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.060/2 śreyo diśaty abhimataṃ yad dharmādiṣu dehinām
analyzed: śreyaḥ diśati abhimatam yat dharma ādiṣu dehinām

original: BhP_04.08.061/1 viraktaś cendriya-ratau bhakti-yogena bhūyasā
analyzed: viraktaḥ ca indriya ratau bhakti yogena bhūyasā

original: BhP_04.08.061/2 taṃ nirantara-bhāvena bhajetāddhā vimuktaye
analyzed: tam nirantara bhāvena bhajeta addhā vimuktaye

original: BhP_04.08.062/1 ity uktas taṃ parikramya praṇamya ca nṛpārbhakaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tam parikramya praṇamya ca nṛpa arbhakaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.062/2 yayau madhuvanaṃ puṇyaṃ hareś caraṇa-carcitam
analyzed: yayau madhuvanam puṇyam hareḥ caraṇa carcitam

original: BhP_04.08.063/1 tapo-vanaṃ gate tasmin praviṣṭo 'ntaḥ-puraṃ muniḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ vanam gate tasmin praviṣṭaḥ antaḥpuram muniḥ

original: BhP_04.08.063/2 arhitārhaṇako rājñā sukhāsīna uvāca tam
analyzed: arhita arhaṇakaḥ rājñā sukha āsīnaḥ uvāca tam

original: BhP_04.08.064/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.064/1 rājan kiṃ dhyāyase dīrghaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā
analyzed: rājan kim dhyāyase dīrgham mukhena pariśuṣyatā

original: BhP_04.08.064/2 kiṃ vā na riṣyate kāmo dharmo vārthena saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: kim vā na riṣyate kāmaḥ dharmaḥ vā arthena saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.065/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.065/1 suto me bālako brahman straiṇenākaruṇātmanā
analyzed: sutaḥ me bālakaḥ brahman straiṇena akaruṇa ātmanā

original: BhP_04.08.065/2 nirvāsitaḥ pañca-varṣaḥ saha mātrā mahān kaviḥ
analyzed: nirvāsitaḥ pañca varṣaḥ saha mātrā mahān kaviḥ

original: BhP_04.08.066/1 apy anāthaṃ vane brahman mā smādanty arbhakaṃ vṛkāḥ
analyzed: api anātham vane brahman mā sma adanti arbhakam vṛkāḥ

original: BhP_04.08.066/2 śrāntaṃ śayānaṃ kṣudhitaṃ parimlāna-mukhāmbujam
analyzed: śrāntam śayānam kṣudhitam parimlāna mukha ambujam

original: BhP_04.08.067/1 aho me bata daurātmyaṃ strī-jitasyopadhāraya
analyzed: aho me bata daurātmyam strī jitasya upadhāraya

original: BhP_04.08.067/2 yo 'ṅkaṃ premṇārurukṣantaṃ nābhyanandam asattamaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ aṅkam premṇā ārurukṣantam na abhyanandam a sattamaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.068/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.068/1 mā mā śucaḥ sva-tanayaṃ deva-guptaṃ viśāmpate
analyzed: mā mā śucaḥ sva tanayam devaguptam viśām pate

original: BhP_04.08.068/2 tat-prabhāvam avijñāya prāvṛṅkte yad-yaśo jagat
analyzed: tad prabhāvam a vijñāya prāvṛṅkte yat yaśaḥ jagat

original: BhP_04.08.069/1 suduṣkaraṃ karma kṛtvā loka-pālair api prabhuḥ
analyzed: su duṣkaram karma kṛtvā lokapālaiḥ api prabhuḥ

original: BhP_04.08.069/2 aiṣyaty acirato rājan yaśo vipulayaṃs tava
analyzed: aiṣyati aciratas rājan yaśaḥ vipulayan tava

original: BhP_04.08.070/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.070/1 iti devarṣiṇā proktaṃ viśrutya jagatī-patiḥ
analyzed: iti devarṣiṇā proktam viśrutya jagatīpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.08.070/2 rāja-lakṣmīm anādṛtya putram evānvacintayat
analyzed: rāja lakṣmīm an ādṛtya putram eva anvacintayat

original: BhP_04.08.071/1 tatrābhiṣiktaḥ prayatas tām upoṣya vibhāvarīm
analyzed: tatra abhiṣiktaḥ prayataḥ tām upoṣya vibhāvarīm

original: BhP_04.08.071/2 samāhitaḥ paryacarad ṛṣy-ādeśena pūruṣam
analyzed: samāhitaḥ paryacarat ṛṣi ādeśena pūruṣam

original: BhP_04.08.072/1 tri-rātrānte tri-rātrānte kapittha-badarāśanaḥ
analyzed: tri rātra ante tri rātra ante kapittha badara aśanaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.072/2 ātma-vṛtty-anusāreṇa māsaṃ ninye 'rcayan harim
analyzed: ātma vṛtti anusāreṇa māsam ninye arcayan harim

original: BhP_04.08.073/1 dvitīyaṃ ca tathā māsaṃ ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe 'rbhako dine
analyzed: dvitīyam ca tathā māsam ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe arbhakaḥ dine

original: BhP_04.08.073/2 tṛṇa-parṇādibhiḥ śīrṇaiḥ kṛtānno 'bhyarcayan vibhum
analyzed: tṛṇa parṇa ādibhiḥ śīrṇaiḥ kṛtānnaḥ abhyarcayan vibhum

original: BhP_04.08.074/1 tṛtīyaṃ cānayan māsaṃ navame navame 'hani
analyzed: tṛtīyam ca anayat māsam navame navame ahani

original: BhP_04.08.074/2 ab-bhakṣa uttamaślokam upādhāvat samādhinā
analyzed: abbhakṣaḥ uttamaślokam upādhāvat samādhinā

original: BhP_04.08.075/1 caturtham api vai māsaṃ dvādaśe dvādaśe 'hani
analyzed: caturtham api vai māsam dvādaśe dvādaśe ahani

original: BhP_04.08.075/2 vāyu-bhakṣo jita-śvāso dhyāyan devam adhārayat
analyzed: vāyubhakṣaḥ jita śvāsaḥ dhyāyan devam adhārayat

original: BhP_04.08.076/1 pañcame māsy anuprāpte jita-śvāso nṛpātmajaḥ
analyzed: pañcame māsi anuprāpte jita śvāsaḥ nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.076/2 dhyāyan brahma padaikena tasthau sthāṇur ivācalaḥ
analyzed: dhyāyan brahma padā ekena tasthau sthāṇuḥ iva acalaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.077/1 sarvato mana ākṛṣya hṛdi bhūtendriyāśayam
analyzed: sarvatas manaḥ ākṛṣya hṛdi bhūta indriya āśayam

original: BhP_04.08.077/2 dhyāyan bhagavato rūpaṃ nādrākṣīt kiñcanāparam
analyzed: dhyāyan bhagavataḥ rūpam na adrākṣīt kiñcana aparam

original: BhP_04.08.078/1 ādhāraṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ pradhāna-puruṣeśvaram
analyzed: ādhāram mahat ādīnām pradhāna puruṣa īśvaram

original: BhP_04.08.078/2 brahma dhārayamāṇasya trayo lokāś cakampire
analyzed: brahma dhārayamāṇasya trayaḥ lokāḥ cakampire

original: BhP_04.08.079/1 yadaika-pādena sa pārthivārbhakas tasthau tad-aṅguṣṭha-nipīḍitā mahī
analyzed: yadā eka pādena sa pārthiva arbhakaḥ tasthau tad aṅguṣṭha nipīḍitā mahī

original: BhP_04.08.079/2 nanāma tatrārdham ibhendra-dhiṣṭhitā tarīva savyetarataḥ pade pade
analyzed: nanāma tatra ardham ibha indra dhiṣṭhitā tarī iva savyā itaratas pade pade

original: BhP_04.08.080/1 tasminn abhidhyāyati viśvam ātmano dvāraṃ nirudhyāsum ananyayā dhiyā
analyzed: tasmin abhidhyāyati viśvam ātmanaḥ dvāram nirudhya asum ananyayā dhiyā

original: BhP_04.08.080/2 lokā nirucchvāsa-nipīḍitā bhṛśaṃ sa-loka-pālāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayur harim
analyzed: lokāḥ nirucchvāsa nipīḍitāḥ bhṛśam sa lokapālāḥ śaraṇam yayuḥ harim

original: BhP_04.08.081/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.08.081/1 naivaṃ vidāmo bhagavan prāṇa-rodhaṃ carācarasyākhila-sattva-dhāmnaḥ
analyzed: na evam vidāmaḥ bhagavan prāṇa rodham carācarasya akhila sattva dhāmnaḥ

original: BhP_04.08.081/2 vidhehi tan no vṛjinād vimokṣaṃ prāptā vayaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam
analyzed: vidhehi tat naḥ vṛjināt vimokṣam prāptāḥ vayam tvām śaraṇam śaraṇyam

original: BhP_04.08.082/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_04.08.082/1 mā bhaiṣṭa bālaṃ tapaso duratyayān nivartayiṣye pratiyāta sva-dhāma
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa bālam tapasaḥ duratyayāt nivartayiṣye pratiyāta sva dhāma

original: BhP_04.08.082/2 yato hi vaḥ prāṇa-nirodha āsīd auttānapādir mayi saṅgatātmā
analyzed: yatas hi vaḥ prāṇa nirodhaḥ āsīt auttānapādiḥ mayi saṅga tā ātmā

original: BhP_04.09.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.001/1 ta evam utsanna-bhayā urukrame kṛtāvanāmāḥ prayayus tri-viṣṭapam
analyzed: te evam utsanna bhayāḥ urukrame kṛtāvanāmāḥ prayayuḥ triviṣṭapam

original: BhP_04.09.001/2 sahasraśīrṣāpi tato garutmatā madhor vanaṃ bhṛtya-didṛkṣayā gataḥ
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣā api tatas garutmatā madhoḥ vanam bhṛtya didṛkṣayā gataḥ

original: BhP_04.09.002/1 sa vai dhiyā yoga-vipāka-tīvrayā hṛt-padma-kośe sphuritaṃ taḍit-prabham
analyzed: sa vai dhiyā yoga vipāka tīvrayā hṛd padma kośe sphuritam taḍit prabham

original: BhP_04.09.002/2 tirohitaṃ sahasaivopalakṣya bahiḥ-sthitaṃ tad-avasthaṃ dadarśa
analyzed: tirohitam sahasā eva upalakṣya bahis sthitam tad avastham dadarśa

original: BhP_04.09.003/1 tad-darśanenāgata-sādhvasaḥ kṣitāv avandatāṅgaṃ vinamayya daṇḍavat
analyzed: tad darśanena āgata sādhvasaḥ kṣitau avandata aṅgam vinamayya daṇḍa vat

original: BhP_04.09.003/2 dṛgbhyāṃ prapaśyan prapibann ivārbhakaś cumbann ivāsyena bhujair ivāśliṣan
analyzed: dṛgbhyām prapaśyan prapiban iva arbhakaḥ cumban iva āsyena bhujaiḥ iva āśliṣan

original: BhP_04.09.004/1 sa taṃ vivakṣantam atad-vidaṃ harir jñātvāsya sarvasya ca hṛdy avasthitaḥ
analyzed: sa tam vivakṣantam a tad vidam hariḥ jñātvā asya sarvasya ca hṛdi avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.004/2 kṛtāñjaliṃ brahmamayena kambunā pasparśa bālaṃ kṛpayā kapole
analyzed: kṛtāñjalim brahma mayena kambunā pasparśa bālam kṛpayā kapole

original: BhP_04.09.005/1 sa vai tadaiva pratipāditāṃ giraṃ daivīṃ parijñāta-parātma-nirṇayaḥ
analyzed: sa vai tadā eva pratipāditām giram daivīm parijñāta para ātma nirṇayaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.005/2 taṃ bhakti-bhāvo 'bhyagṛṇād asatvaraṃ pariśrutoru-śravasaṃ dhruva-kṣitiḥ
analyzed: tam bhakti bhāvaḥ abhyagṛṇāt a sa tvaram pariśruta uruśravasam dhruvakṣitiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.006/0 dhruva uvāca
analyzed: dhruvaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.006/1 yo 'ntaḥ praviśya mama vācam imāṃ prasuptāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ antar praviśya mama vācam imām prasuptām

original: BhP_04.09.006/2 sañjīvayaty akhila-śakti-dharaḥ sva-dhāmnā
analyzed: sañjīvayati akhila śakti dharaḥ sva dhāmnā

original: BhP_04.09.006/3 anyāṃś ca hasta-caraṇa-śravaṇa-tvag-ādīn
analyzed: anyān ca hasta caraṇa śravaṇa tvac ādīn

original: BhP_04.09.006/4 prāṇān namo bhagavate puruṣāya tubhyam
analyzed: prāṇān namaḥ bhagavate puruṣāya tubhyam

original: BhP_04.09.007/1 ekas tvam eva bhagavann idam ātma-śaktyā
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam eva bhagavan idam ātma śaktyā

original: BhP_04.09.007/2 māyākhyayoru-guṇayā mahad-ādy-aśeṣam
analyzed: māyā ākhyayā uru guṇayā mahat ādi aśeṣam

original: BhP_04.09.007/3 sṛṣṭvānuviśya puruṣas tad-asad-guṇeṣu
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā anuviśya puruṣaḥ tad asat guṇeṣu

original: BhP_04.09.007/4 nāneva dāruṣu vibhāvasuvad vibhāsi
analyzed: nānā iva dāruṣu vibhāvasu vat vibhāsi

original: BhP_04.09.008/1 tvad-dattayā vayunayedam acaṣṭa viśvaṃ
analyzed: tvad dattayā vayunayā idam acaṣṭa viśvam

original: BhP_04.09.008/2 supta-prabuddha iva nātha bhavat-prapannaḥ
analyzed: supta prabuddhaḥ iva nātha bhavat prapannaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.008/3 tasyāpavargya-śaraṇaṃ tava pāda-mūlaṃ
analyzed: tasya āpavargya śaraṇam tava pāda mūlam

original: BhP_04.09.008/4 vismaryate kṛta-vidā katham ārta-bandho
analyzed: vismaryate kṛta vidā katham ārta bandho

original: BhP_04.09.009/1 nūnaṃ vimuṣṭa-matayas tava māyayā te
analyzed: nūnam vimuṣṭa matayaḥ tava māyayā te

original: BhP_04.09.009/2 ye tvāṃ bhavāpyaya-vimokṣaṇam anya-hetoḥ
analyzed: ye tvām bhava apyaya vimokṣaṇam anya hetoḥ

original: BhP_04.09.009/3 arcanti kalpaka-taruṃ kuṇapopabhogyam
analyzed: arcanti kalpaka tarum kuṇapa upabhogyam

original: BhP_04.09.009/4 icchanti yat sparśajaṃ niraye 'pi n-ṇām
analyzed: icchanti yat sparśa jam niraye api

original: BhP_04.09.010/1 yā nirvṛtis tanu-bhṛtāṃ tava pāda-padma-
analyzed: yā nirvṛtiḥ tanubhṛtām tava pāda padma

original: BhP_04.09.010/2 dhyānād bhavaj-jana-kathā-śravaṇena vā syāt
analyzed: dhyānāt bhavat jana kathā śravaṇena vā syāt

original: BhP_04.09.010/3 sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
analyzed: sā brahmaṇi sva mahimani api nātha mā bhūt

original: BhP_04.09.010/4 kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt
analyzed: kim tu antaka asi lulitāt patatām vimānāt

original: BhP_04.09.011/1 bhaktiṃ muhuḥ pravahatāṃ tvayi me prasaṅgo
analyzed: bhaktim muhur pravahatām tvayi me prasaṅgo

original: BhP_04.09.011/2 bhūyād ananta mahatām amalāśayānām
analyzed: bhūyāt ananta mahatām amala āśayānām

original: BhP_04.09.011/3 yenāñjasolbaṇam uru-vyasanaṃ bhavābdhiṃ
analyzed: yena añjasā ulbaṇam uru vyasanam bhava abdhim

original: BhP_04.09.011/4 neṣye bhavad-guṇa-kathāmṛta-pāna-mattaḥ
analyzed: neṣye bhavat guṇa kathā amṛta pāna mattaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.012/1 te na smaranty atitarāṃ priyam īśa martyaṃ
analyzed: te na smaranti atitarām priyam īśa martyam

original: BhP_04.09.012/2 ye cānv adaḥ suta-suhṛd-gṛha-vitta-dārāḥ
analyzed: ye ca anu adaḥ suta suhṛd gṛha vitta dārāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.012/3 ye tv abja-nābha bhavadīya-padāravinda-
analyzed: ye tu abjanābha bhavadīya pada aravinda

original: BhP_04.09.012/4 saugandhya-lubdha-hṛdayeṣu kṛta-prasaṅgāḥ
analyzed: saugandhya lubdha hṛdayeṣu kṛta prasaṅgāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.013/1 tiryaṅ-naga-dvija-sarīsṛpa-deva-daitya-
analyzed: tiryak naga dvija sarīsṛpa deva daitya

original: BhP_04.09.013/2 martyādibhiḥ paricitaṃ sad-asad-viśeṣam
analyzed: martya ādibhiḥ paricitam sat asat viśeṣam

original: BhP_04.09.013/3 rūpaṃ sthaviṣṭham aja te mahad-ādy-anekaṃ
analyzed: rūpam sthaviṣṭham aja te mahat ādi anekam

original: BhP_04.09.013/4 nātaḥ paraṃ parama vedmi na yatra vādaḥ
analyzed: na atas param parama vedmi na yatra vādaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.014/1 kalpānta etad akhilaṃ jaṭhareṇa gṛhṇan
analyzed: kalpānte etat akhilam jaṭhareṇa gṛhṇan

original: BhP_04.09.014/2 śete pumān sva-dṛg ananta-sakhas tad-aṅke
analyzed: śete pumān svadṛś ananta sakhaḥ tad aṅke

original: BhP_04.09.014/3 yan-nābhi-sindhu-ruha-kāñcana-loka-padma-
analyzed: yad nābhi sindhuruha kāñcana loka padma

original: BhP_04.09.014/4 garbhe dyumān bhagavate praṇato 'smi tasmai
analyzed: garbhe dyumān bhagavate praṇataḥ asmi tasmai

original: BhP_04.09.015/1 tvaṃ nitya-mukta-pariśuddha-vibuddha ātmā
analyzed: tvam nitya mukta pariśuddha vibuddhaḥ ātmā

original: BhP_04.09.015/2 kūṭa-stha ādi-puruṣo bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ
BhP_04.09.015/3 yad-buddhy-avasthitim akhaṇḍitayā sva-dṛṣṭyā
analyzed: yad buddhi avasthitim akhaṇḍitayā sva dṛṣṭyā

original: BhP_04.09.015/4 draṣṭā sthitāv adhimakho vyatirikta āsse
analyzed: draṣṭā sthitau adhi makhaḥ vyatiriktaḥ āsse

original: BhP_04.09.016/1 yasmin viruddha-gatayo hy aniśaṃ patanti
analyzed: yasmin viruddha gatayaḥ hi aniśam patanti

original: BhP_04.09.016/2 vidyādayo vividha-śaktaya ānupūrvyāt
analyzed: vidyā ādayaḥ vividha śaktayaḥ ānupūrvyāt

original: BhP_04.09.016/3 tad brahma viśva-bhavam ekam anantam ādyam
analyzed: tat brahma viśva bhavam ekam anantam ādyam

original: BhP_04.09.016/4 ānanda-mātram avikāram ahaṃ prapadye
analyzed: ānanda mātram avikāram aham prapadye

original: BhP_04.09.017/1 satyāśiṣo hi bhagavaṃs tava pāda-padmam
analyzed: satya āśiṣaḥ hi bhagavan tava pāda padmam

original: BhP_04.09.017/2 āśīs tathānubhajataḥ puruṣārtha-mūrteḥ
analyzed: āśīḥ tathā anubhajataḥ puruṣa artha mūrteḥ

original: BhP_04.09.017/3 apy evam arya bhagavān paripāti dīnān
analyzed: api evam arya bhagavān paripāti dīnān

original: BhP_04.09.017/4 vāśreva vatsakam anugraha-kātaro 'smān
analyzed: vāśrā iva vatsakam anugraha kātaraḥ asmān

original: BhP_04.09.018/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.018/1 athābhiṣṭuta evaṃ vai sat-saṅkalpena dhīmatā
analyzed: atha abhiṣṭutaḥ evam vai sat saṅkalpena dhīmatā

original: BhP_04.09.018/2 bhṛtyānurakto bhagavān pratinandyedam abravīt
analyzed: bhṛtya anuraktaḥ bhagavān pratinandya idam abravīt

original: BhP_04.09.019/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.019/1 vedāhaṃ te vyavasitaṃ hṛdi rājanya-bālaka
analyzed: veda aham te vyavasitam hṛdi rājanya bālaka

original: BhP_04.09.019/2 tat prayacchāmi bhadraṃ te durāpam api suvrata
analyzed: tat prayacchāmi bhadram te durāpam api suvrata

original: BhP_04.09.020/1 nānyair adhiṣṭhitaṃ bhadra yad bhrājiṣṇu dhruva-kṣiti
analyzed: na anyaiḥ adhiṣṭhitam bhadra yat bhrājiṣṇu dhruva kṣiti

original: BhP_04.09.020/2 yatra graharkṣa-tārāṇāṃ jyotiṣāṃ cakram āhitam
analyzed: yatra graha ṛkṣa tārāṇām jyotiṣām cakram āhitam

original: BhP_04.09.021/1 meḍhyāṃ go-cakravat sthāsnu parastāt kalpa-vāsinām
analyzed: meḍhyām go cakra vat sthāsnu parastāt kalpa vāsinām

original: BhP_04.09.021/2 dharmo 'gniḥ kaśyapaḥ śukro munayo ye vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ agniḥ kaśyapaḥ śukraḥ munayaḥ ye vanaukasaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.021/3 caranti dakṣiṇī-kṛtya bhramanto yat satārakāḥ
analyzed: caranti dakṣiṇīkṛtya bhramantaḥ yat sa tārakāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.022/1 prasthite tu vanaṃ pitrā dattvā gāṃ dharma-saṃśrayaḥ
analyzed: prasthite tu vanam pitrā dattvā gām dharma saṃśrayaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.022/2 ṣaṭ-triṃśad-varṣa-sāhasraṃ rakṣitāvyāhatendriyaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat varṣa sāhasram rakṣitā avyāhata indriyaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.023/1 tvad-bhrātary uttame naṣṭe mṛgayāyāṃ tu tan-manāḥ
analyzed: tvad bhrātari uttame naṣṭe mṛgayāyām tu tanmanāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.023/2 anveṣantī vanaṃ mātā dāvāgniṃ sā pravekṣyati
analyzed: anveṣantī vanam mātā dāva agnim sā pravekṣyati

original: BhP_04.09.024/1 iṣṭvā māṃ yajña-hṛdayaṃ yajñaiḥ puṣkala-dakṣiṇaiḥ
analyzed: iṣṭvā mām yajña hṛdayam yajñaiḥ puṣkala dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.024/2 bhuktvā cehāśiṣaḥ satyā ante māṃ saṃsmariṣyasi
analyzed: bhuktvā ca iha āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ ante mām saṃsmariṣyasi

original: BhP_04.09.025/1 tato gantāsi mat-sthānaṃ sarva-loka-namaskṛtam
analyzed: tatas gantāsi mad sthānam sarva loka namaskṛtam

original: BhP_04.09.025/2 upariṣṭād ṛṣibhyas tvaṃ yato nāvartate gataḥ
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ṛṣibhyaḥ tvam yatas na āvartate gataḥ

original: BhP_04.09.026/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.026/1 ity arcitaḥ sa bhagavān atidiśyātmanaḥ padam
analyzed: iti arcitaḥ sa bhagavān atidiśya ātmanaḥ padam

original: BhP_04.09.026/2 bālasya paśyato dhāma svam agād garuḍa-dhvajaḥ
analyzed: bālasya paśyataḥ dhāma svam agāt garuḍadhvajaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.027/1 so 'pi saṅkalpajaṃ viṣṇoḥ pāda-sevopasāditam
analyzed: saḥ api saṅkalpa jam viṣṇoḥ pāda sevā upasāditam

original: BhP_04.09.027/2 prāpya saṅkalpa-nirvāṇaṃ nātiprīto 'bhyagāt puram
analyzed: prāpya saṅkalpa nirvāṇam na ati prītaḥ abhyagāt puram

original: BhP_04.09.028/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.028/1 sudurlabhaṃ yat paramaṃ padaṃ harer māyāvinas tac-caraṇārcanārjitam
analyzed: su durlabham yat paramam padam hareḥ māyāvinaḥ tad caraṇa arcana arjitam

original: BhP_04.09.028/2 labdhvāpy asiddhārtham ivaika-janmanā kathaṃ svam ātmānam amanyatārtha-vit
analyzed: labdhvā api a siddhārtham iva eka janmanā katham svam ātmānam amanyata artha vid

original: BhP_04.09.029/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.029/1 mātuḥ sapatnyā vāg-bāṇair hṛdi viddhas tu tān smaran
analyzed: mātuḥ sapatnyāḥ vāc bāṇaiḥ hṛdi viddhaḥ tu tān smaran

original: BhP_04.09.029/2 naicchan mukti-pater muktiṃ tasmāt tāpam upeyivān
analyzed: na aicchat muktipateḥ muktim tasmāt tāpam upeyivān

original: BhP_04.09.030/0 dhruva uvāca
analyzed: dhruvaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.030/1 samādhinā naika-bhavena yat padaṃ viduḥ sanandādaya ūrdhva-retasaḥ
analyzed: samādhinā na eka bhavena yat padam viduḥ sananda ādayaḥ ūrdhvaretasaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.030/2 māsair ahaṃ ṣaḍbhir amuṣya pādayoś chāyām upetyāpagataḥ pṛthaṅ-matiḥ
analyzed: māsaiḥ aham ṣaḍbhiḥ amuṣya pādayoḥ chāyām upetya apagataḥ pṛthak matiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.031/1 aho bata mamānātmyaṃ manda-bhāgyasya paśyata
analyzed: aho bata mama anātmyam mandabhāgyasya paśyata

original: BhP_04.09.031/2 bhava-cchidaḥ pāda-mūlaṃ gatvā yāce yad antavat
analyzed: bhavat chidaḥ pāda mūlam gatvā yāce yat antavat

original: BhP_04.09.032/1 matir vidūṣitā devaiḥ patadbhir asahiṣṇubhiḥ
analyzed: matiḥ vidūṣitā devaiḥ patadbhiḥ asahiṣṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.032/2 yo nārada-vacas tathyaṃ nāgrāhiṣam asattamaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nārada vacaḥ tathyam na agrāhiṣam asattamaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.033/1 daivīṃ māyām upāśritya prasupta iva bhinna-dṛk
analyzed: daivīm māyām upāśritya prasuptaḥ iva bhinnadṛś

original: BhP_04.09.033/2 tapye dvitīye 'py asati bhrātṛ-bhrātṛvya-hṛd-rujā
analyzed: tapye dvitīye api asati bhrātṛ bhrātṛvya hṛd rujā

original: BhP_04.09.034/1 mayaitat prārthitaṃ vyarthaṃ cikitseva gatāyuṣi
analyzed: mayā etat prārthitam vyartham cikitsā iva gata āyuṣi

original: BhP_04.09.034/2 prasādya jagad-ātmānaṃ tapasā duṣprasādanam
analyzed: prasādya jagadātmānam tapasā duṣprasādanam

original: BhP_04.09.034/3 bhava-cchidam ayāce 'haṃ bhavaṃ bhāgya-vivarjitaḥ
analyzed: bhavat chidam ayāce aham bhavam bhāgya vivarjitaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.035/1 svārājyaṃ yacchato mauḍhyān māno me bhikṣito bata
analyzed: svārājyam yacchataḥ mauḍhyāt mānaḥ me bhikṣitaḥ bata

original: BhP_04.09.035/2 īśvarāt kṣīṇa-puṇyena phalī-kārān ivādhanaḥ
analyzed: īśvarāt kṣīṇa puṇyena phalīkārān iva adhanaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.036/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.09.036/1 na vai mukundasya padāravindayo rajo-juṣas tāta bhavādṛśā janāḥ
analyzed: na vai mukundasya pada aravindayoḥ rajaḥ juṣaḥ tāta bhavādṛśāḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.036/2 vāñchanti tad-dāsyam ṛte 'rtham ātmano yadṛcchayā labdha-manaḥ-samṛddhayaḥ
analyzed: vāñchanti tad dāsyam ṛte artham ātmanaḥ yadṛcchayā labdha manaḥ samṛddhayaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.037/1 ākarṇyātma-jam āyāntaṃ samparetya yathāgatam
analyzed: ākarṇya ātmajam āyāntam samparetya yathāgatam

original: BhP_04.09.037/2 rājā na śraddadhe bhadram abhadrasya kuto mama
analyzed: rājā na śraddadhe bhadram abhadrasya kutas mama

original: BhP_04.09.038/1 śraddhāya vākyaṃ devarṣer harṣa-vegena dharṣitaḥ
analyzed: śraddhāya vākyam devarṣeḥ harṣa vegena dharṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.038/2 vārtā-hartur atiprīto hāraṃ prādān mahā-dhanam
analyzed: vārtā hartuḥ ati prītaḥ hāram prādāt mahādhanam

original: BhP_04.09.039/1 sad-aśvaṃ ratham āruhya kārtasvara-pariṣkṛtam
analyzed: sat aśvam ratham āruhya kārtasvara pariṣkṛtam

original: BhP_04.09.039/2 brāhmaṇaiḥ kula-vṛddhaiś ca paryasto 'mātya-bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ kula vṛddhaiḥ ca paryastaḥ amātya bandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.040/1 śaṅkha-dundubhi-nādena brahma-ghoṣeṇa veṇubhiḥ
analyzed: śaṅkha dundubhi nādena brahmaghoṣeṇa veṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.040/2 niścakrāma purāt tūrṇam ātmajābhīkṣaṇotsukaḥ
analyzed: niścakrāma purāt tūrṇam ātmaja abhīkṣaṇa utsukaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.041/1 sunītiḥ suruciś cāsya mahiṣyau rukma-bhūṣite
analyzed: sunītiḥ suruciḥ ca asya mahiṣyau rukma bhūṣite

original: BhP_04.09.041/2 āruhya śibikāṃ sārdham uttamenābhijagmatuḥ
analyzed: āruhya śibikām sārdham uttamena abhijagmatuḥ

original: BhP_04.09.042/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvopavanābhyāśa āyāntaṃ tarasā rathāt
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā upavana abhyāśe āyāntam tarasā rathāt

original: BhP_04.09.042/2 avaruhya nṛpas tūrṇam āsādya prema-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: avaruhya nṛpaḥ tūrṇam āsādya prema vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.043/1 parirebhe 'ṅgajaṃ dorbhyāṃ dīrghotkaṇṭha-manāḥ śvasan
analyzed: parirebhe aṅgajam dorbhyām dīrgha utkaṇṭha manāḥ śvasan

original: BhP_04.09.043/2 viṣvaksenāṅghri-saṃsparśa- hatāśeṣāgha-bandhanam
BhP_04.09.044/1 athājighran muhur mūrdhni śītair nayana-vāribhiḥ
analyzed: athā ājighran muhur mūrdhni śītaiḥ nayana vāribhiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.044/2 snāpayām āsa tanayaṃ jātoddāma-manorathaḥ
analyzed: snāpayām āsa tanayam jāta uddāma manorathaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.045/1 abhivandya pituḥ pādāv āśīrbhiś cābhimantritaḥ
analyzed: abhivandya pituḥ pādau āśīrbhiḥ ca abhimantritaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.045/2 nanāma mātarau śīrṣṇā sat-kṛtaḥ saj-janāgraṇīḥ
analyzed: nanāma mātarau śīrṣṇā satkṛtaḥ sat jana agraṇīḥ

original: BhP_04.09.046/1 surucis taṃ samutthāpya pādāvanatam arbhakam
analyzed: suruciḥ tam samutthāpya pāda avanatam arbhakam

original: BhP_04.09.046/2 pariṣvajyāha jīveti bāṣpa-gadgadayā girā
analyzed: pariṣvajya āha jīva iti bāṣpa gadgadayā girā

original: BhP_04.09.047/1 yasya prasanno bhagavānguṇair maitry-ādibhir hariḥ
analyzed: yasya prasannaḥ bhagavān guṇaiḥ maitrī ādibhiḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_04.09.047/2 tasmai namanti bhūtāni nimnam āpa iva svayam
analyzed: tasmai namanti bhūtāni nimnam āpaḥ iva svayam

original: BhP_04.09.048/1 uttamaś ca dhruvaś cobhāv anyonyaṃ prema-vihvalau
analyzed: uttamaḥ ca dhruvaḥ ca ubhau anyonyam prema vihvalau

original: BhP_04.09.048/2 aṅga-saṅgād utpulakāv asraughaṃ muhur ūhatuḥ
analyzed: aṅgasaṅgāt utpulakau asra ogham muhur ūhatuḥ

original: BhP_04.09.049/1 sunītir asya jananī prāṇebhyo 'pi priyaṃ sutam
analyzed: sunītiḥ asya jananī prāṇebhyaḥ api priyam sutam

original: BhP_04.09.049/2 upaguhya jahāv ādhiṃ tad-aṅga-sparśa-nirvṛtā
analyzed: upaguhya jahau ādhim tad aṅga sparśa nirvṛtā

original: BhP_04.09.050/1 payaḥ stanābhyāṃ susrāva netra-jaiḥ salilaiḥ śivaiḥ
analyzed: payaḥ stanābhyām susrāva netra jaiḥ salilaiḥ śivaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.050/2 tadābhiṣicyamānābhyāṃ vīra vīra-suvo muhuḥ
analyzed: tadā abhiṣicyamānābhyām vīra vīrasuvaḥ muhur

original: BhP_04.09.051/1 tāṃ śaśaṃsur janā rājñīṃ diṣṭyā te putra ārti-hā
analyzed: tām śaśaṃsuḥ janāḥ rājñīm diṣṭyā te putraḥ ārti hā

original: BhP_04.09.051/2 pratilabdhaś ciraṃ naṣṭo rakṣitā maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: pratilabdhaḥ ciram naṣṭaḥ rakṣitā maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.052/1 abhyarcitas tvayā nūnaṃ bhagavān praṇatārti-hā
analyzed: abhyarcitaḥ tvayā nūnam bhagavān praṇata ārti hā

original: BhP_04.09.052/2 yad-anudhyāyino dhīrā mṛtyuṃ jigyuḥ sudurjayam
analyzed: yad anudhyāyinaḥ dhīrāḥ mṛtyum jigyuḥ su durjayam

original: BhP_04.09.053/1 lālyamānaṃ janair evaṃ dhruvaṃ sabhrātaraṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: lālyamānam janaiḥ evam dhruvam sa bhrātaram nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.053/2 āropya kariṇīṃ hṛṣṭaḥ stūyamāno 'viśat puram
analyzed: āropya kariṇīm hṛṣṭaḥ stūyamānaḥ aviśat puram

original: BhP_04.09.054/1 tatra tatropasaṅkḷptair lasan-makara-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra upasaṅkḷptaiḥ lasat makara toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.054/2 savṛndaiḥ kadalī-stambhaiḥ pūga-potaiś ca tad-vidhaiḥ
analyzed: sa vṛndaiḥ kadalī stambhaiḥ pūga potaiḥ ca tadvidhaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.055/1 cūta-pallava-vāsaḥ-sraṅ- muktā-dāma-vilambibhiḥ
BhP_04.09.055/2 upaskṛtaṃ prati-dvāram apāṃ kumbhaiḥ sadīpakaiḥ
analyzed: upaskṛtam pratidvāram apām kumbhaiḥ sa dīpakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.056/1 prākārair gopurāgāraiḥ śātakumbha-paricchadaiḥ
analyzed: prākāraiḥ gopura āgāraiḥ śātakumbha paricchadaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.056/2 sarvato 'laṅkṛtaṃ śrīmad- vimāna-śikhara-dyubhiḥ
analyzed: sarvatas alaṅkṛtam śrīmat vimāna śikhara dyubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.057/1 mṛṣṭa-catvara-rathyāṭṭa- mārgaṃ candana-carcitam
analyzed: mṛṣṭa catvara rathyā aṭṭa mārgam candana carcitam

original: BhP_04.09.057/2 lājākṣataiḥ puṣpa-phalais taṇḍulair balibhir yutam
analyzed: lāja akṣataiḥ puṣpa phalaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ balibhiḥ yutam

original: BhP_04.09.058/1 dhruvāya pathi dṛṣṭāya tatra tatra pura-striyaḥ
analyzed: dhruvāya pathi dṛṣṭāya tatra tatra pura striyaḥ

original: BhP_04.09.058/2 siddhārthākṣata-dadhy-ambu- dūrvā-puṣpa-phalāni ca
analyzed: siddhārtha akṣata dadhi ambu dūrvā puṣpa phalāni ca

original: BhP_04.09.059/1 upajahruḥ prayuñjānā vātsalyād āśiṣaḥ satīḥ
analyzed: upajahruḥ prayuñjānāḥ vātsalyāt āśiṣaḥ satīḥ

original: BhP_04.09.059/2 śṛṇvaṃs tad-valgu-gītāni prāviśad bhavanaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvan tad valgu gītāni prāviśat bhavanam pituḥ

original: BhP_04.09.060/1 mahāmaṇi-vrātamaye sa tasmin bhavanottame
analyzed: mahā maṇi vrāta maye sa tasmin bhavana uttame

original: BhP_04.09.060/2 lālito nitarāṃ pitrā nyavasad divi devavat
analyzed: lālitaḥ nitarām pitrā nyavasat divi deva vat

original: BhP_04.09.061/1 payaḥ-phena-nibhāḥ śayyā dāntā rukma-paricchadāḥ
analyzed: payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyā dāntā rukma paricchadāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.061/2 āsanāni mahārhāṇi yatra raukmā upaskarāḥ
analyzed: āsanāni mahārhāṇi yatra raukmāḥ upaskarāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.062/1 yatra sphaṭika-kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca
analyzed: yatra sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā mārakateṣu ca

original: BhP_04.09.062/2 maṇi-pradīpā ābhānti lalanā-ratna-saṃyutāḥ
analyzed: maṇi pradīpāḥ ābhānti lalanā ratna saṃyutāḥ

original: BhP_04.09.063/1 udyānāni ca ramyāṇi vicitrair amara-drumaiḥ
analyzed: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi vicitraiḥ amara drumaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.063/2 kūjad-vihaṅga-mithunair gāyan-matta-madhuvrataiḥ
analyzed: kūjat vihaṅga mithunaiḥ gāyat matta madhu vrataiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.064/1 vāpyo vaidūrya-sopānāḥ padmotpala-kumud-vatīḥ
analyzed: vāpyaḥ vaidūrya sopānāḥ padma utpala kumudvatīḥ

original: BhP_04.09.064/2 haṃsa-kāraṇḍava-kulair juṣṭāś cakrāhva-sārasaiḥ
analyzed: haṃsa kāraṇḍava kulaiḥ juṣṭāḥ cakrāhva sārasaiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.065/1 uttānapādo rājarṣiḥ prabhāvaṃ tanayasya tam
analyzed: uttānapādaḥ rājarṣiḥ prabhāvam tanayasya tam

original: BhP_04.09.065/2 śrutvā dṛṣṭvādbhutatamaṃ prapede vismayaṃ param
analyzed: śrutvā dṛṣṭvā adbhutatamam prapede vismayam param

original: BhP_04.09.066/1 vīkṣyoḍha-vayasaṃ taṃ ca prakṛtīnāṃ ca sammatam
analyzed: vīkṣya ūḍha vayasam tam ca prakṛtīnām ca sammatam

original: BhP_04.09.066/2 anurakta-prajaṃ rājā dhruvaṃ cakre bhuvaḥ patim
analyzed: anurakta prajam rājā dhruvam cakre bhuvaḥ patim

original: BhP_04.09.067/1 ātmānaṃ ca pravayasam ākalayya viśāmpatiḥ
analyzed: ātmānam ca pravayasam ākalayya viśām patiḥ

original: BhP_04.09.067/2 vanaṃ viraktaḥ prātiṣṭhad vimṛśann ātmano gatim
analyzed: vanam viraktaḥ prātiṣṭhat vimṛśan ātmanaḥ gatim

original: BhP_04.10.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.10.001/1 prajāpater duhitaraṃ śiśumārasya vai dhruvaḥ
analyzed: prajāpateḥ duhitaram śiśumārasya vai dhruvaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.001/2 upayeme bhramiṃ nāma tat-sutau kalpa-vatsarau
analyzed: upayeme bhramim nāma tad sutau kalpa vatsarau

original: BhP_04.10.002/1 ilāyām api bhāryāyāṃ vāyoḥ putryāṃ mahā-balaḥ
analyzed: ilāyām api bhāryāyām vāyoḥ putryām mahā balaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.002/2 putram utkala-nāmānaṃ yoṣid-ratnam ajījanat
analyzed: putram utkala nāmānam yoṣit ratnam ajījanat

original: BhP_04.10.003/1 uttamas tv akṛtodvāho mṛgayāyāṃ balīyasā
analyzed: uttamaḥ tu a kṛta udvāhaḥ mṛgayāyām balīyasā

original: BhP_04.10.003/2 hataḥ puṇya-janenādrau tan-mātāsya gatiṃ gatā
analyzed: hataḥ puṇyajanena adrau tad mātā asya gatim gatā

original: BhP_04.10.004/1 dhruvo bhrātṛ-vadhaṃ śrutvā kopāmarṣa-śucārpitaḥ
analyzed: dhruvaḥ bhrātṛ vadham śrutvā kopa amarṣa śucā arpitaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.004/2 jaitraṃ syandanam āsthāya gataḥ puṇya-janālayam
analyzed: jaitram syandanam āsthāya gataḥ puṇyajana ālayam

original: BhP_04.10.005/1 gatvodīcīṃ diśaṃ rājā rudrānucara-sevitām
analyzed: gatvā udīcīm diśam rājā rudra anucara sevitām

original: BhP_04.10.005/2 dadarśa himavad-droṇyāṃ purīṃ guhyaka-saṅkulām
analyzed: dadarśa himavat droṇyām purīm guhyaka saṅkulām

original: BhP_04.10.006/1 dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ bṛhad-bāhuḥ khaṃ diśaś cānunādayan
analyzed: dadhmau śaṅkham bṛhat bāhuḥ kham diśaḥ ca anunādayan

original: BhP_04.10.006/2 yenodvigna-dṛśaḥ kṣattar upadevyo 'trasan bhṛśam
analyzed: yena udvigna dṛśaḥ kṣattar upadevyaḥ atrasan bhṛśam

original: BhP_04.10.007/1 tato niṣkramya balina upadeva-mahā-bhaṭāḥ
analyzed: tatas niṣkramya balinaḥ upadeva mahā bhaṭāḥ

original: BhP_04.10.007/2 asahantas tan-ninādam abhipetur udāyudhāḥ
analyzed: a sahantaḥ tad ninādam abhipetuḥ udāyudhāḥ

original: BhP_04.10.008/1 sa tān āpatato vīra ugra-dhanvā mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: sa tān āpatataḥ vīraḥ ugra dhanvā mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.008/2 ekaikaṃ yugapat sarvān ahan bāṇais tribhis tribhiḥ
analyzed: ekaikam yugapad sarvān ahan bāṇaiḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.009/1 te vai lalāṭa-lagnais tair iṣubhiḥ sarva eva hi
analyzed: te vai lalāṭa lagnaiḥ taiḥ iṣubhiḥ sarve eva hi

original: BhP_04.10.009/2 matvā nirastam ātmānam āśaṃsan karma tasya tat
analyzed: matvā nirastam ātmānam āśaṃsan karma tasya tat

original: BhP_04.10.010/1 te 'pi cāmum amṛṣyantaḥ pāda-sparśam ivoragāḥ
analyzed: te api ca amum a mṛṣyantaḥ pāda sparśam iva uragāḥ

original: BhP_04.10.010/2 śarair avidhyan yugapad dvi-guṇaṃ pracikīrṣavaḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ avidhyan yugapad dviguṇam pracikīrṣavaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.011/1 tataḥ parigha-nistriṃśaiḥ prāsaśūla-paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: tatas parigha nistriṃśaiḥ prāsa śūla paraśvadhaiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.011/2 śakty-ṛṣṭibhir bhuśuṇḍībhiś citra-vājaiḥ śarair api
analyzed: śakti ṛṣṭibhiḥ bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ citra vājaiḥ śaraiḥ api

original: BhP_04.10.012/1 abhyavarṣan prakupitāḥ sarathaṃ saha-sārathim
analyzed: abhyavarṣan prakupitāḥ sa ratham saha sārathim

original: BhP_04.10.012/2 icchantas tat pratīkartum ayutānāṃ trayodaśa
analyzed: icchantaḥ tat pratīkartum ayutānām trayodaśa

original: BhP_04.10.013/1 auttānapādiḥ sa tadā śastra-varṣeṇa bhūriṇā
analyzed: auttānapādiḥ sa tadā śastra varṣeṇa bhūriṇā

original: BhP_04.10.013/2 na evādṛśyatācchanna āsāreṇa yathā giriḥ
analyzed: na eva adṛśyata ācchannaḥ āsāreṇa yathā giriḥ

original: BhP_04.10.014/1 hāhā-kāras tadaivāsīt siddhānāṃ divi paśyatām
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ tadā eva āsīt siddhānām divi paśyatām

original: BhP_04.10.014/2 hato 'yaṃ mānavaḥ sūryo magnaḥ puṇya-janārṇave
analyzed: hataḥ ayam mānavaḥ sūryaḥ magnaḥ puṇyajana arṇave

original: BhP_04.10.015/1 nadatsu yātudhāneṣu jaya-kāśiṣv atho mṛdhe
analyzed: nadatsu yātudhāneṣu jaya kāśiṣu atho mṛdhe

original: BhP_04.10.015/2 udatiṣṭhad rathas tasya nīhārād iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: udatiṣṭhat rathaḥ tasya nīhārāt iva bhāskaraḥ

original: BhP_04.10.016/1 dhanur visphūrjayan divyaṃ dviṣatāṃ khedam udvahan
analyzed: dhanuḥ visphūrjayan divyam dviṣatām khedam udvahan

original: BhP_04.10.016/2 astraughaṃ vyadhamad bāṇair ghanānīkam ivānilaḥ
analyzed: astra ogham vyadhamat bāṇaiḥ ghana anīkam iva anilaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.017/1 tasya te cāpa-nirmuktā bhittvā varmāṇi rakṣasām
analyzed: tasya te cāpa nirmuktāḥ bhittvā varmāṇi rakṣasām

original: BhP_04.10.017/2 kāyān āviviśus tigmā girīn aśanayo yathā
analyzed: kāyān āviviśuḥ tigmāḥ girīn aśanayaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.10.018/1 bhallaiḥ sañchidyamānānāṃ śirobhiś cāru-kuṇḍalaiḥ
analyzed: bhallaiḥ sañchidyamānānām śirobhiḥ cāru kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.018/2 ūrubhir hema-tālābhair dorbhir valaya-valgubhiḥ
analyzed: ūrubhiḥ hema tālā ābhaiḥ dorbhiḥ valaya valgubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.019/1 hāra-keyūra-mukuṭair uṣṇīṣaiś ca mahā-dhanaiḥ
analyzed: hāra keyūra mukuṭaiḥ uṣṇīṣaiḥ ca mahādhanaiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.019/2 āstṛtās tā raṇa-bhuvo rejur vīra-mano-harāḥ
analyzed: āstṛtāḥ tāḥ raṇa bhuvaḥ rejuḥ vīra manoharāḥ

original: BhP_04.10.020/1 hatāvaśiṣṭā itare raṇājirād rakṣo-gaṇāḥ kṣatriya-varya-sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: hata avaśiṣṭāḥ itare raṇa ajirāt rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ kṣatriya varya sāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.020/2 prāyo vivṛkṇāvayavā vidudruvur mṛgendra-vikrīḍita-yūthapā iva
analyzed: prāyas vivṛkṇa avayavāḥ vidudruvuḥ mṛgendra vikrīḍita yūthapāḥ iva

original: BhP_04.10.021/1 apaśyamānaḥ sa tadātatāyinaṃ mahā-mṛdhe kañcana mānavottamaḥ
analyzed: apaśyamānaḥ sa tadā ātatāyinam mahā mṛdhe kañcana mānava uttamaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.021/2 purīṃ didṛkṣann api nāviśad dviṣāṃ na māyināṃ veda cikīrṣitaṃ janaḥ
analyzed: purīm didṛkṣan api nā aviśat dviṣām na māyinām veda cikīrṣitam janaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.022/1 iti bruvaṃś citra-rathaḥ sva-sārathiṃ yattaḥ pareṣāṃ pratiyoga-śaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvan citrarathaḥ sva sārathim yattaḥ pareṣām pratiyoga śaṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.022/2 śuśrāva śabdaṃ jaladher iveritaṃ nabhasvato dikṣu rajo 'nvadṛśyata
analyzed: śuśrāva śabdam jaladheḥ iva īritam nabhasvataḥ dikṣu rajaḥ anvadṛśyata

original: BhP_04.10.023/1 kṣaṇenācchāditaṃ vyoma ghanānīkena sarvataḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇena ācchāditam vyoma ghana anīkena sarvatas

original: BhP_04.10.023/2 visphurat-taḍitā dikṣu trāsayat-stanayitnunā
analyzed: visphurat taḍitā dikṣu trāsayat stanayitnunā

original: BhP_04.10.024/1 vavṛṣū rudhiraughāsṛk- pūya-viṇ-mūtra-medasaḥ
analyzed: vavṛṣuḥ rudhira ogha asṛj pūya viṣ mūtra medasaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.024/2 nipetur gaganād asya kabandhāny agrato 'nagha
analyzed: nipetuḥ gaganāt asya kabandhāni agratas anagha

original: BhP_04.10.025/1 tataḥ khe 'dṛśyata girir nipetuḥ sarvato-diśam
analyzed: tatas khe adṛśyata giriḥ nipetuḥ sarvatodiśam

original: BhP_04.10.025/2 gadā-parigha-nistriṃśa- musalāḥ sāśma-varṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: gadā parigha nistriṃśa musalāḥ sa aśma varṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.026/1 ahayo 'śani-niḥśvāsā vamanto 'gniṃ ruṣākṣibhiḥ
analyzed: ahayaḥ aśani niḥśvāsāḥ vamantaḥ agnim ruṣā akṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.10.026/2 abhyadhāvan gajā mattāḥ siṃha-vyāghrāś ca yūthaśaḥ
analyzed: abhyadhāvan gajāḥ mattāḥ siṃha vyāghrāḥ ca yūthaśas

original: BhP_04.10.027/1 samudra ūrmibhir bhīmaḥ plāvayan sarvato bhuvam
analyzed: samudraḥ ūrmibhiḥ bhīmaḥ plāvayan sarvatas bhuvam

original: BhP_04.10.027/2 āsasāda mahā-hrādaḥ kalpānta iva bhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: āsasāda mahā hrādaḥ kalpa ante iva bhīṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.10.028/1 evaṃ-vidhāny anekāni trāsanāny amanasvinām
analyzed: evaṃvidhāni anekāni trāsanāni amanasvinām

original: BhP_04.10.028/2 sasṛjus tigma-gataya āsuryā māyayāsurāḥ
analyzed: sasṛjuḥ tigma gatayaḥ āsuryā māyayā asurāḥ

original: BhP_04.10.029/1 dhruve prayuktām asurais tāṃ māyām atidustarām
analyzed: dhruve prayuktām asuraiḥ tām māyām ati dustarām

original: BhP_04.10.029/2 niśamya tasya munayaḥ śam āśaṃsan samāgatāḥ
analyzed: niśamya tasya munayaḥ śam āśaṃsan samāgatāḥ

original: BhP_04.10.030/0 munaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: munayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.10.030/1 auttānapāda bhagavāṃs tava śārṅgadhanvā
analyzed: auttānapāda bhagavān tava śārṅgadhanvā

original: BhP_04.10.030/2 devaḥ kṣiṇotv avanatārti-haro vipakṣān
analyzed: devaḥ kṣiṇotu avanata ārti haraḥ vipakṣān

original: BhP_04.10.030/3 yan-nāmadheyam abhidhāya niśamya cāddhā
analyzed: yad nāmadheyam abhidhāya niśamya ca addhā

original: BhP_04.10.030/4 loko 'ñjasā tarati dustaram aṅga mṛtyum
analyzed: lokaḥ añjasā tarati dustaram aṅga mṛtyum

original: BhP_04.11.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 niśamya gadatām evam ṛṣīṇāṃ dhanuṣi dhruvaḥ
analyzed: niśamya gadatām evam ṛṣīṇām dhanuṣi dhruvaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/2 sandadhe 'stram upaspṛśya yan nārāyaṇa-nirmitam
analyzed: sandadhe astram upaspṛśya yat nārāyaṇa nirmitam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sandhīyamāna etasmin māyā guhyaka-nirmitāḥ
analyzed: sandhīyamāne etasmin māyāḥ guhyaka nirmitāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 kṣipraṃ vineśur vidura kleśā jñānodaye yathā
analyzed: kṣipram vineśuḥ vidura kleśāḥ jñāna udaye yathā

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tasyārṣāstraṃ dhanuṣi prayuñjataḥ suvarṇa-puṅkhāḥ kalahaṃsa-vāsasaḥ
analyzed: tasya ārṣa astram dhanuṣi prayuñjataḥ suvarṇa puṅkhāḥ kalahaṃsa vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 viniḥsṛtā āviviśur dviṣad-balaṃ yathā vanaṃ bhīma-ravāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
analyzed: viniḥsṛtāḥ āviviśuḥ dviṣat balam yathā vanam bhīma ravāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tais tigma-dhāraiḥ pradhane śilī-mukhair itas tataḥ puṇya-janā upadrutāḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tigma dhāraiḥ pradhane śilīmukhaiḥ itas tatas puṇyajanāḥ upadrutāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tam abhyadhāvan kupitā udāyudhāḥ suparṇam unnaddha-phaṇā ivāhayaḥ
analyzed: tam abhyadhāvan kupitāḥ udāyudhāḥ suparṇam unnaddha phaṇāḥ iva ahayaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sa tān pṛṣatkair abhidhāvato mṛdhe nikṛtta-bāhūru-śirodharodarān
analyzed: sa tān pṛṣatkaiḥ abhidhāvataḥ mṛdhe nikṛtta bāhu ūru śirodharā udarān

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 nināya lokaṃ param arka-maṇḍalaṃ vrajanti nirbhidya yam ūrdhva-retasaḥ
analyzed: nināya lokam param arka maṇḍalam vrajanti nirbhidya yam ūrdhvaretasaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tān hanyamānān abhivīkṣya guhyakān anāgasaś citra-rathena bhūriśaḥ
analyzed: tān hanyamānān abhivīkṣya guhyakān anāgasaḥ citrarathena bhūriśas

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 auttānapādiṃ kṛpayā pitāmaho manur jagādopagataḥ saharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: auttānapādim kṛpayā pitāmahaḥ manuḥ jagāda upagataḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 manur uvāca
analyzed: manuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 alaṃ vatsātiroṣeṇa tamo-dvāreṇa pāpmanā
analyzed: alam vatsa ati roṣeṇa tamaḥ dvāreṇa pāpmanā

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 yena puṇya-janān etān avadhīs tvam anāgasaḥ
analyzed: yena puṇyajanān etān avadhīḥ tvam anāgasaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 nāsmat-kulocitaṃ tāta karmaitat sad-vigarhitam
analyzed: na asmad kula ucitam tāta karma etat sat vigarhitam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 vadho yad upadevānām ārabdhas te 'kṛtainasām
analyzed: vadhaḥ yat upadevānām ārabdhaḥ te akṛta enasām

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 nanv ekasyāparādhena prasaṅgād bahavo hatāḥ
analyzed: nanu ekasya aparādhena prasaṅgāt bahavaḥ hatāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 bhrātur vadhābhitaptena tvayāṅga bhrātṛ-vatsala
analyzed: bhrātuḥ vadha abhitaptena tvayā aṅga bhrātṛ vatsala

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 nāyaṃ mārgo hi sādhūnāṃ hṛṣīkeśānuvartinām
analyzed: na ayam mārgaḥ hi sādhūnām hṛṣīkeśa anuvartinām

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 yad ātmānaṃ parāg gṛhya paśuvad bhūta-vaiśasam
analyzed: yat ātmānam parāk gṛhya paśu vat bhūta vaiśasam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sarva-bhūtātma-bhāvena bhūtāvāsaṃ hariṃ bhavān
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātma bhāvena bhūtāvāsam harim bhavān

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 ārādhyāpa durārādhyaṃ viṣṇos tat paramaṃ padam
analyzed: ārādhya apa durārādhyam viṣṇoḥ tat paramam padam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sa tvaṃ harer anudhyātas tat-puṃsām api sammataḥ
analyzed: sa tvam hareḥ anudhyātaḥ tad puṃsām api sammataḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 kathaṃ tv avadyaṃ kṛtavān anuśikṣan satāṃ vratam
analyzed: katham tu avadyam kṛtavān anuśikṣan satām vratam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 titikṣayā karuṇayā maitryā cākhila-jantuṣu
analyzed: titikṣayā karuṇayā maitryā ca akhila jantuṣu

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 samatvena ca sarvātmā bhagavān samprasīdati
analyzed: sama tvena ca sarva ātmā bhagavān samprasīdati

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 samprasanne bhagavati puruṣaḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: samprasanne bhagavati puruṣaḥ prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 vimukto jīva-nirmukto brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati
analyzed: vimuktaḥ jīva nirmuktaḥ brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 bhūtaiḥ pañcabhir ārabdhair yoṣit puruṣa eva hi
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ pañcabhiḥ ārabdhaiḥ yoṣit puruṣaḥ eva hi

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tayor vyavāyāt sambhūtir yoṣit-puruṣayor iha
analyzed: tayoḥ vyavāyāt sambhūtiḥ yoṣit puruṣayoḥ iha

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 evaṃ pravartate sargaḥ sthitiḥ saṃyama eva ca
analyzed: evam pravartate sargaḥ sthitiḥ saṃyamaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 guṇa-vyatikarād rājan māyayā paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: guṇa vyatikarāt rājan māyayā paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 nimitta-mātraṃ tatrāsīn nirguṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: nimitta mātram tatra āsīt nirguṇaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 vyaktāvyaktam idaṃ viśvaṃ yatra bhramati lohavat
analyzed: vyakta avyaktam idam viśvam yatra bhramati loha vat

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sa khalv idaṃ bhagavān kāla-śaktyā guṇa-pravāheṇa vibhakta-vīryaḥ
analyzed: sa khalu idam bhagavān kāla śaktyā guṇa pravāheṇa vibhakta vīryaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 karoty akartaiva nihanty ahantā ceṣṭā vibhūmnaḥ khalu durvibhāvyā
analyzed: karoti akartā eva nihanti ahantā ceṣṭā vibhūmnaḥ khalu durvibhāvyā

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 so 'nanto 'nta-karaḥ kālo 'nādir ādi-kṛd avyayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ anantaḥ anta karaḥ kālaḥ anādiḥ ādi kṛt avyayaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 janaṃ janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunāntakam
analyzed: janam janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunā antakam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 na vai sva-pakṣo 'sya vipakṣa eva vā parasya mṛtyor viśataḥ samaṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: na vai sva pakṣaḥ asya vipakṣaḥ eva vā parasya mṛtyoḥ viśataḥ samam prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 taṃ dhāvamānam anudhāvanty anīśā yathā rajāṃsy anilaṃ bhūta-saṅghāḥ
analyzed: tam dhāvamānam anudhāvanti anīśāḥ yathā rajāṃsi anilam bhūta saṅghāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 āyuṣo 'pacayaṃ jantos tathaivopacayaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ apacayam jantoḥ tathā evā upacayam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 ubhābhyāṃ rahitaḥ sva-stho duḥsthasya vidadhāty asau
analyzed: ubhābhyām rahitaḥ svasthaḥ duḥsthasya vidadhāti asau

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 kecit karma vadanty enaṃ svabhāvam apare nṛpa
analyzed: kecid karma vadanti enam svabhāvam apare nṛpa

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 eke kālaṃ pare daivaṃ puṃsaḥ kāmam utāpare
analyzed: eke kālam pare daivam puṃsaḥ kāmam uta apare

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 avyaktasyāprameyasya nānā-śakty-udayasya ca
analyzed: avyaktasya aprameyasya nānā śakti udayasya ca

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 na vai cikīrṣitaṃ tāta ko vedātha sva-sambhavam
analyzed: na vai cikīrṣitam tāta kaḥ veda atha sva sambhavam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 na caite putraka bhrātur hantāro dhanadānugāḥ
analyzed: na ca ete putraka bhrātuḥ hantāraḥ dhanada anugāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 visargādānayos tāta puṃso daivaṃ hi kāraṇam
analyzed: visarga ādānayoḥ tāta puṃsaḥ daivam hi kāraṇam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sa eva viśvaṃ sṛjati sa evāvati hanti ca
analyzed: saḥ eva viśvam sṛjati saḥ eva avati hanti ca

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 athāpi hy anahaṅkārān nājyate guṇa-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: atha api hi anahaṅkārāt na ajyate guṇa karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 eṣa bhūtāni bhūtātmā bhūteśo bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa bhūtāni bhūta ātmā bhūteśaḥ bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 sva-śaktyā māyayā yuktaḥ sṛjaty atti ca pāti ca
analyzed: sva śaktyā māyayā yuktaḥ sṛjati atti ca pāti ca

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tam eva mṛtyum amṛtaṃ tāta daivaṃ sarvātmanopehi jagat-parāyaṇam
analyzed: tam eva mṛtyum amṛtam tāta daivam sarva ātmanā upehi jagat parāyaṇam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 yasmai baliṃ viśva-sṛjo haranti gāvo yathā vai nasi dāma-yantritāḥ
analyzed: yasmai balim viśva sṛjaḥ haranti gāvaḥ yathā vai nasi dāma yantritāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 yaḥ pañca-varṣo jananīṃ tvaṃ vihāya mātuḥ sapatnyā vacasā bhinna-marmā
analyzed: yaḥ pañca varṣaḥ jananīm tvam vihāya mātuḥ sapatnyāḥ vacasā bhinna marmā

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 vanaṃ gatas tapasā pratyag-akṣam ārādhya lebhe mūrdhni padaṃ tri-lokyāḥ
analyzed: vanam gataḥ tapasā pratyak akṣam ārādhya lebhe mūrdhni padam trilokyāḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tam enam aṅgātmani mukta-vigrahe vyapāśritaṃ nirguṇam ekam akṣaram
analyzed: tam enam aṅga ātmani mukta vigrahe vyapāśritam nirguṇam ekam akṣaram

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 ātmānam anviccha vimuktam ātma-dṛg yasminn idaṃ bhedam asat pratīyate
analyzed: ātmānam anviccha vimuktam ātma dṛś yasmin idam bhedam asat pratīyate

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tvaṃ pratyag-ātmani tadā bhagavaty ananta ānanda-mātra upapanna-samasta-śaktau
analyzed: tvam pratyagātmani tadā bhagavati anantaḥ ānanda mātraḥ upapanna samasta śaktau

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 bhaktiṃ vidhāya paramāṃ śanakair avidyā- granthiṃ vibhetsyasi mamāham iti prarūḍham
analyzed: bhaktim vidhāya paramām śanakais avidyā granthim vibhetsyasi mama aham iti prarūḍham

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 saṃyaccha roṣaṃ bhadraṃ te pratīpaṃ śreyasāṃ param
analyzed: saṃyaccha roṣam bhadram te pratīpam śreyasām param

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 śrutena bhūyasā rājann agadena yathāmayam
analyzed: śrutena bhūyasā rājan agadena yathāmayam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 yenopasṛṣṭāt puruṣāl loka udvijate bhṛśam
analyzed: yena upasṛṣṭāt puruṣāt lokaḥ udvijate bhṛśam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 na budhas tad-vaśaṃ gacched icchann abhayam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na budhaḥ tad vaśam gacchet icchan abhayam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 helanaṃ giriśa-bhrātur dhanadasya tvayā kṛtam
analyzed: helanam giriśa bhrātuḥ dhanadasya tvayā kṛtam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 yaj jaghnivān puṇya-janān bhrātṛ-ghnān ity amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: yat jaghnivān puṇyajanān bhrātṛ ghnān iti amarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 taṃ prasādaya vatsāśu sannatyā praśrayoktibhiḥ
analyzed: tam prasādaya vatsa āśu sannatyā praśraya uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 na yāvan mahatāṃ tejaḥ kulaṃ no 'bhibhaviṣyati
analyzed: na yāvat mahatām tejaḥ kulam naḥ abhibhaviṣyati

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 evaṃ svāyambhuvaḥ pautram anuśāsya manur dhruvam
analyzed: evam svāyambhuvaḥ pautram anuśāsya manuḥ dhruvam

original: BhP_04.11.001/1 tenābhivanditaḥ sākam ṛṣibhiḥ sva-puraṃ yayau
analyzed: tena abhivanditaḥ sākam ṛṣibhiḥ sva puram yayau

original: BhP_04.12.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.12.001/1 dhruvaṃ nivṛttaṃ pratibuddhya vaiśasād apeta-manyuṃ bhagavān dhaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: dhruvam nivṛttam pratibuddhya vaiśasāt apeta manyum bhagavān dhaneśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.12.001/2 tatrāgataś cāraṇa-yakṣa-kinnaraiḥ saṃstūyamāno nyavadat kṛtāñjalim
analyzed: tatra āgataḥ cāraṇa yakṣa kinnaraiḥ saṃstūyamānaḥ nyavadat kṛtāñjalim

original: BhP_04.12.002/0 dhanada uvāca
analyzed: dhanadaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.12.002/1 bho bhoḥ kṣatriya-dāyāda parituṣṭo 'smi te 'nagha
analyzed: bho bhoḥ kṣatriya dāyāda parituṣṭaḥ asmi te anagha

original: BhP_04.12.002/2 yat tvaṃ pitāmahādeśād vairaṃ dustyajam atyajaḥ
analyzed: yat tvam pitāmaha ādeśāt vairam dustyajam atyajaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.003/1 na bhavān avadhīd yakṣān na yakṣā bhrātaraṃ tava
analyzed: na bhavān avadhīt yakṣān na yakṣāḥ bhrātaram tava

original: BhP_04.12.003/2 kāla eva hi bhūtānāṃ prabhur apyaya-bhāvayoḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ eva hi bhūtānām prabhuḥ apyaya bhāvayoḥ

original: BhP_04.12.004/1 ahaṃ tvam ity apārthā dhīr ajñānāt puruṣasya hi
analyzed: aham tvam iti apārthā dhīḥ ajñānāt puruṣasya hi

original: BhP_04.12.004/2 svāpnīvābhāty atad-dhyānād yayā bandha-viparyayau
analyzed: a tad dhyānāt yayā bandha viparyayau

original: BhP_04.12.005/1 tad gaccha dhruva bhadraṃ te bhagavantam adhokṣajam
analyzed: tat gaccha dhruva bhadram te bhagavantam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_04.12.005/2 sarva-bhūtātma-bhāvena sarva-bhūtātma-vigraham
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātma bhāvena sarva bhūta ātma vigraham

original: BhP_04.12.006/1 bhajasva bhajanīyāṅghrim abhavāya bhava-cchidam
analyzed: bhajasva bhajanīya aṅghrim abhavāya bhava chidam

original: BhP_04.12.006/2 yuktaṃ virahitaṃ śaktyā guṇa-mayyātma-māyayā
analyzed: yuktam virahitam śaktyā guṇa mayyā ātma māyayā

original: BhP_04.12.007/1 vṛṇīhi kāmaṃ nṛpa yan mano-gataṃ mattas tvam auttānapade 'viśaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: vṛṇīhi kāmam nṛpa yat manogatam mattaḥ tvam auttānapade a viśaṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.007/2 varaṃ varārho 'mbuja-nābha-pādayor anantaraṃ tvāṃ vayam aṅga śuśruma
analyzed: varam vara arhaḥ ambuja nābha pādayoḥ anantaram tvām vayam aṅga śuśruma

original: BhP_04.12.008/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.12.008/1 sa rāja-rājena varāya codito dhruvo mahā-bhāgavato mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: sa rājarājena varāya coditaḥ dhruvaḥ mahā bhāgavataḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_04.12.008/2 harau sa vavre 'calitāṃ smṛtiṃ yayā taraty ayatnena duratyayaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: harau sa vavre acalitām smṛtim yayā tarati ayatnena duratyayam tamaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.009/1 tasya prītena manasā tāṃ dattvaiḍaviḍas tataḥ
