analyzed: tasya prītena manasā tām dattvā aiḍaviḍaḥ tatas

original: BhP_04.12.009/2 paśyato 'ntardadhe so 'pi sva-puraṃ pratyapadyata
analyzed: paśyataḥ antardadhe saḥ api sva puram pratyapadyata

original: BhP_04.12.010/1 athāyajata yajñeśaṃ kratubhir bhūri-dakṣiṇaiḥ
analyzed: atha ayajata yajñeśam kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.12.010/2 dravya-kriyā-devatānāṃ karma karma-phala-pradam
analyzed: dravya kriyā devatānām karma karma phala pradam

original: BhP_04.12.011/1 sarvātmany acyute 'sarve tīvraughāṃ bhaktim udvahan
analyzed: sarvātmani acyute asarve tīvra oghām bhaktim udvahan

original: BhP_04.12.011/2 dadarśātmani bhūteṣu tam evāvasthitaṃ vibhum
analyzed: dadarśa ātmani bhūteṣu tam eva avasthitam vibhum

original: BhP_04.12.012/1 tam evaṃ śīla-sampannaṃ brahmaṇyaṃ dīna-vatsalam
analyzed: tam evam śīla sampannam brahmaṇyam dīna vatsalam

original: BhP_04.12.012/2 goptāraṃ dharma-setūnāṃ menire pitaraṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: goptāram dharma setūnām menire pitaram prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.12.013/1 ṣaṭ-triṃśad-varṣa-sāhasraṃ śaśāsa kṣiti-maṇḍalam
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat varṣa sāhasram śaśāsa kṣiti maṇḍalam

original: BhP_04.12.013/2 bhogaiḥ puṇya-kṣayaṃ kurvann abhogair aśubha-kṣayam
analyzed: bhogaiḥ puṇya kṣayam kurvan abhogaiḥ aśubha kṣayam

original: BhP_04.12.014/1 evaṃ bahu-savaṃ kālaṃ mahātmāvicalendriyaḥ
analyzed: evam bahu savam kālam mahātmā avicala indriyaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.014/2 tri-vargaupayikaṃ nītvā putrāyādān nṛpāsanam
analyzed: trivarga aupayikam nītvā putrāya adāt nṛpāsanam

original: BhP_04.12.015/1 manyamāna idaṃ viśvaṃ māyā-racitam ātmani
analyzed: manyamānaḥ idam viśvam māyā racitam ātmani

original: BhP_04.12.015/2 avidyā-racita-svapna-gandharva-nagaropamam
analyzed: avidyā racita svapna gandharvanagara upamam

original: BhP_04.12.016/1 ātma-stry-apatya-suhṛdo balam ṛddha-kośam
analyzed: ātma strī apatya suhṛdaḥ balam ṛddha kośam

original: BhP_04.12.016/2 antaḥ-puraṃ parivihāra-bhuvaś ca ramyāḥ
analyzed: antaḥpuram parivihāra bhuvaḥ ca ramyāḥ

original: BhP_04.12.016/3 bhū-maṇḍalaṃ jaladhi-mekhalam ākalayya
analyzed: bhū maṇḍalam jaladhi mekhalam ākalayya

original: BhP_04.12.016/4 kālopasṛṣṭam iti sa prayayau viśālām
analyzed: kāla upasṛṣṭam iti sa prayayau viśālām

original: BhP_04.12.017/1 tasyāṃ viśuddha-karaṇaḥ śiva-vār vigāhya
analyzed: tasyām viśuddha karaṇaḥ śiva vār vigāhya

original: BhP_04.12.017/2 baddhvāsanaṃ jita-marun manasāhṛtākṣaḥ
analyzed: baddhvā āsanam jita marut manasā āhṛta akṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.017/3 sthūle dadhāra bhagavat-pratirūpa etad
analyzed: sthūle dadhāra bhagavat pratirūpe etat

original: BhP_04.12.017/4 dhyāyaṃs tad avyavahito vyasṛjat samādhau
analyzed: dhyāyan tat avyavahitaḥ vyasṛjat samādhau

original: BhP_04.12.018/1 bhaktiṃ harau bhagavati pravahann ajasram
analyzed: bhaktim harau bhagavati pravahan ajasram

original: BhP_04.12.018/2 ānanda-bāṣpa-kalayā muhur ardyamānaḥ
analyzed: ānanda bāṣpa kalayā muhur ardyamānaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.018/3 viklidyamāna-hṛdayaḥ pulakācitāṅgo
analyzed: viklidyamāna hṛdayaḥ pulaka ācita aṅgaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.018/4 nātmānam asmarad asāv iti mukta-liṅgaḥ
analyzed: na ātmānam asmarat asau iti mukta liṅgaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.019/1 sa dadarśa vimānāgryaṃ nabhaso 'vatarad dhruvaḥ
analyzed: sa dadarśa vimāna agryam nabhasaḥ avatarat dhruvaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.019/2 vibhrājayad daśa diśo rākāpatim ivoditam
analyzed: vibhrājayat daśa diśaḥ rākāpatim iva uditam

original: BhP_04.12.020/1 tatrānu deva-pravarau catur-bhujau
analyzed: tatra anu deva pravarau catur bhujau

original: BhP_04.12.020/2 śyāmau kiśorāv aruṇāmbujekṣaṇau
analyzed: śyāmau kiśorau aruṇa ambuja īkṣaṇau

original: BhP_04.12.020/3 sthitāv avaṣṭabhya gadāṃ suvāsasau
analyzed: sthitau avaṣṭabhya gadām su vāsasau

original: BhP_04.12.020/4 kirīṭa-hārāṅgada-cāru-kuṇḍalau
analyzed: kirīṭa hāra aṅgada cāru kuṇḍalau

original: BhP_04.12.021/1 vijñāya tāv uttamagāya-kiṅkarāv
analyzed: vijñāya tau uttama gāya kiṅkarau

original: BhP_04.12.021/2 abhyutthitaḥ sādhvasa-vismṛta-kramaḥ
analyzed: abhyutthitaḥ sādhvasa vismṛta kramaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.021/3 nanāma nāmāni gṛṇan madhudviṣaḥ
analyzed: nanāma nāmāni gṛṇan madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.021/4 pārṣat-pradhānāv iti saṃhatāñjaliḥ
analyzed: pārṣad pradhānau iti saṃhata añjaliḥ

original: BhP_04.12.022/1 taṃ kṛṣṇa-pādābhiniviṣṭa-cetasaṃ
analyzed: tam kṛṣṇa pāda abhiniviṣṭa cetasam

original: BhP_04.12.022/2 baddhāñjaliṃ praśraya-namra-kandharam
analyzed: baddhāñjalim praśraya namra kandharam

original: BhP_04.12.022/3 sunanda-nandāv upasṛtya sasmitaṃ
analyzed: sunanda nandau upasṛtya sa smitam

original: BhP_04.12.022/4 pratyūcatuḥ puṣkaranābha-sammatau
analyzed: pratyūcatuḥ puṣkaranābha sammatau

original: BhP_04.12.023/0 sunanda-nandāv ūcatuḥ
analyzed: sunanda nandau ūcatuḥ

original: BhP_04.12.023/1 bho bho rājan subhadraṃ te vācaṃ no 'vahitaḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: bho bho rājan su bhadram te vācam naḥ avahitaḥ śṛṇu

original: BhP_04.12.023/2 yaḥ pañca-varṣas tapasā bhavān devam atītṛpat
analyzed: yaḥ pañca varṣaḥ tapasā bhavān devam atītṛpat

original: BhP_04.12.024/1 tasyākhila-jagad-dhātur āvāṃ devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya akhila jagat dhātuḥ āvām devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.024/2 pārṣadāv iha samprāptau netuṃ tvāṃ bhagavat-padam
analyzed: pārṣadau iha samprāptau netum tvām bhagavat padam

original: BhP_04.12.025/1 sudurjayaṃ viṣṇu-padaṃ jitaṃ tvayā yat sūrayo 'prāpya vicakṣate param
analyzed: su durjayam viṣṇu padam jitam tvayā yat sūrayaḥ a prāpya vicakṣate param

original: BhP_04.12.025/2 ātiṣṭha tac candra-divākarādayo graharkṣa-tārāḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇam
analyzed: ātiṣṭha tat candra divākara ādayaḥ graha ṛkṣa tārāḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇam

original: BhP_04.12.026/1 anāsthitaṃ te pitṛbhir anyair apy aṅga karhicit
analyzed: an āsthitam te pitṛbhiḥ anyaiḥ api aṅga karhicit

original: BhP_04.12.026/2 ātiṣṭha jagatāṃ vandyaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
analyzed: ātiṣṭha jagatām vandyam tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam

original: BhP_04.12.027/1 etad vimāna-pravaram uttamaśloka-maulinā
analyzed: etat vimāna pravaram uttamaśloka maulinā

original: BhP_04.12.027/2 upasthāpitam āyuṣmann adhiroḍhuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: upasthāpitam āyuṣman adhiroḍhum tvam arhasi

original: BhP_04.12.028/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.12.028/1 niśamya vaikuṇṭha-niyojya-mukhyayor madhu-cyutaṃ vācam urukrama-priyaḥ
analyzed: niśamya vaikuṇṭha niyojya mukhyayoḥ madhu cyutam vācam urukrama priyaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.028/2 kṛtābhiṣekaḥ kṛta-nitya-maṅgalo munīn praṇamyāśiṣam abhyavādayat
analyzed: kṛta abhiṣekaḥ kṛta nitya maṅgalaḥ munīn praṇamya āśiṣam abhyavādayat

original: BhP_04.12.029/1 parītyābhyarcya dhiṣṇyāgryaṃ pārṣadāv abhivandya ca
analyzed: parītya abhyarcya dhiṣṇya agryam pārṣadau abhivandya ca

original: BhP_04.12.029/2 iyeṣa tad adhiṣṭhātuṃ bibhrad rūpaṃ hiraṇmayam
analyzed: iyeṣa tat adhiṣṭhātum bibhrat rūpam hiraṇmayam

original: BhP_04.12.030/1 tadottānapadaḥ putro dadarśāntakam āgatam
analyzed: tadā uttānapadaḥ putraḥ dadarśa antakam āgatam

original: BhP_04.12.030/2 mṛtyor mūrdhni padaṃ dattvā ārurohādbhutaṃ gṛham
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ mūrdhni padam dattvā āruroha adbhutam gṛham

original: BhP_04.12.031/1 tadā dundubhayo nedur mṛdaṅga-paṇavādayaḥ
analyzed: tadā dundubhayaḥ neduḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.031/2 gandharva-mukhyāḥ prajaguḥ petuḥ kusuma-vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: gandharva mukhyāḥ prajaguḥ petuḥ kusuma vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.032/1 sa ca svarlokam ārokṣyan sunītiṃ jananīṃ dhruvaḥ
analyzed: sa ca svar lokam ārokṣyan sunītim jananīm dhruvaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.032/2 anvasmarad agaṃ hitvā dīnāṃ yāsye tri-viṣṭapam
analyzed: anvasmarat agam hitvā dīnām yāsye triviṣṭapam

original: BhP_04.12.033/1 iti vyavasitaṃ tasya vyavasāya surottamau
analyzed: iti vyavasitam tasya vyavasāya sura uttamau

original: BhP_04.12.033/2 darśayām āsatur devīṃ puro yānena gacchatīm
analyzed: darśayām āsatuḥ devīm puras yānena gacchatīm

original: BhP_04.12.034/1 tatra tatra praśaṃsadbhiḥ pathi vaimānikaiḥ suraiḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra praśaṃsadbhiḥ pathi vaimānikaiḥ suraiḥ

original: BhP_04.12.034/2 avakīryamāṇo dadṛśe kusumaiḥ kramaśo grahān
analyzed: avakīryamāṇaḥ dadṛśe kusumaiḥ kramaśas grahān

original: BhP_04.12.035/1 tri-lokīṃ deva-yānena so 'tivrajya munīn api
analyzed: trilokīm deva yānena saḥ ativrajya munīn api

original: BhP_04.12.035/2 parastād yad dhruva-gatir viṣṇoḥ padam athābhyagāt
analyzed: parastāt yat dhruva gatiḥ viṣṇoḥ padam atha abhyagāt

original: BhP_04.12.036/1 yad bhrājamānaṃ sva-rucaiva sarvato lokās trayo hy anu vibhrājanta ete
analyzed: yat bhrājamānam sva rucā eva sarvatas lokāḥ trayaḥ hi anu vibhrājante ete

original: BhP_04.12.036/2 yan nāvrajan jantuṣu ye 'nanugrahā vrajanti bhadrāṇi caranti ye 'niśam
analyzed: yat na avrajan jantuṣu ye ananugrahāḥ vrajanti bhadrāṇi caranti ye aniśam

original: BhP_04.12.037/1 śāntāḥ sama-dṛśaḥ śuddhāḥ sarva-bhūtānurañjanāḥ
analyzed: śāntāḥ samadṛśaḥ śuddhāḥ sarva bhūta anurañjanāḥ

original: BhP_04.12.037/2 yānty añjasācyuta-padam acyuta-priya-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: yānti añjasā acyuta padam acyuta priya bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_04.12.038/1 ity uttānapadaḥ putro dhruvaḥ kṛṣṇa-parāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti uttānapadaḥ putraḥ dhruvaḥ kṛṣṇa parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.038/2 abhūt trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ cūḍā-maṇir ivāmalaḥ
analyzed: abhūt trayāṇām lokānām cūḍāmaṇiḥ iva amalaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.039/1 gambhīra-vego 'nimiṣaṃ jyotiṣāṃ cakram āhitam
analyzed: gambhīra vegaḥ animiṣam jyotiṣām cakram āhitam

original: BhP_04.12.039/2 yasmin bhramati kauravya meḍhyām iva gavāṃ gaṇaḥ
analyzed: yasmin bhramati kauravya meḍhyām iva gavām gaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.040/1 mahimānaṃ vilokyāsya nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: mahimānam vilokya asya nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_04.12.040/2 ātodyaṃ vitudañ ślokān satre 'gāyat pracetasām
analyzed: ātodyam vitudam ślokān satre agāyat pracetasām

original: BhP_04.12.041/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.12.041/1 nūnaṃ sunīteḥ pati-devatāyās tapaḥ-prabhāvasya sutasya tāṃ gatim
analyzed: nūnam sunīteḥ pati devatāyāḥ tapaḥ prabhāvasya sutasya tām gatim

original: BhP_04.12.041/2 dṛṣṭvābhyupāyān api veda-vādino naivādhigantuṃ prabhavanti kiṃ nṛpāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā abhyupāyān api veda vādinaḥ na eva adhigantum prabhavanti kim nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_04.12.042/1 yaḥ pañca-varṣo guru-dāra-vāk-śarair bhinnena yāto hṛdayena dūyatā
analyzed: yaḥ pañca varṣaḥ guru dāra vāc śaraiḥ bhinnena yātaḥ hṛdayena dūyatā

original: BhP_04.12.042/2 vanaṃ mad-ādeśa-karo 'jitaṃ prabhuṃ jigāya tad-bhakta-guṇaiḥ parājitam
analyzed: vanam mad ādeśa karaḥ ajitam prabhum jigāya tad bhakta guṇaiḥ parājitam

original: BhP_04.12.043/1 yaḥ kṣatra-bandhur bhuvi tasyādhirūḍham anv ārurukṣed api varṣa-pūgaiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kṣatrabandhuḥ bhuvi tasya adhirūḍham anu ārurukṣet api varṣa pūgaiḥ

original: BhP_04.12.043/2 ṣaṭ-pañca-varṣo yad ahobhir alpaiḥ prasādya vaikuṇṭham avāpa tat-padam
analyzed: ṣaṣ pañca varṣaḥ yat ahobhiḥ alpaiḥ prasādya vaikuṇṭham avāpa tat padam

original: BhP_04.12.044/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.12.044/1 etat te 'bhihitaṃ sarvaṃ yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā
analyzed: etat te abhihitam sarvam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham iha tvayā

original: BhP_04.12.044/2 dhruvasyoddāma-yaśasaś caritaṃ sammataṃ satām
analyzed: dhruvasya uddāma yaśasaḥ caritam sammatam satām

original: BhP_04.12.045/1 dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ svasty-ayanaṃ mahat
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam puṇyam svastyayanam mahat

original: BhP_04.12.045/2 svargyaṃ dhrauvyaṃ saumanasyaṃ praśasyam agha-marṣaṇam
analyzed: svargyam dhrauvyam saumanasyam praśasyam agha marṣaṇam

original: BhP_04.12.046/1 śrutvaitac chraddhayābhīkṣṇam acyuta-priya-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: śrutvā etat śraddhayā abhīkṣṇam acyuta priya ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_04.12.046/2 bhaved bhaktir bhagavati yayā syāt kleśa-saṅkṣayaḥ
analyzed: bhavet bhaktiḥ bhagavati yayā syāt kleśa saṅkṣayaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.047/1 mahattvam icchatāṃ tīrthaṃ śrotuḥ śīlādayo guṇāḥ
analyzed: mahattvam icchatām tīrtham śrotuḥ śīla ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_04.12.047/2 yatra tejas tad icchūnāṃ māno yatra manasvinām
analyzed: yatra tejaḥ tat icchūnām mānaḥ yatra manasvinām

original: BhP_04.12.048/1 prayataḥ kīrtayet prātaḥ samavāye dvi-janmanām
analyzed: prayataḥ kīrtayet prātar samavāye dvijanmanām

original: BhP_04.12.048/2 sāyaṃ ca puṇya-ślokasya dhruvasya caritaṃ mahat
analyzed: sāyam ca puṇyaślokasya dhruvasya caritam mahat

original: BhP_04.12.049/1 paurṇamāsyāṃ sinīvālyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇe 'thavā
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām sinīvālyām dvādaśyām śravaṇe athavā

original: BhP_04.12.049/2 dina-kṣaye vyatīpāte saṅkrame 'rkadine 'pi vā
BhP_04.12.050/1 śrāvayec chraddadhānānāṃ tīrtha-pāda-padāśrayaḥ
analyzed: śrāvayet śraddadhānānām tīrtha pāda pada āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.050/2 necchaṃs tatrātmanātmānaṃ santuṣṭa iti sidhyati
analyzed: na icchan tatra ātmanā ātmānam santuṣṭaḥ iti sidhyati

original: BhP_04.12.051/1 jñānam ajñāta-tattvāya yo dadyāt sat-pathe 'mṛtam
analyzed: dadyāt

original: BhP_04.12.051/2 kṛpālor dīna-nāthasya devās tasyānugṛhṇate
analyzed: kṛpāloḥ dīna nāthasya devāḥ tasya anugṛhṇate

original: BhP_04.12.052/1 idaṃ mayā te 'bhihitaṃ kurūdvaha dhruvasya vikhyāta-viśuddha-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: idam mayā te abhihitam kuru udvaha dhruvasya vikhyāta viśuddha karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.12.052/2 hitvārbhakaḥ krīḍanakāni mātur gṛhaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ yo jagāma
analyzed: hitvā arbhakaḥ krīḍanakāni mātuḥ gṛham ca viṣṇum śaraṇam yaḥ jagāma

original: BhP_04.13.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.13.001/1 niśamya kauṣāraviṇopavarṇitaṃ dhruvasya vaikuṇṭha-padādhirohaṇam
analyzed: niśamya kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitam dhruvasya vaikuṇṭha pada adhirohaṇam

original: BhP_04.13.001/2 prarūḍha-bhāvo bhagavaty adhokṣaje praṣṭuṃ punas taṃ viduraḥ pracakrame
analyzed: prarūḍha bhāvaḥ bhagavati adhokṣaje praṣṭum punar tam viduraḥ pracakrame

original: BhP_04.13.002/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.13.002/1 ke te pracetaso nāma kasyāpatyāni suvrata
analyzed: ke te pracetasaḥ nāma kasya apatyāni suvrata

original: BhP_04.13.002/2 kasyānvavāye prakhyātāḥ kutra vā satram āsata
analyzed: kasya anvavāye prakhyātāḥ kutra vā satram āsata

original: BhP_04.13.003/1 manye mahā-bhāgavataṃ nāradaṃ deva-darśanam
analyzed: manye mahā bhāgavatam nāradam devadarśanam

original: BhP_04.13.003/2 yena proktaḥ kriyā-yogaḥ paricaryā-vidhir hareḥ
analyzed: yena proktaḥ kriyā yogaḥ paricaryā vidhiḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_04.13.004/1 sva-dharma-śīlaiḥ puruṣair bhagavān yajña-pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: svadharma śīlaiḥ puruṣaiḥ bhagavān yajñapūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.004/2 ijyamāno bhaktimatā nāradeneritaḥ kila
analyzed: ijyamānaḥ bhaktimatā nāradena īritaḥ kila

original: BhP_04.13.005/1 yās tā devarṣiṇā tatra varṇitā bhagavat-kathāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ deva ṛṣiṇā tatra varṇitāḥ bhagavat kathāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.005/2 mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave brahman kārtsnyenācaṣṭum arhasi
analyzed: mahyam śuśrūṣave brahman kārtsnyena ācaṣṭum arhasi

original: BhP_04.13.006/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.13.006/1 dhruvasya cotkalaḥ putraḥ pitari prasthite vanam
analyzed: dhruvasya ca utkalaḥ putraḥ pitari prasthite vanam

original: BhP_04.13.006/2 sārvabhauma-śriyaṃ naicchad adhirājāsanaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: sārvabhauma śriyam na aicchat adhirāja āsanam pituḥ

original: BhP_04.13.007/1 sa janmanopaśāntātmā niḥsaṅgaḥ sama-darśanaḥ
analyzed: sa janmanā upaśānta ātmā niḥsaṅgaḥ sama darśanaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.007/2 dadarśa loke vitatam ātmānaṃ lokam ātmani
analyzed: dadarśa loke vitatam ātmānam lokam ātmani

original: BhP_04.13.008/1 ātmānaṃ brahma nirvāṇaṃ pratyastamita-vigraham
analyzed: ātmānam brahma nirvāṇam pratyastam ita vigraham

original: BhP_04.13.008/2 avabodha-rasaikātmyam ānandam anusantatam
BhP_04.13.009/1 avyavacchinna-yogāgni- dagdha-karma-malāśayaḥ
BhP_04.13.009/2 svarūpam avarundhāno nātmano 'nyaṃ tadaikṣata
analyzed: sva rūpam avarundhānaḥ na ātmanaḥ anyam tadā aikṣata

original: BhP_04.13.010/1 jaḍāndha-badhironmatta- mūkākṛtir atan-matiḥ
BhP_04.13.010/2 lakṣitaḥ pathi bālānāṃ praśāntārcir ivānalaḥ
analyzed: lakṣitaḥ pathi bālānām praśānta arciḥ iva analaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.011/1 matvā taṃ jaḍam unmattaṃ kula-vṛddhāḥ samantriṇaḥ
analyzed: matvā tam jaḍam unmattam kula vṛddhāḥ sa mantriṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.011/2 vatsaraṃ bhūpatiṃ cakrur yavīyāṃsaṃ bhrameḥ sutam
analyzed: vatsaram bhūpatim cakruḥ yavīyāṃsam bhrameḥ sutam

original: BhP_04.13.012/1 svarvīthir vatsarasyeṣṭā bhāryāsūta ṣaḍ-ātmajān
analyzed: svarvīthiḥ vatsarasya iṣṭā bhāryā asūta ṣaṭ ātmajān

original: BhP_04.13.012/2 puṣpārṇaṃ tigmaketuṃ ca iṣam ūrjaṃ vasuṃ jayam
analyzed: puṣpārṇam tigmaketum ca iṣam ūrjam vasum jayam

original: BhP_04.13.013/1 puṣpārṇasya prabhā bhāryā doṣā ca dve babhūvatuḥ
analyzed: puṣpārṇasya prabhā bhāryā doṣā ca dve babhūvatuḥ

original: BhP_04.13.013/2 prātar madhyandinaṃ sāyam iti hy āsan prabhā-sutāḥ
analyzed: prātar madhyandinam sāyam iti hi āsan prabhā sutāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.014/1 pradoṣo niśitho vyuṣṭa iti doṣā-sutās trayaḥ
analyzed: pradoṣaḥ niśithaḥ vyuṣṭaḥ iti doṣāsutāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.014/2 vyuṣṭaḥ sutaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ sarvatejasam ādadhe
analyzed: vyuṣṭaḥ sutam puṣkariṇyām sarva tejasam ādadhe

original: BhP_04.13.015/1 sa cakṣuḥ sutam ākūtyāṃ patnyāṃ manum avāpa ha
analyzed: sa cakṣuḥ sutam ākūtyām patnyām manum avāpa ha

original: BhP_04.13.015/2 manor asūta mahiṣī virajān naḍvalā sutān
analyzed: manoḥ asūta mahiṣī virajān naḍvalā sutān

original: BhP_04.13.016/1 puruṃ kutsaṃ tritaṃ dyumnaṃ satyavantam ṛtaṃ vratam
analyzed: purum kutsam tritam dyumnam satyavantam ṛtam vratam

original: BhP_04.13.016/2 agniṣṭomam atīrātraṃ pradyumnaṃ śibim ulmukam
analyzed: agniṣṭomam atīrātram pradyumnam śibim ulmukam

original: BhP_04.13.017/1 ulmuko 'janayat putrān puṣkariṇyāṃ ṣaḍ uttamān
analyzed: ulmukaḥ ajanayat putrān puṣkariṇyām ṣaṭ uttamān

original: BhP_04.13.017/2 aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ khyātiṃ kratum aṅgirasaṃ gayam
analyzed: aṅgam sumanasam khyātim kratum aṅgirasam gayam

original: BhP_04.13.018/1 sunīthāṅgasya yā patnī suṣuve venam ulbaṇam
analyzed: sunīthā aṅgasya yā patnī suṣuve venam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_04.13.018/2 yad-dauḥśīlyāt sa rājarṣir nirviṇṇo niragāt purāt
analyzed: yad dauḥśīlyāt sa rājarṣiḥ nirviṇṇaḥ niragāt purāt

original: BhP_04.13.019/1 yam aṅga śepuḥ kupitā vāg-vajrā munayaḥ kila
analyzed: yam aṅga śepuḥ kupitāḥ vāc vajrāḥ munayaḥ kila

original: BhP_04.13.019/2 gatāsos tasya bhūyas te mamanthur dakṣiṇaṃ karam
analyzed: gatāsoḥ tasya bhūyas te mamanthuḥ dakṣiṇam karam

original: BhP_04.13.020/1 arājake tadā loke dasyubhiḥ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: arājake tadā loke dasyubhiḥ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.020/2 jāto nārāyaṇāṃśena pṛthur ādyaḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ
analyzed: jātaḥ nārāyaṇa aṃśena pṛthuḥ ādyaḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.13.021/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.13.021/1 tasya śīla-nidheḥ sādhor brahmaṇyasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya śīla nidheḥ sādhoḥ brahmaṇyasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.021/2 rājñaḥ katham abhūd duṣṭā prajā yad vimanā yayau
analyzed: rājñaḥ katham abhūt duṣṭā prajā yat vimanāḥ yayau

original: BhP_04.13.022/1 kiṃ vāṃho vena uddiśya brahma-daṇḍam ayūyujan
analyzed: kim vā aṃhaḥ venaḥ uddiśya brahmadaṇḍam ayūyujan

original: BhP_04.13.022/2 daṇḍa-vrata-dhare rājñi munayo dharma-kovidāḥ
analyzed: daṇḍavrata dhare rājñi munayaḥ dharma kovidāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.023/1 nāvadhyeyaḥ prajā-pālaḥ prajābhir aghavān api
analyzed: na avadhyeyaḥ prajāpālaḥ prajābhiḥ aghavān api

original: BhP_04.13.023/2 yad asau loka-pālānāṃ bibharty ojaḥ sva-tejasā
analyzed: yat asau lokapālānām bibharti ojaḥ sva tejasā

original: BhP_04.13.024/1 etad ākhyāhi me brahman sunīthātmaja-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: etat ākhyāhi me brahman sunītha ātmaja ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_04.13.024/2 śraddadhānāya bhaktāya tvaṃ parāvara-vittamaḥ
analyzed: śraddadhānāya bhaktāya tvam parāvara vittamaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.025/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.13.025/1 aṅgo 'śvamedhaṃ rājarṣir ājahāra mahā-kratum
analyzed: aṅgaḥ aśvamedham rājarṣiḥ ājahāra mahā kratum

original: BhP_04.13.025/2 nājagmur devatās tasminn āhūtā brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: na ājagmuḥ devatāḥ tasmin āhūtāḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.13.026/1 tam ūcur vismitās tatra yajamānam athartvijaḥ
analyzed: tam ūcuḥ vismitāḥ tatra yajamānam atha ṛtvijaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.026/2 havīṃṣi hūyamānāni na te gṛhṇanti devatāḥ
analyzed: havīṃṣi hūyamānāni na te gṛhṇanti devatāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.027/1 rājan havīṃṣy aduṣṭāni śraddhayāsāditāni te
analyzed: rājan havīṃṣi aduṣṭāni śraddhayā āsāditāni te

original: BhP_04.13.027/2 chandāṃsy ayāta-yāmāni yojitāni dhṛta-vrataiḥ
analyzed: chandāṃsi ayātayāmāni yojitāni dhṛta vrataiḥ

original: BhP_04.13.028/1 na vidāmeha devānāṃ helanaṃ vayam aṇv api
analyzed: na vidāma iha devānām helanam vayam aṇu api

original: BhP_04.13.028/2 yan na gṛhṇanti bhāgān svān ye devāḥ karma-sākṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: yat na gṛhṇanti bhāgān svān ye devāḥ karma sākṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.029/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.13.029/1 aṅgo dvija-vacaḥ śrutvā yajamānaḥ sudurmanāḥ
analyzed: aṅgaḥ dvija vacaḥ śrutvā yajamānaḥ su durmanāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.029/2 tat praṣṭuṃ vyasṛjad vācaṃ sadasyāṃs tad-anujñayā
analyzed: tat praṣṭum vyasṛjat vācam sadasyān tad anujñayā

original: BhP_04.13.030/1 nāgacchanty āhutā devā na gṛhṇanti grahān iha
analyzed: na āgacchanti āhutāḥ devāḥ na gṛhṇanti grahān iha

original: BhP_04.13.030/2 sadasas-patayo brūta kim avadyaṃ mayā kṛtam
analyzed: sadasaspatayaḥ brūta kim avadyam mayā kṛtam

original: BhP_04.13.031/0 sadasas-pataya ūcuḥ
analyzed: sadasaspatayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.13.031/1 nara-deveha bhavato nāghaṃ tāvan manāk sthitam
analyzed: naradeva iha bhavataḥ na agham tāvat manāk sthitam

original: BhP_04.13.031/2 asty ekaṃ prāktanam aghaṃ yad ihedṛk tvam aprajaḥ
analyzed: asti ekam prāktanam agham yat iha īdṛś tvam aprajaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.032/1 tathā sādhaya bhadraṃ te ātmānaṃ suprajaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: tathā sādhaya bhadram te ātmānam su prajam nṛpa

original: BhP_04.13.032/2 iṣṭas te putra-kāmasya putraṃ dāsyati yajña-bhuk
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ te putra kāmasya putram dāsyati yajñabhuj

original: BhP_04.13.033/1 tathā sva-bhāgadheyāni grahīṣyanti divaukasaḥ
analyzed: tathā sva bhāgadheyāni grahīṣyanti divaukasaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.033/2 yad yajña-puruṣaḥ sākṣād apatyāya harir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat yajñapuruṣaḥ sākṣāt apatyāya hariḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.034/1 tāṃs tān kāmān harir dadyād yān yān kāmayate janaḥ
analyzed: tān tān kāmān hariḥ dadyāt yān yān kāmayate janaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.034/2 ārādhito yathaivaiṣa tathā puṃsāṃ phalodayaḥ
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ yathā eva eṣa tathā puṃsām phala udayaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.035/1 iti vyavasitā viprās tasya rājñaḥ prajātaye
analyzed: iti vyavasitāḥ viprāḥ tasya rājñaḥ prajātaye

original: BhP_04.13.035/2 puroḍāśaṃ niravapan śipi-viṣṭāya viṣṇave
analyzed: puroḍāśam niravapan śipiviṣṭāya viṣṇave

original: BhP_04.13.036/1 tasmāt puruṣa uttasthau hema-māly amalāmbaraḥ
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣaḥ uttasthau hema mālī amala ambaraḥ

original: BhP_04.13.036/2 hiraṇmayena pātreṇa siddham ādāya pāyasam
analyzed: hiraṇmayena pātreṇa siddham ādāya pāyasam

original: BhP_04.13.037/1 sa viprānumato rājā gṛhītvāñjalinaudanam
analyzed: sa vipra anumataḥ rājā gṛhītvā añjalinā odanam

original: BhP_04.13.037/2 avaghrāya mudā yuktaḥ prādāt patnyā udāra-dhīḥ
analyzed: avaghrāya mudā yuktaḥ prādāt patnyai udāra dhīḥ

original: BhP_04.13.038/1 sā tat puṃ-savanaṃ rājñī prāśya vai patyur ādadhe
analyzed: sā tat puṃsavanam rājñī prāśya vai patyuḥ ādadhe

original: BhP_04.13.038/2 garbhaṃ kāla upāvṛtte kumāraṃ suṣuve 'prajā
analyzed: garbham kāle upāvṛtte kumāram suṣuve aprajā

original: BhP_04.13.039/1 sa bāla eva puruṣo mātāmaham anuvrataḥ
analyzed: sa bālaḥ eva puruṣaḥ mātāmaham anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_04.13.039/2 adharmāṃśodbhavaṃ mṛtyuṃ tenābhavad adhārmikaḥ
analyzed: adharma aṃśa udbhavam mṛtyum tena abhavat adhārmikaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.040/1 sa śarāsanam udyamya mṛgayur vana-gocaraḥ
analyzed: sa śarāsanam udyamya mṛgayuḥ vana gocaraḥ

original: BhP_04.13.040/2 hanty asādhur mṛgān dīnān veno 'sāv ity arauj janaḥ
analyzed: hanti asādhuḥ mṛgān dīnān venaḥ asau iti araut janaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.041/1 ākrīḍe krīḍato bālān vayasyān atidāruṇaḥ
analyzed: ākrīḍe krīḍataḥ bālān vayasyān ati dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.041/2 prasahya niranukrośaḥ paśu-māram amārayat
analyzed: prasahya niranukrośaḥ paśumāram amārayat

original: BhP_04.13.042/1 taṃ vicakṣya khalaṃ putraṃ śāsanair vividhair nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tam vicakṣya khalam putram śāsanaiḥ vividhaiḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.042/2 yadā na śāsituṃ kalpo bhṛśam āsīt sudurmanāḥ
analyzed: yadā na śāsitum kalpaḥ bhṛśam āsīt su durmanāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.043/1 prāyeṇābhyarcito devo ye 'prajā gṛha-medhinaḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa abhyarcitaḥ devaḥ ye aprajāḥ gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.043/2 kad-apatya-bhṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ ye na vindanti durbharam
analyzed: kadapatya bhṛtam duḥkham ye na vindanti durbharam

original: BhP_04.13.044/1 yataḥ pāpīyasī kīrtir adharmaś ca mahān nṛṇām
analyzed: yatas pāpīyasī kīrtiḥ adharmaḥ ca mahān nṛṇām

original: BhP_04.13.044/2 yato virodhaḥ sarveṣāṃ yata ādhir anantakaḥ
analyzed: yatas virodhaḥ sarveṣām yatas ādhiḥ anantakaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.045/1 kas taṃ prajāpadeśaṃ vai moha-bandhanam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ tam prajā apadeśam vai moha bandhanam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.045/2 paṇḍito bahu manyeta yad-arthāḥ kleśadā gṛhāḥ
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ bahu manyeta yad arthāḥ kleśa dāḥ gṛhāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.046/1 kad-apatyaṃ varaṃ manye sad-apatyāc chucāṃ padāt
analyzed: kadapatyam varam manye sat apatyāt śucām padāt

original: BhP_04.13.046/2 nirvidyeta gṛhān martyo yat-kleśa-nivahā gṛhāḥ
analyzed: nirvidyeta gṛhān martyaḥ yad kleśa nivahāḥ gṛhāḥ

original: BhP_04.13.047/1 evaṃ sa nirviṇṇa-manā nṛpo gṛhān niśītha utthāya mahodayodayāt
analyzed: evam sa nirviṇṇa manāḥ nṛpaḥ gṛhāt niśīthe utthāya mahodaya udayāt

original: BhP_04.13.047/2 alabdha-nidro 'nupalakṣito nṛbhir hitvā gato vena-suvaṃ prasuptām
analyzed: a labdha nidraḥ anupalakṣitaḥ nṛbhiḥ hitvā gataḥ vena suvam prasuptām

original: BhP_04.13.048/1 vijñāya nirvidya gataṃ patiṃ prajāḥ purohitāmātya-suhṛd-gaṇādayaḥ
analyzed: vijñāya nirvidya gatam patim prajāḥ purohita amātya suhṛd gaṇa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.048/2 vicikyur urvyām atiśoka-kātarā yathā nigūḍhaṃ puruṣaṃ kuyoginaḥ
analyzed: vicikyuḥ urvyām ati śoka kātarāḥ yathā nigūḍham puruṣam ku yoginaḥ

original: BhP_04.13.049/1 alakṣayantaḥ padavīṃ prajāpater hatodyamāḥ pratyupasṛtya te purīm
analyzed: a lakṣayantaḥ padavīm prajāpateḥ hata udyamāḥ pratyupasṛtya te purīm

original: BhP_04.13.049/2 ṛṣīn sametān abhivandya sāśravo nyavedayan paurava bhartṛ-viplavam
analyzed: ṛṣīn sametān abhivandya sa aśravaḥ nyavedayan paurava bhartṛ viplavam

original: BhP_04.14.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.14.001/1 bhṛgv-ādayas te munayo lokānāṃ kṣema-darśinaḥ
analyzed: bhṛgu ādayaḥ te munayaḥ lokānām kṣema darśinaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.001/2 goptary asati vai nṝṇāṃ paśyantaḥ paśu-sāmyatām
analyzed: goptari asati vai nṝṇām paśyantaḥ paśu sāmya tām

original: BhP_04.14.002/1 vīra-mātaram āhūya sunīthāṃ brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: vīra mātaram āhūya sunīthām brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.002/2 prakṛty-asammataṃ venam abhyaṣiñcan patiṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: prakṛtya sammatam venam abhyaṣiñcan patim bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.003/1 śrutvā nṛpāsana-gataṃ venam atyugra-śāsanam
analyzed: śrutvā nṛpāsana gatam venam ati ugra śāsanam

original: BhP_04.14.003/2 nililyur dasyavaḥ sadyaḥ sarpa-trastā ivākhavaḥ
analyzed: nililyuḥ dasyavaḥ sadyas sarpa trastāḥ iva ākhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.004/1 sa ārūḍha-nṛpa-sthāna unnaddho 'ṣṭa-vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ārūḍha nṛpa sthāne unnaddhaḥ aṣṭa vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.14.004/2 avamene mahā-bhāgān stabdhaḥ sambhāvitaḥ svataḥ
analyzed: avamene mahābhāgān stabdhaḥ sambhāvitaḥ svataḥ

original: BhP_04.14.005/1 evaṃ madāndha utsikto niraṅkuśa iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: evam mada andhaḥ utsiktaḥ niraṅkuśaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.005/2 paryaṭan ratham āsthāya kampayann iva rodasī
analyzed: paryaṭan ratham āsthāya kampayan iva rodasī

original: BhP_04.14.006/1 na yaṣṭavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ na hotavyaṃ dvijāḥ kvacit
analyzed: na yaṣṭavyam na dātavyam na hotavyam dvijāḥ kvacid

original: BhP_04.14.006/2 iti nyavārayad dharmaṃ bherī-ghoṣeṇa sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: iti nyavārayat dharmam bherī ghoṣeṇa sarvaśas

original: BhP_04.14.007/1 venasyāvekṣya munayo durvṛttasya viceṣṭitam
analyzed: venasya avekṣya munayaḥ durvṛttasya viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_04.14.007/2 vimṛśya loka-vyasanaṃ kṛpayocuḥ sma satriṇaḥ
analyzed: vimṛśya loka vyasanam kṛpayā ūcuḥ sma satriṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.008/1 aho ubhayataḥ prāptaṃ lokasya vyasanaṃ mahat
analyzed: aho ubhayatas prāptam lokasya vyasanam mahat

original: BhP_04.14.008/2 dāruṇy ubhayato dīpte iva taskara-pālayoḥ
analyzed: dāruṇī ubhayatas dīpte iva taskara pālayoḥ

original: BhP_04.14.009/1 arājaka-bhayād eṣa kṛto rājātad-arhaṇaḥ
analyzed: arājaka bhayāt eṣa kṛtaḥ rājā a tad arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.009/2 tato 'py āsīd bhayaṃ tv adya kathaṃ syāt svasti dehinām
analyzed: tatas api āsīt bhayam tu adya katham syāt svasti dehinām

original: BhP_04.14.010/1 aher iva payaḥ-poṣaḥ poṣakasyāpy anartha-bhṛt
analyzed: aheḥ iva payaḥ poṣaḥ poṣakasya api anartha bhṛt

original: BhP_04.14.010/2 venaḥ prakṛtyaiva khalaḥ sunīthā-garbha-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: venaḥ prakṛtyā eva khalaḥ sunīthā garbha sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.011/1 nirūpitaḥ prajā-pālaḥ sa jighāṃsati vai prajāḥ
analyzed: nirūpitaḥ prajāpālaḥ sa jighāṃsati vai prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.14.011/2 tathāpi sāntvayemāmuṃ nāsmāṃs tat-pātakaṃ spṛśet
analyzed: tathā api sāntvayema amum na asmān tad pātakam spṛśet

original: BhP_04.14.012/1 tad-vidvadbhir asad-vṛtto veno 'smābhiḥ kṛto nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tad vidvadbhiḥ asat vṛttaḥ venaḥ asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.012/2 sāntvito yadi no vācaṃ na grahīṣyaty adharma-kṛt
analyzed: sāntvitaḥ yadi naḥ vācam na grahīṣyati adharma kṛt

original: BhP_04.14.013/1 loka-dhikkāra-sandagdhaṃ dahiṣyāmaḥ sva-tejasā
analyzed: loka dhikkāra sandagdham dahiṣyāmaḥ sva tejasā

original: BhP_04.14.013/2 evam adhyavasāyainaṃ munayo gūḍha-manyavaḥ
analyzed: evam adhyavasāya enam munayaḥ gūḍha manyavaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.013/3 upavrajyābruvan venaṃ sāntvayitvā ca sāmabhiḥ
analyzed: upavrajya abruvan venam sāntvayitvā ca sāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.14.014/0 munaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: munayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.14.014/1 nṛpa-varya nibodhaitad yat te vijñāpayāma bhoḥ
analyzed: nṛpa varya nibodha etat yat te vijñāpayāma bhoḥ

original: BhP_04.14.014/2 āyuḥ-śrī-bala-kīrtīnāṃ tava tāta vivardhanam
analyzed: āyuḥ śrī bala kīrtīnām tava tāta vivardhanam

original: BhP_04.14.015/1 dharma ācaritaḥ puṃsāṃ vāṅ-manaḥ-kāya-buddhibhiḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ ācaritaḥ puṃsām vāc manaḥ kāya buddhibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.14.015/2 lokān viśokān vitaraty athānantyam asaṅginām
analyzed: lokān viśokān vitarati atha ānantyam asaṅginām

original: BhP_04.14.016/1 sa te mā vinaśed vīra prajānāṃ kṣema-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa te mā vinaśet vīra prajānām kṣema lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.016/2 yasmin vinaṣṭe nṛpatir aiśvaryād avarohati
analyzed: yasmin vinaṣṭe nṛpatiḥ aiśvaryāt avarohati

original: BhP_04.14.017/1 rājann asādhv-amātyebhyaś corādibhyaḥ prajā nṛpaḥ
analyzed: rājan asādhu amātyebhyaḥ cora ādibhyaḥ prajāḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.017/2 rakṣan yathā baliṃ gṛhṇann iha pretya ca modate
analyzed: rakṣan yathā balim gṛhṇan iha pretya ca modate

original: BhP_04.14.018/1 yasya rāṣṭre pure caiva bhagavān yajña-pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: yasya rāṣṭre pure ca eva bhagavān yajñapūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.018/2 ijyate svena dharmeṇa janair varṇāśramānvitaiḥ
analyzed: ijyate svena dharmeṇa janaiḥ varṇa āśrama anvitaiḥ

original: BhP_04.14.019/1 tasya rājño mahā-bhāga bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: tasya rājñaḥ mahābhāga bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.019/2 parituṣyati viśvātmā tiṣṭhato nija-śāsane
analyzed: parituṣyati viśvātmā tiṣṭhataḥ nija śāsane

original: BhP_04.14.020/1 tasmiṃs tuṣṭe kim aprāpyaṃjagatām īśvareśvare
analyzed: tasmin tuṣṭe kim a prāpyam jagatām īśvara īśvare

original: BhP_04.14.020/2 lokāḥ sapālā hy etasmai haranti balim ādṛtāḥ
analyzed: lokāḥ sa pālāḥ hi etasmai haranti balim ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_04.14.021/1 taṃ sarva-lokāmara-yajña-saṅgrahaṃ trayīmayaṃ dravyamayaṃ tapomayam
analyzed: tam sarva loka amara yajña saṅgraham trayī mayam dravya mayam tapaḥ mayam

original: BhP_04.14.021/2 yajñair vicitrair yajato bhavāya te rājan sva-deśān anuroddhum arhasi
analyzed: yajñaiḥ vicitraiḥ yajataḥ bhavāya te rājan sva deśān anuroddhum arhasi

original: BhP_04.14.022/1 yajñena yuṣmad-viṣaye dvijātibhir vitāyamānena surāḥ kalā hareḥ
analyzed: yajñena yuṣmat viṣaye dvijātibhiḥ vitāyamānena surāḥ kalāḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_04.14.022/2 sviṣṭāḥ sutuṣṭāḥ pradiśanti vāñchitaṃ tad-dhelanaṃ nārhasi vīra ceṣṭitum
analyzed: su iṣṭāḥ su tuṣṭāḥ pradiśanti vāñchitam tad helanam na arhasi vīra ceṣṭitum

original: BhP_04.14.023/0 vena uvāca
analyzed: venaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.14.023/1 bāliśā bata yūyaṃ vā adharme dharma-māninaḥ
analyzed: bāliśāḥ bata yūyam vai adharme dharma māninaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.023/2 ye vṛttidaṃ patiṃ hitvā jāraṃ patim upāsate
analyzed: ye vṛtti dam patim hitvā jāram patim upāsate

original: BhP_04.14.024/1 avajānanty amī mūḍhā nṛpa-rūpiṇam īśvaram
analyzed: avajānanti amī mūḍhāḥ nṛpa rūpiṇam īśvaram

original: BhP_04.14.024/2 nānuvindanti te bhadram iha loke paratra ca
analyzed: na anuvindanti te bhadram iha loke paratra ca

original: BhP_04.14.025/1 ko yajña-puruṣo nāma yatra vo bhaktir īdṛśī
analyzed: kaḥ yajñapuruṣaḥ nāma yatra vaḥ bhaktiḥ īdṛśī

original: BhP_04.14.025/2 bhartṛ-sneha-vidūrāṇāṃ yathā jāre kuyoṣitām
analyzed: bhartṛ sneha vidūrāṇām yathā jāre ku yoṣitām

original: BhP_04.14.026/1 viṣṇur viriñco giriśa indro vāyur yamo raviḥ
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ viriñcaḥ giriśaḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ yamaḥ raviḥ

original: BhP_04.14.026/2 parjanyo dhanadaḥ somaḥ kṣitir agnir apāmpatiḥ
analyzed: parjanyaḥ dhanadaḥ somaḥ kṣitiḥ agniḥ apāmpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.14.027/1 ete cānye ca vibudhāḥ prabhavo vara-śāpayoḥ
analyzed: ete ca anye ca vibudhāḥ prabhavaḥ vara śāpayoḥ

original: BhP_04.14.027/2 dehe bhavanti nṛpateḥ sarva-devamayo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: dehe bhavanti nṛpateḥ sarva deva mayaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.028/1 tasmān māṃ karmabhir viprā yajadhvaṃ gata-matsarāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt mām karmabhiḥ viprāḥ yajadhvam gata matsarāḥ

original: BhP_04.14.028/2 baliṃ ca mahyaṃ harata matto 'nyaḥ ko 'gra-bhuk pumān
analyzed: balim ca mahyam harata mattaḥ anyaḥ kaḥ agra bhuj pumān

original: BhP_04.14.029/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.14.029/1 itthaṃ viparyaya-matiḥ pāpīyān utpathaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: ittham viparyaya matiḥ pāpīyān utpatham gataḥ

original: BhP_04.14.029/2 anunīyamānas tad-yācñāṃ na cakre bhraṣṭa-maṅgalaḥ
analyzed: anunīyamānaḥ tad yācñām na cakre bhraṣṭa maṅgalaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.030/1 iti te 'sat-kṛtās tena dvijāḥ paṇḍita-māninā
analyzed: iti te asatkṛtāḥ tena dvijāḥ paṇḍita māninā

original: BhP_04.14.030/2 bhagnāyāṃ bhavya-yācñāyāṃ tasmai vidura cukrudhuḥ
analyzed: bhagnāyām bhavya yācñāyām tasmai vidura cukrudhuḥ

original: BhP_04.14.031/1 hanyatāṃ hanyatām eṣa pāpaḥ prakṛti-dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: hanyatām hanyatām eṣa pāpaḥ prakṛti dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.031/2 jīvan jagad asāv āśu kurute bhasmasād dhruvam
analyzed: jīvan jagat asau āśu kurute bhasmasāt dhruvam

original: BhP_04.14.032/1 nāyam arhaty asad-vṛtto naradeva-varāsanam
analyzed: na ayam arhati a sat vṛttaḥ naradeva varāsanam

original: BhP_04.14.032/2 yo 'dhiyajña-patiṃ viṣṇuṃ vinindaty anapatrapaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ adhiyajña patim viṣṇum vinindati anapatrapaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.033/1 ko vainaṃ paricakṣīta venam ekam ṛte 'śubham
analyzed: kaḥ vā enam paricakṣīta venam ekam ṛte aśubham

original: BhP_04.14.033/2 prāpta īdṛśam aiśvaryaṃ yad-anugraha-bhājanaḥ
analyzed: prāptaḥ īdṛśam aiśvaryam yat anugraha bhājanaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.034/1 itthaṃ vyavasitā hantum ṛṣayo rūḍha-manyavaḥ
analyzed: ittham vyavasitāḥ hantum ṛṣayaḥ rūḍha manyavaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.034/2 nijaghnur huṅkṛtair venaṃ hatam acyuta-nindayā
analyzed: nijaghnuḥ huṅkṛtaiḥ venam hatam acyuta nindayā

original: BhP_04.14.035/1 ṛṣibhiḥ svāśrama-padaṃ gate putra-kalevaram
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ sva āśrama padam gate putra kalevaram

original: BhP_04.14.035/2 sunīthā pālayām āsa vidyā-yogena śocatī
analyzed: sunīthā pālayām āsa vidyā yogena śocatī

original: BhP_04.14.036/1 ekadā munayas te tu sarasvat-salilāplutāḥ
analyzed: ekadā munayaḥ te tu sarasvat salila āplutāḥ

original: BhP_04.14.036/2 hutvāgnīn sat-kathāś cakrur upaviṣṭāḥ sarit-taṭe
analyzed: hutvā agnīn sat kathāḥ cakruḥ upaviṣṭāḥ sarit taṭe

original: BhP_04.14.037/1 vīkṣyotthitāṃs tadotpātān āhur loka-bhayaṅkarān
analyzed: vīkṣya utthitān tadā utpātān āhuḥ loka bhayaṅkarān

original: BhP_04.14.037/2 apy abhadram anāthāyā dasyubhyo na bhaved bhuvaḥ
analyzed: api abhadram anāthāyāḥ dasyubhyaḥ na bhavet bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.038/1 evaṃ mṛśanta ṛṣayo dhāvatāṃ sarvato-diśam
analyzed: evam mṛśantaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dhāvatām sarvatodiśam

original: BhP_04.14.038/2 pāṃsuḥ samutthito bhūriś corāṇām abhilumpatām
analyzed: pāṃsuḥ samutthitaḥ bhūriḥ corāṇām abhilumpatām

original: BhP_04.14.039/1 tad upadravam ājñāya lokasya vasu lumpatām
analyzed: tat upadravam ājñāya lokasya vasu lumpatām

original: BhP_04.14.039/2 bhartary uparate tasminn anyonyaṃ ca jighāṃsatām
analyzed: bhartari uparate tasmin anyonyam ca jighāṃsatām

original: BhP_04.14.040/1 cora-prāyaṃ jana-padaṃ hīna-sattvam arājakam
analyzed: cora prāyam janapadam hīna sattvam arājakam

original: BhP_04.14.040/2 lokān nāvārayañ chaktā api tad-doṣa-darśinaḥ
analyzed: lokān na avārayam śaktāḥ api tad doṣa darśinaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.041/1 brāhmaṇaḥ sama-dṛk śānto dīnānāṃ samupekṣakaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ samadṛś śāntaḥ dīnānām samupekṣakaḥ

original: BhP_04.14.041/2 sravate brahma tasyāpi bhinna-bhāṇḍāt payo yathā
analyzed: sravate brahma tasya api bhinna bhāṇḍāt payaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.14.042/1 nāṅgasya vaṃśo rājarṣer eṣa saṃsthātum arhati
analyzed: na aṅgasya vaṃśaḥ rājarṣeḥ eṣa saṃsthātum arhati

original: BhP_04.14.042/2 amogha-vīryā hi nṛpā vaṃśe 'smin keśavāśrayāḥ
analyzed: amogha vīryāḥ hi nṛpāḥ vaṃśe asmin keśava āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_04.14.043/1 viniścityaivam ṛṣayo vipannasya mahīpateḥ
analyzed: viniścitya evam ṛṣayaḥ vipannasya mahīpateḥ

original: BhP_04.14.043/2 mamanthur ūruṃ tarasā tatrāsīd bāhuko naraḥ
analyzed: mamanthuḥ ūrum tarasā tatra āsīt bāhukaḥ naraḥ

original: BhP_04.14.044/1 kāka-kṛṣṇo 'tihrasvāṅgo hrasva-bāhur mahā-hanuḥ
analyzed: kāka kṛṣṇaḥ ati hrasva aṅgaḥ hrasva bāhuḥ mahā hanuḥ

original: BhP_04.14.044/2 hrasva-pān nimna-nāsāgro raktākṣas tāmra-mūrdhajaḥ
BhP_04.14.045/1 taṃ tu te 'vanataṃ dīnaṃ kiṃ karomīti vādinam
analyzed: tam tu te avanatam dīnam kim karomi iti vādinam

original: BhP_04.14.045/2 niṣīdety abruvaṃs tāta sa niṣādas tato 'bhavat
analyzed: niṣīda iti abruvan tāta sa niṣādaḥ tatas abhavat

original: BhP_04.14.046/1 tasya vaṃśyās tu naiṣādā giri-kānana-gocarāḥ
analyzed: tasya vaṃśyāḥ tu naiṣādāḥ giri kānana gocarāḥ

original: BhP_04.14.046/2 yenāharaj jāyamāno vena-kalmaṣam ulbaṇam
analyzed: yena aharat jāyamānaḥ vena kalmaṣam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_04.15.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.15.001/1 atha tasya punar viprair aputrasya mahīpateḥ
analyzed: atha tasya punar vipraiḥ aputrasya mahīpateḥ

original: BhP_04.15.001/2 bāhubhyāṃ mathyamānābhyāṃ mithunaṃ samapadyata
analyzed: bāhubhyām mathyamānābhyām mithunam samapadyata

original: BhP_04.15.002/1 tad dṛṣṭvā mithunaṃ jātam ṛṣayo brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā mithunam jātam ṛṣayaḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.002/2 ūcuḥ parama-santuṣṭā viditvā bhagavat-kalām
analyzed: ūcuḥ parama santuṣṭāḥ viditvā bhagavat kalām

original: BhP_04.15.003/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.15.003/1 eṣa viṣṇor bhagavataḥ kalā bhuvana-pālinī
analyzed: eṣa viṣṇoḥ bhagavataḥ kalā bhuvana pālinī

original: BhP_04.15.003/2 iyaṃ ca lakṣmyāḥ sambhūtiḥ puruṣasyānapāyinī
analyzed: iyam ca lakṣmyāḥ sambhūtiḥ puruṣasya anapāyinī

original: BhP_04.15.004/1 ayaṃ tu prathamo rājñāṃ pumān prathayitā yaśaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu prathamaḥ rājñām pumān prathayitā yaśaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.004/2 pṛthur nāma mahārājo bhaviṣyati pṛthu-śravāḥ
analyzed: pṛthuḥ nāma mahā rājaḥ bhaviṣyati pṛthu śravāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.005/1 iyaṃ ca sudatī devī guṇa-bhūṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇā
analyzed: iyam ca sudatī devī guṇa bhūṣaṇa bhūṣaṇā

original: BhP_04.15.005/2 arcir nāma varārohā pṛthum evāvarundhatī
analyzed: arciḥ nāma varārohā pṛthum eva avarundhatī

original: BhP_04.15.006/1 eṣa sākṣād dharer aṃśojāto loka-rirakṣayā
analyzed: eṣa sākṣāt hareḥ aṃśaḥ jātaḥ loka rirakṣayā

original: BhP_04.15.006/2 iyaṃ ca tat-parā hi śrīr anujajñe 'napāyinī
analyzed: iyam ca tad parā hi śrīḥ anujajñe anapāyinī

original: BhP_04.15.007/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.15.007/1 praśaṃsanti sma taṃ viprā gandharva-pravarā jaguḥ
analyzed: praśaṃsanti sma tam viprāḥ gandharva pravarāḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_04.15.007/2 mumucuḥ sumano-dhārāḥ siddhā nṛtyanti svaḥ-striyaḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ sumanaḥ dhārāḥ siddhāḥ nṛtyanti svaḥstriyaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.008/1 śaṅkha-tūrya-mṛdaṅgādyā nedur dundubhayo divi
analyzed: śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅga ādyāḥ neduḥ dundubhayaḥ divi

original: BhP_04.15.008/2 tatra sarva upājagmur devarṣi-pitṝṇāṃ gaṇāḥ
analyzed: tatra sarve upājagmuḥ deva ṛṣi pitṝṇām gaṇāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.009/1 brahmā jagad-gurur devaiḥ sahāsṛtya sureśvaraiḥ
analyzed: brahmā jagadguruḥ devaiḥ saha āsṛtya sura īśvaraiḥ

original: BhP_04.15.009/2 vainyasya dakṣiṇe haste dṛṣṭvā cihnaṃ gadābhṛtaḥ
analyzed: vainyasya dakṣiṇe haste dṛṣṭvā cihnam gadābhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.010/1 pādayor aravindaṃ ca taṃ vai mene hareḥ kalām
analyzed: pādayoḥ aravindam ca tam vai mene hareḥ kalām

original: BhP_04.15.010/2 yasyāpratihataṃ cakram aṃśaḥ sa parameṣṭhinaḥ
analyzed: yasya apratihatam cakram aṃśaḥ sa parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.011/1 tasyābhiṣeka ārabdho brāhmaṇair brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: tasya abhiṣekaḥ ārabdhaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.15.011/2 ābhiṣecanikāny asmai ājahruḥ sarvato janāḥ
analyzed: ābhiṣecanikāni asmai ājahruḥ sarvatas janāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.012/1 sarit-samudrā girayo nāgā gāvaḥ khagā mṛgāḥ
analyzed: sarit samudrāḥ girayaḥ nāgāḥ gāvaḥ khagāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.012/2 dyauḥ kṣitiḥ sarva-bhūtāni samājahrur upāyanam
analyzed: dyauḥ kṣitiḥ sarva bhūtāni samājahruḥ upāyanam

original: BhP_04.15.013/1 so 'bhiṣikto mahārājaḥ suvāsāḥ sādhv-alaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: saḥ abhiṣiktaḥ mahā rājaḥ su vāsāḥ sādhu alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.013/2 patnyārciṣālaṅkṛtayā vireje 'gnir ivāparaḥ
analyzed: patnyā arciṣā alaṅkṛtayā vireje agniḥ iva aparaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.014/1 tasmai jahāra dhanado haimaṃ vīra varāsanam
analyzed: tasmai jahāra dhanadaḥ haimam vīra varāsanam

original: BhP_04.15.014/2 varuṇaḥ salila-srāvam ātapatraṃ śaśi-prabham
analyzed: varuṇaḥ salila srāvam ātapatram śaśi prabham

original: BhP_04.15.015/1 vāyuś ca vāla-vyajane dharmaḥ kīrtimayīṃ srajam
analyzed: vāyuḥ ca vāla vyajane dharmaḥ kīrti mayīm srajam

original: BhP_04.15.015/2 indraḥ kirīṭam utkṛṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ saṃyamanaṃ yamaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ kirīṭam utkṛṣṭam daṇḍam saṃyamanam yamaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.016/1 brahmā brahmamayaṃ varma bhāratī hāram uttamam
analyzed: brahmā brahma mayam varma bhāratī hāram uttamam

original: BhP_04.15.016/2 hariḥ sudarśanaṃ cakraṃ tat-patny avyāhatāṃ śriyam
analyzed: hariḥ sudarśanam cakram tad patnī avyāhatām śriyam

original: BhP_04.15.017/1 daśa-candram asiṃ rudraḥ śata-candraṃ tathāmbikā
analyzed: daśa candram asim rudraḥ śata candram tathā ambikā

original: BhP_04.15.017/2 somo 'mṛtamayān aśvāṃs tvaṣṭā rūpāśrayaṃ ratham
analyzed: somaḥ amṛta mayān aśvān tvaṣṭā rūpa āśrayam ratham

original: BhP_04.15.018/1 agnir āja-gavaṃ cāpaṃ sūryo raśmimayān iṣūn
analyzed: agniḥ ājagavam cāpam sūryaḥ raśmi mayān iṣūn

original: BhP_04.15.018/2 bhūḥ pāduke yogamayyau dyauḥ puṣpāvalim anvaham
analyzed: bhūḥ pāduke yoga mayyau dyauḥ puṣpa āvalim anvaham

original: BhP_04.15.019/1 nāṭyaṃ sugītaṃ vāditram antardhānaṃ ca khecarāḥ
analyzed: nāṭyam su gītam vāditram antardhānam ca khecarāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.019/2 ṛṣayaś cāśiṣaḥ satyāḥ samudraḥ śaṅkham ātmajam
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ samudraḥ śaṅkham ātma jam

original: BhP_04.15.020/1 sindhavaḥ parvatā nadyo ratha-vīthīr mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: sindhavaḥ parvatāḥ nadyaḥ ratha vīthīḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.020/2 sūto 'tha māgadho vandī taṃ stotum upatasthire
analyzed: sūtaḥ atha māgadhaḥ vandī tam stotum upatasthire

original: BhP_04.15.021/1 stāvakāṃs tān abhipretya pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: stāvakān tān abhipretya pṛthuḥ vainyaḥ pratāpavān

original: BhP_04.15.021/2 megha-nirhrādayā vācā prahasann idam abravīt
analyzed: megha nirhrādayā vācā prahasan idam abravīt

original: BhP_04.15.022/0 pṛthur uvāca
analyzed: pṛthuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.15.022/1 bhoḥ sūta he māgadha saumya vandin loke 'dhunāspaṣṭa-guṇasya me syāt
analyzed: bhoḥ sūta he māgadha saumya vandin loke adhunā aspaṣṭa guṇasya me syāt

original: BhP_04.15.022/2 kim āśrayo me stava eṣa yojyatāṃ mā mayy abhūvan vitathā giro vaḥ
analyzed: kim āśrayaḥ me stavaḥ eṣa yojyatām mā mayi abhūvan vitathāḥ giraḥ vaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.023/1 tasmāt parokṣe 'smad-upaśrutāny alaṃ kariṣyatha stotram apīcya-vācaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt parokṣe asmad upaśrutāni alam kariṣyatha stotram apīcya vācaḥ

original: BhP_04.15.023/2 saty uttamaśloka-guṇānuvāde jugupsitaṃ na stavayanti sabhyāḥ
analyzed: sati uttamaśloka guṇa anuvāde jugupsitam na stavayanti sabhyāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.024/1 mahad-guṇān ātmani kartum īśaḥ kaḥ stāvakaiḥ stāvayate 'sato 'pi
analyzed: mahat guṇān ātmani kartum īśaḥ kaḥ stāvakaiḥ stāvayate asataḥ api

original: BhP_04.15.024/2 te 'syābhaviṣyann iti vipralabdho janāvahāsaṃ kumatir na veda
analyzed: te asya abhaviṣyan iti vipralabdhaḥ jana avahāsam kumatiḥ na veda

original: BhP_04.15.025/1 prabhavo hy ātmanaḥ stotraṃjugupsanty api viśrutāḥ
analyzed: prabhavaḥ hi ātmanaḥ stotram jugupsanti api viśrutāḥ

original: BhP_04.15.025/2 hrīmantaḥ paramodārāḥ pauruṣaṃ vā vigarhitam
analyzed: hrīmantaḥ parama udārāḥ pauruṣam vā vigarhitam

original: BhP_04.15.026/1 vayaṃ tv aviditā loke sūtādyāpi varīmabhiḥ
analyzed: vayam tu aviditāḥ loke sūta adya api varīmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.15.026/2 karmabhiḥ katham ātmānaṃ gāpayiṣyāma bālavat
analyzed: karmabhiḥ katham ātmānam gāpayiṣyāma bāla vat

original: BhP_04.16.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.16.001/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ gāyakā muni-coditāḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam nṛpatim gāyakāḥ muni coditāḥ

original: BhP_04.16.001/2 tuṣṭuvus tuṣṭa-manasas tad-vāg-amṛta-sevayā
analyzed: tuṣṭuvuḥ tuṣṭa manasaḥ tad vāc amṛta sevayā

original: BhP_04.16.002/1 nālaṃ vayaṃ te mahimānuvarṇane yo deva-varyo 'vatatāra māyayā
analyzed: na alam vayam te mahima anuvarṇane yaḥ deva varyaḥ avatatāra māyayā

original: BhP_04.16.002/2 venāṅga-jātasya ca pauruṣāṇi te vācas-patīnām api babhramur dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vena aṅga jātasya ca pauruṣāṇi te vācaspatīnām api babhramuḥ dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.003/1 athāpy udāra-śravasaḥ pṛthor hareḥ kalāvatārasya kathāmṛtādṛtāḥ
analyzed: athā api udāra śravasaḥ pṛthoḥ hareḥ kalā avatārasya kathā amṛta ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_04.16.003/2 yathopadeśaṃ munibhiḥ pracoditāḥ ślāghyāni karmāṇi vayaṃ vitanmahi
analyzed: yathopadeśam munibhiḥ pracoditāḥ ślāghyāni karmāṇi vayam vitanmahi

original: BhP_04.16.004/1 eṣa dharma-bhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho lokaṃ dharme 'nuvartayan
analyzed: eṣa dharma bhṛtām śreṣṭhaḥ lokam dharme anuvartayan

original: BhP_04.16.004/2 goptā ca dharma-setūnāṃ śāstā tat-paripanthinām
analyzed: goptā ca dharma setūnām śāstā tad paripanthinām

original: BhP_04.16.005/1 eṣa vai loka-pālānāṃ bibharty ekas tanau tanūḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai lokapālānām bibharti ekaḥ tanau tanūḥ

original: BhP_04.16.005/2 kāle kāle yathā-bhāgaṃ lokayor ubhayor hitam
analyzed: kāle kāle yathābhāgam lokayoḥ ubhayoḥ hitam

original: BhP_04.16.006/1 vasu kāla upādatte kāle cāyaṃ vimuñcati
analyzed: vasu kāle upādatte kāle ca ayam vimuñcati

original: BhP_04.16.006/2 samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu pratapan sūryavad vibhuḥ
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu pratapan sūrya vat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.16.007/1 titikṣaty akramaṃ vainya upary ākramatām api
analyzed: titikṣati akramam vainyaḥ upari ākramatām api

original: BhP_04.16.007/2 bhūtānāṃ karuṇaḥ śaśvad ārtānāṃ kṣiti-vṛttimān
analyzed: bhūtānām karuṇaḥ śaśvat ārtānām kṣiti vṛttimān

original: BhP_04.16.008/1 deve 'varṣaty asau devo naradeva-vapur hariḥ
analyzed: deve a varṣati asau devaḥ naradeva vapuḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_04.16.008/2 kṛcchra-prāṇāḥ prajā hy eṣa rakṣiṣyaty añjasendravat
analyzed: kṛcchra prāṇāḥ prajāḥ hi eṣa rakṣiṣyati añjasā indra vat

original: BhP_04.16.009/1 āpyāyayaty asau lokaṃ vadanāmṛta-mūrtinā
analyzed: āpyāyayati asau lokam vadana amṛta mūrtinā

original: BhP_04.16.009/2 sānurāgāvalokena viśada-smita-cāruṇā
analyzed: sa anurāga avalokena viśada smita cāruṇā

original: BhP_04.16.010/1 avyakta-vartmaiṣa nigūḍha-kāryo gambhīra-vedhā upagupta-vittaḥ
analyzed: avyakta vartmā eṣa nigūḍha kāryaḥ gambhīra vedhāḥ upagupta vittaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.010/2 ananta-māhātmya-guṇaika-dhāmā pṛthuḥ pracetā iva saṃvṛtātmā
analyzed: ananta māhātmya guṇa eka dhāmā pṛthuḥ pracetāḥ iva saṃvṛta ātmā

original: BhP_04.16.011/1 durāsado durviṣaha āsanno 'pi vidūravat
analyzed: durāsadaḥ durviṣahaḥ āsannaḥ api vidūra vat

original: BhP_04.16.011/2 naivābhibhavituṃ śakyo venāraṇy-utthito 'nalaḥ
analyzed: na eva abhibhavitum śakyaḥ vena araṇi utthitaḥ analaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.012/1 antar bahiś ca bhūtānāṃ paśyan karmāṇi cāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: antar bahis ca bhūtānām paśyan karmāṇi cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.16.012/2 udāsīna ivādhyakṣo vāyur ātmeva dehinām
analyzed: udāsīnaḥ iva adhyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ ātmā iva dehinām

original: BhP_04.16.013/1 nādaṇḍyaṃ daṇḍayaty eṣa sutam ātma-dviṣām api
analyzed: na a daṇḍyam daṇḍayati eṣa sutam ātma dviṣām api

original: BhP_04.16.013/2 daṇḍayaty ātmajam api daṇḍyaṃ dharma-pathe sthitaḥ
analyzed: daṇḍayati ātmajam api daṇḍyam dharma pathe sthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.014/1 asyāpratihataṃ cakraṃ pṛthor āmānasācalāt
analyzed: asya apratihatam cakram pṛthoḥ ā mānasa acalāt

original: BhP_04.16.014/2 vartate bhagavān arko yāvat tapati go-gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: vartate bhagavān arkaḥ yāvat tapati go gaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.16.015/1 rañjayiṣyati yal lokam ayam ātma-viceṣṭitaiḥ
analyzed: rañjayiṣyati yat lokam ayam ātma viceṣṭitaiḥ

original: BhP_04.16.015/2 athāmum āhū rājānaṃ mano-rañjanakaiḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: atha amum āhuḥ rājānam manaḥ rañjanakaiḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.16.016/1 dṛḍha-vrataḥ satya-sandho brahmaṇyo vṛddha-sevakaḥ
BhP_04.16.016/2 śaraṇyaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ mānado dīna-vatsalaḥ
BhP_04.16.017/1 mātṛ-bhaktiḥ para-strīṣu patnyām ardha ivātmanaḥ
analyzed: mātṛ bhaktiḥ para strīṣu patnyām ardhaḥ iva ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.017/2 prajāsu pitṛvat snigdhaḥ kiṅkaro brahma-vādinām
analyzed: prajāsu pitṛ vat snigdhaḥ kiṅkaraḥ brahma vādinām

original: BhP_04.16.018/1 dehinām ātmavat-preṣṭhaḥ suhṛdāṃ nandi-vardhanaḥ
analyzed: dehinām ātma vat preṣṭhaḥ suhṛdām nandi vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.018/2 mukta-saṅga-prasaṅgo 'yaṃ daṇḍa-pāṇir asādhuṣu
analyzed: mukta saṅga prasaṅgaḥ ayam daṇḍa pāṇiḥ asādhuṣu

original: BhP_04.16.019/1 ayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ kūṭa-stha ātmā kalayāvatīrṇaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu sākṣāt bhagavān tryadhīśaḥ kūṭasthaḥ ātmā kalayā avatīrṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.019/2 yasminn avidyā-racitaṃ nirarthakaṃ paśyanti nānātvam api pratītam
analyzed: yasmin avidyā racitam nirarthakam paśyanti nānātvam api pratītam

original: BhP_04.16.020/1 ayaṃ bhuvo maṇḍalam odayādrer goptaika-vīro naradeva-nāthaḥ
analyzed: ayam bhuvaḥ maṇḍalam ā udaya adreḥ goptā eka vīraḥ naradeva nāthaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.020/2 āsthāya jaitraṃ ratham ātta-cāpaḥ paryasyate dakṣiṇato yathārkaḥ
analyzed: āsthāya jaitram ratham ātta cāpaḥ paryasyate dakṣiṇatas yathā arkaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.021/1 asmai nṛ-pālāḥ kila tatra tatra baliṃ hariṣyanti saloka-pālāḥ
analyzed: asmai nṛpālāḥ kila tatra tatra balim hariṣyanti sa lokapālāḥ

original: BhP_04.16.021/2 maṃsyanta eṣāṃ striya ādi-rājaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ tad-yaśa uddharantyaḥ
analyzed: maṃsyante eṣām striyaḥ ādi rājam cakrāyudham tad yaśaḥ uddharantyaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.022/1 ayaṃ mahīṃ gāṃ duduhe 'dhirājaḥ prajāpatir vṛtti-karaḥ prajānām
analyzed: ayam mahīm gām duduhe adhirājaḥ prajāpatiḥ vṛtti karaḥ prajānām

original: BhP_04.16.022/2 yo līlayādrīn sva-śarāsa-koṭyā bhindan samāṃ gām akarod yathendraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ līlayā adrīn sva śarāsa koṭyā bhindan samām gām akarot yathā indraḥ

original: BhP_04.16.023/1 visphūrjayann āja-gavaṃ dhanuḥ svayaṃ yadācarat kṣmām aviṣahyam ājau
analyzed: visphūrjayan ājagavam dhanuḥ svayam yat ācarat kṣmām aviṣahyam ājau

original: BhP_04.16.023/2 tadā nililyur diśi diśy asanto lāṅgūlam udyamya yathā mṛgendraḥ
analyzed: tadā nililyuḥ diśi diśi asantaḥ lāṅgūlam udyamya yathā mṛgendraḥ

original: BhP_04.16.024/1 eṣo 'śvamedhāñ śatam ājahāra sarasvatī prādurabhāvi yatra
analyzed: eṣaḥ aśvamedhām śatam ājahāra sarasvatī prādurabhāvi yatra

original: BhP_04.16.024/2 ahārṣīd yasya hayaṃ purandaraḥ śata-kratuś carame vartamāne
analyzed: ahārṣīt yasya hayam purandaraḥ śatakratuḥ carame vartamāne

original: BhP_04.16.025/1 eṣa sva-sadmopavane sametya sanat-kumāraṃ bhagavantam ekam
analyzed: eṣa sva sadma upavane sametya sanatkumāram bhagavantam ekam

original: BhP_04.16.025/2 ārādhya bhaktyālabhatāmalaṃ taj jñānaṃ yato brahma paraṃ vidanti
analyzed: ārādhya bhaktyā ālabhatām alam tat jñānam yatas brahma param vidanti

original: BhP_04.16.026/1 tatra tatra giras tās tā iti viśruta-vikramaḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra giraḥ tāḥ tāḥ iti viśruta vikramaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.026/2 śroṣyaty ātmāśritā gāthāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ
analyzed: śroṣyati ātma āśritāḥ gāthāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu parākramaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.027/1 diśo vijityāpratiruddha-cakraḥ sva-tejasotpāṭita-loka-śalyaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ vijitya a pratiruddha cakraḥ sva tejasā utpāṭita loka śalyaḥ

original: BhP_04.16.027/2 surāsurendrair upagīyamāna- mahānubhāvo bhavitā patir bhuvaḥ
analyzed: sura asura indraiḥ upagīyamāna mahā anubhāvaḥ bhavitā patiḥ bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.001/1 evaṃ sa bhagavān vainyaḥ khyāpito guṇa-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: evam sa bhagavān vainyaḥ khyāpitaḥ guṇa karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.17.001/2 chandayām āsa tān kāmaiḥ pratipūjyābhinandya ca
analyzed: chandayām āsa tān kāmaiḥ pratipūjya abhinandya ca

original: BhP_04.17.002/1 brāhmaṇa-pramukhān varṇān bhṛtyāmātya-purodhasaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇa pramukhān varṇān bhṛtya amātya purodhasaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.002/2 paurān jāna-padān śreṇīḥ prakṛtīḥ samapūjayat
analyzed: paurān jānapadān śreṇīḥ prakṛtīḥ samapūjayat

original: BhP_04.17.003/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.003/1 kasmād dadhāra go-rūpaṃ dharitrī bahu-rūpiṇī
analyzed: kasmāt dadhāra go rūpam dharitrī bahu rūpiṇī

original: BhP_04.17.003/2 yāṃ dudoha pṛthus tatra ko vatso dohanaṃ ca kim
analyzed: yām dudoha pṛthuḥ tatra kaḥ vatsaḥ dohanam ca kim

original: BhP_04.17.004/1 prakṛtyā viṣamā devī kṛtā tena samā katham
analyzed: prakṛtyāḥ viṣamā devī kṛtā tena samā katham

original: BhP_04.17.004/2 tasya medhyaṃ hayaṃ devaḥ kasya hetor apāharat
analyzed: tasya medhyam hayam devaḥ kasya hetoḥ apāharat

original: BhP_04.17.005/1 sanat-kumārād bhagavato brahman brahma-vid-uttamāt
analyzed: sanatkumārāt bhagavataḥ brahman brahma vid uttamāt

original: BhP_04.17.005/2 labdhvā jñānaṃ sa-vijñānaṃ rājarṣiḥ kāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: labdhvā jñānam sa vijñānam rājarṣiḥ kām gatim gataḥ

original: BhP_04.17.006/1 yac cānyad api kṛṣṇasya bhavān bhagavataḥ prabhoḥ
analyzed: yat ca anyat api kṛṣṇasya bhavān bhagavataḥ prabhoḥ

original: BhP_04.17.006/2 śravaḥ suśravasaḥ puṇyaṃ pūrva-deha-kathāśrayam
analyzed: śravaḥ su śravasaḥ puṇyam pūrva deha kathā āśrayam

original: BhP_04.17.007/1 bhaktāya me 'nuraktāya tava cādhokṣajasya ca
analyzed: bhaktāya me anuraktāya tava ca adhokṣajasya ca

original: BhP_04.17.007/2 vaktum arhasi yo 'duhyad vainya-rūpeṇa gām imām
analyzed: vaktum arhasi yaḥ aduhyat vainya rūpeṇa gām imām

original: BhP_04.17.008/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.008/1 codito vidureṇaivaṃ vāsudeva-kathāṃ prati
analyzed: coditaḥ vidureṇa evam vāsudeva kathām prati

original: BhP_04.17.008/2 praśasya taṃ prīta-manā maitreyaḥ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: praśasya tam prīta manāḥ maitreyaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: BhP_04.17.009/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.009/1 yadābhiṣiktaḥ pṛthur aṅga viprair āmantrito janatāyāś ca pālaḥ
analyzed: yadā abhiṣiktaḥ pṛthuḥ aṅga vipraiḥ āmantritaḥ janatāyāḥ ca pālaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.009/2 prajā niranne kṣiti-pṛṣṭha etya kṣut-kṣāma-dehāḥ patim abhyavocan
analyzed: prajāḥ niranne kṣiti pṛṣṭhe etya kṣudh kṣāma dehāḥ patim abhyavocan

original: BhP_04.17.010/1 vayaṃ rājañ jāṭhareṇābhitaptā yathāgninā koṭara-sthena vṛkṣāḥ
analyzed: vayam rājam jāṭhareṇa abhitaptāḥ yathā agninā koṭara sthena vṛkṣāḥ

original: BhP_04.17.010/2 tvām adya yātāḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ yaḥ sādhito vṛtti-karaḥ patir naḥ
analyzed: tvām adya yātāḥ śaraṇam śaraṇyam yaḥ sādhitaḥ vṛtti karaḥ patiḥ naḥ

original: BhP_04.17.011/1 tan no bhavān īhatu rātave 'nnaṃ kṣudhārditānāṃ naradeva-deva
analyzed: tat naḥ bhavān īhatu rātave annam kṣudhā arditānām naradeva deva

original: BhP_04.17.011/2 yāvan na naṅkṣyāmaha ujjhitorjā vārtā-patis tvaṃ kila loka-pālaḥ
analyzed: yāvat na naṅkṣyāmahe ujjhita ūrjāḥ vārtā patiḥ tvam kila lokapālaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.012/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.012/1 pṛthuḥ prajānāṃ karuṇaṃ niśamya paridevitam
analyzed: pṛthuḥ prajānām karuṇam niśamya paridevitam

original: BhP_04.17.012/2 dīrghaṃ dadhyau kuruśreṣṭha nimittaṃ so 'nvapadyata
analyzed: dīrgham dadhyau kuru śreṣṭha nimittam saḥ anvapadyata

original: BhP_04.17.013/1 iti vyavasito buddhyā pragṛhīta-śarāsanaḥ
analyzed: iti vyavasitaḥ buddhyā pragṛhīta śarāsanaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.013/2 sandadhe viśikhaṃ bhūmeḥ kruddhas tripura-hā yathā
analyzed: sandadhe viśikham bhūmeḥ kruddhaḥ tripura hā yathā

original: BhP_04.17.014/1 pravepamānā dharaṇī niśāmyodāyudhaṃ ca tam
analyzed: pravepamānā dharaṇī niśāmya udāyudham ca tam

original: BhP_04.17.014/2 gauḥ saty apādravad bhītā mṛgīva mṛgayu-drutā
analyzed: gauḥ satī apādravat bhītā mṛgī iva mṛgayu drutā

original: BhP_04.17.015/1 tām anvadhāvat tad vainyaḥ kupito 'tyaruṇekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tām anvadhāvat tat vainyaḥ kupitaḥ ati aruṇa īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.015/2 śaraṃ dhanuṣi sandhāya yatra yatra palāyate
analyzed: śaram dhanuṣi sandhāya yatra yatra palāyate

original: BhP_04.17.016/1 sā diśo vidiśo devī rodasī cāntaraṃ tayoḥ
analyzed: sā diśaḥ vidiśaḥ devī rodasī ca antaram tayoḥ

original: BhP_04.17.016/2 dhāvantī tatra tatrainaṃ dadarśānūdyatāyudham
analyzed: dhāvantī tatra tatra enam dadarśa anūdyata āyudham

original: BhP_04.17.017/1 loke nāvindata trāṇaṃ vainyān mṛtyor iva prajāḥ
analyzed: loke na avindata trāṇam vainyāt mṛtyoḥ iva prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.17.017/2 trastā tadā nivavṛte hṛdayena vidūyatā
analyzed: trastā tadā nivavṛte hṛdayena vidūyatā

original: BhP_04.17.018/1 uvāca ca mahā-bhāgaṃ dharma-jñāpanna-vatsala
analyzed: uvāca ca mahābhāgam dharma jña āpanna vatsala

original: BhP_04.17.018/2 trāhi mām api bhūtānāṃ pālane 'vasthito bhavān
analyzed: trāhi mām api bhūtānām pālane avasthitaḥ bhavān

original: BhP_04.17.019/1 sa tvaṃ jighāṃsase kasmād dīnām akṛta-kilbiṣām
analyzed: sa tvam jighāṃsase kasmāt dīnām a kṛta kilbiṣām

original: BhP_04.17.019/2 ahaniṣyat kathaṃ yoṣāṃ dharma-jña iti yo mataḥ
analyzed: ahaniṣyat katham yoṣām dharma jñaḥ iti yaḥ mataḥ

original: BhP_04.17.020/1 praharanti na vai strīṣu kṛtāgaḥsv api jantavaḥ
analyzed: praharanti na vai strīṣu kṛta āgaḥsu api jantavaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.020/2 kim uta tvad-vidhā rājan karuṇā dīna-vatsalāḥ
analyzed: kim uta tvadvidhāḥ rājan karuṇāḥ dīna vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_04.17.021/1 māṃ vipāṭyājarāṃ nāvaṃ yatra viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: mām vipāṭya ajarām nāvam yatra viśvam pratiṣṭhitam

original: BhP_04.17.021/2 ātmānaṃ ca prajāś cemāḥ katham ambhasi dhāsyasi
analyzed: ātmānam ca prajāḥ ca imāḥ katham ambhasi dhāsyasi

original: BhP_04.17.022/0 pṛthur uvāca
analyzed: pṛthuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.022/1 vasudhe tvāṃ vadhiṣyāmi mac-chāsana-parāṅ-mukhīm
analyzed: vasudhe tvām vadhiṣyāmi mad śāsana parāṅmukhīm

original: BhP_04.17.022/2 bhāgaṃ barhiṣi yā vṛṅkte na tanoti ca no vasu
analyzed: bhāgam barhiṣi yā vṛṅkte na tanoti ca naḥ vasu

original: BhP_04.17.023/1 yavasaṃ jagdhy anudinaṃ naiva dogdhy audhasaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: yavasam jagdhi anudinam na eva dogdhi audhasam payaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.023/2 tasyām evaṃ hi duṣṭāyāṃ daṇḍo nātra na śasyate
analyzed: tasyām evam hi duṣṭāyām daṇḍaḥ na atra na śasyate

original: BhP_04.17.024/1 tvaṃ khalv oṣadhi-bījāni prāk sṛṣṭāni svayambhuvā
analyzed: tvam khalu oṣadhi bījāni prāk sṛṣṭāni svayambhuvā

original: BhP_04.17.024/2 na muñcasy ātma-ruddhāni mām avajñāya manda-dhīḥ
analyzed: na muñcasi ātma ruddhāni mām avajñāya manda dhīḥ

original: BhP_04.17.025/1 amūṣāṃ kṣut-parītānām ārtānāṃ paridevitam
analyzed: amūṣām kṣudh parītānām ārtānām paridevitam

original: BhP_04.17.025/2 śamayiṣyāmi mad-bāṇair bhinnāyās tava medasā
analyzed: śamayiṣyāmi mad bāṇaiḥ bhinnāyāḥ tava medasā

original: BhP_04.17.026/1 pumān yoṣid uta klība ātma-sambhāvano 'dhamaḥ
analyzed: pumān yoṣit uta klībaḥ ātma sambhāvanaḥ adhamaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.026/2 bhūteṣu niranukrośo nṛpāṇāṃ tad-vadho 'vadhaḥ
analyzed: bhūteṣu niranukrośaḥ nṛpāṇām tad vadhaḥ avadhaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.027/1 tvāṃ stabdhāṃ durmadāṃ nītvā māyā-gāṃ tilaśaḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tvām stabdhām durmadām nītvā māyā gām tilaśas śaraiḥ

original: BhP_04.17.027/2 ātma-yoga-balenemā dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: ātma yoga balena imāḥ dhārayiṣyāmi aham prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.17.028/1 evaṃ manyumayīṃ mūrtiṃ kṛtāntam iva bibhratam
analyzed: evam manyu mayīm mūrtim kṛtāntam iva bibhratam

original: BhP_04.17.028/2 praṇatā prāñjaliḥ prāha mahī sañjāta-vepathuḥ
analyzed: praṇatā prāñjaliḥ prāha mahī sañjāta vepathuḥ

original: BhP_04.17.029/0 dharovāca
analyzed: dharā uvāca

original: BhP_04.17.029/1 namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya māyayā vinyasta-nānā-tanave guṇātmane
analyzed: namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya māyayā vinyasta nānā tanave guṇa ātmane

original: BhP_04.17.029/2 namaḥ svarūpānubhavena nirdhuta- dravya-kriyā-kāraka-vibhramormaye
analyzed: namaḥ sva rūpa anubhavena nirdhuta dravya kriyā kāraka vibhrama ūrmaye

original: BhP_04.17.030/1 yenāham ātmāyatanaṃ vinirmitā dhātrā yato 'yaṃ guṇa-sarga-saṅgrahaḥ
analyzed: yena aham ātma āyatanam vinirmitā dhātrā yatas ayam guṇa sarga saṅgrahaḥ

original: BhP_04.17.030/2 sa eva māṃ hantum udāyudhaḥ svarāḍ upasthito 'nyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kam āśraye
analyzed: saḥ eva mām hantum udāyudhaḥ svarāj upasthitaḥ anyam śaraṇam kam āśraye

original: BhP_04.17.031/1 ya etad ādāv asṛjac carācaraṃ sva-māyayātmāśrayayāvitarkyayā
analyzed: yaḥ etat ādau asṛjat carācaram sva māyayā ātma āśrayayā a vitarkyayā

original: BhP_04.17.031/2 tayaiva so 'yaṃ kila goptum udyataḥ kathaṃ nu māṃ dharma-paro jighāṃsati
analyzed: tayā eva saḥ ayam kila goptum udyataḥ katham nu mām dharma paraḥ jighāṃsati

original: BhP_04.17.032/1 nūnaṃ bateśasya samīhitaṃ janais tan-māyayā durjayayākṛtātmabhiḥ
analyzed: nūnam bata īśasya samīhitam janaiḥ tad māyayā durjayayā akṛtātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.17.032/2 na lakṣyate yas tv akarod akārayad yo 'neka ekaḥ parataś ca īśvaraḥ
analyzed: na lakṣyate yaḥ tu akarot akārayat yaḥ anekaḥ ekaḥ paratas ca īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.17.033/1 sargādi yo 'syānuruṇaddhi śaktibhir dravya-kriyā-kāraka-cetanātmabhiḥ
analyzed: sarga ādi yaḥ asya anuruṇaddhi śaktibhiḥ dravya kriyā kāraka cetanā ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.17.033/2 tasmai samunnaddha-niruddha-śaktaye namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya vedhase
analyzed: tasmai samunnaddha niruddha śaktaye namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya vedhase

original: BhP_04.17.034/1 sa vai bhavān ātma-vinirmitaṃ jagad bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇātmakaṃ vibho
analyzed: sa vai bhavān ātma vinirmitam jagat bhūta indriya antaḥkaraṇa ātmakam vibho

original: BhP_04.17.034/2 saṃsthāpayiṣyann aja māṃ rasātalād abhyujjahārāmbhasa ādi-sūkaraḥ
analyzed: saṃsthāpayiṣyan aja mām rasātalāt abhyujjahāra ambhasaḥ ādi sūkaraḥ

original: BhP_04.17.035/1 apām upasthe mayi nāvy avasthitāḥ prajā bhavān adya rirakṣiṣuḥ kila
analyzed: apām upasthe mayi nāvi avasthitāḥ prajāḥ bhavān adya rirakṣiṣuḥ kila

original: BhP_04.17.035/2 sa vīra-mūrtiḥ samabhūd dharā-dharo yo māṃ payasy ugra-śaro jighāṃsasi
analyzed: sa vīra mūrtiḥ samabhūt dharādharaḥ yaḥ mām payasi ugra śaraḥ jighāṃsasi

original: BhP_04.17.036/1 nūnaṃ janair īhitam īśvarāṇām asmad-vidhais tad-guṇa-sarga-māyayā
analyzed: nūnam janaiḥ īhitam īśvarāṇām asmadvidhaiḥ tad guṇa sarga māyayā

original: BhP_04.17.036/2 na jñāyate mohita-citta-vartmabhis tebhyo namo vīra-yaśas-karebhyaḥ
analyzed: na jñāyate mohita citta vartmabhiḥ tebhyaḥ namaḥ vīra yaśaskarebhyaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.18.001/1 itthaṃ pṛthum abhiṣṭūya ruṣā prasphuritādharam
analyzed: ittham pṛthum abhiṣṭūya ruṣā prasphurita adharam

original: BhP_04.18.001/2 punar āhāvanir bhītā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: punar āha avaniḥ bhītā saṃstabhya ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_04.18.002/1 sanniyacchābhibho manyuṃ nibodha śrāvitaṃ ca me
analyzed: san niyaccha abhibho manyum nibodha śrāvitam ca me

original: BhP_04.18.002/2 sarvataḥ sāram ādatte yathā madhu-karo budhaḥ
analyzed: sarvatas sāram ādatte yathā madhukaraḥ budhaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.003/1 asmin loke 'thavāmuṣmin munibhis tattva-darśibhiḥ
analyzed: asmin loke athavā amuṣmin munibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.18.003/2 dṛṣṭā yogāḥ prayuktāś ca puṃsāṃ śreyaḥ-prasiddhaye
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ yogāḥ prayuktāḥ ca puṃsām śreyaḥ prasiddhaye

original: BhP_04.18.004/1 tān ātiṣṭhati yaḥ samyag upāyān pūrva-darśitān
analyzed: tān ātiṣṭhati yaḥ samyak upāyān pūrva darśitān

original: BhP_04.18.004/2 avaraḥ śraddhayopeta upeyān vindate 'ñjasā
analyzed: avaraḥ śraddhayā upetaḥ upeyān vindate añjasā

original: BhP_04.18.005/1 tān anādṛtya yo 'vidvān arthān ārabhate svayam
analyzed: tān an ādṛtya yaḥ a vidvān arthān ārabhate svayam

original: BhP_04.18.005/2 tasya vyabhicaranty arthā ārabdhāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tasya vyabhicaranti arthāḥ ārabdhāḥ ca punar punar

original: BhP_04.18.006/1 purā sṛṣṭā hy oṣadhayo brahmaṇā yā viśāmpate
analyzed: purā sṛṣṭāḥ hi oṣadhayaḥ brahmaṇā yāḥ viśām pate

original: BhP_04.18.006/2 bhujyamānā mayā dṛṣṭā asadbhir adhṛta-vrataiḥ
analyzed: bhujyamānāḥ mayā dṛṣṭāḥ asadbhiḥ a dhṛta vrataiḥ

original: BhP_04.18.007/1 apālitānādṛtā ca bhavadbhir loka-pālakaiḥ
analyzed: a pālitā an ādṛtā ca bhavadbhiḥ lokapālakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.18.007/2 corī-bhūte 'tha loke 'haṃ yajñārthe 'grasam oṣadhīḥ
analyzed: corībhūte atha loke aham yajña arthe agrasam oṣadhīḥ

original: BhP_04.18.008/1 nūnaṃ tā vīrudhaḥ kṣīṇā mayi kālena bhūyasā
analyzed: nūnam tāḥ vīrudhaḥ kṣīṇāḥ mayi kālena bhūyasā

original: BhP_04.18.008/2 tatra yogena dṛṣṭena bhavān ādātum arhati
analyzed: tatra yogena dṛṣṭena bhavān ādātum arhati

original: BhP_04.18.009/1 vatsaṃ kalpaya me vīra yenāhaṃ vatsalā tava
analyzed: vatsam kalpaya me vīra yena aham vatsalā tava

original: BhP_04.18.009/2 dhokṣye kṣīramayān kāmān anurūpaṃ ca dohanam
analyzed: dhokṣye kṣīra mayān kāmān anurūpam ca dohanam

original: BhP_04.18.010/1 dogdhāraṃ ca mahā-bāho bhūtānāṃ bhūta-bhāvana
analyzed: dogdhāram ca mahā bāho bhūtānām bhūta bhāvana

original: BhP_04.18.010/2 annam īpsitam ūrjasvad bhagavān vāñchate yadi
analyzed: annam īpsitam ūrjasvat bhagavān vāñchate yadi

original: BhP_04.18.011/1 samāṃ ca kuru māṃ rājan deva-vṛṣṭaṃ yathā payaḥ
analyzed: samām ca kuru mām rājan deva vṛṣṭam yathā payaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.011/2 apartāv api bhadraṃ te upāvarteta me vibho
analyzed: apartau api bhadram te upāvarteta me vibho

original: BhP_04.18.012/1 iti priyaṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ bhuva ādāya bhūpatiḥ
analyzed: iti priyam hitam vākyam bhuvaḥ ādāya bhūpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.18.012/2 vatsaṃ kṛtvā manuṃ pāṇāv aduhat sakalauṣadhīḥ
analyzed: vatsam kṛtvā manum pāṇau aduhat sakala oṣadhīḥ

original: BhP_04.18.013/1 tathāpare ca sarvatra sāram ādadate budhāḥ
analyzed: tathā apare ca sarvatra sāram ādadate budhāḥ

original: BhP_04.18.013/2 tato 'nye ca yathā-kāmaṃ duduhuḥ pṛthu-bhāvitām
analyzed: tatas anye ca yathākāmam duduhuḥ pṛthu bhāvitām

original: BhP_04.18.014/1 ṛṣayo duduhur devīm indriyeṣv atha sattama
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ duduhuḥ devīm indriyeṣu atha sattama

original: BhP_04.18.014/2 vatsaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ kṛtvā payaś chandomayaṃ śuci
analyzed: vatsam bṛhaspatim kṛtvā payaḥ chandaḥ mayam śuci

original: BhP_04.18.015/1 kṛtvā vatsaṃ sura-gaṇā indraṃ somam adūduhan
analyzed: kṛtvā vatsam sura gaṇāḥ indram somam adūduhan

original: BhP_04.18.015/2 hiraṇmayena pātreṇa vīryam ojo balaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: hiraṇmayena pātreṇa vīryam ojaḥ balam payaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.016/1 daiteyā dānavā vatsaṃ prahlādam asurarṣabham
analyzed: daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ vatsam prahlādam asura ṛṣabham

original: BhP_04.18.016/2 vidhāyādūduhan kṣīram ayaḥ-pātre surāsavam
analyzed: vidhāya adūduhan kṣīram ayaḥ pātre surāsavam

original: BhP_04.18.017/1 gandharvāpsaraso 'dhukṣan pātre padmamaye payaḥ
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ adhukṣan pātre padma maye payaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.017/2 vatsaṃ viśvāvasuṃ kṛtvā gāndharvaṃ madhu saubhagam
analyzed: vatsam viśvāvasum kṛtvā gāndharvam madhu saubhagam

original: BhP_04.18.018/1 vatsena pitaro 'ryamṇā kavyaṃ kṣīram adhukṣata
analyzed: vatsena pitaraḥ aryamṇā kavyam kṣīram adhukṣata

original: BhP_04.18.018/2 āma-pātre mahā-bhāgāḥ śraddhayā śrāddha-devatāḥ
analyzed: āma pātre mahābhāgāḥ śraddhayā śrāddhadevatāḥ

original: BhP_04.18.019/1 prakalpya vatsaṃ kapilaṃ siddhāḥ saṅkalpanāmayīm
analyzed: prakalpya vatsam kapilam siddhāḥ saṅkalpanā mayīm

original: BhP_04.18.019/2 siddhiṃ nabhasi vidyāṃ ca ye ca vidyādharādayaḥ
analyzed: siddhim nabhasi vidyām ca ye ca vidyādhara ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.020/1 anye ca māyino māyām antardhānādbhutātmanām
analyzed: anye ca māyinaḥ māyām antardhāna adbhuta ātmanām

original: BhP_04.18.020/2 mayaṃ prakalpya vatsaṃ te duduhur dhāraṇāmayīm
analyzed: mayam prakalpya vatsam te duduhuḥ dhāraṇā mayīm

original: BhP_04.18.021/1 yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi bhūtāni piśācāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
analyzed: yakṣa rakṣāṃsi bhūtāni piśācāḥ piśita aśanāḥ

original: BhP_04.18.021/2 bhūteśa-vatsā duduhuḥ kapāle kṣatajāsavam
analyzed: bhūteśa vatsāḥ duduhuḥ kapāle kṣataja āsavam

original: BhP_04.18.022/1 tathāhayo dandaśūkāḥ sarpā nāgāś ca takṣakam
analyzed: tathā ahayaḥ dandaśūkāḥ sarpāḥ nāgāḥ ca takṣakam

original: BhP_04.18.022/2 vidhāya vatsaṃ duduhur bila-pātre viṣaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: vidhāya vatsam duduhuḥ bila pātre viṣam payaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.023/1 paśavo yavasaṃ kṣīraṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā ca go-vṛṣam
analyzed: paśavaḥ yavasam kṣīram vatsam kṛtvā ca go vṛṣam

original: BhP_04.18.023/2 araṇya-pātre cādhukṣan mṛgendreṇa ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
analyzed: araṇya pātre ca adhukṣan mṛgendreṇa ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.024/1 kravyādāḥ prāṇinaḥ kravyaṃ duduhuḥ sve kalevare
analyzed: kravyādāḥ prāṇinaḥ kravyam duduhuḥ sve kalevare

original: BhP_04.18.024/2 suparṇa-vatsā vihagāś caraṃ cācaram eva ca
analyzed: suparṇa vatsāḥ vihagāḥ caram ca acaram eva ca

original: BhP_04.18.025/1 vaṭa-vatsā vanaspatayaḥ pṛthag rasamayaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: vaṭa vatsāḥ vanaspatayaḥ pṛthak rasa mayam payaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.025/2 girayo himavad-vatsā nānā-dhātūn sva-sānuṣu
analyzed: girayaḥ himavat vatsāḥ nānā dhātūn sva sānuṣu

original: BhP_04.18.026/1 sarve sva-mukhya-vatsena sve sve pātre pṛthak payaḥ
analyzed: sarve sva mukhya vatsena sve sve pātre pṛthak payaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.026/2 sarva-kāma-dughāṃ pṛthvīṃ duduhuḥ pṛthu-bhāvitām
analyzed: sarva kāma dughām pṛthvīm duduhuḥ pṛthu bhāvitām

original: BhP_04.18.027/1 evaṃ pṛthv-ādayaḥ pṛthvīm annādāḥ svannam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam pṛthu ādayaḥ pṛthvīm anna ādāḥ su annam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.027/2 doha-vatsādi-bhedena kṣīra-bhedaṃ kurūdvaha
analyzed: doha vatsa ādi bhedena kṣīra bhedam kuru udvaha

original: BhP_04.18.028/1 tato mahīpatiḥ prītaḥ sarva-kāma-dughāṃ pṛthuḥ
analyzed: tatas mahīpatiḥ prītaḥ sarva kāma dughām pṛthuḥ

original: BhP_04.18.028/2 duhitṛtve cakāremāṃ premṇā duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: duhitṛ tve cakāra imām premṇā duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_04.18.029/1 cūrṇayan sva-dhanuṣ-koṭyā giri-kūṭāni rāja-rāṭ
analyzed: cūrṇayan sva dhanuṣkoṭyā giri kūṭāni rāja rāj

original: BhP_04.18.029/2 bhū-maṇḍalam idaṃ vainyaḥ prāyaś cakre samaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: bhū maṇḍalam idam vainyaḥ prāyas cakre samam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.18.030/1 athāsmin bhagavān vainyaḥ prajānāṃ vṛttidaḥ pitā
analyzed: atha asmin bhagavān vainyaḥ prajānām vṛtti daḥ pitā

original: BhP_04.18.030/2 nivāsān kalpayāṃ cakre tatra tatra yathārhataḥ
analyzed: nivāsān cakre tatra tatra yathārhataḥ

original: BhP_04.18.031/1 grāmān puraḥ pattanāni durgāṇi vividhāni ca
analyzed: grāmān puraḥ pattanāni durgāṇi vividhāni ca

original: BhP_04.18.031/2 ghoṣān vrajān sa-śibirān ākarān kheṭa-kharvaṭān
analyzed: ghoṣān vrajān sa śibirān ākarān kheṭa kharvaṭān

original: BhP_04.18.032/1 prāk pṛthor iha naivaiṣā pura-grāmādi-kalpanā
analyzed: prāk pṛthoḥ iha nā eva eṣā pura grāma ādi kalpanā

original: BhP_04.18.032/2 yathā-sukhaṃ vasanti sma tatra tatrākutobhayāḥ
analyzed: yathāsukham vasanti sma tatra tatra akutobhayāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.19.001/1 athādīkṣata rājā tu hayamedha-śatena saḥ
analyzed: atha adīkṣata rājā tu hayamedha śatena saḥ

original: BhP_04.19.001/2 brahmāvarte manoḥ kṣetre yatra prācī sarasvatī
analyzed: brahmāvarte manoḥ kṣetre yatra prācī sarasvatī

original: BhP_04.19.002/1 tad abhipretya bhagavān karmātiśayam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat abhipretya bhagavān karma atiśayam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.002/2 śata-kratur na mamṛṣe pṛthor yajña-mahotsavam
analyzed: śatakratuḥ na mamṛṣe pṛthoḥ yajña mahā utsavam

original: BhP_04.19.003/1 yatra yajña-patiḥ sākṣād bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: yatra yajñapatiḥ sākṣāt bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.19.003/2 anvabhūyata sarvātmā sarva-loka-guruḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: anvabhūyata sarva ātmā sarva loka guruḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_04.19.004/1 anvito brahma-śarvābhyāṃ loka-pālaiḥ sahānugaiḥ
analyzed: anvitaḥ brahma śarvābhyām lokapālaiḥ saha anugaiḥ

original: BhP_04.19.004/2 upagīyamāno gandharvair munibhiś cāpsaro-gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.19.005/1 siddhā vidyādharā daityā dānavā guhyakādayaḥ
analyzed: siddhāḥ vidyādharāḥ daityāḥ dānavāḥ guhyaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.005/2 sunanda-nanda-pramukhāḥ pārṣada-pravarā hareḥ
analyzed: sunanda nanda pramukhāḥ pārṣada pravarāḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_04.19.006/1 kapilo nārado datto yogeśāḥ sanakādayaḥ
analyzed: kapilaḥ nāradaḥ dattaḥ yoga īśāḥ sanaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.006/2 tam anvīyur bhāgavatā ye ca tat-sevanotsukāḥ
analyzed: tam anvīyuḥ bhāgavatāḥ ye ca tad sevana utsukāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.007/1 yatra dharma-dughā bhūmiḥ sarva-kāma-dughā satī
analyzed: yatra dharma dughā bhūmiḥ sarva kāma dughā satī

original: BhP_04.19.007/2 dogdhi smābhīpsitān arthān yajamānasya bhārata
analyzed: dogdhi sma abhīpsitān arthān yajamānasya bhārata

original: BhP_04.19.008/1 ūhuḥ sarva-rasān nadyaḥ kṣīra-dadhy-anna-go-rasān
analyzed: ūhuḥ sarva rasān nadyaḥ kṣīra dadhi anna gorasān

original: BhP_04.19.008/2 taravo bhūri-varṣmāṇaḥ prāsūyanta madhu-cyutaḥ
analyzed: taravaḥ bhūri varṣmāṇaḥ prāsūyanta madhu cyutaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.009/1 sindhavo ratna-nikarān girayo 'nnaṃ catur-vidham
analyzed: sindhavaḥ ratna nikarān girayaḥ annam caturvidham

original: BhP_04.19.009/2 upāyanam upājahruḥ sarve lokāḥ sa-pālakāḥ
analyzed: upāyanam upājahruḥ sarve lokāḥ sa pālakāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.010/1 iti cādhokṣajeśasya pṛthos tu paramodayam
analyzed: iti ca adhokṣaja īśasya pṛthoḥ tu parama udayam

original: BhP_04.19.010/2 asūyan bhagavān indraḥ pratighātam acīkarat
analyzed: asūyan bhagavān indraḥ pratighātam acīkarat

original: BhP_04.19.011/1 carameṇāśvamedhena yajamāne yajuṣ-patim
analyzed: carameṇa aśvamedhena yajamāne yajuṣpatim

original: BhP_04.19.011/2 vainye yajña-paśuṃ spardhann apovāha tirohitaḥ
analyzed: vainye yajña paśum spardhan apovāha tirohitaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.012/1 tam atrir bhagavān aikṣat tvaramāṇaṃ vihāyasā
analyzed: tam atriḥ bhagavān aikṣat tvaramāṇam vihāyasā

original: BhP_04.19.012/2 āmuktam iva pākhaṇḍaṃ yo 'dharme dharma-vibhramaḥ
analyzed: āmuktam iva pākhaṇḍam yaḥ adharme dharma vibhramaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.013/1 atriṇā codito hantuṃ pṛthu-putro mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: atriṇā coditaḥ hantum pṛthu putraḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.013/2 anvadhāvata saṅkruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: anvadhāvata saṅkruddhaḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: BhP_04.19.014/1 taṃ tādṛśākṛtiṃ vīkṣya mene dharmaṃ śarīriṇam
analyzed: tam tādṛś ākṛtim vīkṣya mene dharmam śarīriṇam

original: BhP_04.19.014/2 jaṭilaṃ bhasmanācchannaṃ tasmai bāṇaṃ na muñcati
analyzed: jaṭilam bhasmanā ācchannam tasmai bāṇam na muñcati

original: BhP_04.19.015/1 vadhān nivṛttaṃ taṃ bhūyo hantave 'trir acodayat
analyzed: vadhāt nivṛttam tam bhūyas hantave atriḥ acodayat

original: BhP_04.19.015/2 jahi yajña-hanaṃ tāta mahendraṃ vibudhādhamam
analyzed: jahi yajña hanam tāta mahā indram vibudha adhamam

original: BhP_04.19.016/1 evaṃ vainya-sutaḥ proktas tvaramāṇaṃ vihāyasā
analyzed: evam vainya sutaḥ proktaḥ tvaramāṇam vihāyasā

original: BhP_04.19.016/2 anvadravad abhikruddho rāvaṇaṃ gṛdhra-rāḍ iva
analyzed: anvadravat abhikruddhaḥ rāvaṇam gṛdhrarāj iva

original: BhP_04.19.017/1 so 'śvaṃ rūpaṃ ca tad dhitvā tasmā antarhitaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: saḥ aśvam rūpam ca tat hitvā tasmai antarhitaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_04.19.017/2 vīraḥ sva-paśum ādāya pitur yajñam upeyivān
analyzed: vīraḥ sva paśum ādāya pituḥ yajñam upeyivān

original: BhP_04.19.018/1 tat tasya cādbhutaṃ karma vicakṣya paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tat tasya ca adbhutam karma vicakṣya parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.018/2 nāmadheyaṃ dadus tasmai vijitāśva iti prabho
analyzed: nāmadheyam daduḥ tasmai vijita aśvaḥ iti prabho

original: BhP_04.19.019/1 upasṛjya tamas tīvraṃ jahārāśvaṃ punar hariḥ
analyzed: upasṛjya tamaḥ tīvram jahāra aśvam punar hariḥ

original: BhP_04.19.019/2 caṣāla-yūpataś channo hiraṇya-raśanaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: caṣāla yūpataḥ channaḥ hiraṇya raśanam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.19.020/1 atriḥ sandarśayām āsa tvaramāṇaṃ vihāyasā
analyzed: atriḥ sandarśayām āsa tvaramāṇam vihāyasā

original: BhP_04.19.020/2 kapāla-khaṭvāṅga-dharaṃ vīro nainam abādhata
analyzed: kapāla khaṭvāṅga dharam vīraḥ na enam abādhata

original: BhP_04.19.021/1 atriṇā coditas tasmai sandadhe viśikhaṃ ruṣā
analyzed: atriṇā coditaḥ tasmai sandadhe viśikham ruṣā

original: BhP_04.19.021/2 so 'śvaṃ rūpaṃ ca tad dhitvā tasthāv antarhitaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: saḥ aśvam rūpam ca tat hitvā tasthau antarhitaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_04.19.022/1 vīraś cāśvam upādāya pitṛ-yajñam athāvrajat
analyzed: vīraḥ ca aśvam upādāya pitṛ yajñam atha avrajat

original: BhP_04.19.022/2 tad avadyaṃ hare rūpaṃ jagṛhur jñāna-durbalāḥ
analyzed: tat avadyam hare rūpam jagṛhuḥ jñāna durbalāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.023/1 yāni rūpāṇi jagṛhe indro haya-jihīrṣayā
analyzed: yāni rūpāṇi jagṛhe indraḥ haya jihīrṣayā

original: BhP_04.19.023/2 tāni pāpasya khaṇḍāni liṅgaṃ khaṇḍam ihocyate
analyzed: tāni pāpasya khaṇḍāni liṅgam khaṇḍam iha ucyate

original: BhP_04.19.024/1 evam indre haraty aśvaṃ vainya-yajña-jighāṃsayā
analyzed: evam indre harati aśvam vainya yajña jighāṃsayā
