original: BhP_04.19.024/2 tad-gṛhīta-visṛṣṭeṣu pākhaṇḍeṣu matir nṛṇām
analyzed: tad gṛhīta visṛṣṭeṣu pākhaṇḍeṣu matiḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_04.19.025/1 dharma ity upadharmeṣu nagna-rakta-paṭādiṣu
analyzed: dharmaḥ iti upadharmeṣu nagna rakta paṭa ādiṣu

original: BhP_04.19.025/2 prāyeṇa sajjate bhrāntyā peśaleṣu ca vāgmiṣu
analyzed: prāyeṇa sajjate bhrāntyā peśaleṣu ca vāgmiṣu

original: BhP_04.19.026/1 tad abhijñāya bhagavān pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ
analyzed: tat abhijñāya bhagavān pṛthuḥ pṛthu parākramaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.026/2 indrāya kupito bāṇam ādattodyata-kārmukaḥ
analyzed: indrāya kupitaḥ bāṇam ādatta udyata kārmukaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.027/1 tam ṛtvijaḥ śakra-vadhābhisandhitaṃ vicakṣya duṣprekṣyam asahya-raṃhasam
analyzed: tam ṛtvijaḥ śakra vadha abhisandhitam vicakṣya duṣprekṣyam asahya raṃhasam

original: BhP_04.19.027/2 nivārayām āsur aho mahā-mate na yujyate 'trānya-vadhaḥ pracoditāt
analyzed: nivārayām āsuḥ aho mahāmate na yujyate atrā anya vadhaḥ pracoditāt

original: BhP_04.19.028/1 vayaṃ marutvantam ihārtha-nāśanaṃ hvayāmahe tvac-chravasā hata-tviṣam
analyzed: vayam marutvantam iha artha nāśanam hvayāmahe tvad śravasā hata tviṣam

original: BhP_04.19.028/2 ayātayāmopahavair anantaraṃ prasahya rājan juhavāma te 'hitam
analyzed: ayātayāma upahavaiḥ anantaram prasahya rājan juhavāma te ahitam

original: BhP_04.19.029/1 ity āmantrya kratu-patiṃ vidurāsyartvijo ruṣā
analyzed: iti āmantrya kratu patim vidura asya ṛtvijaḥ ruṣā

original: BhP_04.19.029/2 srug-ghastān juhvato 'bhyetya svayambhūḥ pratyaṣedhata
analyzed: sruc hastān juhvataḥ abhyetya svayambhūḥ pratyaṣedhata

original: BhP_04.19.030/1 na vadhyo bhavatām indro yad yajño bhagavat-tanuḥ
analyzed: na vadhyaḥ bhavatām indraḥ yat yajñaḥ bhagavat tanuḥ

original: BhP_04.19.030/2 yaṃ jighāṃsatha yajñena yasyeṣṭās tanavaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: yam jighāṃsatha yajñena yasya iṣṭāḥ tanavaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.031/1 tad idaṃ paśyata mahad- dharma-vyatikaraṃ dvijāḥ
analyzed: tat idam paśyata mahat dharma vyatikaram dvijāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.031/2 indreṇānuṣṭhitaṃ rājñaḥ karmaitad vijighāṃsatā
analyzed: indreṇa anuṣṭhitam rājñaḥ karma etat vijighāṃsatā

original: BhP_04.19.032/1 pṛthu-kīrteḥ pṛthor bhūyāt tarhy ekona-śata-kratuḥ
analyzed: pṛthu kīrteḥ pṛthoḥ bhūyāt tarhi eka ūna śatakratuḥ

original: BhP_04.19.032/2 alaṃ te kratubhiḥ sviṣṭair yad bhavān mokṣa-dharma-vit
analyzed: alam te kratubhiḥ su iṣṭaiḥ yat bhavān mokṣa dharma vid

original: BhP_04.19.033/1 naivātmane mahendrāya roṣam āhartum arhasi
analyzed: na eva ātmane mahā indrāya roṣam āhartum arhasi

original: BhP_04.19.033/2 ubhāv api hi bhadraṃ te uttamaśloka-vigrahau
analyzed: ubhau api hi bhadram te uttamaśloka vigrahau

original: BhP_04.19.034/1 māsmin mahārāja kṛthāḥ sma cintāṃ niśāmayāsmad-vaca ādṛtātmā
analyzed: mā asmin mahā rāja kṛthāḥ sma cintām niśāmaya asmad vacaḥ ādṛta ātmā

original: BhP_04.19.034/2 yad dhyāyato daiva-hataṃ nu kartuṃ mano 'tiruṣṭaṃ viśate tamo 'ndham
analyzed: yat dhyāyataḥ daiva hatam nu kartum manaḥ ati ruṣṭam viśate tamaḥ andham

original: BhP_04.19.035/1 kratur viramatām eṣa deveṣu duravagrahaḥ
analyzed: kratuḥ viramatām eṣa deveṣu duravagrahaḥ

original: BhP_04.19.035/2 dharma-vyatikaro yatra pākhaṇḍair indra-nirmitaiḥ
analyzed: dharma vyatikaraḥ yatra pākhaṇḍaiḥ indra nirmitaiḥ

original: BhP_04.19.036/1 ebhir indropasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ pākhaṇḍair hāribhir janam
analyzed: ebhiḥ indra upasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ pākhaṇḍaiḥ hāribhiḥ janam

original: BhP_04.19.036/2 hriyamāṇaṃ vicakṣvainaṃ yas te yajña-dhrug aśva-muṭ
analyzed: hriyamāṇam vicakṣva enam yaḥ te yajña druh aśva muṣ

original: BhP_04.19.037/1 bhavān paritrātum ihāvatīrṇo dharmaṃ janānāṃ samayānurūpam
analyzed: bhavān paritrātum iha avatīrṇaḥ dharmam janānām samaya anurūpam

original: BhP_04.19.037/2 venāpacārād avaluptam adya tad-dehato viṣṇu-kalāsi vainya
analyzed: vena apacārāt avaluptam adya tad dehataḥ viṣṇu kalā asi vainya

original: BhP_04.19.038/1 sa tvaṃ vimṛśyāsya bhavaṃ prajāpate saṅkalpanaṃ viśva-sṛjāṃ pipīpṛhi
analyzed: sa tvam vimṛśya asya bhavam prajāpate saṅkalpanam viśvasṛjām pipīpṛhi

original: BhP_04.19.038/2 aindrīṃ ca māyām upadharma-mātaraṃ pracaṇḍa-pākhaṇḍa-pathaṃ prabho jahi
analyzed: aindrīm ca māyām upadharma mātaram pracaṇḍa pākhaṇḍa patham prabho jahi

original: BhP_04.19.039/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.19.039/1 itthaṃ sa loka-guruṇā samādiṣṭo viśāmpatiḥ
analyzed: ittham sa lokaguruṇā samādiṣṭaḥ viśām patiḥ

original: BhP_04.19.039/2 tathā ca kṛtvā vātsalyaṃ maghonāpi ca sandadhe
analyzed: tathā ca kṛtvā vātsalyam maghonā api ca sandadhe

original: BhP_04.19.040/1 kṛtāvabhṛtha-snānāya pṛthave bhūri-karmaṇe
analyzed: kṛta avabhṛtha snānāya pṛthave bhūri karmaṇe

original: BhP_04.19.040/2 varān dadus te varadā ye tad-barhiṣi tarpitāḥ
analyzed: varān daduḥ te vara dāḥ ye tad barhiṣi tarpitāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.041/1 viprāḥ satyāśiṣas tuṣṭāḥ śraddhayā labdha-dakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: viprāḥ satya āśiṣaḥ tuṣṭāḥ śraddhayā labdha dakṣiṇāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.041/2 āśiṣo yuyujuḥ kṣattar ādi-rājāya sat-kṛtāḥ
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ yuyujuḥ kṣattar ādirājāya satkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.042/1 tvayāhūtā mahā-bāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: tvayā āhūtāḥ mahā bāho sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: BhP_04.19.042/2 pūjitā dāna-mānābhyāṃ pitṛ-devarṣi-mānavāḥ
analyzed: pūjitāḥ dāna mānābhyām pitṛ deva ṛṣi mānavāḥ

original: BhP_04.20.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.20.001/1 bhagavān api vaikuṇṭhaḥ sākaṃ maghavatā vibhuḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api vaikuṇṭhaḥ sākam maghavatā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.20.001/2 yajñair yajña-patis tuṣṭo yajña-bhuk tam abhāṣata
analyzed: yajñaiḥ yajñapatiḥ tuṣṭaḥ yajñabhuj tam abhāṣata

original: BhP_04.20.002/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_04.20.002/1 eṣa te 'kārṣīd bhaṅgaṃ haya-medha-śatasya ha
analyzed: eṣa te akārṣīt bhaṅgam hayamedha śatasya ha

original: BhP_04.20.002/2 kṣamāpayata ātmānam amuṣya kṣantum arhasi
analyzed: kṣamāpayataḥ ātmānam amuṣya kṣantum arhasi

original: BhP_04.20.003/1 sudhiyaḥ sādhavo loke naradeva narottamāḥ
analyzed: sudhiyaḥ sādhavaḥ loke naradeva nara uttamāḥ

original: BhP_04.20.003/2 nābhidruhyanti bhūtebhyo yarhi nātmā kalevaram
analyzed: na abhidruhyanti bhūtebhyaḥ yarhi na ātmā kalevaram

original: BhP_04.20.004/1 puruṣā yadi muhyanti tvādṛśā deva-māyayā
analyzed: puruṣāḥ yadi muhyanti tvādṛśāḥ deva māyayā

original: BhP_04.20.004/2 śrama eva paraṃ jāto dīrghayā vṛddha-sevayā
analyzed: śramaḥ eva param jātaḥ dīrghayā vṛddha sevayā

original: BhP_04.20.005/1 ataḥ kāyam imaṃ vidvān avidyā-kāma-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: atas kāyam imam vidvān avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.20.005/2 ārabdha iti naivāsmin pratibuddho 'nuṣajjate
analyzed: ārabdhaḥ iti na eva asmin pratibuddhaḥ anuṣajjate

original: BhP_04.20.006/1 asaṃsaktaḥ śarīre 'sminn amunotpādite gṛhe
analyzed: asaṃsaktaḥ śarīre asmin amunā utpādite gṛhe

original: BhP_04.20.006/2 apatye draviṇe vāpi kaḥ kuryān mamatāṃ budhaḥ
analyzed: apatye draviṇe vā api kaḥ kuryāt mamatām budhaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.007/1 ekaḥ śuddhaḥ svayaṃ-jyotir nirguṇo 'sau guṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ śuddhaḥ svayam jyotiḥ nirguṇaḥ asau guṇa āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.007/2 sarva-go 'nāvṛtaḥ sākṣī nirātmātmātmanaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: sarvagaḥ anāvṛtaḥ sākṣī nirātmā ātmā ātmanaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_04.20.008/1 ya evaṃ santam ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ veda pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ evam santam ātmānam ātma stham veda pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.008/2 nājyate prakṛti-stho 'pi tad-guṇaiḥ sa mayi sthitaḥ
analyzed: na ajyate prakṛti sthaḥ api tad guṇaiḥ sa mayi sthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.009/1 yaḥ sva-dharmeṇa māṃ nityaṃ nirāśīḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ svadharmeṇa mām nityam nirāśīḥ śraddhayā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.009/2 bhajate śanakais tasya mano rājan prasīdati
analyzed: bhajate śanakais tasya manaḥ rājan prasīdati

original: BhP_04.20.010/1 parityakta-guṇaḥ samyag darśano viśadāśayaḥ
analyzed: parityakta guṇaḥ samyak darśanaḥ viśada āśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.010/2 śāntiṃ me samavasthānaṃ brahma kaivalyam aśnute
analyzed: śāntim me samavasthānam brahma kaivalyam aśnute

original: BhP_04.20.011/1 udāsīnam ivādhyakṣaṃ dravya-jñāna-kriyātmanām
analyzed: udāsīnam iva adhyakṣam dravya jñāna kriyā ātmanām

original: BhP_04.20.011/2 kūṭa-stham imam ātmānaṃ yo vedāpnoti śobhanam
analyzed: kūṭastham imam ātmānam yaḥ veda āpnoti śobhanam

original: BhP_04.20.012/1 bhinnasya liṅgasya guṇa-pravāho dravya-kriyā-kāraka-cetanātmanaḥ
analyzed: bhinnasya liṅgasya guṇa pravāhaḥ dravya kriyā kāraka cetanā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.012/2 dṛṣṭāsu sampatsu vipatsu sūrayo na vikriyante mayi baddha-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭāsu sampatsu vipatsu sūrayaḥ na vikriyante mayi baddha sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_04.20.013/1 samaḥ samānottama-madhyamādhamaḥ sukhe ca duḥkhe ca jitendriyāśayaḥ
analyzed: samaḥ samāna uttama madhyama adhamaḥ sukhe ca duḥkhe ca jita indriya āśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.013/2 mayopakḷptākhila-loka-saṃyuto vidhatsva vīrākhila-loka-rakṣaṇam
analyzed: mayā upakḷpta akhila loka saṃyutaḥ vidhatsva vīra akhila loka rakṣaṇam

original: BhP_04.20.014/1 śreyaḥ prajā-pālanam eva rājño yat sāmparāye sukṛtāt ṣaṣṭham aṃśam
analyzed: śreyaḥ prajā pālanam eva rājñaḥ yat sāmparāye sukṛtāt ṣaṣṭham aṃśam

original: BhP_04.20.014/2 hartānyathā hṛta-puṇyaḥ prajānām arakṣitā kara-hāro 'gham atti
analyzed: hartā anyathā hṛta puṇyaḥ prajānām arakṣitā kara hāraḥ agham atti

original: BhP_04.20.015/1 evaṃ dvijāgryānumatānuvṛtta- dharma-pradhāno 'nyatamo 'vitāsyāḥ
analyzed: evam dvijāgrya anumata anuvṛtta dharma pradhānaḥ anyatamaḥ avitā asyāḥ

original: BhP_04.20.015/2 hrasvena kālena gṛhopayātān draṣṭāsi siddhān anurakta-lokaḥ
analyzed: hrasvena kālena gṛha upayātān draṣṭāsi siddhān anurakta lokaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.016/1 varaṃ ca mat kañcana mānavendra vṛṇīṣva te 'haṃ guṇa-śīla-yantritaḥ
analyzed: varam ca mat kañcana mānava indra vṛṇīṣva te aham guṇa śīla yantritaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.016/2 nāhaṃ makhair vai sulabhas tapobhir yogena vā yat sama-citta-vartī
analyzed: na aham makhaiḥ vai sulabhaḥ tapobhiḥ yogena vā yat sama citta vartī

original: BhP_04.20.017/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.20.017/1 sa itthaṃ loka-guruṇā viṣvaksenena viśva-jit
analyzed: saḥ ittham lokaguruṇā viṣvaksenena viśvajit

original: BhP_04.20.017/2 anuśāsita ādeśaṃ śirasā jagṛhe hareḥ
analyzed: anuśāsitaḥ ādeśam śirasā jagṛhe hareḥ

original: BhP_04.20.018/1 spṛśantaṃ pādayoḥ premṇā vrīḍitaṃ svena karmaṇā
analyzed: spṛśantam pādayoḥ premṇā vrīḍitam svena karmaṇā

original: BhP_04.20.018/2 śata-kratuṃ pariṣvajya vidveṣaṃ visasarja ha
analyzed: śatakratum pariṣvajya vidveṣam visasarja ha

original: BhP_04.20.019/1 bhagavān atha viśvātmā pṛthunopahṛtārhaṇaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān atha viśvātmā pṛthunā upahṛta arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.019/2 samujjihānayā bhaktyā gṛhīta-caraṇāmbujaḥ
analyzed: bhaktyā gṛhīta caraṇa ambujaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.020/1 prasthānābhimukho 'py enam anugraha-vilambitaḥ
analyzed: prasthāna abhimukhaḥ api enam anugraha vilambitaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.020/2 paśyan padma-palāśākṣo na pratasthe suhṛt satām
analyzed: paśyan padma palāśa akṣaḥ na pratasthe suhṛd satām

original: BhP_04.20.021/1 sa ādi-rājo racitāñjalir hariṃ vilokituṃ nāśakad aśru-locanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ādirājaḥ racita añjaliḥ harim vilokitum nā aśakat aśru locanaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.021/2 na kiñcanovāca sa bāṣpa-viklavo hṛdopaguhyāmum adhād avasthitaḥ
analyzed: na kiñcana uvāca sa bāṣpa viklavaḥ hṛdā upaguhya amum adhāt avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.022/1 athāvamṛjyāśru-kalā vilokayann atṛpta-dṛg-gocaram āha pūruṣam
analyzed: atha avamṛjya aśru kalāḥ vilokayan atṛpta dṛś gocaram āha pūruṣam

original: BhP_04.20.022/2 padā spṛśantaṃ kṣitim aṃsa unnate vinyasta-hastāgram uraṅga-vidviṣaḥ
analyzed: padā spṛśantam kṣitim aṃse unnate vinyasta hasta agram uraṅga vidviṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.023/0 pṛthur uvāca
analyzed: pṛthuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.20.023/1 varān vibho tvad varadeśvarād budhaḥ kathaṃ vṛṇīte guṇa-vikriyātmanām
analyzed: varān vibho tvat vara da īśvarāt budhaḥ katham vṛṇīte guṇa vikriyā ātmanām

original: BhP_04.20.023/2 ye nārakāṇām api santi dehināṃ tān īśa kaivalya-pate vṛṇe na ca
analyzed: ye nārakāṇām api santi dehinām tān īśa kaivalya pate vṛṇe na ca

original: BhP_04.20.024/1 na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin na yatra yuṣmac-caraṇāmbujāsavaḥ
analyzed: na kāmaye nātha tat api aham kvacid na yatra yuṣmad caraṇa ambuja asavaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.024/2 mahattamāntar-hṛdayān mukha-cyuto vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ
analyzed: mahattama antar hṛdayāt mukha cyutaḥ vidhatsva karṇa ayutam eṣa me varaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.025/1 sa uttamaśloka mahan-mukha-cyuto bhavat-padāmbhoja-sudhā kaṇānilaḥ
analyzed: saḥ uttamaśloka mahat mukha cyutaḥ bhavat pada ambhoja sudhā kaṇā anilaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.025/2 smṛtiṃ punar vismṛta-tattva-vartmanāṃ kuyogināṃ no vitaraty alaṃ varaiḥ
analyzed: smṛtim punar vismṛta tattva vartmanām ku yoginām naḥ vitarati alam varaiḥ

original: BhP_04.20.026/1 yaśaḥ śivaṃ suśrava ārya-saṅgame yadṛcchayā copaśṛṇoti te sakṛt
analyzed: yaśaḥ śivam su śravaḥ ārya saṅgame yadṛcchayā ca upaśṛṇoti te sakṛt

original: BhP_04.20.026/2 kathaṃ guṇa-jño viramed vinā paśuṃ śrīr yat pravavre guṇa-saṅgrahecchayā
analyzed: katham guṇa jñaḥ viramet vinā paśum śrīḥ yat pravavre guṇa saṅgraha icchayā

original: BhP_04.20.027/1 athābhaje tvākhila-pūruṣottamaṃ guṇālayaṃ padma-kareva lālasaḥ
analyzed: atha ābhaje tvā akhila pūruṣottamam guṇa ālayam padmakarā iva lālasaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.027/2 apy āvayor eka-pati-spṛdhoḥ kalir na syāt kṛta-tvac-caraṇaika-tānayoḥ
analyzed: api āvayoḥ eka pati spṛdhoḥ kaliḥ na syāt kṛta tvad caraṇa ekatānayoḥ

original: BhP_04.20.028/1 jagaj-jananyāṃ jagad-īśa vaiśasaṃ syād eva yat-karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam
analyzed: jagat jananyām jagadīśa vaiśasam syāt eva yat karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam

original: BhP_04.20.028/2 karoṣi phalgv apy uru dīna-vatsalaḥ sva eva dhiṣṇye 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā
analyzed: karoṣi phalgu api uru dīna vatsalaḥ sve eva dhiṣṇye abhiratasya kim tayā

original: BhP_04.20.029/1 bhajanty atha tvām ata eva sādhavo vyudasta-māyā-guṇa-vibhramodayam
analyzed: bhajanti atha tvām atas eva sādhavaḥ vyudasta māyā guṇa vibhrama udayam

original: BhP_04.20.029/2 bhavat-padānusmaraṇād ṛte satāṃ nimittam anyad bhagavan na vidmahe
analyzed: bhavat pada anusmaraṇāt ṛte satām nimittam anyat bhagavat na vidmahe

original: BhP_04.20.030/1 manye giraṃ te jagatāṃ vimohinīṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti bhajantam āttha yat
analyzed: manye giram te jagatām vimohinīm varam vṛṇīṣva iti bhajantam āttha yat

original: BhP_04.20.030/2 vācā nu tantyā yadi te jano 'sitaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ karma karoti mohitaḥ
analyzed: vācā nu tantyā yadi te janaḥ a sitaḥ katham punar karma karoti mohitaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.031/1 tvan-māyayāddhā jana īśa khaṇḍito yad anyad āśāsta ṛtātmano 'budhaḥ
analyzed: tvad māyayā addhā janaḥ īśa khaṇḍitaḥ yat anyat āśāste ṛta ātmanaḥ abudhaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.031/2 yathā cared bāla-hitaṃ pitā svayaṃ tathā tvam evārhasi naḥ samīhitum
analyzed: yathā caret bāla hitam pitā svayam tathā tvam eva arhasi naḥ samīhitum

original: BhP_04.20.032/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.20.032/1 ity ādi-rājena nutaḥ sa viśva-dṛk tam āha rājan mayi bhaktir astu te
analyzed: iti ādirājena nutaḥ sa viśva dṛś tam āha rājan mayi bhaktiḥ astu te

original: BhP_04.20.032/2 diṣṭyedṛśī dhīr mayi te kṛtā yayā māyāṃ madīyāṃ tarati sma dustyajām
analyzed: diṣṭyā īdṛśī dhīḥ mayi te kṛtā yayā māyām madīyām tarati sma dustyajām

original: BhP_04.20.033/1 tat tvaṃ kuru mayādiṣṭam apramattaḥ prajāpate
analyzed: tat tvam kuru mayā ādiṣṭam apramattaḥ prajāpate

original: BhP_04.20.033/2 mad-ādeśa-karo lokaḥ sarvatrāpnoti śobhanam
analyzed: mad ādeśa karaḥ lokaḥ sarvatra āpnoti śobhanam

original: BhP_04.20.034/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.20.034/1 iti vainyasya rājarṣeḥ pratinandyārthavad vacaḥ
analyzed: iti vainyasya rājarṣeḥ pratinandya arthavat vacaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.034/2 pūjito 'nugṛhītvainaṃ gantuṃ cakre 'cyuto matim
analyzed: pūjitaḥ anugṛhītvā enam gantum cakre acyutaḥ matim

original: BhP_04.20.035/1 devarṣi-pitṛ-gandharva- siddha-cāraṇa-pannagāḥ
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharva siddha cāraṇa pannagāḥ

original: BhP_04.20.035/2 kinnarāpsaraso martyāḥ khagā bhūtāny anekaśaḥ
analyzed: kinnara apsarasaḥ martyāḥ khagāḥ bhūtāni anekaśas

original: BhP_04.20.036/1 yajñeśvara-dhiyā rājñā vāg-vittāñjali-bhaktitaḥ
analyzed: yajñeśvara dhiyā rājñā vāc vitta añjali bhaktitaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.036/2 sabhājitā yayuḥ sarve vaikuṇṭhānugatās tataḥ
analyzed: sabhājitāḥ yayuḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha anugatāḥ tatas

original: BhP_04.20.037/1 bhagavān api rājarṣeḥ sopādhyāyasya cācyutaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api rājarṣeḥ sa upādhyāyasya ca acyutaḥ

original: BhP_04.20.037/2 harann iva mano 'muṣya sva-dhāma pratyapadyata
analyzed: haran iva manaḥ amuṣya sva dhāma pratyapadyata

original: BhP_04.20.038/1 adṛṣṭāya namaskṛtya nṛpaḥ sandarśitātmane
analyzed: adṛṣṭāya namaskṛtya nṛpaḥ sandarśita ātmane

original: BhP_04.20.038/2 avyaktāya ca devānāṃ devāya sva-puraṃ yayau
analyzed: avyaktāya ca devānām devāya sva puram yayau

original: BhP_04.21.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.21.001/1 mauktikaiḥ kusuma-sragbhir dukūlaiḥ svarṇa-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: mauktikaiḥ kusuma sragbhiḥ dukūlaiḥ svarṇa toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.001/2 mahā-surabhibhir dhūpair maṇḍitaṃ tatra tatra vai
analyzed: mahā surabhibhiḥ dhūpaiḥ maṇḍitam tatra tatra vai

original: BhP_04.21.002/1 candanāguru-toyārdra- rathyā-catvara-mārgavat
analyzed: candana aguru toya ārdra rathyā catvara mārgavat

original: BhP_04.21.002/2 puṣpākṣata-phalais tokmair lājair arcirbhir arcitam
analyzed: puṣpa akṣata phalaiḥ tokmaiḥ lājaiḥ arcirbhiḥ arcitam

original: BhP_04.21.003/1 savṛndaiḥ kadalī-stambhaiḥ pūga-potaiḥ pariṣkṛtam
analyzed: sa vṛndaiḥ kadalī stambhaiḥ pūga potaiḥ pariṣkṛtam

original: BhP_04.21.003/2 taru-pallava-mālābhiḥ sarvataḥ samalaṅkṛtam
analyzed: taru pallava mālābhiḥ sarvatas samalaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_04.21.004/1 prajās taṃ dīpa-balibhiḥ sambhṛtāśeṣa-maṅgalaiḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ tam dīpa balibhiḥ sambhṛta aśeṣa maṅgalaiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.004/2 abhīyur mṛṣṭa-kanyāś ca mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍala-maṇḍitāḥ
analyzed: abhīyuḥ mṛṣṭa kanyāḥ ca mṛṣṭa kuṇḍala maṇḍitāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.005/1 śaṅkha-dundubhi-ghoṣeṇa brahma-ghoṣeṇa cartvijām
analyzed: śaṅkha dundubhi ghoṣeṇa brahmaghoṣeṇa ca ṛtvijām

original: BhP_04.21.005/2 viveśa bhavanaṃ vīraḥ stūyamāno gata-smayaḥ
analyzed: viveśa bhavanam vīraḥ stūyamānaḥ gata smayaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.006/1 pūjitaḥ pūjayām āsa tatra tatra mahā-yaśāḥ
analyzed: pūjitaḥ pūjayām āsa tatra tatra mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.006/2 paurāñ jānapadāṃs tāṃs tān prītaḥ priya-vara-pradaḥ
analyzed: paurān jānapadān tān tān prītaḥ priya vara pradaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.007/1 sa evam ādīny anavadya-ceṣṭitaḥ karmāṇi bhūyāṃsi mahān mahattamaḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam ādīni anavadya ceṣṭitaḥ karmāṇi bhūyāṃsi mahān mahattamaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.007/2 kurvan śaśāsāvani-maṇḍalaṃ yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nidhāyāruruhe paraṃ padam
analyzed: kurvan śaśāsa avani maṇḍalam yaśaḥ sphītam nidhāya āruruhe param padam

original: BhP_04.21.008/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.21.008/1 tad ādi-rājasya yaśo vijṛmbhitaṃ guṇair aśeṣair guṇavat-sabhājitam
analyzed: tat ādirājasya yaśaḥ vijṛmbhitam guṇaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ guṇavat sabhājitam

original: BhP_04.21.008/2 kṣattā mahā-bhāgavataḥ sadaspate kauṣāraviṃ prāha gṛṇantam arcayan
analyzed: kṣattā mahā bhāgavataḥ sadaspate kauṣāravim prāha gṛṇantam arcayan

original: BhP_04.21.009/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.21.009/1 so 'bhiṣiktaḥ pṛthur viprair labdhāśeṣa-surārhaṇaḥ
analyzed: saḥ abhiṣiktaḥ pṛthuḥ vipraiḥ labdha aśeṣa sura arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.009/2 bibhrat sa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo bāhvor yābhyāṃ dudoha gām
analyzed: bibhrat sa vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ bāhvoḥ yābhyām dudoha gām

original: BhP_04.21.010/1 ko nv asya kīrtiṃ na śṛṇoty abhijño yad-vikramocchiṣṭam aśeṣa-bhūpāḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu asya kīrtim na śṛṇoti abhijñaḥ yad vikrama ucchiṣṭam aśeṣa bhūpāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.010/2 lokāḥ sa-pālā upajīvanti kāmam adyāpi tan me vada karma śuddham
analyzed: lokāḥ sa pālāḥ upajīvanti kāmam adya api tat me vada karma śuddham

original: BhP_04.21.011/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.21.011/1 gaṅgā-yamunayor nadyor antarā kṣetram āvasan
analyzed: gaṅgā yamunayoḥ nadyoḥ antarā kṣetram āvasan

original: BhP_04.21.011/2 ārabdhān eva bubhuje bhogān puṇya-jihāsayā
analyzed: ārabdhān eva bubhuje bhogān puṇya jihāsayā

original: BhP_04.21.012/1 sarvatrāskhalitādeśaḥ sapta-dvīpaika-daṇḍa-dhṛk
BhP_04.21.012/2 anyatra brāhmaṇa-kulād anyatrācyuta-gotrataḥ
analyzed: anyatra brāhmaṇa kulāt anyatra acyuta gotrataḥ

original: BhP_04.21.013/1 ekadāsīn mahā-satra- dīkṣā tatra divaukasām
analyzed: ekadā āsīt mahā satra dīkṣā tatra divaukasām

original: BhP_04.21.013/2 samājo brahmarṣīṇāṃ ca rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sattama
analyzed: samājaḥ brahmarṣīṇām ca rājarṣīṇām ca sattama

original: BhP_04.21.014/1 tasminn arhatsu sarveṣu sv-arciteṣu yathārhataḥ
analyzed: tasmin arhatsu sarveṣu su arciteṣu yathārhataḥ

original: BhP_04.21.014/2 utthitaḥ sadaso madhye tārāṇām uḍurāḍ iva
analyzed: utthitaḥ sadasaḥ madhye tārāṇām uḍurāj iva

original: BhP_04.21.015/1 prāṃśuḥ pīnāyata-bhujo gauraḥ kañjāruṇekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: prāṃśuḥ pīna āyata bhujaḥ gauraḥ kañja aruṇa īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.015/2 sunāsaḥ sumukhaḥ saumyaḥ pīnāṃsaḥ sudvija-smitaḥ
BhP_04.21.016/1 vyūḍha-vakṣā bṛhac-chroṇir vali-valgu-dalodaraḥ
analyzed: vyūḍha vakṣāḥ bṛhat śroṇiḥ vali valgu dala udaraḥ

original: BhP_04.21.016/2 āvarta-nābhir ojasvī kāñcanorur udagra-pāt
analyzed: āvarta nābhiḥ ojasvī kāñcana ūruḥ udagra pād

original: BhP_04.21.017/1 sūkṣma-vakrāsita-snigdha- mūrdhajaḥ kambu-kandharaḥ
BhP_04.21.017/2 mahā-dhane dukūlāgrye paridhāyopavīya ca
analyzed: mahādhane dukūla agrye paridhāya upavīya ca

original: BhP_04.21.018/1 vyañjitāśeṣa-gātra-śrīr niyame nyasta-bhūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: vyañjita aśeṣa gātra śrīḥ niyame nyasta bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.018/2 kṛṣṇājina-dharaḥ śrīmān kuśa-pāṇiḥ kṛtocitaḥ
BhP_04.21.019/1 śiśira-snigdha-tārākṣaḥ samaikṣata samantataḥ
analyzed: śiśira snigdha tārā akṣaḥ samaikṣata samantataḥ

original: BhP_04.21.019/2 ūcivān idam urvīśaḥ sadaḥ saṃharṣayann iva
analyzed: ūcivān idam urvī īśaḥ sadaḥ saṃharṣayan iva

original: BhP_04.21.020/1 cāru citra-padaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ gūḍham aviklavam
analyzed: cāru citra padam ślakṣṇam mṛṣṭam gūḍham aviklavam

original: BhP_04.21.020/2 sarveṣām upakārārthaṃ tadā anuvadann iva
analyzed: sarveṣām upakāra artham tadā anuvadan iva

original: BhP_04.21.021/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_04.21.021/1 sabhyāḥ śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vaḥ sādhavo ya ihāgatāḥ
analyzed: sabhyāḥ śṛṇuta bhadram vaḥ sādhavaḥ ye iha āgatāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.021/2 satsu jijñāsubhir dharmam āvedyaṃ sva-manīṣitam
analyzed: satsu jijñāsubhiḥ dharmam āvedyam sva manīṣitam

original: BhP_04.21.022/1 ahaṃ daṇḍa-dharo rājā prajānām iha yojitaḥ
analyzed: aham daṇḍa dharaḥ rājā prajānām iha yojitaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.022/2 rakṣitā vṛttidaḥ sveṣu setuṣu sthāpitā pṛthak
analyzed: rakṣitā vṛtti daḥ sveṣu setuṣu sthāpitā pṛthak

original: BhP_04.21.023/1 tasya me tad-anuṣṭhānād yān āhur brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: tasya me tad anuṣṭhānāt yān āhuḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.023/2 lokāḥ syuḥ kāma-sandohā yasya tuṣyati diṣṭa-dṛk
analyzed: lokāḥ syuḥ kāma sandohāḥ yasya tuṣyati diṣṭa dṛś

original: BhP_04.21.024/1 ya uddharet karaṃ rājā prajā dharmeṣv aśikṣayan
analyzed: yaḥ uddharet karam rājā prajāḥ dharmeṣu aśikṣayan

original: BhP_04.21.024/2 prajānāṃ śamalaṃ bhuṅkte bhagaṃ ca svaṃ jahāti saḥ
analyzed: prajānām śamalam bhuṅkte bhagam ca svam jahāti saḥ

original: BhP_04.21.025/1 tat prajā bhartṛ-piṇḍārthaṃ svārtham evānasūyavaḥ
analyzed: tat prajāḥ bhartṛ piṇḍa artham sva artham eva anasūyavaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.025/2 kurutādhokṣaja-dhiyas tarhi me 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: kuruta adhokṣaja dhiyaḥ tarhi me anugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.026/1 yūyaṃ tad anumodadhvaṃ pitṛ-devarṣayo 'malāḥ
analyzed: yūyam tat anumodadhvam pitṛ deva ṛṣayaḥ amalāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.026/2 kartuḥ śāstur anujñātus tulyaṃ yat pretya tat phalam
analyzed: kartuḥ śāstuḥ anujñātuḥ tulyam yat pretya tat phalam

original: BhP_04.21.027/1 asti yajña-patir nāma keṣāñcid arha-sattamāḥ
analyzed: asti yajñapatiḥ nāma keṣāñcid arha sattamāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.027/2 ihāmutra ca lakṣyante jyotsnāvatyaḥ kvacid bhuvaḥ
analyzed: iha amutra ca lakṣyante jyotsnāvatyaḥ kvacid bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.028/1 manor uttānapādasya dhruvasyāpi mahīpateḥ
analyzed: manoḥ uttānapādasya dhruvasya api mahīpateḥ

original: BhP_04.21.028/2 priyavratasya rājarṣer aṅgasyāsmat-pituḥ pituḥ
analyzed: priyavratasya rājarṣeḥ aṅgasya asmad pituḥ pituḥ

original: BhP_04.21.029/1 īdṛśānām athānyeṣām ajasya ca bhavasya ca
analyzed: īdṛśānām atha anyeṣām ajasya ca bhavasya ca

original: BhP_04.21.029/2 prahlādasya baleś cāpi kṛtyam asti gadābhṛtā
analyzed: prahlādasya baleḥ ca api kṛtyam asti gadābhṛtā

original: BhP_04.21.030/1 dauhitrādīn ṛte mṛtyoḥ śocyān dharma-vimohitān
analyzed: dauhitra ādīn ṛte mṛtyoḥ śocyān dharma vimohitān

original: BhP_04.21.030/2 varga-svargāpavargāṇāṃ prāyeṇaikātmya-hetunā
analyzed: varga svarga apavargāṇām prāyeṇa aikātmya hetunā

original: BhP_04.21.031/1 yat-pāda-sevābhirucis tapasvinām aśeṣa-janmopacitaṃ malaṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: yad pāda sevā abhiruciḥ tapasvinām aśeṣa janma upacitam malam dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.031/2 sadyaḥ kṣiṇoty anvaham edhatī satī yathā padāṅguṣṭha-viniḥsṛtā sarit
analyzed: sadyas kṣiṇoti anvaham edhatī satī yathā pada aṅguṣṭha viniḥsṛtā sarit

original: BhP_04.21.032/1 vinirdhutāśeṣa-mano-malaḥ pumān asaṅga-vijñāna-viśeṣa-vīryavān
analyzed: vinirdhuta aśeṣa manaḥ malaḥ pumān asaṅga vijñāna viśeṣa vīryavān

original: BhP_04.21.032/2 yad-aṅghri-mūle kṛta-ketanaḥ punar na saṃsṛtiṃ kleśa-vahāṃ prapadyate
analyzed: yat aṅghri mūle kṛta ketanaḥ punar na saṃsṛtim kleśa vahām prapadyate

original: BhP_04.21.033/1 tam eva yūyaṃ bhajatātma-vṛttibhir mano-vacaḥ-kāya-guṇaiḥ sva-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: tam eva yūyam bhajata ātma vṛttibhiḥ manaḥ vacaḥ kāya guṇaiḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.033/2 amāyinaḥ kāma-dughāṅghri-paṅkajaṃ yathādhikārāvasitārtha-siddhayaḥ
analyzed: amāyinaḥ kāmadughā aṅghri paṅkajam yathā adhikārāḥ avasita artha siddhayaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.034/1 asāv ihāneka-guṇo 'guṇo 'dhvaraḥ pṛthag-vidha-dravya-guṇa-kriyoktibhiḥ
analyzed: asau iha aneka guṇaḥ aguṇaḥ adhvaraḥ pṛthagvidha dravya guṇa kriyā uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.034/2 sampadyate 'rthāśaya-liṅga-nāmabhir viśuddha-vijñāna-ghanaḥ svarūpataḥ
analyzed: sampadyate artha āśaya liṅga nāmabhiḥ viśuddha vijñāna ghanaḥ sva rūpataḥ

original: BhP_04.21.035/1 pradhāna-kālāśaya-dharma-saṅgrahe śarīra eṣa pratipadya cetanām
analyzed: pradhāna kāla āśaya dharma saṅgrahe śarīre eṣa pratipadya cetanām

original: BhP_04.21.035/2 kriyā-phalatvena vibhur vibhāvyate yathānalo dāruṣu tad-guṇātmakaḥ
analyzed: kriyā phala tvena vibhuḥ vibhāvyate yathā analaḥ dāruṣu tad guṇa ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.036/1 aho mamāmī vitaranty anugrahaṃ hariṃ guruṃ yajña-bhujām adhīśvaram
analyzed: aho mama amī vitaranti anugraham harim gurum yajñabhujām adhīśvaram

original: BhP_04.21.036/2 sva-dharma-yogena yajanti māmakā nirantaraṃ kṣoṇi-tale dṛḍha-vratāḥ
analyzed: svadharma yogena yajanti māmakāḥ nirantaram kṣoṇi tale dṛḍha vratāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.037/1 mā jātu tejaḥ prabhaven maharddhibhis titikṣayā tapasā vidyayā ca
analyzed: mā jātu tejaḥ prabhavet mahā ṛddhibhiḥ titikṣayā tapasā vidyayā ca

original: BhP_04.21.037/2 dedīpyamāne 'jita-devatānāṃ kule svayaṃ rāja-kulād dvijānām
analyzed: dedīpyamāne ajita devatānām kule svayam rāja kulāt dvijānām

original: BhP_04.21.038/1 brahmaṇya-devaḥ puruṣaḥ purātano nityaṃ harir yac-caraṇābhivandanāt
analyzed: brahmaṇyadevaḥ puruṣaḥ purātanaḥ nityam hariḥ yad caraṇa abhivandanāt

original: BhP_04.21.038/2 avāpa lakṣmīm anapāyinīṃ yaśo jagat-pavitraṃ ca mahattamāgraṇīḥ
analyzed: avāpa lakṣmīm anapāyinīm yaśaḥ jagat pavitram ca mahattama agraṇīḥ

original: BhP_04.21.039/1 yat-sevayāśeṣa-guhāśayaḥ sva-rāḍ vipra-priyas tuṣyati kāmam īśvaraḥ
analyzed: yad sevayā aśeṣa guhā āśayaḥ svarāj vipra priyaḥ tuṣyati kāmam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.21.039/2 tad eva tad-dharma-parair vinītaiḥ sarvātmanā brahma-kulaṃ niṣevyatām
analyzed: tat eva tad dharma paraiḥ vinītaiḥ sarva ātmanā brahma kulam niṣevyatām

original: BhP_04.21.040/1 pumān labhetānativelam ātmanaḥ prasīdato 'tyanta-śamaṃ svataḥ svayam
analyzed: pumān labheta anativelam ātmanaḥ prasīdataḥ atyanta śamam svataḥ svayam

original: BhP_04.21.040/2 yan-nitya-sambandha-niṣevayā tataḥ paraṃ kim atrāsti mukhaṃ havir-bhujām
analyzed: yat nitya sambandha niṣevayā tatas param kim atrā asti mukham havirbhujām

original: BhP_04.21.041/1 aśnāty anantaḥ khalu tattva-kovidaiḥ śraddhā-hutaṃ yan-mukha ijya-nāmabhiḥ
analyzed: aśnāti anantaḥ khalu tattva kovidaiḥ śraddhā hutam yad mukhe ijya nāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.041/2 na vai tathā cetanayā bahiṣ-kṛte hutāśane pāramahaṃsya-paryaguḥ
analyzed: na vai tathā cetanayā bahiṣkṛte hutāśane pāramahaṃsya paryaguḥ

original: BhP_04.21.042/1 yad brahma nityaṃ virajaṃ sanātanaṃ śraddhā-tapo-maṅgala-mauna-saṃyamaiḥ
analyzed: yat brahma nityam virajam sanātanam śraddhā tapaḥ maṅgala mauna saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.042/2 samādhinā bibhrati hārtha-dṛṣṭaye yatredam ādarśa ivāvabhāsate
analyzed: samādhinā bibhrati ha artha dṛṣṭaye yatra idam ādarśe iva avabhāsate

original: BhP_04.21.043/1 teṣām ahaṃ pāda-saroja-reṇum āryā vaheyādhi-kirīṭam āyuḥ
analyzed: teṣām aham pāda saroja reṇum āryāḥ vaheya adhi kirīṭam āyuḥ

original: BhP_04.21.043/2 yaṃ nityadā bibhrata āśu pāpaṃ naśyaty amuṃ sarva-guṇā bhajanti
analyzed: yam nityadā bibhrataḥ āśu pāpam naśyati amum sarva guṇāḥ bhajanti

original: BhP_04.21.044/1 guṇāyanaṃ śīla-dhanaṃ kṛta-jñaṃ vṛddhāśrayaṃ saṃvṛṇate 'nu sampadaḥ
analyzed: guṇāyanam śīla dhanam kṛtajñam vṛddha āśrayam saṃvṛṇate anu sampadaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.044/2 prasīdatāṃ brahma-kulaṃ gavāṃ ca janārdanaḥ sānucaraś ca mahyam
analyzed: prasīdatām brahma kulam gavām ca janārdanaḥ sa anucaraḥ ca mahyam

original: BhP_04.21.045/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.21.046/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ pitṛ-deva-dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam nṛpatim pitṛ deva dvijātayaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.046/2 tuṣṭuvur hṛṣṭa-manasaḥ sādhu-vādena sādhavaḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭuvuḥ hṛṣṭa manasaḥ sādhuvādena sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.047/1 putreṇa jayate lokān iti satyavatī śrutiḥ
analyzed: putreṇa jayate lokān iti satyavatī śrutiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.047/2 brahma-daṇḍa-hataḥ pāpo yad veno 'tyatarat tamaḥ
analyzed: brahma daṇḍa hataḥ pāpaḥ yat venaḥ atyatarat tamaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.048/1 hiraṇyakaśipuś cāpi bhagavan-nindayā tamaḥ
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca api bhagavat nindayā tamaḥ

original: BhP_04.21.048/2 vivikṣur atyagāt sūnoḥ prahlādasyānubhāvataḥ
analyzed: vivikṣuḥ atyagāt sūnoḥ prahlādasya anubhāvataḥ

original: BhP_04.21.049/1 vīra-varya pitaḥ pṛthvyāḥ samāḥ sañjīva śāśvatīḥ
analyzed: vīra varya pitar pṛthvyāḥ samāḥ san jīva śāśvatīḥ

original: BhP_04.21.049/2 yasyedṛśy acyute bhaktiḥ sarva-lokaika-bhartari
analyzed: yasya īdṛśī acyute bhaktiḥ sarva loka eka bhartari

original: BhP_04.21.050/1 aho vayaṃ hy adya pavitra-kīrte tvayaiva nāthena mukunda-nāthāḥ
analyzed: aho vayam hi adya pavitra kīrte tvayā eva nāthena mukunda nāthāḥ

original: BhP_04.21.050/2 ya uttamaślokatamasya viṣṇor brahmaṇya-devasya kathāṃ vyanakti
analyzed: yaḥ uttamaślokatamasya viṣṇoḥ brahmaṇyadevasya kathām vyanakti

original: BhP_04.21.051/1 nātyadbhutam idaṃ nātha tavājīvyānuśāsanam
analyzed: na ati adbhutam idam nātha tava ājīvya anuśāsanam

original: BhP_04.21.051/2 prajānurāgo mahatāṃ prakṛtiḥ karuṇātmanām
analyzed: prajā anurāgaḥ mahatām prakṛtiḥ karuṇa ātmanām

original: BhP_04.21.052/1 adya nas tamasaḥ pāras tvayopāsāditaḥ prabho
analyzed: adya naḥ tamasaḥ pāraḥ tvayā upāsāditaḥ prabho

original: BhP_04.21.052/2 bhrāmyatāṃ naṣṭa-dṛṣṭīnāṃ karmabhir daiva-saṃjñitaiḥ
analyzed: bhrāmyatām naṣṭa dṛṣṭīnām karmabhiḥ daiva saṃjñitaiḥ

original: BhP_04.21.053/1 namo vivṛddha-sattvāya puruṣāya mahīyase
analyzed: namaḥ vivṛddha sattvāya puruṣāya mahīyase

original: BhP_04.21.053/2 yo brahma kṣatram āviśya bibhartīdaṃ sva-tejasā
analyzed: yaḥ brahma kṣatram āviśya bibharti idam sva tejasā

original: BhP_04.22.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.001/1 janeṣu pragṛṇatsv evaṃ pṛthuṃ pṛthula-vikramam
analyzed: janeṣu pragṛṇatsu evam pṛthum pṛthula vikramam

original: BhP_04.22.001/2 tatropajagmur munayaś catvāraḥ sūrya-varcasaḥ
analyzed: tatra upajagmuḥ munayaḥ catvāraḥ sūrya varcasaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.002/1 tāṃs tu siddheśvarān rājā vyomno 'vatarato 'rciṣā
analyzed: tān tu siddha īśvarān rājā vyomnaḥ avatarataḥ arciṣā

original: BhP_04.22.002/2 lokān apāpān kurvāṇān sānugo 'caṣṭa lakṣitān
analyzed: lokān a pāpān kurvāṇān sa anugaḥ acaṣṭa lakṣitān

original: BhP_04.22.003/1 tad-darśanodgatān prāṇān pratyāditsur ivotthitaḥ
analyzed: tad darśana udgatān prāṇān pratyāditsuḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.003/2 sa-sadasyānugo vainya indriyeśo guṇān iva
analyzed: sa sadasya anugaḥ vainyaḥ indriya īśaḥ guṇān iva

original: BhP_04.22.004/1 gauravād yantritaḥ sabhyaḥ praśrayānata-kandharaḥ
analyzed: gauravāt yantritaḥ sabhyaḥ praśraya ānata kandharaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.004/2 vidhivat pūjayāṃ cakre gṛhītādhyarhaṇāsanān
analyzed: vidhivat cakre gṛhīta adhi arhaṇa āsanān

original: BhP_04.22.005/1 tat-pāda-śauca-salilair mārjitālaka-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: tad pāda śauca salilaiḥ mārjita alaka bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.005/2 tatra śīlavatāṃ vṛttam ācaran mānayann iva
analyzed: tatra śīlavatām vṛttam ācaran mānayan iva

original: BhP_04.22.006/1 hāṭakāsana āsīnān sva-dhiṣṇyeṣv iva pāvakān
analyzed: hāṭaka āsane āsīnān sva dhiṣṇyeṣu iva pāvakān

original: BhP_04.22.006/2 śraddhā-saṃyama-saṃyuktaḥ prītaḥ prāha bhavāgrajān
analyzed: śraddhā saṃyama saṃyuktaḥ prītaḥ prāha bhava agrajān

original: BhP_04.22.007/0 pṛthur uvāca
analyzed: pṛthuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.007/1 aho ācaritaṃ kiṃ me maṅgalaṃ maṅgalāyanāḥ
analyzed: aho ācaritam kim me maṅgalam maṅgalāyanāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.007/2 yasya vo darśanaṃ hy āsīd durdarśānāṃ ca yogibhiḥ
analyzed: yasya vaḥ darśanam hi āsīt durdarśānām ca yogibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.22.008/1 kiṃ tasya durlabhataram iha loke paratra ca
analyzed: kim tasya durlabhataram iha loke paratra ca

original: BhP_04.22.008/2 yasya viprāḥ prasīdanti śivo viṣṇuś ca sānugaḥ
analyzed: yasya viprāḥ prasīdanti śivaḥ viṣṇuḥ ca sa anugaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.009/1 naiva lakṣayate loko lokān paryaṭato 'pi yān
analyzed: nā eva lakṣayate lokaḥ lokān paryaṭataḥ api yān

original: BhP_04.22.009/2 yathā sarva-dṛśaṃ sarva ātmānaṃ ye 'sya hetavaḥ
analyzed: yathā sarva dṛśam sarve ātmānam ye asya hetavaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.010/1 adhanā api te dhanyāḥ sādhavo gṛha-medhinaḥ
analyzed: adhanāḥ api te dhanyāḥ sādhavaḥ gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.010/2 yad-gṛhā hy arha-varyāmbu- tṛṇa-bhūmīśvarāvarāḥ
analyzed: yad gṛhāḥ hi arha varya ambu tṛṇa bhūmi īśvara avarāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.011/1 vyālālaya-drumā vai teṣv ariktākhila-sampadaḥ
analyzed: vyāla ālaya drumāḥ vai teṣu arikta akhila sampadaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.011/2 yad-gṛhās tīrtha-pādīya- pādatīrtha-vivarjitāḥ
analyzed: yad gṛhāḥ tīrthapādīya pāda tīrtha vivarjitāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.012/1 svāgataṃ vo dvija-śreṣṭhā yad-vratāni mumukṣavaḥ
analyzed: svāgatam vaḥ dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ yat vratāni mumukṣavaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.012/2 caranti śraddhayā dhīrā bālā eva bṛhanti ca
analyzed: caranti śraddhayā dhīrāḥ bālāḥ eva bṛhanti ca

original: BhP_04.22.013/1 kaccin naḥ kuśalaṃ nāthā indriyārthārtha-vedinām
analyzed: kaccit naḥ kuśalam nāthāḥ indriya artha artha vedinām

original: BhP_04.22.013/2 vyasanāvāpa etasmin patitānāṃ sva-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: vyasana āvāpe etasmin patitānām sva karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.22.014/1 bhavatsu kuśala-praśna ātmārāmeṣu neṣyate
analyzed: bhavatsu kuśala praśnaḥ ātma ārāmeṣu na iṣyate

original: BhP_04.22.014/2 kuśalākuśalā yatra na santi mati-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: kuśala akuśalāḥ yatra na santi mati vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.015/1 tad ahaṃ kṛta-viśrambhaḥ suhṛdo vas tapasvinām
analyzed: tat aham kṛta viśrambhaḥ suhṛdaḥ vaḥ tapasvinām

original: BhP_04.22.015/2 sampṛcche bhava etasmin kṣemaḥ kenāñjasā bhavet
analyzed: sampṛcche bhave etasmin kṣemaḥ kena añjasā bhavet

original: BhP_04.22.016/1 vyaktam ātmavatām ātmā bhagavān ātma-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: vyaktam ātmavatām ātmā bhagavān ātma bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.016/2 svānām anugrahāyemāṃ siddha-rūpī caraty ajaḥ
analyzed: svānām anugrahāya imām siddha rūpī carati ajaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.017/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.017/1 pṛthos tat sūktam ākarṇya sāraṃ suṣṭhu mitaṃ madhu
analyzed: pṛthoḥ tat sūktam ākarṇya sāram suṣṭhu mitam madhu

original: BhP_04.22.017/2 smayamāna iva prītyā kumāraḥ pratyuvāca ha
analyzed: smayamānaḥ iva prītyā kumāraḥ pratyuvāca ha

original: BhP_04.22.018/0 sanat-kumāra uvāca
analyzed: sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.018/1 sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja sarva-bhūta-hitātmanā
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam mahā rāja sarva bhūta hita ātmanā

original: BhP_04.22.018/2 bhavatā viduṣā cāpi sādhūnāṃ matir īdṛśī
analyzed: bhavatā viduṣā ca api sādhūnām matiḥ īdṛśī

original: BhP_04.22.019/1 saṅgamaḥ khalu sādhūnām ubhayeṣāṃ ca sammataḥ
analyzed: saṅgamaḥ khalu sādhūnām ubhayeṣām ca sammataḥ

original: BhP_04.22.019/2 yat-sambhāṣaṇa-sampraśnaḥ sarveṣāṃ vitanoti śam
analyzed: yat sambhāṣaṇa sampraśnaḥ sarveṣām vitanoti śam

original: BhP_04.22.020/1 asty eva rājan bhavato madhudviṣaḥ pādāravindasya guṇānuvādane
analyzed: asti eva rājan bhavataḥ madhudviṣaḥ pāda aravindasya guṇa anuvādane

original: BhP_04.22.020/2 ratir durāpā vidhunoti naiṣṭhikī kāmaṃ kaṣāyaṃ malam antar-ātmanaḥ
analyzed: ratiḥ durāpā vidhunoti naiṣṭhikī kāmam kaṣāyam malam antarātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.021/1 śāstreṣv iyān eva suniścito nṛṇāṃ kṣemasya sadhryag-vimṛśeṣu hetuḥ
analyzed: śāstreṣu iyān eva su niścitaḥ nṛṇām kṣemasya sadhri agvi mṛśa iṣu hetuḥ

original: BhP_04.22.021/2 asaṅga ātma-vyatirikta ātmani dṛḍhā ratir brahmaṇi nirguṇe ca yā
analyzed: asaṅge ātma vyatirikte ātmani dṛḍhā ratiḥ brahmaṇi nirguṇe ca yā

original: BhP_04.22.022/1 sā śraddhayā bhagavad-dharma-caryayā jijñāsayādhyātmika-yoga-niṣṭhayā
analyzed: sā śraddhayā bhagavat dharma caryayā jijñāsayā ādhyātmika yoga niṣṭhayā

original: BhP_04.22.022/2 yogeśvaropāsanayā ca nityaṃ puṇya-śravaḥ-kathayā puṇyayā ca
analyzed: yoga īśvara upāsanayā ca nityam puṇya śravaḥ kathayā puṇyayā ca

original: BhP_04.22.023/1 arthendriyārāma-sagoṣṭhy-atṛṣṇayā tat-sammatānām aparigraheṇa ca
analyzed: artha indriya ārāma sagoṣṭhī atṛṣṇayā tad sammatānām aparigraheṇa ca

original: BhP_04.22.023/2 vivikta-rucyā paritoṣa ātmani vinā harer guṇa-pīyūṣa-pānāt
analyzed: vivikta rucyā paritoṣaḥ ātmani vinā hareḥ guṇa pīyūṣa pānāt

original: BhP_04.22.024/1 ahiṃsayā pāramahaṃsya-caryayā smṛtyā mukundācaritāgrya-sīdhunā
analyzed: ahiṃsayā pāramahaṃsya caryayā smṛtyā mukunda ācarita agrya sīdhunā

original: BhP_04.22.024/2 yamair akāmair niyamaiś cāpy anindayā nirīhayā dvandva-titikṣayā ca
analyzed: yamaiḥ akāmaiḥ niyamaiḥ ca api anindayā nirīhayā dvandva titikṣayā ca

original: BhP_04.22.025/1 harer muhus tatpara-karṇa-pūra- guṇābhidhānena vijṛmbhamāṇayā
analyzed: hareḥ muhur tad para karṇapūra guṇa abhidhānena vijṛmbhamāṇayā

original: BhP_04.22.025/2 bhaktyā hy asaṅgaḥ sad-asaty anātmani syān nirguṇe brahmaṇi cāñjasā ratiḥ
analyzed: bhaktyā hi asaṅgaḥ sat asati anātmani syāt nirguṇe brahmaṇi ca añjasā ratiḥ

original: BhP_04.22.026/1 yadā ratir brahmaṇi naiṣṭhikī pumān ācāryavān jñāna-virāga-raṃhasā
analyzed: yadā ratiḥ brahmaṇi naiṣṭhikī pumān ācāryavān jñāna virāga raṃhasā

original: BhP_04.22.026/2 dahaty avīryaṃ hṛdayaṃ jīva-kośaṃ pañcātmakaṃ yonim ivotthito 'gniḥ
analyzed: dahati avīryam hṛdayam jīva kośam pañca ātmakam yonim iva utthitaḥ agniḥ

original: BhP_04.22.027/1 dagdhāśayo mukta-samasta-tad-guṇo naivātmano bahir antar vicaṣṭe
analyzed: dagdha āśayaḥ mukta samasta tad guṇaḥ na eva ātmanaḥ bahis antar vicaṣṭe

original: BhP_04.22.027/2 parātmanor yad-vyavadhānaṃ purastāt svapne yathā puruṣas tad-vināśe
analyzed: para ātmanoḥ yat vyavadhānam purastāt svapne yathā puruṣaḥ tad vināśe

original: BhP_04.22.028/1 ātmānam indriyārthaṃ ca paraṃ yad ubhayor api
analyzed: ātmānam indriya artham ca param yat ubhayoḥ api

original: BhP_04.22.028/2 saty āśaya upādhau vai pumān paśyati nānyadā
analyzed: sati āśaye upādhau vai pumān paśyati na anyadā

original: BhP_04.22.029/1 nimitte sati sarvatra jalādāv api pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: nimitte sati sarvatra jala ādau api pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.029/2 ātmanaś ca parasyāpi bhidāṃ paśyati nānyadā
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca parasya api bhidām paśyati na anyadā

original: BhP_04.22.030/1 indriyair viṣayākṛṣṭair ākṣiptaṃ dhyāyatāṃ manaḥ
analyzed: indriyaiḥ viṣaya ākṛṣṭaiḥ ākṣiptam dhyāyatām manaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.030/2 cetanāṃ harate buddheḥ stambas toyam iva hradāt
analyzed: cetanām harate buddheḥ stambaḥ toyam iva hradāt

original: BhP_04.22.031/1 bhraśyaty anusmṛtiś cittaṃ jñāna-bhraṃśaḥ smṛti-kṣaye
analyzed: bhraśyati anusmṛtiḥ cittam jñāna bhraṃśaḥ smṛti kṣaye

original: BhP_04.22.031/2 tad-rodhaṃ kavayaḥ prāhur ātmāpahnavam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tad rodham kavayaḥ prāhuḥ ātma apahnavam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.032/1 nātaḥ parataro loke puṃsaḥ svārtha-vyatikramaḥ
analyzed: na atas parataraḥ loke puṃsaḥ sva artha vyatikramaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.032/2 yad-adhy anyasya preyastvam ātmanaḥ sva-vyatikramāt
analyzed: yat adhi anyasya preyaḥ tvam ātmanaḥ sva vyatikramāt

original: BhP_04.22.033/1 arthendriyārthābhidhyānaṃ sarvārthāpahnavo nṛṇām
analyzed: artha indriya artha abhidhyānam sarva artha apahnavaḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_04.22.033/2 bhraṃśito jñāna-vijñānād yenāviśati mukhyatām
analyzed: bhraṃśitaḥ jñāna vijñānāt yena āviśati mukhya tām

original: BhP_04.22.034/1 na kuryāt karhicit saṅgaṃ tamas tīvraṃ titīriṣuḥ
analyzed: na kuryāt karhicit saṅgam tamaḥ tīvram titīriṣuḥ

original: BhP_04.22.034/2 dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāṇāṃ yad atyanta-vighātakam
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām yat atyanta vighātakam

original: BhP_04.22.035/1 tatrāpi mokṣa evārtha ātyantikatayeṣyate
analyzed: tatra api mokṣaḥ eva arthaḥ ātyantika tayā iṣyate

original: BhP_04.22.035/2 traivargyo 'rtho yato nityaṃ kṛtānta-bhaya-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: traivargyaḥ arthaḥ yatas nityam kṛtānta bhaya saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.036/1 pare 'vare ca ye bhāvā guṇa-vyatikarād anu
analyzed: pare avare ca ye bhāvāḥ guṇa vyatikarāt anu

original: BhP_04.22.036/2 na teṣāṃ vidyate kṣemam īśa-vidhvaṃsitāśiṣām
analyzed: na teṣām vidyate kṣemam īśa vidhvaṃsita āśiṣām

original: BhP_04.22.037/1 tat tvaṃ narendra jagatām atha tasthūṣāṃ ca
analyzed: tat tvam narendra jagatām atha tasthūṣām ca

original: BhP_04.22.037/2 dehendriyāsu-dhiṣaṇātmabhir āvṛtānām
analyzed: deha indriya asu dhiṣaṇā ātmabhiḥ āvṛtānām

original: BhP_04.22.037/3 yaḥ kṣetravit-tapatayā hṛdi viśvag āviḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kṣetra vittapa tayā hṛdi āvis

original: BhP_04.22.037/4 pratyak cakāsti bhagavāṃs tam avehi so 'smi
analyzed: pratyak cakāsti bhagavān tam avehi saḥ asmi

original: BhP_04.22.038/1 yasminn idaṃ sad-asad-ātmatayā vibhāti
analyzed: yasmin idam sat asat ātma tayā vibhāti

original: BhP_04.22.038/2 māyā viveka-vidhuti sraji vāhi-buddhiḥ
BhP_04.22.038/3 taṃ nitya-mukta-pariśuddha-viśuddha-tattvaṃ
analyzed: tam nityam ukta pariśuddha viśuddha tattvam

original: BhP_04.22.038/4 pratyūḍha-karma-kalila-prakṛtiṃ prapadye
analyzed: pratyūḍha karma kalila prakṛtim prapadye

original: BhP_04.22.039/1 yat-pāda-paṅkaja-palāśa-vilāsa-bhaktyā
analyzed: yat pāda paṅkaja palāśa vilāsa bhaktyā

original: BhP_04.22.039/2 karmāśayaṃ grathitam udgrathayanti santaḥ
analyzed: karma āśayam grathitam udgrathayanti santaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.039/3 tadvan na rikta-matayo yatayo 'pi ruddha-
analyzed: tadvat na rikta matayaḥ yatayaḥ api

original: BhP_04.22.039/4 sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam
analyzed: srotaḥ gaṇāḥ tam araṇam bhaja vāsudevam

original: BhP_04.22.040/1 kṛcchro mahān iha bhavārṇavam aplaveśāṃ
analyzed: kṛcchraḥ mahān iha bhava arṇavam a plava īśām

original: BhP_04.22.040/2 ṣaḍ-varga-nakram asukhena titīrṣanti
analyzed: ṣaḍvarga nakram asukhena titīrṣanti

original: BhP_04.22.040/3 tat tvaṃ harer bhagavato bhajanīyam aṅghriṃ
analyzed: tat tvam hareḥ bhagavataḥ bhajanīyam aṅghrim

original: BhP_04.22.040/4 kṛtvoḍupaṃ vyasanam uttara dustarārṇam
analyzed: kṛtvā uḍupam vyasanam uttara dustara arṇam

original: BhP_04.22.041/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.041/1 sa evaṃ brahma-putreṇa kumāreṇātma-medhasā
analyzed: saḥ evam brahma putreṇa kumāreṇa ātma medhasā

original: BhP_04.22.041/2 darśitātma-gatiḥ samyak praśasyovāca taṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: darśita ātma gatiḥ samyak praśasya uvāca tam nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.042/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.042/1 kṛto me 'nugrahaḥ pūrvaṃ hariṇārtānukampinā
analyzed: kṛtaḥ me anugrahaḥ pūrvam hariṇā ārta anukampinā

original: BhP_04.22.042/2 tam āpādayituṃ brahman bhagavan yūyam āgatāḥ
analyzed: tam āpādayitum brahman bhagavan yūyam āgatāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.043/1 niṣpāditaś ca kārtsnyena bhagavadbhir ghṛṇālubhiḥ
analyzed: niṣpāditaḥ ca kārtsnyena bhagavadbhiḥ ghṛṇālubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.22.043/2 sādhūcchiṣṭaṃ hi me sarvam ātmanā saha kiṃ dade
analyzed: sādhu ucchiṣṭam hi me sarvam ātmanā saha kim dade

original: BhP_04.22.044/1 prāṇā dārāḥ sutā brahman gṛhāś ca sa-paricchadāḥ
analyzed: prāṇāḥ dārāḥ sutāḥ brahman gṛhāḥ ca sa paricchadāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.044/2 rājyaṃ balaṃ mahī kośa iti sarvaṃ niveditam
analyzed: rājyam balam mahī kośaḥ iti sarvam niveditam

original: BhP_04.22.045/1 sainā-patyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca daṇḍa-netṛtvam eva ca
analyzed: saināpatyam ca rājyam ca daṇḍa netṛ tvam eva ca

original: BhP_04.22.045/2 sarva lokādhipatyaṃ ca veda-śāstra-vid arhati
analyzed: loka ādhipatyam ca veda śāstra vid arhati

original: BhP_04.22.046/1 svam eva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca
analyzed: svam eva brāhmaṇaḥ bhuṅkte svam vaste svam dadāti ca

original: BhP_04.22.046/2 tasyaivānugraheṇānnaṃ bhuñjate kṣatriyādayaḥ
analyzed: tasya eva anugraheṇa annam bhuñjate kṣatriya ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.047/1 yair īdṛśī bhagavato gatir ātma-vāda
analyzed: yaiḥ īdṛśī bhagavataḥ gatiḥ ātma vāda

original: BhP_04.22.047/2 ekāntato nigamibhiḥ pratipāditā naḥ
analyzed: ekāntataḥ nigamibhiḥ pratipāditā naḥ

original: BhP_04.22.047/3 tuṣyantv adabhra-karuṇāḥ sva-kṛtena nityaṃ
analyzed: tuṣyantu adabhra karuṇāḥ sva kṛtena nityam

original: BhP_04.22.047/4 ko nāma tat pratikaroti vinoda-pātram
analyzed: kaḥ nāma tat pratikaroti vinoda pātram

original: BhP_04.22.048/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.22.048/1 ta ātma-yoga-pataya ādi-rājena pūjitāḥ
analyzed: te ātma yoga patayaḥ ādirājena pūjitāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.048/2 śīlaṃ tadīyaṃ śaṃsantaḥ khe 'bhavan miṣatāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: śīlam tadīyam śaṃsantaḥ khe abhavat miṣatām nṛṇām

original: BhP_04.22.049/1 vainyas tu dhuryo mahatāṃ saṃsthityādhyātma-śikṣayā
analyzed: vainyaḥ tu dhuryaḥ mahatām saṃsthitya adhyātma śikṣayā

original: BhP_04.22.049/2 āpta-kāmam ivātmānaṃ mena ātmany avasthitaḥ
analyzed: āpta kāmam iva ātmānam mene ātmani avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.050/1 karmāṇi ca yathā-kālaṃ yathā-deśaṃ yathā-balam
analyzed: karmāṇi ca yathākālam yathādeśam yathābalam

original: BhP_04.22.050/2 yathocitaṃ yathā-vittam akarod brahma-sāt-kṛtam
analyzed: yathocitam yathāvittam akarot brahmasātkṛtam

original: BhP_04.22.051/1 phalaṃ brahmaṇi sannyasya nirviṣaṅgaḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: phalam brahmaṇi sannyasya nirviṣaṅgaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.051/2 karmādhyakṣaṃ ca manvāna ātmānaṃ prakṛteḥ param
analyzed: karma adhyakṣam ca manvānaḥ ātmānam prakṛteḥ param

original: BhP_04.22.052/1 gṛheṣu vartamāno 'pi sa sāmrājya-śriyānvitaḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu vartamānaḥ api sa sāmrājya śriyā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.052/2 nāsajjatendriyārtheṣu niraham-matir arkavat
analyzed: na asajjata indriya artheṣu nirahammatiḥ arka vat

original: BhP_04.22.053/1 evam adhyātma-yogena karmāṇy anusamācaran
analyzed: evam adhyātma yogena karmāṇi anusamācaran

original: BhP_04.22.053/2 putrān utpādayām āsa pañcārciṣy ātma-sammatān
analyzed: putrān utpādayām āsa pañca arciṣi ātma sammatān

original: BhP_04.22.054/1 vijitāśvaṃ dhūmrakeśaṃ haryakṣaṃ draviṇaṃ vṛkam
analyzed: vijitāśvam dhūmrakeśam haryakṣam draviṇam vṛkam

original: BhP_04.22.054/2 sarveṣāṃ loka-pālānāṃ dadhāraikaḥ pṛthur guṇān
analyzed: sarveṣām lokapālānām dadhāra ekaḥ pṛthuḥ guṇān

original: BhP_04.22.055/1 gopīthāya jagat-sṛṣṭeḥ kāle sve sve 'cyutātmakaḥ
analyzed: gopīthāya jagat sṛṣṭeḥ kāle sve sve acyuta ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.055/2 mano-vāg-vṛttibhiḥ saumyair guṇaiḥ saṃrañjayan prajāḥ
analyzed: manaḥ vāc vṛttibhiḥ saumyaiḥ guṇaiḥ saṃrañjayan prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.22.056/1 rājety adhān nāmadheyaṃ soma-rāja ivāparaḥ
analyzed: rājā iti adhāt nāmadheyam soma rājaḥ iva aparaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.056/2 sūryavad visṛjan gṛhṇan pratapaṃś ca bhuvo vasu
analyzed: sūrya vat visṛjan gṛhṇan pratapan ca bhuvaḥ vasu

original: BhP_04.22.057/1 durdharṣas tejasevāgnir mahendra iva durjayaḥ
analyzed: durdharṣaḥ tejasā iva agniḥ mahā indraḥ iva durjayaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.057/2 titikṣayā dharitrīva dyaur ivābhīṣṭa-do nṛṇām
analyzed: titikṣayā dharitrī iva dyauḥ iva abhīṣṭa daḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_04.22.058/1 varṣati sma yathā-kāmaṃ parjanya iva tarpayan
analyzed: varṣati sma yathākāmam parjanyaḥ iva tarpayan

original: BhP_04.22.058/2 samudra iva durbodhaḥ sattvenācala-rāḍ iva
analyzed: samudraḥ iva durbodhaḥ sattvena acala rāj iva

original: BhP_04.22.059/1 dharma-rāḍ iva śikṣāyām āścarye himavān iva
analyzed: dharmarāj iva śikṣāyām āścarye himavān iva

original: BhP_04.22.059/2 kuvera iva kośāḍhyo guptārtho varuṇo yathā
analyzed: kuveraḥ iva kośa āḍhyaḥ gupta arthaḥ varuṇaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.22.060/1 mātariśveva sarvātmā balena mahasaujasā
analyzed: mātariśvā iva sarva ātmā balena mahasā ojasā

original: BhP_04.22.060/2 aviṣahyatayā devo bhagavān bhūta-rāḍ iva
analyzed: aviṣahya tayā devaḥ bhagavān bhūta rāj iva

original: BhP_04.22.061/1 kandarpa iva saundarye manasvī mṛga-rāḍ iva
analyzed: kandarpaḥ iva saundarye manasvī mṛgarāj iva

original: BhP_04.22.061/2 vātsalye manuvan nṛṇāṃ prabhutve bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: vātsalye manu vat nṛṇām prabhu tve bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_04.22.062/1 bṛhaspatir brahma-vāde ātmavattve svayaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ brahma vāde ātmavat tve svayam hariḥ

original: BhP_04.22.062/2 bhaktyā go-guru-vipreṣu viṣvaksenānuvartiṣu
analyzed: bhaktyā go guru vipreṣu viṣvaksena anuvartiṣu

original: BhP_04.22.062/3 hriyā praśraya-śīlābhyām ātma-tulyaḥ parodyame
analyzed: hriyā praśraya śīlābhyām ātma tulyaḥ para udyame

original: BhP_04.22.063/1 kīrtyordhva-gītayā pumbhis trailokye tatra tatra ha
analyzed: kīrtyā ūrdhva gītayā pumbhiḥ trailokye tatra tatra ha

original: BhP_04.22.063/2 praviṣṭaḥ karṇa-randhreṣu strīṇāṃ rāmaḥ satām iva
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ karṇa randhreṣu strīṇām rāmaḥ satām iva

original: BhP_04.23.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.23.001/1 dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ pravayasam ekadā vainya ātmavān
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ātmānam pravayasam ekadā vainyaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_04.23.001/2 ātmanā vardhitāśeṣa- svānusargaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: ātmanā vardhita aśeṣa sva anusargaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.23.002/1 jagatas tasthuṣaś cāpi vṛttido dharma-bhṛt satām
analyzed: jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca api vṛtti daḥ dharma bhṛt satām

original: BhP_04.23.002/2 niṣpāditeśvarādeśo yad-artham iha jajñivān
analyzed: niṣpādita īśvara ādeśaḥ yad artham iha jajñivān

original: BhP_04.23.003/1 ātmajeṣv ātmajāṃ nyasya virahād rudatīm iva
analyzed: ātmajeṣu ātmajām nyasya virahāt rudatīm iva

original: BhP_04.23.003/2 prajāsu vimanaḥsv ekaḥ sa-dāro 'gāt tapo-vanam
analyzed: prajāsu vimanaḥsu ekaḥ sa dāraḥ agāt tapaḥ vanam

original: BhP_04.23.004/1 tatrāpy adābhya-niyamo vaikhānasa-susammate
analyzed: tatra api adābhya niyamaḥ vaikhānasa su sammate

original: BhP_04.23.004/2 ārabdha ugra-tapasi yathā sva-vijaye purā
analyzed: ārabdhaḥ ugra tapasi yathā sva vijaye purā

original: BhP_04.23.005/1 kanda-mūla-phalāhāraḥ śuṣka-parṇāśanaḥ kvacit
analyzed: kanda mūla phala āhāraḥ śuṣka parṇa aśanaḥ kvacid

original: BhP_04.23.005/2 ab-bhakṣaḥ katicit pakṣān vāyu-bhakṣas tataḥ param
analyzed: abbhakṣaḥ katicid pakṣān vāyubhakṣaḥ tatas param

original: BhP_04.23.006/1 grīṣme pañca-tapā vīro varṣāsv āsāraṣāṇ muniḥ
analyzed: grīṣme pañcatapāḥ vīraḥ varṣāsu āsāra sāh muniḥ

original: BhP_04.23.006/2 ākaṇṭha-magnaḥ śiśire udake sthaṇḍile-śayaḥ
analyzed: ā kaṇṭha magnaḥ śiśire udake sthaṇḍileśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.007/1 titikṣur yata-vāg dānta ūrdhva-retā jitānilaḥ
analyzed: titikṣuḥ yata vāc dāntaḥ ūrdhvaretāḥ jita anilaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.007/2 ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇam acarat tapa uttamam
analyzed: ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇam acarat tapaḥ uttamam

original: BhP_04.23.008/1 tena kramānusiddhena dhvasta-karma-malāśayaḥ
analyzed: tena krama anusiddhena dhvasta karma mala āśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.008/2 prāṇāyāmaiḥ sanniruddha- ṣaḍ-vargaś chinna-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaiḥ san niruddha ṣaḍvargaḥ chinna bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.009/1 sanat-kumāro bhagavān yad āhādhyātmikaṃ param
analyzed: sanatkumāraḥ bhagavān yat āha ādhyātmikam param

original: BhP_04.23.009/2 yogaṃ tenaiva puruṣam abhajat puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: yogam tena eva puruṣam abhajat puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.010/1 bhagavad-dharmiṇaḥ sādhoḥ śraddhayā yatataḥ sadā
analyzed: bhagavat dharmiṇaḥ sādhoḥ śraddhayā yatataḥ sadā

original: BhP_04.23.010/2 bhaktir bhagavati brahmaṇy ananya-viṣayābhavat
analyzed: bhaktiḥ bhagavati brahmaṇi ananya viṣayā bhavat

original: BhP_04.23.011/1 tasyānayā bhagavataḥ parikarma-śuddha-
analyzed: tasya anayā bhagavataḥ parikarma śuddha

original: BhP_04.23.011/2 sattvātmanas tad-anusaṃsmaraṇānupūrtyā
analyzed: sattva ātmanaḥ tad anusaṃsmaraṇa anupūrtyā

original: BhP_04.23.011/3 jñānaṃ viraktimad abhūn niśitena yena
analyzed: jñānam viraktimat abhūt niśitena yena

original: BhP_04.23.011/4 ciccheda saṃśaya-padaṃ nija-jīva-kośam
analyzed: ciccheda saṃśaya padam nija jīva kośam

original: BhP_04.23.012/1 chinnānya-dhīr adhigatātma-gatir nirīhas
analyzed: chinna anya dhīḥ adhigata ātma gatiḥ nirīhaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.012/2 tat tatyaje 'cchinad idaṃ vayunena yena
analyzed: tat tatyaje acchinat idam vayunena yena

original: BhP_04.23.012/3 tāvan na yoga-gatibhir yatir apramatto
analyzed: tāvat na yoga gatibhiḥ yatiḥ apramattaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.012/4 yāvad gadāgraja-kathāsu ratiṃ na kuryāt
analyzed: yāvat gadāgraja kathāsu ratim na kuryāt

original: BhP_04.23.013/1 evaṃ sa vīra-pravaraḥ saṃyojyātmānam ātmani
analyzed: evam sa vīra pravaraḥ saṃyojya ātmānam ātmani

original: BhP_04.23.013/2 brahma-bhūto dṛḍhaṃ kāle tatyāja svaṃ kalevaram
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ dṛḍham kāle tatyāja svam kalevaram

original: BhP_04.23.014/1 sampīḍya pāyuṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ vāyum utsārayañ chanaiḥ
analyzed: sampīḍya pāyum pārṣṇibhyām vāyum utsārayam śanais

original: BhP_04.23.014/2 nābhyāṃ koṣṭheṣv avasthāpya hṛd-uraḥ-kaṇṭha-śīrṣaṇi
analyzed: nābhyām koṣṭheṣu avasthāpya hṛd uraḥ kaṇṭha śīrṣaṇi

original: BhP_04.23.015/1 utsarpayaṃs tu taṃ mūrdhni krameṇāveśya niḥspṛhaḥ
analyzed: utsarpayan tu tam mūrdhni krameṇa āveśya niḥspṛhaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.015/2 vāyuṃ vāyau kṣitau kāyaṃ tejas tejasy ayūyujat
analyzed: vāyum vāyau kṣitau kāyam tejaḥ tejasi ayūyujat

original: BhP_04.23.016/1 khāny ākāśe dravaṃ toye yathā-sthānaṃ vibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: khāni ākāśe dravam toye yathāsthānam vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.016/2 kṣitim ambhasi tat tejasy ado vāyau nabhasy amum
analyzed: kṣitim ambhasi tat tejasi adaḥ vāyau nabhasi amum

original: BhP_04.23.017/1 indriyeṣu manas tāni tan-mātreṣu yathodbhavam
analyzed: indriyeṣu manaḥ tāni tanmātreṣu yathodbhavam

original: BhP_04.23.017/2 bhūtādināmūny utkṛṣya mahaty ātmani sandadhe
analyzed: bhūtādinā amūni utkṛṣya mahati ātmani sandadhe

original: BhP_04.23.018/1 taṃ sarva-guṇa-vinyāsaṃ jīve māyāmaye nyadhāt
analyzed: tam sarva guṇa vinyāsam jīve māyā maye nyadhāt

original: BhP_04.23.018/2 taṃ cānuśayam ātma-stham asāv anuśayī pumān
analyzed: tam ca anuśayam ātma stham asau anuśayī pumān

original: BhP_04.23.018/3 nāna-vairāgya-vīryeṇa svarūpa-stho 'jahāt prabhuḥ
analyzed: na anavairāgya vīryeṇa sva rūpa sthaḥ ajahāt prabhuḥ

original: BhP_04.23.019/1 arcir nāma mahā-rājñī tat-patny anugatā vanam
analyzed: arciḥ nāma mahā rājñī tad patnī anugatā vanam

original: BhP_04.23.019/2 sukumāry atad-arhā ca yat-padbhyāṃ sparśanaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: sukumārī a tad arhā ca yat padbhyām sparśanam bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.020/1 atīva bhartur vrata-dharma-niṣṭhayā śuśrūṣayā cārṣa-deha-yātrayā
analyzed: atīva bhartuḥ vrata dharma niṣṭhayā śuśrūṣayā ca ārṣa dehayātrayā

original: BhP_04.23.020/2 nāvindatārtiṃ parikarśitāpi sā preyaskara-sparśana-māna-nirvṛtiḥ
analyzed: na avindata ārtim parikarśitā api sā preyaskara sparśana māna nirvṛtiḥ

original: BhP_04.23.021/1 dehaṃ vipannākhila-cetanādikaṃ patyuḥ pṛthivyā dayitasya cātmanaḥ
analyzed: deham vipanna akhila cetanā ādikam patyuḥ pṛthivyāḥ dayitasya ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.021/2 ālakṣya kiñcic ca vilapya sā satī citām athāropayad adri-sānuni
analyzed: ālakṣya kiñcid ca vilapya sā satī citām atha āropayat adri sānuni

original: BhP_04.23.022/1 vidhāya kṛtyaṃ hradinī-jalāplutā dattvodakaṃ bhartur udāra-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: vidhāya kṛtyam hradinī jala āplutā dattvā udakam bhartuḥ udāra karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.022/2 natvā divi-sthāṃs tridaśāṃs triḥ parītya viveśa vahniṃ dhyāyatī bhartṛ-pādau
analyzed: natvā divi sthān tridaśān tris parītya viveśa vahnim dhyāyatī bhartṛ pādau

original: BhP_04.23.023/1 vilokyānugatāṃ sādhvīṃ pṛthuṃ vīra-varaṃ patim
analyzed: vilokya anugatām sādhvīm pṛthum vīra varam patim

original: BhP_04.23.023/2 tuṣṭuvur varadā devair deva-patnyaḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭuvuḥ vara dāḥ devaiḥ deva patnyaḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_04.23.024/1 kurvatyaḥ kusumāsāraṃ tasmin mandara-sānuni
analyzed: kurvatyaḥ kusuma āsāram tasmin mandara sānuni

original: BhP_04.23.024/2 nadatsv amara-tūryeṣu gṛṇanti sma parasparam
analyzed: nadatsu amara tūryeṣu gṛṇanti sma parasparam

original: BhP_04.23.025/0 devya ūcuḥ
analyzed: devyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.23.025/1 aho iyaṃ vadhūr dhanyā yā caivaṃ bhū-bhujāṃ patim
analyzed: aho iyam vadhūḥ dhanyā yā ca evam bhūbhujām patim

original: BhP_04.23.025/2 sarvātmanā patiṃ bheje yajñeśaṃ śrīr vadhūr iva
analyzed: sarva ātmanā patim bheje yajñeśam śrīḥ vadhūḥ iva

original: BhP_04.23.026/1 saiṣā nūnaṃ vrajaty ūrdhvam anu vainyaṃ patiṃ satī
analyzed: sā eṣā nūnam vrajati ūrdhvam anu vainyam patim satī

original: BhP_04.23.026/2 paśyatāsmān atītyārcir durvibhāvyena karmaṇā
analyzed: paśyata asmān atītya arciḥ durvibhāvyena karmaṇā

original: BhP_04.23.027/1 teṣāṃ durāpaṃ kiṃ tv anyan martyānāṃ bhagavat-padam
analyzed: teṣām durāpam kim tu anyat martyānām bhagavat padam

original: BhP_04.23.027/2 bhuvi lolāyuṣo ye vai naiṣkarmyaṃ sādhayanty uta
analyzed: bhuvi lola āyuṣaḥ ye vai naiṣkarmyam sādhayanti uta

original: BhP_04.23.028/1 sa vañcito batātma-dhruk kṛcchreṇa mahatā bhuvi
analyzed: sa vañcitaḥ bata ātma druh kṛcchreṇa mahatā bhuvi

original: BhP_04.23.028/2 labdhvāpavargyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ viṣayeṣu viṣajjate
analyzed: labdhvā āpavargyam mānuṣyam viṣayeṣu viṣajjate

original: BhP_04.23.029/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.23.029/1 stuvatīṣv amara-strīṣu pati-lokaṃ gatā vadhūḥ
analyzed: stuvatīṣu amara strīṣu pati lokam gatā vadhūḥ

original: BhP_04.23.029/2 yaṃ vā ātma-vidāṃ dhuryo vainyaḥ prāpācyutāśrayaḥ
analyzed: yam vai ātma vidām dhuryaḥ vainyaḥ prāpa acyuta āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.030/1 ittham-bhūtānubhāvo 'sau pṛthuḥ sa bhagavattamaḥ
analyzed: ittham bhūta anubhāvaḥ asau pṛthuḥ sa bhagavattamaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.030/2 kīrtitaṃ tasya caritam uddāma-caritasya te
analyzed: kīrtitam tasya caritam uddāma caritasya te

original: BhP_04.23.031/1 ya idaṃ sumahat puṇyaṃ śraddhayāvahitaḥ paṭhet
analyzed: yaḥ idam su mahat puṇyam śraddhayā avahitaḥ paṭhet

original: BhP_04.23.031/2 śrāvayec chṛṇuyād vāpi sa pṛthoḥ padavīm iyāt
analyzed: śrāvayet śṛṇuyāt vā api sa pṛthoḥ padavīm iyāt

original: BhP_04.23.032/1 brāhmaṇo brahma-varcasvī rājanyo jagatī-patiḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ brahma varcasvī rājanyaḥ jagatīpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.23.032/2 vaiśyaḥ paṭhan viṭ-patiḥ syāc chūdraḥ sattamatām iyāt
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ paṭhan viṭpatiḥ syāt śūdraḥ sattama tām iyāt

original: BhP_04.23.033/1 triḥ kṛtva idam ākarṇya naro nāry athavādṛtā
analyzed: tris kṛtvas idam ākarṇya naraḥ nārī athavā ādṛtā

original: BhP_04.23.033/2 aprajaḥ suprajatamo nirdhano dhanavattamaḥ
analyzed: aprajaḥ suprajatamaḥ nirdhanaḥ dhanavattamaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.034/1 aspaṣṭa-kīrtiḥ suyaśā mūrkho bhavati paṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: aspaṣṭa kīrtiḥ su yaśāḥ mūrkhaḥ bhavati paṇḍitaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.034/2 idaṃ svasty-ayanaṃ puṃsām amaṅgalya-nivāraṇam
analyzed: idam svastyayanam puṃsām amaṅgalya nivāraṇam

original: BhP_04.23.035/1 dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ kali-malāpaham
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam svargyam kali mala apaham

original: BhP_04.23.035/2 dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāṇāṃ samyak siddhim abhīpsubhiḥ
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām samyak siddhim abhīpsubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.23.035/3 śraddhayaitad anuśrāvyaṃ caturṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ param
analyzed: śraddhayā etat anuśrāvyam caturṇām kāraṇam param

original: BhP_04.23.036/1 vijayābhimukho rājā śrutvaitad abhiyāti yān
analyzed: vijaya abhimukhaḥ rājā śrutvā etat abhiyāti yān

original: BhP_04.23.036/2 baliṃ tasmai haranty agre rājānaḥ pṛthave yathā
analyzed: balim tasmai haranti agre rājānaḥ pṛthave yathā

original: BhP_04.23.037/1 muktānya-saṅgo bhagavaty amalāṃ bhaktim udvahan
analyzed: mukta anya saṅgaḥ bhagavati amalām bhaktim udvahan

original: BhP_04.23.037/2 vainyasya caritaṃ puṇyaṃ śṛṇuyāc chrāvayet paṭhet
analyzed: vainyasya caritam puṇyam śṛṇuyāt śrāvayet paṭhet

original: BhP_04.23.038/1 vaicitravīryābhihitaṃ mahan-māhātmya-sūcakam
analyzed: vaicitravīrya abhihitam mahat māhātmya sūcakam

original: BhP_04.23.038/2 asmin kṛtam atimartyaṃ pārthavīṃ gatim āpnuyāt
analyzed: asmin kṛtam atimartyam pārthavīm gatim āpnuyāt

original: BhP_04.23.039/1 anudinam idam ādareṇa śṛṇvan pṛthu-caritaṃ prathayan vimukta-saṅgaḥ
analyzed: anudinam idam ādareṇa śṛṇvan pṛthu caritam prathayan vimukta saṅgaḥ

original: BhP_04.23.039/2 bhagavati bhava-sindhu-pota-pāde sa ca nipuṇāṃ labhate ratiṃ manuṣyaḥ
analyzed: bhagavati bhava sindhu pota pāde sa ca nipuṇām labhate ratim manuṣyaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.24.001/1 vijitāśvo 'dhirājāsīt pṛthu-putraḥ pṛthu-śravāḥ
analyzed: vijitāśvaḥ adhirājā āsīt pṛthu putraḥ pṛthuśravāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.001/2 yavīyobhyo 'dadāt kāṣṭhā bhrātṛbhyo bhrātṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: yavīyobhyaḥ adadāt kāṣṭhāḥ bhrātṛbhyaḥ bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.002/1 haryakṣāyādiśat prācīṃ dhūmrakeśāya dakṣiṇām
analyzed: haryakṣāya ādiśat prācīm dhūmrakeśāya dakṣiṇām

original: BhP_04.24.002/2 pratīcīṃ vṛka-saṃjñāya turyāṃ draviṇase vibhuḥ
analyzed: pratīcīm vṛka saṃjñāya turyām draviṇase vibhuḥ

original: BhP_04.24.003/1 antardhāna-gatiṃ śakrāl labdhvāntardhāna-saṃjñitaḥ
analyzed: antardhāna gatim śakrāt labdhvā antardhāna saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.003/2 apatya-trayam ādhatta śikhaṇḍinyāṃ susammatam
analyzed: apatya trayam ādhatta śikhaṇḍinyām su sammatam

original: BhP_04.24.004/1 pāvakaḥ pavamānaś ca śucir ity agnayaḥ purā
analyzed: pāvakaḥ pavamānaḥ ca śuciḥ iti agnayaḥ purā

original: BhP_04.24.004/2 vasiṣṭha-śāpād utpannāḥ punar yoga-gatiṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭha śāpāt utpannāḥ punar yoga gatim gatāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.005/1 antardhāno nabhasvatyāṃ havirdhānam avindata
analyzed: antardhānaḥ nabhasvatyām havirdhānam avindata

original: BhP_04.24.005/2 ya indram aśva-hartāraṃ vidvān api na jaghnivān
analyzed: yaḥ indram aśva hartāram vidvān api na jaghnivān

original: BhP_04.24.006/1 rājñāṃ vṛttiṃ karādāna- daṇḍa-śulkādi-dāruṇām
analyzed: rājñām vṛttim kara ādāna daṇḍa śulka ādi dāruṇām

original: BhP_04.24.006/2 manyamāno dīrgha-sattra- vyājena visasarja ha
analyzed: manyamānaḥ dīrghasattra vyājena visasarja ha

original: BhP_04.24.007/1 tatrāpi haṃsaṃ puruṣaṃ paramātmānam ātma-dṛk
analyzed: tatra api haṃsam puruṣam paramātmānam ātma dṛś

original: BhP_04.24.007/2 yajaṃs tal-lokatām āpa kuśalena samādhinā
analyzed: yajan tad loka tām āpa kuśalena samādhinā

original: BhP_04.24.008/1 havirdhānād dhavirdhānī vidurāsūta ṣaṭ sutān
analyzed: havirdhānāt dhavirdhānī vidura asūta ṣaṭ sutān

original: BhP_04.24.008/2 barhiṣadaṃ gayaṃ śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ satyaṃ jitavratam
analyzed: barhiṣadam gayam śuklam kṛṣṇam satyam jita vratam

original: BhP_04.24.009/1 barhiṣat sumahā-bhāgo hāvirdhāniḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: barhiṣad su mahābhāgaḥ hāvirdhāniḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.009/2 kriyā-kāṇḍeṣu niṣṇāto yogeṣu ca kurūdvaha
analyzed: kriyā kāṇḍeṣu niṣṇātaḥ yogeṣu ca kuru udvaha

original: BhP_04.24.010/1 yasyedaṃ deva-yajanam anuyajñaṃ vitanvataḥ
analyzed: yasya idam devayajanam anu yajñam vitanvataḥ

original: BhP_04.24.010/2 prācīnāgraiḥ kuśair āsīd āstṛtaṃ vasudhā-talam
analyzed: prācīna agraiḥ kuśaiḥ āsīt āstṛtam vasudhā talam

original: BhP_04.24.011/1 sāmudrīṃ devadevoktām upayeme śatadrutim
analyzed: sāmudrīm devadeva uktām upayeme śatadrutim

original: BhP_04.24.011/2 yāṃ vīkṣya cāru-sarvāṅgīṃ kiśorīṃ suṣṭhv-alaṅkṛtām
analyzed: yām vīkṣya cāru sarva aṅgīm kiśorīm suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtām

original: BhP_04.24.011/3 parikramantīm udvāhe cakame 'gniḥ śukīm iva
analyzed: parikramantīm udvāhe cakame agniḥ śukīm iva

original: BhP_04.24.012/1 vibudhāsura-gandharva- muni-siddha-naroragāḥ
analyzed: vibudha asura gandharva muni siddha nara uragāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.012/2 vijitāḥ sūryayā dikṣu kvaṇayantyaiva nūpuraiḥ
analyzed: vijitāḥ sūryayā dikṣu kvaṇayantyā eva nūpuraiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.013/1 prācīnabarhiṣaḥ putrāḥ śatadrutyāṃ daśābhavan
analyzed: prācīnabarhiṣaḥ putrāḥ śatadrutyām daśa abhavan

original: BhP_04.24.013/2 tulya-nāma-vratāḥ sarve dharma-snātāḥ pracetasaḥ
analyzed: tulya nāma vratāḥ sarve dharma snātāḥ pracetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.014/1 pitrādiṣṭāḥ prajā-sarge tapase 'rṇavam āviśan
analyzed: pitrā ādiṣṭāḥ prajā sarge tapase arṇavam āviśan

original: BhP_04.24.014/2 daśa-varṣa-sahasrāṇi tapasārcaṃs tapas-patim
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi tapasā arcan tapaspatim

original: BhP_04.24.015/1 yad uktaṃ pathi dṛṣṭena giriśena prasīdatā
analyzed: yat uktam pathi dṛṣṭena giriśena prasīdatā

original: BhP_04.24.015/2 tad dhyāyanto japantaś ca pūjayantaś ca saṃyatāḥ
analyzed: tat dhyāyantaḥ japantaḥ ca pūjayantaḥ ca saṃyatāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.016/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.24.016/1 pracetasāṃ giritreṇa yathāsīt pathi saṅgamaḥ
analyzed: pracetasām giritreṇa yathā āsīt pathi saṅgamaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.016/2 yad utāha haraḥ prītas tan no brahman vadārthavat
analyzed: yat uta āha haraḥ prītaḥ tat naḥ brahman vada arthavat

original: BhP_04.24.017/1 saṅgamaḥ khalu viprarṣe śiveneha śarīriṇām
analyzed: saṅgamaḥ khalu viprarṣe śivena iha śarīriṇām

original: BhP_04.24.017/2 durlabho munayo dadhyur asaṅgād yam abhīpsitam
analyzed: durlabhaḥ munayaḥ dadhyuḥ asaṅgāt yam abhīpsitam

original: BhP_04.24.018/1 ātmārāmo 'pi yas tv asya loka-kalpasya rādhase
analyzed: ātma ārāmaḥ api yaḥ tu asya loka kalpasya rādhase

original: BhP_04.24.018/2 śaktyā yukto vicarati ghorayā bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: śaktyā yuktaḥ vicarati ghorayā bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.019/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.24.019/1 pracetasaḥ pitur vākyaṃ śirasādāya sādhavaḥ
analyzed: pracetasaḥ pituḥ vākyam śirasā ādāya sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.019/2 diśaṃ pratīcīṃ prayayus tapasy ādṛta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: diśam pratīcīm prayayuḥ tapasi ādṛta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.020/1 sa-samudram upa vistīrṇam apaśyan sumahat saraḥ
analyzed: sa samudram upa vistīrṇam apaśyan su mahat saraḥ

original: BhP_04.24.020/2 mahan-mana iva svacchaṃ prasanna-salilāśayam
analyzed: mahat manaḥ iva su accham prasanna salilāśayam

original: BhP_04.24.021/1 nīla-raktotpalāmbhoja- kahlārendīvarākaram
BhP_04.24.021/2 haṃsa-sārasa-cakrāhva- kāraṇḍava-nikūjitam
BhP_04.24.022/1 matta-bhramara-sausvarya- hṛṣṭa-roma-latāṅghripam
analyzed: matta bhramara sausvarya hṛṣṭa roma latā aṅghripam

original: BhP_04.24.022/2 padma-kośa-rajo dikṣu vikṣipat-pavanotsavam
analyzed: padma kośa rajaḥ dikṣu vikṣipat pavana utsavam

original: BhP_04.24.023/1 tatra gāndharvam ākarṇya divya-mārga-manoharam
analyzed: tatra gāndharvam ākarṇya divya mārga manoharam

original: BhP_04.24.023/2 visismyū rāja-putrās te mṛdaṅga-paṇavādy anu
analyzed: visismyuḥ rāja putrāḥ te mṛdaṅga paṇava ādi anu

original: BhP_04.24.024/1 tarhy eva sarasas tasmān niṣkrāmantaṃ sahānugam
analyzed: tarhi eva sarasaḥ tasmāt niṣkrāmantam saha anugam

original: BhP_04.24.024/2 upagīyamānam amara- pravaraṃ vibudhānugaiḥ
analyzed: upagīyamānam amara pravaram vibudha anugaiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.025/1 tapta-hema-nikāyābhaṃ śiti-kaṇṭhaṃ tri-locanam
analyzed: tapta hema nikāya ābham śitikaṇṭham tri locanam

original: BhP_04.24.025/2 prasāda-sumukhaṃ vīkṣya praṇemur jāta-kautukāḥ
analyzed: prasāda su mukham vīkṣya praṇemuḥ jāta kautukāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.026/1 sa tān prapannārti-haro bhagavān dharma-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: sa tān prapanna ārti haraḥ bhagavān dharma vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.026/2 dharma-jñān śīla-sampannān prītaḥ prītān uvāca ha
analyzed: dharma jñān śīla sampannān prītaḥ prītān uvāca ha

original: BhP_04.24.027/0 śrī-rudra uvāca
analyzed: śrī rudraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.24.027/1 yūyaṃ vediṣadaḥ putrā viditaṃ vaś cikīrṣitam
analyzed: yūyam vediṣadaḥ putrāḥ viditam vaḥ cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_04.24.027/2 anugrahāya bhadraṃ va evaṃ me darśanaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: anugrahāya bhadram vaḥ evam me darśanam kṛtam

original: BhP_04.24.028/1 yaḥ paraṃ raṃhasaḥ sākṣāt tri-guṇāj jīva-saṃjñitāt
analyzed: yaḥ param raṃhasaḥ sākṣāt triguṇāt jīva saṃjñitāt

original: BhP_04.24.028/2 bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ prapannaḥ sa priyo hi me
analyzed: bhagavantam vāsudevam prapannaḥ sa priyaḥ hi me

original: BhP_04.24.029/1 sva-dharma-niṣṭhaḥ śata-janmabhiḥ pumān viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām
analyzed: svadharma niṣṭhaḥ śata janmabhiḥ pumān viriñca tām eti tatas param hi mām

original: BhP_04.24.029/2 avyākṛtaṃ bhāgavato 'tha vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yathāhaṃ vibudhāḥ kalātyaye
analyzed: avyākṛtam bhāgavataḥ atha vaiṣṇavam padam yathā aham vibudhāḥ kalā atyaye

original: BhP_04.24.030/1 atha bhāgavatā yūyaṃ priyāḥ stha bhagavān yathā
analyzed: atha bhāgavatāḥ yūyam priyāḥ stha bhagavān yathā

original: BhP_04.24.030/2 na mad bhāgavatānāṃ ca preyān anyo 'sti karhicit
analyzed: na mat bhāgavatānām ca preyān anyaḥ asti karhicit

original: BhP_04.24.031/1 idaṃ viviktaṃ japtavyaṃ pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ param
analyzed: idam viviktam japtavyam pavitram maṅgalam param

original: BhP_04.24.031/2 niḥśreyasa-karaṃ cāpi śrūyatāṃ tad vadāmi vaḥ
analyzed: niḥśreyasa karam ca api śrūyatām tat vadāmi vaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.032/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.24.032/1 ity anukrośa-hṛdayo bhagavān āha tāñ chivaḥ
analyzed: iti anukrośa hṛdayaḥ bhagavān āha tām śivaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.032/2 baddhāñjalīn rāja-putrān nārāyaṇa-paro vacaḥ
analyzed: baddhāñjalīn rāja putrān nārāyaṇa paraḥ vacaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.033/0 śrī-rudra uvāca
analyzed: śrī rudraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.24.033/1 jitaṃ ta ātma-vid-varya- svastaye svastir astu me
analyzed: jitam te ātma vid varya svastaye svastiḥ astu me

original: BhP_04.24.033/2 bhavatārādhasā rāddhaṃ sarvasmā ātmane namaḥ
analyzed: bhavatā arādhasā rāddham sarvasmai ātmane namaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.034/1 namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya bhūta-sūkṣmendriyātmane
analyzed: namaḥ paṅkajanābhāya bhūta sūkṣma indriya ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.034/2 vāsudevāya śāntāya kūṭa-sthāya sva-rociṣe
analyzed: vāsudevāya śāntāya kūṭasthāya sva rociṣe

original: BhP_04.24.035/1 saṅkarṣaṇāya sūkṣmāya durantāyāntakāya ca
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇāya sūkṣmāya durantāya antakāya ca

original: BhP_04.24.035/2 namo viśva-prabodhāya pradyumnāyāntar-ātmane
analyzed: namaḥ viśva prabodhāya pradyumnāya antarātmane

original: BhP_04.24.036/1 namo namo 'niruddhāya hṛṣīkeśendriyātmane
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ aniruddhāya hṛṣīkeśa indriya ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.036/2 namaḥ paramahaṃsāya pūrṇāya nibhṛtātmane
analyzed: namaḥ paramahaṃsāya pūrṇāya nibhṛta ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.037/1 svargāpavarga-dvārāya nityaṃ śuci-ṣade namaḥ
analyzed: svarga apavarga dvārāya nityam śuciṣade namaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.037/2 namo hiraṇya-vīryāya cātur-hotrāya tantave
analyzed: namaḥ hiraṇya vīryāya cāturhotrāya tantave

original: BhP_04.24.038/1 nama ūrja iṣe trayyāḥ pataye yajña-retase
analyzed: namaḥ ūrje iṣe trayyāḥ pataye yajña retase

original: BhP_04.24.038/2 tṛpti-dāya ca jīvānāṃ namaḥ sarva-rasātmane
analyzed: tṛpti dāya ca jīvānām namaḥ sarva rasa ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.039/1 sarva-sattvātma-dehāya viśeṣāya sthavīyase
analyzed: sarva sattva ātma dehāya viśeṣāya sthavīyase

original: BhP_04.24.039/2 namas trailokya-pālāya saha ojo-balāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ trailokya pālāya sahaḥ ojaḥ balāya ca

original: BhP_04.24.040/1 artha-liṅgāya nabhase namo 'ntar-bahir-ātmane
analyzed: artha liṅgāya nabhase namaḥ antar bahis ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.040/2 namaḥ puṇyāya lokāya amuṣmai bhūri-varcase
analyzed: namaḥ puṇyāya lokāya amuṣmai bhūri varcase

original: BhP_04.24.041/1 pravṛttāya nivṛttāya pitṛ-devāya karmaṇe
analyzed: pravṛttāya nivṛttāya pitṛ devāya karmaṇe

original: BhP_04.24.041/2 namo 'dharma-vipākāya mṛtyave duḥkha-dāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ adharma vipākāya mṛtyave duḥkha dāya ca

original: BhP_04.24.042/1 namas ta āśiṣām īśa manave kāraṇātmane
analyzed: namaḥ te āśiṣām īśa manave kāraṇa ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.042/2 namo dharmāya bṛhate kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase
analyzed: namaḥ dharmāya bṛhate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase

original: BhP_04.24.042/3 puruṣāya purāṇāya sāṅkhya-yogeśvarāya ca
analyzed: puruṣāya purāṇāya sāṅkhya yoga īśvarāya ca

original: BhP_04.24.043/1 śakti-traya-sametāya mīḍhuṣe 'haṅkṛtātmane
analyzed: śakti traya sametāya mīḍhuṣe ahaṅkṛta ātmane

original: BhP_04.24.043/2 ceta-ākūti-rūpāya namo vāco vibhūtaye
analyzed: cetas ākūti rūpāya namaḥ vācaḥ vibhūtaye

original: BhP_04.24.044/1 darśanaṃ no didṛkṣūṇāṃ dehi bhāgavatārcitam
analyzed: darśanam naḥ didṛkṣūṇām dehi bhāgavata arcitam

original: BhP_04.24.044/2 rūpaṃ priyatamaṃ svānāṃ sarvendriya-guṇāñjanam
analyzed: rūpam priyatamam svānām sarva indriya guṇa añjanam

original: BhP_04.24.045/1 snigdha-prāvṛḍ-ghana-śyāmaṃ sarva-saundarya-saṅgraham
analyzed: snigdha prāvṛṣ ghana śyāmam sarva saundarya saṅgraham

original: BhP_04.24.045/2 cārv-āyata-catur-bāhu sujāta-rucirānanam
analyzed: cāru āyata catur bāhu sujāta rucira ānanam

original: BhP_04.24.046/1 padma-kośa-palāśākṣaṃ sundara-bhru sunāsikam
BhP_04.24.046/2 sudvijaṃ sukapolāsyaṃ sama-karṇa-vibhūṣaṇam
analyzed: su dvijam su kapola āsyam sama karṇa vibhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_04.24.047/1 prīti-prahasitāpāṅgam alakai rūpa-śobhitam
analyzed: prīti prahasita apāṅgam alakaiḥ rūpa śobhitam

original: BhP_04.24.047/2 lasat-paṅkaja-kiñjalka- dukūlaṃ mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍalam
BhP_04.24.048/1 sphurat-kirīṭa-valaya- hāra-nūpura-mekhalam
analyzed: sphurat kirīṭa valaya hāra nūpura mekhalam

original: BhP_04.24.048/2 śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padma- mālā-maṇy-uttamarddhimat
BhP_04.24.049/1 siṃha-skandha-tviṣo bibhrat saubhaga-grīva-kaustubham
analyzed: siṃha skandha tviṣaḥ bibhrat saubhaga grīva kaustubham

original: BhP_04.24.049/2 śriyānapāyinyā kṣipta- nikaṣāśmorasollasat
analyzed: śriyā anapāyinyā kṣipta nikaṣa aśma urasā ullasat

original: BhP_04.24.050/1 pūra-recaka-saṃvigna- vali-valgu-dalodaram
BhP_04.24.050/2 pratisaṅkrāmayad viśvaṃ nābhyāvarta-gabhīrayā
analyzed: pratisaṅkrāmayat viśvam nābhi āvarta gabhīrayā

original: BhP_04.24.051/1 śyāma-śroṇy-adhi-rociṣṇu- dukūla-svarṇa-mekhalam
BhP_04.24.051/2 sama-cārv-aṅghri-jaṅghoru- nimna-jānu-sudarśanam
analyzed: sama cāru aṅghri jaṅghā ūru nimna jānu su darśanam

original: BhP_04.24.052/1 padā śarat-padma-palāśa-rociṣā nakha-dyubhir no 'ntar-aghaṃ vidhunvatā
analyzed: padā śarad padma palāśa rociṣā nakhadyubhiḥ naḥ antaragham vidhunvatā

original: BhP_04.24.052/2 pradarśaya svīyam apāsta-sādhvasaṃ padaṃ guro mārga-gurus tamo-juṣām
analyzed: pradarśaya svīyam apāsta sādhvasam padam guro mārga guruḥ tamaḥ juṣām

original: BhP_04.24.053/1 etad rūpam anudhyeyam ātma-śuddhim abhīpsatām
analyzed: etat rūpam anudhyeyam ātma śuddhim abhīpsatām

original: BhP_04.24.053/2 yad-bhakti-yogo 'bhayadaḥ sva-dharmam anutiṣṭhatām
analyzed: yat bhakti yogaḥ abhaya daḥ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatām

original: BhP_04.24.054/1 bhavān bhaktimatā labhyo durlabhaḥ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: bhavān bhaktimatā labhyaḥ durlabhaḥ sarva dehinām

original: BhP_04.24.054/2 svārājyasyāpy abhimata ekāntenātma-vid-gatiḥ
analyzed: svārājyasya api abhimataḥ ekāntena ātma vid gatiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.055/1 taṃ durārādhyam ārādhya satām api durāpayā
analyzed: tam durārādhyam ārādhya satām api durāpayā

original: BhP_04.24.055/2 ekānta-bhaktyā ko vāñchet pāda-mūlaṃ vinā bahiḥ
analyzed: ekānta bhaktyā kaḥ vāñchet pāda mūlam vinā bahis

original: BhP_04.24.056/1 yatra nirviṣṭam araṇaṃ kṛtānto nābhimanyate
analyzed: yatra nirviṣṭam araṇam kṛtāntaḥ na abhimanyate

original: BhP_04.24.056/2 viśvaṃ vidhvaṃsayan vīrya- śaurya-visphūrjita-bhruvā
analyzed: viśvam vidhvaṃsayan śaurya visphūrjita bhruvā

original: BhP_04.24.057/1 kṣaṇārdhenāpi tulaye na svargaṃ nāpunar-bhavam
analyzed: kṣaṇārdhena api tulaye na svargam na apunarbhavam

original: BhP_04.24.057/2 bhagavat-saṅgi-saṅgasya martyānāṃ kim utāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: bhagavat saṅgi saṅgasya martyānām kim uta āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.058/1 athānaghāṅghres tava kīrti-tīrthayor antar-bahiḥ-snāna-vidhūta-pāpmanām
analyzed: athā anagha aṅghreḥ tava kīrti tīrthayoḥ antar bahis snāna vidhūta pāpmanām

original: BhP_04.24.058/2 bhūteṣv anukrośa-susattva-śīlināṃ syāt saṅgamo 'nugraha eṣa nas tava
analyzed: bhūteṣu anukrośa su sattva śīlinām syāt saṅgamaḥ anugrahaḥ eṣa naḥ tava

original: BhP_04.24.059/1 na yasya cittaṃ bahir-artha-vibhramaṃ tamo-guhāyāṃ ca viśuddham āviśat
analyzed: na yasya cittam bahis artha vibhramam tamaḥ guhāyām ca viśuddham āviśat

original: BhP_04.24.059/2 yad-bhakti-yogānugṛhītam añjasā munir vicaṣṭe nanu tatra te gatim
analyzed: yat bhakti yoga anugṛhītam añjasā muniḥ vicaṣṭe nanu tatra te gatim

original: BhP_04.24.060/1 yatredaṃ vyajyate viśvaṃ viśvasminn avabhāti yat
analyzed: yatra idam vyajyate viśvam viśvasmin avabhāti yat

original: BhP_04.24.060/2 tat tvaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotir ākāśam iva vistṛtam
analyzed: tat tvam brahma param jyotiḥ ākāśam iva vistṛtam

original: BhP_04.24.061/1 yo māyayedaṃ puru-rūpayāsṛjad bibharti bhūyaḥ kṣapayaty avikriyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ māyayā idam puru rūpayā asṛjat bibharti bhūyas kṣapayati avikriyaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.061/2 yad-bheda-buddhiḥ sad ivātma-duḥsthayā tvam ātma-tantraṃ bhagavan pratīmahi
analyzed: yat bheda buddhiḥ sat iva ātma duḥsthayā tvam ātmatantram bhagavan pratīmahi

original: BhP_04.24.062/1 kriyā-kalāpair idam eva yoginaḥ śraddhānvitāḥ sādhu yajanti siddhaye
analyzed: kriyā kalāpaiḥ idam eva yoginaḥ śraddhā anvitāḥ sādhu yajanti siddhaye

original: BhP_04.24.062/2 bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇopalakṣitaṃ vede ca tantre ca ta eva kovidāḥ
analyzed: bhūta indriya antaḥkaraṇa upalakṣitam vede ca tantre ca te eva kovidāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.063/1 tvam eka ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ supta-śaktis tayā rajaḥ-sattva-tamo vibhidyate
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ supta śaktiḥ tayā rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ vibhidyate

original: BhP_04.24.063/2 mahān ahaṃ khaṃ marud agni-vār-dharāḥ surarṣayo bhūta-gaṇā idaṃ yataḥ
