analyzed: mahān aham kham marut agni vārdharāḥ sura ṛṣayaḥ bhūta gaṇāḥ idam yatas

original: BhP_04.24.064/1 sṛṣṭaṃ sva-śaktyedam anupraviṣṭaś catur-vidhaṃ puram ātmāṃśakena
analyzed: sṛṣṭam sva śaktyā idam anupraviṣṭaḥ caturvidham puram ātma aṃśakena

original: BhP_04.24.064/2 atho vidus taṃ puruṣaṃ santam antar bhuṅkte hṛṣīkair madhu sāra-ghaṃ yaḥ
analyzed: atha u viduḥ tam puruṣam santam antar bhuṅkte hṛṣīkaiḥ madhu sāragham yaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.065/1 sa eṣa lokān aticaṇḍa-vego vikarṣasi tvaṃ khalu kāla-yānaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa lokān ati caṇḍa vegaḥ vikarṣasi tvam khalu kālayānaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.065/2 bhūtāni bhūtair anumeya-tattvo ghanāvalīr vāyur ivāviṣahyaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni bhūtaiḥ anumeya tattvaḥ ghana āvalīḥ vāyuḥ iva aviṣahyaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.066/1 pramattam uccair iti kṛtya-cintayā pravṛddha-lobhaṃ viṣayeṣu lālasam
analyzed: pramattam uccais iti kṛtya cintayā pravṛddha lobham viṣayeṣu lālasam

original: BhP_04.24.066/2 tvam apramattaḥ sahasābhipadyase kṣul-lelihāno 'hir ivākhum antakaḥ
analyzed: tvam apramattaḥ sahasā abhipadyase kṣudh lelihānaḥ ahiḥ iva ākhum antakaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.067/1 kas tvat-padābjaṃ vijahāti paṇḍito yas te 'vamāna-vyayamāna-ketanaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ tvad pada abjam vijahāti paṇḍitaḥ yaḥ te avamāna vyaya māna ketanaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.067/2 viśaṅkayāsmad-gurur arcati sma yad vinopapattiṃ manavaś caturdaśa
analyzed: viśaṅkayā asmad guruḥ arcati sma yat vinā upapattim manavaḥ caturdaśa

original: BhP_04.24.068/1 atha tvam asi no brahman paramātman vipaścitām
analyzed: atha tvam asi naḥ brahman paramātman vipaścitām

original: BhP_04.24.068/2 viśvaṃ rudra-bhaya-dhvastam akutaścid-bhayā gatiḥ
analyzed: viśvam rudra bhaya dhvastam akutaścidbhayā gatiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.069/1 idaṃ japata bhadraṃ vo viśuddhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ
analyzed: idam japata bhadram vaḥ viśuddhāḥ nṛpa nandanāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.069/2 sva-dharmam anutiṣṭhanto bhagavaty arpitāśayāḥ
analyzed: svadharmam anutiṣṭhantaḥ bhagavati arpita āśayāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.070/1 tam evātmānam ātma-sthaṃ sarva-bhūteṣv avasthitam
analyzed: tam eva ātmānam ātma stham sarva bhūteṣu avasthitam

original: BhP_04.24.070/2 pūjayadhvaṃ gṛṇantaś ca dhyāyantaś cāsakṛd dharim
analyzed: pūjayadhvam gṛṇantaḥ ca dhyāyantaḥ ca asakṛt harim

original: BhP_04.24.071/1 yogādeśam upāsādya dhārayanto muni-vratāḥ
analyzed: yoga ādeśam upāsādya dhārayantaḥ muni vratāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.071/2 samāhita-dhiyaḥ sarva etad abhyasatādṛtāḥ
analyzed: samāhita dhiyaḥ sarve etat abhyasata ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.072/1 idam āha purāsmākaṃ bhagavān viśvasṛk-patiḥ
analyzed: idam āha purā asmākam bhagavān viśvasṛkpatiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.072/2 bhṛgv-ādīnām ātmajānāṃ sisṛkṣuḥ saṃsisṛkṣatām
analyzed: bhṛgu ādīnām ātmajānām sisṛkṣuḥ saṃsisṛkṣatām

original: BhP_04.24.073/1 te vayaṃ noditāḥ sarve prajā-sarge prajeśvarāḥ
analyzed: te vayam noditāḥ sarve prajā sarge prajā īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.073/2 anena dhvasta-tamasaḥ sisṛkṣmo vividhāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: anena dhvasta tamasaḥ sisṛkṣmaḥ vividhāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_04.24.074/1 athedaṃ nityadā yukto japann avahitaḥ pumān
analyzed: athā idam nityadā yuktaḥ japan avahitaḥ pumān

original: BhP_04.24.074/2 acirāc chreya āpnoti vāsudeva-parāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: acirāt śreyaḥ āpnoti vāsudeva parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.075/1 śreyasām iha sarveṣāṃ jñānaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param
analyzed: śreyasām iha sarveṣām jñānam niḥśreyasam param

original: BhP_04.24.075/2 sukhaṃ tarati duṣpāraṃ jñāna-naur vyasanārṇavam
analyzed: sukham tarati duṣpāram jñāna nauḥ vyasana arṇavam

original: BhP_04.24.076/1 ya imaṃ śraddhayā yukto mad-gītaṃ bhagavat-stavam
analyzed: yaḥ imam śraddhayā yuktaḥ mad gītam bhagavat stavam

original: BhP_04.24.076/2 adhīyāno durārādhyaṃ harim ārādhayaty asau
analyzed: adhīyānaḥ durārādhyam harim ārādhayati asau

original: BhP_04.24.077/1 vindate puruṣo 'muṣmād yad yad icchaty asatvaram
analyzed: vindate puruṣaḥ amuṣmāt yat yat icchati a satvaram

original: BhP_04.24.077/2 mad-gīta-gītāt suprītāc chreyasām eka-vallabhāt
analyzed: mad gīta gītāt su prītāt śreyasām eka vallabhāt

original: BhP_04.24.078/1 idaṃ yaḥ kalya utthāya prāñjaliḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
analyzed: idam yaḥ kalye utthāya prāñjaliḥ śraddhayā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.24.078/2 śṛṇuyāc chrāvayen martyo mucyate karma-bandhanaiḥ
analyzed: śṛṇuyāt śrāvayet martyaḥ mucyate karma bandhanaiḥ

original: BhP_04.24.079/1 gītaṃ mayedaṃ naradeva-nandanāḥ parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ stavam
analyzed: gītam mayā idam naradeva nandanāḥ parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ stavam

original: BhP_04.24.079/2 japanta ekāgra-dhiyas tapo mahat caradhvam ante tata āpsyathepsitam
analyzed: japantaḥ ekāgra dhiyaḥ tapaḥ mahat caradhvam ante tatas āpsyatha īpsitam

original: BhP_04.25.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.25.001/1 iti sandiśya bhagavān bārhiṣadair abhipūjitaḥ
analyzed: iti sandiśya bhagavān bārhiṣadaiḥ abhipūjitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.001/2 paśyatāṃ rāja-putrāṇāṃ tatraivāntardadhe haraḥ
analyzed: paśyatām rāja putrāṇām tatra eva antardadhe haraḥ

original: BhP_04.25.002/1 rudra-gītaṃ bhagavataḥ stotraṃ sarve pracetasaḥ
analyzed: rudra gītam bhagavataḥ stotram sarve pracetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.002/2 japantas te tapas tepur varṣāṇām ayutaṃ jale
analyzed: japantaḥ te tapaḥ tepuḥ varṣāṇām ayutam jale

original: BhP_04.25.003/1 prācīnabarhiṣaṃ kṣattaḥ karmasv āsakta-mānasam
analyzed: prācīna barhiṣam kṣattar karmasu āsakta mānasam

original: BhP_04.25.003/2 nārado 'dhyātma-tattva-jñaḥ kṛpāluḥ pratyabodhayat
analyzed: nāradaḥ adhyātma tattva jñaḥ kṛpāluḥ pratyabodhayat

original: BhP_04.25.004/1 śreyas tvaṃ katamad rājan karmaṇātmana īhase
analyzed: śreyaḥ tvam katamat rājan karmaṇā ātmanaḥ īhase

original: BhP_04.25.004/2 duḥkha-hāniḥ sukhāvāptiḥ śreyas tan neha ceṣyate
analyzed: duḥkha hāniḥ sukha avāptiḥ śreyaḥ tat na iha ca iṣyate

original: BhP_04.25.005/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_04.25.005/1 na jānāmi mahā-bhāga paraṃ karmāpaviddha-dhīḥ
analyzed: na jānāmi mahābhāga param karma apaviddha dhīḥ

original: BhP_04.25.005/2 brūhi me vimalaṃ jñānaṃ yena mucyeya karmabhiḥ
analyzed: brūhi me vimalam jñānam yena mucyeya karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.006/1 gṛheṣu kūṭa-dharmeṣu putra-dāra-dhanārtha-dhīḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu kūṭa dharmeṣu putra dāra dhana artha dhīḥ

original: BhP_04.25.006/2 na paraṃ vindate mūḍho bhrāmyan saṃsāra-vartmasu
analyzed: na param vindate mūḍhaḥ bhrāmyan saṃsāra vartmasu

original: BhP_04.25.007/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.25.007/1 bho bhoḥ prajāpate rājan paśūn paśya tvayādhvare
analyzed: bho bhoḥ prajāpate rājan paśūn paśya tvayā adhvare

original: BhP_04.25.007/2 saṃjñāpitāñ jīva-saṅghān nirghṛṇena sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: saṃjñāpitām jīva saṅghān nirghṛṇena sahasraśas

original: BhP_04.25.008/1 ete tvāṃ sampratīkṣante smaranto vaiśasaṃ tava
analyzed: ete tvām sampratīkṣante smarantaḥ vaiśasam tava

original: BhP_04.25.008/2 samparetam ayaḥ-kūṭaiś chindanty utthita-manyavaḥ
analyzed: samparetam ayaḥ kūṭaiḥ chindanti utthita manyavaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.009/1 atra te kathayiṣye 'mum itihāsaṃ purātanam
analyzed: atra te kathayiṣye amum itihāsam purātanam

original: BhP_04.25.009/2 purañjanasya caritaṃ nibodha gadato mama
analyzed: purañjanasya caritam nibodha gadataḥ mama

original: BhP_04.25.010/1 āsīt purañjano nāma rājā rājan bṛhac-chravāḥ
analyzed: āsīt purañjanaḥ nāma rājā rājan bṛhacchravāḥ

original: BhP_04.25.010/2 tasyāvijñāta-nāmāsīt sakhāvijñāta-ceṣṭitaḥ
analyzed: tasya a vijñāta nāmā āsīt sakhā a vijñāta ceṣṭitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.011/1 so 'nveṣamāṇaḥ śaraṇaṃ babhrāma pṛthivīṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ anveṣamāṇaḥ śaraṇam babhrāma pṛthivīm prabhuḥ

original: BhP_04.25.011/2 nānurūpaṃ yadāvindad abhūt sa vimanā iva
analyzed: na anurūpam yadā avindat abhūt sa vimanāḥ iva

original: BhP_04.25.012/1 na sādhu mene tāḥ sarvā bhūtale yāvatīḥ puraḥ
analyzed: na sādhu mene tāḥ sarvāḥ bhū tale yāvatīḥ puraḥ

original: BhP_04.25.012/2 kāmān kāmayamāno 'sau tasya tasyopapattaye
analyzed: kāmān kāmayamānaḥ asau tasya tasya upapattaye

original: BhP_04.25.013/1 sa ekadā himavato dakṣiṇeṣv atha sānuṣu
analyzed: saḥ ekadā himavataḥ dakṣiṇeṣu atha sānuṣu

original: BhP_04.25.013/2 dadarśa navabhir dvārbhiḥ puraṃ lakṣita-lakṣaṇām
analyzed: dadarśa navabhiḥ dvārbhiḥ puram lakṣita lakṣaṇām

original: BhP_04.25.014/1 prākāropavanāṭṭāla- parikhair akṣa-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: prākāra upavana aṭṭāla parikhaiḥ akṣa toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.014/2 svarṇa-raupyāyasaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ saṅkulāṃ sarvato gṛhaiḥ
analyzed: svarṇa raupya āyasaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ saṅkulām sarvatas gṛhaiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.015/1 nīla-sphaṭika-vaidūrya- muktā-marakatāruṇaiḥ
BhP_04.25.015/2 kḷpta-harmya-sthalīṃ dīptāṃ śriyā bhogavatīm iva
analyzed: kḷpta harmya sthalīm dīptām śriyā bhogavatīm iva

original: BhP_04.25.016/1 sabhā-catvara-rathyābhir ākrīḍāyatanāpaṇaiḥ
analyzed: sabhā catvara rathyābhiḥ ākrīḍa āyatana āpaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.016/2 caitya-dhvaja-patākābhir yuktāṃ vidruma-vedibhiḥ
analyzed: caitya dhvaja patākābhiḥ yuktām vidruma vedibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.017/1 puryās tu bāhyopavane divya-druma-latākule
analyzed: puryāḥ tu bāhya upavane divya druma latā ākule

original: BhP_04.25.017/2 nadad-vihaṅgāli-kula- kolāhala-jalāśaye
analyzed: nadat vihaṅga ali kula kolāhala jalāśaye

original: BhP_04.25.018/1 hima-nirjhara-vipruṣmat- kusumākara-vāyunā
BhP_04.25.018/2 calat-pravāla-viṭapa- nalinī-taṭa-sampadi
analyzed: calat pravāla viṭapa nalinī taṭa sampadi

original: BhP_04.25.019/1 nānāraṇya-mṛga-vrātair anābādhe muni-vrataiḥ
analyzed: na an araṇya mṛga vrātaiḥ an ābādhe muni vrataiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.019/2 āhūtaṃ manyate pāntho yatra kokila-kūjitaiḥ
analyzed: āhūtam manyate pānthaḥ yatra kokila kūjitaiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.020/1 yadṛcchayāgatāṃ tatra dadarśa pramadottamām
analyzed: yadṛcchayā āgatām tatra dadarśa pramadā uttamām

original: BhP_04.25.020/2 bhṛtyair daśabhir āyāntīm ekaika-śata-nāyakaiḥ
analyzed: bhṛtyaiḥ daśabhiḥ āyāntam īm ekaika śata nāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.021/1 añca-śīrṣāhinā guptāṃ pratīhāreṇa sarvataḥ
analyzed: añca śīrṣa ahinā guptām pratīhāreṇa sarvatas

original: BhP_04.25.021/2 anveṣamāṇām ṛṣabham aprauḍhāṃ kāma-rūpiṇīm
analyzed: anveṣamāṇām ṛṣabham aprauḍhām kāmarūpiṇīm

original: BhP_04.25.022/1 sunāsāṃ sudatīṃ bālāṃ sukapolāṃ varānanām
analyzed: su nāsām sudatīm bālām su kapolām vara ānanām

original: BhP_04.25.022/2 sama-vinyasta-karṇābhyāṃ bibhratīṃ kuṇḍala-śriyam
analyzed: sama vinyasta karṇābhyām bibhratīm kuṇḍala śriyam

original: BhP_04.25.023/1 piśaṅga-nīvīṃ suśroṇīṃ śyāmāṃ kanaka-mekhalām
analyzed: piśaṅga nīvīm su śroṇīm śyāmām kanaka mekhalām

original: BhP_04.25.023/2 padbhyāṃ kvaṇadbhyāṃ calantīṃ nūpurair devatām iva
analyzed: padbhyām kvaṇadbhyām calantīm nūpuraiḥ devatām iva

original: BhP_04.25.024/1 stanau vyañjita-kaiśorau sama-vṛttau nirantarau
analyzed: stanau vyañjita kaiśorau sama vṛttau nirantarau

original: BhP_04.25.024/2 vastrāntena nigūhantīṃ vrīḍayā gaja-gāminīm
analyzed: vastra antena nigūhantīm vrīḍayā gaja gāminīm

original: BhP_04.25.025/1 tām āha lalitaṃ vīraḥ savrīḍa-smita-śobhanām
analyzed: tām āha lalitam vīraḥ sa vrīḍa smita śobhanām

original: BhP_04.25.025/2 snigdhenāpāṅga-puṅkhena spṛṣṭaḥ premodbhramad-bhruvā
analyzed: snigdhena apāṅga puṅkhena spṛṣṭaḥ prema udbhramat bhruvā

original: BhP_04.25.026/1 kā tvaṃ kañja-palāśākṣi kasyāsīha kutaḥ sati
analyzed: kā tvam kañja palāśa akṣi kasya asi iha kutas sati

original: BhP_04.25.026/2 imām upa purīṃ bhīru kiṃ cikīrṣasi śaṃsa me
analyzed: imām upa purīm bhīru kim cikīrṣasi śaṃsa me

original: BhP_04.25.027/1 ka ete 'nupathā ye ta ekādaśa mahā-bhaṭāḥ
analyzed: ke ete anupathāḥ ye te ekādaśa mahā bhaṭāḥ

original: BhP_04.25.027/2 etā vā lalanāḥ subhru ko 'yaṃ te 'hiḥ puraḥ-saraḥ
analyzed: etāḥ vā lalanāḥ subhru kaḥ ayam te ahiḥ puraḥsaraḥ

original: BhP_04.25.028/1 tvaṃ hrīr bhavāny asy atha vāg ramā patiṃ vicinvatī kiṃ munivad raho vane
analyzed: tvam hrīḥ bhavānī asi atha vāc ramā patim vicinvatī kim muni vat rahaḥ vane

original: BhP_04.25.028/2 tvad-aṅghri-kāmāpta-samasta-kāmaṃ kva padma-kośaḥ patitaḥ karāgrāt
analyzed: tvad aṅghrikām āpta samasta kāmam kva padmakośaḥ patitaḥ kara agrāt

original: BhP_04.25.029/1 nāsāṃ varorv anyatamā bhuvi-spṛk purīm imāṃ vīra-vareṇa sākam
analyzed: na āsām varā ūru anyatamā bhuvispṛś purīm imām vīra vareṇa sākam

original: BhP_04.25.029/2 arhasy alaṅkartum adabhra-karmaṇā lokaṃ paraṃ śrīr iva yajña-puṃsā
analyzed: arhasi alaṅkartum adabhra karmaṇā lokam param śrīḥ iva yajña puṃsā

original: BhP_04.25.030/1 yad eṣa māpāṅga-vikhaṇḍitendriyaṃ savrīḍa-bhāva-smita-vibhramad-bhruvā
analyzed: yat eṣa mā apāṅga vikhaṇḍita indriyam sa vrīḍa bhāva smita vibhramat bhruvā

original: BhP_04.25.030/2 tvayopasṛṣṭo bhagavān mano-bhavaḥ prabādhate 'thānugṛhāṇa śobhane
analyzed: tvayā upasṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān manobhavaḥ prabādhate atha anugṛhāṇa śobhane

original: BhP_04.25.031/1 tvad-ānanaṃ subhru sutāra-locanaṃ vyālambi-nīlālaka-vṛnda-saṃvṛtam
analyzed: tvad ānanam subhru su tāra locanam vyālambi nīla alaka vṛnda saṃvṛtam

original: BhP_04.25.031/2 unnīya me darśaya valgu-vācakaṃ yad vrīḍayā nābhimukhaṃ śuci-smite
analyzed: unnīya me darśaya valgu vācakam yat vrīḍayā na abhimukham śuci smite

original: BhP_04.25.032/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.25.032/1 itthaṃ purañjanaṃ nārī yācamānam adhīravat
analyzed: ittham purañjanam nārī yācamānam adhīra vat

original: BhP_04.25.032/2 abhyanandata taṃ vīraṃ hasantī vīra mohitā
analyzed: abhyanandata tam vīram hasantī vīra mohitā

original: BhP_04.25.033/1 na vidāma vayaṃ samyak kartāraṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: na vidāma vayam samyak kartāram puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_04.25.033/2 ātmanaś ca parasyāpi gotraṃ nāma ca yat-kṛtam
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca parasya api gotram nāma ca yat kṛtam

original: BhP_04.25.034/1 ihādya santam ātmānaṃ vidāma na tataḥ param
analyzed: iha adya santam ātmānam vidāma na tatas param

original: BhP_04.25.034/2 yeneyaṃ nirmitā vīra purī śaraṇam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yena iyam nirmitā vīra purī śaraṇam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.035/1 ete sakhāyaḥ sakhyo me narā nāryaś ca mānada
analyzed: ete sakhāyaḥ sakhyaḥ me narāḥ nāryaḥ ca mānada

original: BhP_04.25.035/2 suptāyāṃ mayi jāgarti nāgo 'yaṃ pālayan purīm
analyzed: suptāyām mayi jāgarti nāgaḥ ayam pālayan purīm

original: BhP_04.25.036/1 diṣṭyāgato 'si bhadraṃ te grāmyān kāmān abhīpsase
analyzed: diṣṭyā āgataḥ asi bhadram te grāmyān kāmān abhīpsase

original: BhP_04.25.036/2 udvahiṣyāmi tāṃs te 'haṃ sva-bandhubhir arindama
analyzed: udvahiṣyāmi tān te aham sva bandhubhiḥ arindama

original: BhP_04.25.037/1 imāṃ tvam adhitiṣṭhasva purīṃ nava-mukhīṃ vibho
analyzed: imām tvam adhitiṣṭhasva purīm nava mukhīm vibho

original: BhP_04.25.037/2 mayopanītān gṛhṇānaḥ kāma-bhogān śataṃ samāḥ
analyzed: mayā upanītān gṛhṇānaḥ kāma bhogān śatam samāḥ

original: BhP_04.25.038/1 kaṃ nu tvad-anyaṃ ramaye hy arati-jñam akovidam
analyzed: kam nu tvad anyam ramaye hi a rati jñam a kovidam

original: BhP_04.25.038/2 asamparāyābhimukham aśvastana-vidaṃ paśum
analyzed: a samparāya abhimukham aśvastana vidam paśum

original: BhP_04.25.039/1 dharmo hy atrārtha-kāmau ca prajānando 'mṛtaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi atra artha kāmau ca prajā ānandaḥ amṛtam yaśaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.039/2 lokā viśokā virajā yān na kevalino viduḥ
analyzed: lokāḥ viśokāḥ virajāḥ yān na kevalinaḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_04.25.040/1 pitṛ-devarṣi-martyānāṃ bhūtānām ātmanaś ca ha
analyzed: pitṛ deva ṛṣi martyānām bhūtānām ātmanaḥ ca ha

original: BhP_04.25.040/2 kṣemyaṃ vadanti śaraṇaṃ bhave 'smin yad gṛhāśramaḥ
analyzed: kṣemyam vadanti śaraṇam bhave asmin yat gṛhāśramaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.041/1 kā nāma vīra vikhyātaṃ vadānyaṃ priya-darśanam
analyzed: kā nāma vīra vikhyātam vadānyam priya darśanam

original: BhP_04.25.041/2 na vṛṇīta priyaṃ prāptaṃ mādṛśī tvādṛśaṃ patim
analyzed: na vṛṇīta priyam prāptam mādṛśī tvādṛśam patim

original: BhP_04.25.042/1 kasyā manas te bhuvi bhogi-bhogayoḥ striyā na sajjed bhujayor mahā-bhuja
analyzed: kasyāḥ manaḥ te bhuvi bhogi bhogayoḥ striyāḥ na sajjet bhujayoḥ mahā bhuja

original: BhP_04.25.042/2 yo 'nātha-vargādhim alaṃ ghṛṇoddhata- smitāvalokena caraty apohitum
analyzed: yaḥ anātha varga ādhim alam smita avalokena carati apohitum

original: BhP_04.25.043/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.25.043/1 iti tau dam-patī tatra samudya samayaṃ mithaḥ
analyzed: iti tau dampatī tatra samudya samayam mithas

original: BhP_04.25.043/2 tāṃ praviśya purīṃ rājan mumudāte śataṃ samāḥ
analyzed: tām praviśya purīm rājan mumudāte śatam samāḥ

original: BhP_04.25.044/1 upagīyamāno lalitaṃ tatra tatra ca gāyakaiḥ
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ lalitam tatra tatra ca gāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.25.044/2 krīḍan parivṛtaḥ strībhir hradinīm āviśac chucau
analyzed: krīḍan parivṛtaḥ strībhiḥ hradinīm āviśat śucau

original: BhP_04.25.045/1 saptopari kṛtā dvāraḥ puras tasyās tu dve adhaḥ
analyzed: sapta upari kṛtāḥ dvāraḥ puras tasyāḥ tu dve adhas

original: BhP_04.25.045/2 pṛthag-viṣaya-gaty-arthaṃ tasyāṃ yaḥ kaścaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: pṛthak viṣaya gati artham tasyām yaḥ kaścana īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.25.046/1 pañca dvāras tu paurastyā dakṣiṇaikā tathottarā
analyzed: pañca dvāraḥ tu paurastyāḥ dakṣiṇā ekā tathā uttarā

original: BhP_04.25.046/2 paścime dve amūṣāṃ te nāmāni nṛpa varṇaye
analyzed: paścime dve amūṣām te nāmāni nṛpa varṇaye

original: BhP_04.25.047/1 khadyotāvirmukhī ca prāg dvārāv ekatra nirmite
analyzed: khadyota āvirmukhī ca prāk dvārau ekatra nirmite

original: BhP_04.25.047/2 vibhrājitaṃ janapadaṃ yāti tābhyāṃ dyumat-sakhaḥ
analyzed: vibhrājitam janapadam yāti tābhyām dyumat sakhaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.048/1 nalinī nālinī ca prāg dvārāv ekatra nirmite
analyzed: nalinī nālinī ca prāk dvārau ekatra nirmite

original: BhP_04.25.048/2 avadhūta-sakhas tābhyāṃ viṣayaṃ yāti saurabham
analyzed: avadhūta sakhaḥ tābhyām viṣayam yāti saurabham

original: BhP_04.25.049/1 mukhyā nāma purastād dvās tayāpaṇa-bahūdanau
analyzed: mukhyāḥ nāma purastāt dvāḥ tayāpaṇa bahūdanau

original: BhP_04.25.049/2 viṣayau yāti pura-rāḍ rasajña-vipaṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: viṣayau yāti   rasajña vipaṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.050/1 pitṛhūr nṛpa puryā dvār dakṣiṇena purañjanaḥ
analyzed: pitṛ hūḥ nṛpa puryāḥ dvār dakṣiṇena purañjanaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.050/2 rāṣṭraṃ dakṣiṇa-pañcālaṃ yāti śrutadharānvitaḥ
analyzed: rāṣṭram dakṣiṇa pañcālam yāti śrutadhara anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.051/1 devahūr nāma puryā dvā uttareṇa purañjanaḥ
analyzed: devahūḥ nāma puryāḥ dvau uttareṇa purañjanaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.051/2 rāṣṭram uttara-pañcālaṃ yāti śrutadharānvitaḥ
analyzed: rāṣṭram uttara pañcālam yāti śrutadhara anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.052/1 āsurī nāma paścād dvās tayā yāti purañjanaḥ
analyzed: āsurī nāma paścāt dvāḥ tayā yāti purañjanaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.052/2 grāmakaṃ nāma viṣayaṃ durmadena samanvitaḥ
analyzed: grāmakam nāma viṣayam durmadena samanvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.053/1 nirṛtir nāma paścād dvās tayā yāti purañjanaḥ
analyzed: nirṛtiḥ nāma paścāt dvāḥ tayā yāti purañjanaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.053/2 vaiśasaṃ nāma viṣayaṃ lubdhakena samanvitaḥ
analyzed: vaiśasam nāma viṣayam lubdhakena samanvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.054/1 andhāv amīṣāṃ paurāṇāṃ nirvāk-peśaskṛtāv ubhau
analyzed: andhau amīṣām paurāṇām nirvāc peśaskṛtau ubhau

original: BhP_04.25.054/2 akṣaṇvatām adhipatis tābhyāṃ yāti karoti ca
analyzed: akṣaṇvatām adhipatiḥ tābhyām yāti karoti ca

original: BhP_04.25.055/1 sa yarhy antaḥpura-gato viṣūcīna-samanvitaḥ
analyzed: sa yarhi antaḥpura gataḥ viṣūcīna samanvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.055/2 mohaṃ prasādaṃ harṣaṃ vā yāti jāyātmajodbhavam
analyzed: moham prasādam harṣam vā yāti jāyā ātmaja udbhavam

original: BhP_04.25.056/1 evaṃ karmasu saṃsaktaḥ kāmātmā vañcito 'budhaḥ
analyzed: evam karmasu saṃsaktaḥ kāma ātmā vañcitaḥ abudhaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.056/2 mahiṣī yad yad īheta tat tad evānvavartata
analyzed: mahiṣī yat yat īheta tat tat eva anvavartata

original: BhP_04.25.057/1 kvacit pibantyāṃ pibati madirāṃ mada-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: kvacid pibantyām pibati madirām mada vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.057/2 aśnantyāṃ kvacid aśnāti jakṣatyāṃ saha jakṣiti
analyzed: aśnantyām kvacid aśnāti jakṣatyām saha jakṣiti

original: BhP_04.25.058/1 kvacid gāyati gāyantyāṃ rudatyāṃ rudati kvacit
analyzed: kvacid gāyati gāyantyām rudatyām rudati kvacid

original: BhP_04.25.058/2 kvacid dhasantyāṃ hasati jalpantyām anu jalpati
analyzed: kvacid hasantyām hasati jalpantyām anu jalpati

original: BhP_04.25.059/1 kvacid dhāvati dhāvantyāṃ tiṣṭhantyām anu tiṣṭhati
analyzed: kvacid dhāvati dhāvantyām tiṣṭhantyām anu tiṣṭhati

original: BhP_04.25.059/2 anu śete śayānāyām anvāste kvacid āsatīm
analyzed: anu śete śayānāyām anvāste kvacid āsatīm

original: BhP_04.25.060/1 kvacic chṛṇoti śṛṇvantyāṃ paśyantyām anu paśyati
analyzed: kvacid śṛṇoti śṛṇvantyām paśyantyām anu paśyati

original: BhP_04.25.060/2 kvacij jighrati jighrantyāṃ spṛśantyāṃ spṛśati kvacit
analyzed: kvacid jighrati jighrantyām spṛśantyām spṛśati kvacid

original: BhP_04.25.061/1 kvacic ca śocatīṃ jāyām anu śocati dīnavat
analyzed: kvacid ca śocatīm jāyām anu śocati dīna vat

original: BhP_04.25.061/2 anu hṛṣyati hṛṣyantyāṃ muditām anu modate
analyzed: anu hṛṣyati hṛṣyantyām muditām anu modate

original: BhP_04.25.062/1 vipralabdho mahiṣyaivaṃ sarva-prakṛti-vañcitaḥ
analyzed: vipralabdhaḥ mahiṣyā evam sarva prakṛti vañcitaḥ

original: BhP_04.25.062/2 necchann anukaroty ajñaḥ klaibyāt krīḍā-mṛgo yathā
analyzed: na icchan anukaroti ajñaḥ klaibyāt krīḍāmṛgaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.26.001/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.26.001/1 sa ekadā maheṣvāso rathaṃ pañcāśvam āśu-gam
analyzed: saḥ ekadā mahā iṣvāsaḥ ratham pañca aśvam āśu gam

original: BhP_04.26.001/2 dvīṣaṃ dvi-cakram ekākṣaṃ tri-veṇuṃ pañca-bandhuram
analyzed: dvi īṣam dvi cakram eka akṣam tri veṇum pañca bandhuram

original: BhP_04.26.002/1 eka-raśmy eka-damanam eka-nīḍaṃ dvi-kūbaram
analyzed: eka raśmi eka damanam eka nīḍam dvi kūbaram

original: BhP_04.26.002/2 pañca-praharaṇaṃ sapta- varūthaṃ pañca-vikramam
analyzed: pañca praharaṇam sapta varūtham pañca vikramam

original: BhP_04.26.003/1 haimopaskaram āruhya svarṇa-varmākṣayeṣudhiḥ
analyzed: haima upaskaram āruhya svarṇa varma akṣaya iṣudhiḥ

original: BhP_04.26.003/2 ekādaśa-camū-nāthaḥ pañca-prastham agād vanam
analyzed: ekādaśa camū nāthaḥ pañca prastham agāt vanam

original: BhP_04.26.004/1 cacāra mṛgayāṃ tatra dṛpta ātteṣu-kārmukaḥ
analyzed: cacāra mṛgayām tatra dṛptaḥ ātta iṣu kārmukaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.004/2 vihāya jāyām atad-arhāṃ mṛga-vyasana-lālasaḥ
analyzed: vihāya jāyām atadarhām mṛga vyasana lālasaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.005/1 āsurīṃ vṛttim āśritya ghorātmā niranugrahaḥ
analyzed: āsurīm vṛttim āśritya ghora ātmā niranugrahaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.005/2 nyahanan niśitair bāṇair vaneṣu vana-gocarān
analyzed: nyahanat niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ vaneṣu vana gocarān

original: BhP_04.26.006/1 tīrtheṣu pratidṛṣṭeṣu rājā medhyān paśūn vane
analyzed: tīrtheṣu pratidṛṣṭeṣu rājā medhyān paśūn vane

original: BhP_04.26.006/2 yāvad-artham alaṃ lubdho hanyād iti niyamyate
analyzed: yāvadartham alam lubdhaḥ hanyāt iti niyamyate

original: BhP_04.26.007/1 ya evaṃ karma niyataṃ vidvān kurvīta mānavaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ evam karma niyatam vidvān kurvīta mānavaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.007/2 karmaṇā tena rājendra jñānena na sa lipyate
analyzed: karmaṇā tena rāja indra jñānena na sa lipyate

original: BhP_04.26.008/1 anyathā karma kurvāṇo mānārūḍho nibadhyate
analyzed: anyathā karma kurvāṇaḥ māna ārūḍhaḥ nibadhyate

original: BhP_04.26.008/2 guṇa-pravāha-patito naṣṭa-prajño vrajaty adhaḥ
analyzed: guṇa pravāha patitaḥ naṣṭa prajñaḥ vrajati adhas

original: BhP_04.26.009/1 tatra nirbhinna-gātrāṇāṃ citra-vājaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: tatra nirbhinna gātrāṇām citra vājaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ

original: BhP_04.26.009/2 viplavo 'bhūd duḥkhitānāṃ duḥsahaḥ karuṇātmanām
analyzed: viplavaḥ abhūt duḥkhitānām duḥsahaḥ karuṇa ātmanām

original: BhP_04.26.010/1 śaśān varāhān mahiṣān gavayān ruru-śalyakān
analyzed: śaśān varāhān mahiṣān gavayān ruru śalyakān

original: BhP_04.26.010/2 medhyān anyāṃś ca vividhān vinighnan śramam adhyagāt
analyzed: medhyān anyān ca vividhān vinighnan śramam adhyagāt

original: BhP_04.26.011/1 tataḥ kṣut-tṛṭ-pariśrānto nivṛtto gṛham eyivān
analyzed: tatas kṣudh tṛṣ pariśrāntaḥ nivṛttaḥ gṛham eyivān

original: BhP_04.26.011/2 kṛta-snānocitāhāraḥ saṃviveśa gata-klamaḥ
analyzed: kṛta snāna ucita āhāraḥ saṃviveśa gata klamaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.012/1 ātmānam arhayāṃ cakre dhūpālepa-srag-ādibhiḥ
analyzed: ātmānam dhūpa ālepa sraj ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.26.012/2 sādhv-alaṅkṛta-sarvāṅgo mahiṣyām ādadhe manaḥ
analyzed: sādhu alaṅkṛta sarva aṅgaḥ mahiṣyām ādadhe manaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.013/1 tṛpto hṛṣṭaḥ sudṛptaś ca kandarpākṛṣṭa-mānasaḥ
analyzed: tṛptaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ su dṛptaḥ ca kandarpa ākṛṣṭa mānasaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.013/2 na vyacaṣṭa varārohāṃ gṛhiṇīṃ gṛha-medhinīm
analyzed: na vyacaṣṭa vara ārohām gṛhiṇīm gṛhamedhinīm

original: BhP_04.26.014/1 antaḥpura-striyo 'pṛcchad vimanā iva vediṣat
analyzed: antaḥpura striyaḥ apṛcchat vimanāḥ iva vediṣad

original: BhP_04.26.014/2 api vaḥ kuśalaṃ rāmāḥ seśvarīṇāṃ yathā purā
analyzed: api vaḥ kuśalam rāmāḥ sa īśvarīṇām yathā purā

original: BhP_04.26.015/1 na tathaitarhi rocante gṛheṣu gṛha-sampadaḥ
analyzed: na tathā etarhi rocante gṛheṣu gṛha sampadaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.015/2 yadi na syād gṛhe mātā patnī vā pati-devatā
analyzed: yadi na syāt gṛhe mātā patnī vā pati devatā

original: BhP_04.26.015/3 vyaṅge ratha iva prājñaḥ ko nāmāsīta dīnavat
analyzed: vyaṅge rathe iva prājñaḥ kaḥ nāma āsīta dīna vat

original: BhP_04.26.016/1 kva vartate sā lalanā majjantaṃ vyasanārṇave
analyzed: kva vartate sā lalanā majjantam vyasana arṇave

original: BhP_04.26.016/2 yā mām uddharate prajñāṃ dīpayantī pade pade
analyzed: yā mām uddharate prajñām dīpayantī pade pade

original: BhP_04.26.017/0 rāmā ūcuḥ
analyzed: rāmāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.26.017/1 nara-nātha na jānīmas tvat-priyā yad vyavasyati
analyzed: naranātha na jānīmaḥ tvad priyā yat vyavasyati

original: BhP_04.26.017/2 bhūtale niravastāre śayānāṃ paśya śatru-han
analyzed: bhū tale niravastāre śayānām paśya śatru han

original: BhP_04.26.018/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.26.018/1 purañjanaḥ sva-mahiṣīṃ nirīkṣyāvadhutāṃ bhuvi
analyzed: purañjanaḥ sva mahiṣīm nirīkṣya avadhutām bhuvi

original: BhP_04.26.018/2 tat-saṅgonmathita-jñāno vaiklavyaṃ paramaṃ yayau
analyzed: tad saṅga unmathita jñānaḥ vaiklavyam paramam yayau

original: BhP_04.26.019/1 sāntvayan ślakṣṇayā vācā hṛdayena vidūyatā
analyzed: sāntvayan ślakṣṇayā vācā hṛdayena vidūyatā

original: BhP_04.26.019/2 preyasyāḥ sneha-saṃrambha- liṅgam ātmani nābhyagāt
analyzed: preyasyāḥ sneha saṃrambha liṅgam ātmani na abhyagāt

original: BhP_04.26.020/1 anuninye 'tha śanakair vīro 'nunaya-kovidaḥ
analyzed: anuninye atha śanakais vīraḥ anunaya kovidaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.020/2 pasparśa pāda-yugalam āha cotsaṅga-lālitām
analyzed: pasparśa pāda yugalam āha ca utsaṅga lālitām

original: BhP_04.26.021/0 purañjana uvāca
analyzed: purañjanaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.26.021/1 nūnaṃ tv akṛta-puṇyās te bhṛtyā yeṣv īśvarāḥ śubhe
analyzed: nūnam tu akṛta puṇyāḥ te bhṛtyāḥ yeṣu īśvarāḥ śubhe

original: BhP_04.26.021/2 kṛtāgaḥsv ātmasāt kṛtvā śikṣā-daṇḍaṃ na yuñjate
analyzed: kṛta āgaḥsu ātmasāt kṛtvā śikṣā daṇḍam na yuñjate

original: BhP_04.26.022/1 paramo 'nugraho daṇḍo bhṛtyeṣu prabhuṇārpitaḥ
analyzed: paramaḥ anugrahaḥ daṇḍaḥ bhṛtyeṣu prabhuṇā arpitaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.022/2 bālo na veda tat tanvi bandhu-kṛtyam amarṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: bālaḥ na veda tat tanvi bandhu kṛtyam amarṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.26.023/1 sā tvaṃ mukhaṃ sudati subhrv anurāga-bhāra- vrīḍā-vilamba-vilasad-dhasitāvalokam
analyzed: sā tvam mukham sudati su bhru anurāga bhāra vrīḍā vilamba vilasat hasita avalokam

original: BhP_04.26.023/2 nīlālakālibhir upaskṛtam unnasaṃ naḥ svānāṃ pradarśaya manasvini valgu-vākyam
analyzed: nīla alaka ālibhiḥ upaskṛtam unnasam naḥ svānām pradarśaya manasvini valgu vākyam

original: BhP_04.26.024/1 tasmin dadhe damam ahaṃ tava vīra-patni yo 'nyatra bhūsura-kulāt kṛta-kilbiṣas tam
analyzed: tasmin dadhe damam aham tava vīra patni yaḥ anyatra bhūsura kulāt kṛta kilbiṣaḥ tam

original: BhP_04.26.024/2 paśye na vīta-bhayam unmuditaṃ tri-lokyām anyatra vai mura-ripor itaratra dāsāt
analyzed: paśye na vīta bhayam unmuditam trilokyām anyatra vai muraripoḥ itaratra dāsāt

original: BhP_04.26.025/1 vaktraṃ na te vitilakaṃ malinaṃ viharṣaṃ saṃrambha-bhīmam avimṛṣṭam apeta-rāgam
analyzed: vaktram na te vitilakam malinam viharṣam saṃrambha bhīmam a vimṛṣṭam apeta rāgam

original: BhP_04.26.025/2 paśye stanāv api śucopahatau sujātau bimbādharaṃ vigata-kuṅkuma-paṅka-rāgam
analyzed: paśye stanau api śucā upahatau sujātau bimba adharam vigata kuṅkuma paṅka rāgam

original: BhP_04.26.026/1 tan me prasīda suhṛdaḥ kṛta-kilbiṣasya svairaṃ gatasya mṛgayāṃ vyasanāturasya
analyzed: tat me prasīda suhṛdaḥ kṛta kilbiṣasya svairam gatasya mṛgayām vyasana āturasya

original: BhP_04.26.026/2 kā devaraṃ vaśa-gataṃ kusumāstra-vega- visrasta-pauṃsnam uśatī na bhajeta kṛtye
analyzed: kā devaram vaśa gatam kusuma astra vega visrasta pauṃsnam uśatī na bhajeta kṛtye

original: BhP_04.27.001/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.27.001/1 itthaṃ purañjanaṃ sadhryag vaśamānīya vibhramaiḥ
analyzed: ittham purañjanam vaśam ānīya vibhramaiḥ

original: BhP_04.27.001/2 purañjanī mahārāja reme ramayatī patim
analyzed: purañjanī mahā rāja reme ramayatī patim

original: BhP_04.27.002/1 sa rājā mahiṣīṃ rājan susnātāṃ rucirānanām
analyzed: sa rājāḥ mahiṣīm rājan su snātām rucira ānanām

original: BhP_04.27.002/2 kṛta-svastyayanāṃ tṛptām abhyanandad upāgatām
analyzed: kṛta svastyayanām tṛptām abhyanandat upāgatām

original: BhP_04.27.003/1 tayopagūḍhaḥ parirabdha-kandharo raho 'numantrair apakṛṣṭa-cetanaḥ
analyzed: tayā upagūḍhaḥ parirabdha kandharaḥ rahaḥ anu mantraiḥ apakṛṣṭa cetanaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.003/2 na kāla-raṃho bubudhe duratyayaṃ divā niśeti pramadā-parigrahaḥ
analyzed: na kāla raṃhaḥ bubudhe duratyayam divā niśā iti pramadā parigrahaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.004/1 śayāna unnaddha-mado mahā-manā mahārha-talpe mahiṣī-bhujopadhiḥ
analyzed: śayānaḥ unnaddha madaḥ mahāmanāḥ mahārha talpe mahiṣī bhuja upadhiḥ

original: BhP_04.27.004/2 tām eva vīro manute paraṃ yatas tamo-'bhibhūto na nijaṃ paraṃ ca yat
analyzed: tām eva vīraḥ manute param yatas tamaḥ abhibhūtaḥ na nijam param ca yat

original: BhP_04.27.005/1 tayaivaṃ ramamāṇasya kāma-kaśmala-cetasaḥ
analyzed: tayā evam ramamāṇasya kāma kaśmala cetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.005/2 kṣaṇārdham iva rājendra vyatikrāntaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇa ardham iva rāja indra vyatikrāntam navam vayaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.006/1 tasyām ajanayat putrān purañjanyāṃ purañjanaḥ
analyzed: tasyām ajanayat putrān purañjanyām purañjanaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.006/2 śatāny ekādaśa virāḍ āyuṣo 'rdham athātyagāt
analyzed: śatāni ekādaśa virāj āyuṣaḥ ardham atha atyagāt

original: BhP_04.27.007/1 duhitṝr daśottara-śataṃ pitṛ-mātṛ-yaśaskarīḥ
analyzed: duhitṝḥ daśottaraśatam pitṛ mātṛ yaśaskarīḥ

original: BhP_04.27.007/2 śīlaudārya-guṇopetāḥ paurañjanyaḥ prajā-pate
analyzed: śīla audārya guṇa upetāḥ paurañjanyaḥ prajāpate

original: BhP_04.27.008/1 sa pañcāla-patiḥ putrān pitṛ-vaṃśa-vivardhanān
analyzed: sa pañcāla patiḥ putrān pitṛ vaṃśa vivardhanān

original: BhP_04.27.008/2 dāraiḥ saṃyojayām āsa duhitṝḥ sadṛśair varaiḥ
analyzed: dāraiḥ saṃyojayām āsa duhitṝḥ sadṛśaiḥ varaiḥ

original: BhP_04.27.009/1 putrāṇāṃ cābhavan putrā ekaikasya śataṃ śatam
analyzed: putrāṇām ca abhavan putrāḥ ekaikasya śatam śatam

original: BhP_04.27.009/2 yair vai paurañjano vaṃśaḥ pañcāleṣu samedhitaḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ vai paurañjanaḥ vaṃśaḥ pañcāleṣu samedhitaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.010/1 teṣu tad-riktha-hāreṣu gṛha-kośānujīviṣu
analyzed: teṣu tad riktha hāreṣu gṛha kośa anujīviṣu

original: BhP_04.27.010/2 nirūḍhena mamatvena viṣayeṣv anvabadhyata
analyzed: nirūḍhena mamatvena viṣayeṣu anvabadhyata

original: BhP_04.27.011/1 īje ca kratubhir ghorair dīkṣitaḥ paśu-mārakaiḥ
analyzed: īje ca kratubhiḥ ghoraiḥ dīkṣitaḥ paśu mārakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.27.011/2 devān pitṝn bhūta-patīn nānā-kāmo yathā bhavān
analyzed: devān pitṝn bhūtapatīn nānā kāmaḥ yathā bhavān

original: BhP_04.27.012/1 yukteṣv evaṃ pramattasya kuṭumbāsakta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: yukteṣu evam pramattasya kuṭumba āsakta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.012/2 āsasāda sa vai kālo yo 'priyaḥ priya-yoṣitām
analyzed: āsasāda sa vai kālaḥ yaḥ apriyaḥ priya yoṣitām

original: BhP_04.27.013/1 caṇḍavega iti khyāto gandharvādhipatir nṛpa
analyzed: caṇḍavegaḥ iti khyātaḥ gandharva adhipatiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_04.27.013/2 gandharvās tasya balinaḥ ṣaṣṭy-uttara-śata-trayam
analyzed: gandharvāḥ tasya balinaḥ ṣaṣṭi uttara śata trayam

original: BhP_04.27.014/1 gandharvyas tādṛśīr asya maithunyaś ca sitāsitāḥ
analyzed: gandharvyaḥ tādṛśīḥ asya maithunyaḥ ca sita asitāḥ

original: BhP_04.27.014/2 parivṛttyā vilumpanti sarva-kāma-vinirmitām
analyzed: parivṛttyā vilumpanti sarva kāma vinirmitām

original: BhP_04.27.015/1 te caṇḍavegānucarāḥ purañjana-puraṃ yadā
analyzed: te caṇḍavega anucarāḥ purañjana puram yadā

original: BhP_04.27.015/2 hartum ārebhire tatra pratyaṣedhat prajāgaraḥ
analyzed: hartum ārebhire tatra pratyaṣedhat prajāgaraḥ

original: BhP_04.27.016/1 sa saptabhiḥ śatair eko viṃśatyā ca śataṃ samāḥ
analyzed: sa saptabhiḥ śataiḥ ekaḥ viṃśatyā ca śatam samāḥ

original: BhP_04.27.016/2 purañjana-purādhyakṣo gandharvair yuyudhe balī
analyzed: purañjana pura adhyakṣaḥ gandharvaiḥ yuyudhe balī

original: BhP_04.27.017/1 kṣīyamāṇe sva-sambandhe ekasmin bahubhir yudhā
analyzed: kṣīyamāṇe sva sambandhe ekasmin bahubhiḥ yudhā

original: BhP_04.27.017/2 cintāṃ parāṃ jagāmārtaḥ sa-rāṣṭra-pura-bāndhavaḥ
analyzed: cintām parām jagāma ārtaḥ sa rāṣṭra pura bāndhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.27.018/1 sa eva puryāṃ madhu-bhuk pañcāleṣu sva-pārṣadaiḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva puryām madhu bhuj pañcāleṣu sva pārṣadaiḥ

original: BhP_04.27.018/2 upanītaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇan strī-jito nāvidad bhayam
analyzed: upanītam balim gṛhṇan strī jitaḥ na avidat bhayam

original: BhP_04.27.019/1 kālasya duhitā kācit tri-lokīṃ varam icchatī
analyzed: kālasya duhitā kācid trilokīm varam icchatī

original: BhP_04.27.019/2 paryaṭantī na barhiṣman pratyanandata kaścana
analyzed: paryaṭantī na barhiṣman pratyanandata kaścana

original: BhP_04.27.020/1 daurbhāgyenātmano loke viśrutā durbhageti sā
analyzed: daurbhāgyena ātmanaḥ loke viśrutā durbhagā iti sā

original: BhP_04.27.020/2 yā tuṣṭā rājarṣaye tu vṛtādāt pūrave varam
analyzed: yā tuṣṭā rājarṣaye tu vṛtā adāt pūrave varam

original: BhP_04.27.021/1 kadācid aṭamānā sā brahma-lokān mahīṃ gatam
analyzed: kadācid aṭamānā sā brahma lokāt mahīm gatam

original: BhP_04.27.021/2 vavre bṛhad-vrataṃ māṃ tu jānatī kāma-mohitā
analyzed: vavre bṛhat vratam mām tu jānatī kāma mohitā

original: BhP_04.27.022/1 mayi saṃrabhya vipula- madāc chāpaṃ suduḥsaham
analyzed: mayi saṃrabhya vipula madāt śāpam su duḥsaham

original: BhP_04.27.022/2 sthātum arhasi naikatra mad-yācñā-vimukho mune
analyzed: sthātum arhasi nā ekatra mad yācñā vimukhaḥ mune

original: BhP_04.27.023/1 tato vihata-saṅkalpā kanyakā yavaneśvaram
analyzed: tatas vihata saṅkalpā kanyakā yavana īśvaram

original: BhP_04.27.023/2 mayopadiṣṭam āsādya vavre nāmnā bhayaṃ patim
analyzed: mayā upadiṣṭam āsādya vavre nāmnā bhayam patim

original: BhP_04.27.024/1 ṛṣabhaṃ yavanānāṃ tvāṃ vṛṇe vīrepsitaṃ patim
analyzed: ṛṣabham yavanānām tvām vṛṇe vīra īpsitam patim

original: BhP_04.27.024/2 saṅkalpas tvayi bhūtānāṃ kṛtaḥ kila na riṣyati
analyzed: saṅkalpaḥ tvayi bhūtānām kṛtaḥ kila na riṣyati

original: BhP_04.27.025/1 dvāv imāv anuśocanti bālāv asad-avagrahau
analyzed: dvau imau anuśocanti bālau asat avagrahau

original: BhP_04.27.025/2 yal loka-śāstropanataṃ na rāti na tad icchati
analyzed: yat loka śāstra upanatam na rāti na tat icchati

original: BhP_04.27.026/1 atho bhajasva māṃ bhadra bhajantīṃ me dayāṃ kuru
analyzed: atho bhajasva mām bhadra bhajantīm me dayām kuru

original: BhP_04.27.026/2 etāvān pauruṣo dharmo yad ārtān anukampate
analyzed: etāvān pauruṣaḥ dharmaḥ yat ārtān anukampate

original: BhP_04.27.027/1 kāla-kanyodita-vaco niśamya yavaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: kāla kanyā udita vacaḥ niśamya yavana īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.27.027/2 cikīrṣur deva-guhyaṃ sa sasmitaṃ tām abhāṣata
analyzed: cikīrṣuḥ deva guhyam sa sa smitam tām abhāṣata

original: BhP_04.27.028/1 mayā nirūpitas tubhyaṃ patir ātma-samādhinā
analyzed: mayā nirūpitaḥ tubhyam patiḥ ātma samādhinā

original: BhP_04.27.028/2 nābhinandati loko 'yaṃ tvām abhadrām asammatām
analyzed: na abhinandati lokaḥ ayam tvām a bhadrām a sammatām

original: BhP_04.27.029/1 tvam avyakta-gatir bhuṅkṣva lokaṃ karma-vinirmitam
analyzed: tvam avyakta gatiḥ bhuṅkṣva lokam karma vinirmitam

original: BhP_04.27.029/2 yā hi me pṛtanā-yuktā prajā-nāśaṃ praṇeṣyasi
analyzed: yā hi me pṛtanā yuktā prajā nāśam praṇeṣyasi

original: BhP_04.27.030/1 prajvāro 'yaṃ mama bhrātā tvaṃ ca me bhaginī bhava
analyzed: prajvāraḥ ayam mama bhrātā tvam ca me bhaginī bhava

original: BhP_04.27.030/2 carāmy ubhābhyāṃ loke 'sminn avyakto bhīma-sainikaḥ
analyzed: carāmi ubhābhyām loke asmin avyaktaḥ bhīma sainikaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.001/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.28.001/1 sainikā bhaya-nāmno ye barhiṣman diṣṭa-kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: sainikāḥ bhaya nāmnaḥ ye barhiṣman diṣṭa kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.001/2 prajvāra-kāla-kanyābhyāṃ vicerur avanīm imām
analyzed: prajvāra kālakanyābhyām viceruḥ avanīm imām

original: BhP_04.28.002/1 ta ekadā tu rabhasā purañjana-purīṃ nṛpa
analyzed: te ekadā tu rabhasā purañjana purīm nṛpa

original: BhP_04.28.002/2 rurudhur bhauma-bhogāḍhyāṃ jarat-pannaga-pālitām
analyzed: rurudhuḥ bhauma bhoga āḍhyām jarat pannaga pālitām

original: BhP_04.28.003/1 kāla-kanyāpi bubhuje purañjana-puraṃ balāt
analyzed: kāla kanyā api bubhuje purañjana puram balāt

original: BhP_04.28.003/2 yayābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ sadyo niḥsāratām iyāt
analyzed: yayā abhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ sadyas niḥsāra tām iyāt

original: BhP_04.28.004/1 tayopabhujyamānāṃ vai yavanāḥ sarvato-diśam
analyzed: tayā upabhujyamānām vai yavanāḥ sarvatodiśam

original: BhP_04.28.004/2 dvārbhiḥ praviśya subhṛśaṃ prārdayan sakalāṃ purīm
analyzed: dvārbhiḥ praviśya su bhṛśam prārdayan sakalām purīm

original: BhP_04.28.005/1 tasyāṃ prapīḍyamānāyām abhimānī purañjanaḥ
analyzed: tasyām prapīḍyamānāyām abhimānī purañjanaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.005/2 avāporu-vidhāṃs tāpān kuṭumbī mamatākulaḥ
analyzed: avāpa uruvidhān tāpān kuṭumbī mamatā ākulaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.006/1 kanyopagūḍho naṣṭa-śrīḥ kṛpaṇo viṣayātmakaḥ
analyzed: kanyā upagūḍhaḥ naṣṭa śrīḥ kṛpaṇaḥ viṣaya ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.006/2 naṣṭa-prajño hṛtaiśvaryo gandharva-yavanair balāt
analyzed: naṣṭa prajñaḥ hṛta aiśvaryaḥ gandharva yavanaiḥ balāt

original: BhP_04.28.007/1 viśīrṇāṃ sva-purīṃ vīkṣya pratikūlān anādṛtān
analyzed: viśīrṇām sva purīm vīkṣya pratikūlān an ādṛtān

original: BhP_04.28.007/2 putrān pautrānugāmātyān jāyāṃ ca gata-sauhṛdām
analyzed: putrān pautra anuga amātyān jāyām ca gata sauhṛdām

original: BhP_04.28.008/1 ātmānaṃ kanyayā grastaṃ pañcālān ari-dūṣitān
analyzed: ātmānam kanyayā grastam pañcālān ari dūṣitān

original: BhP_04.28.008/2 duranta-cintām āpanno na lebhe tat-pratikriyām
analyzed: duranta cintām āpannaḥ na lebhe tad pratikriyām

original: BhP_04.28.009/1 kāmān abhilaṣan dīno yāta-yāmāṃś ca kanyayā
analyzed: kāmān abhilaṣan dīnaḥ yātayāmān ca kanyayā

original: BhP_04.28.009/2 vigatātma-gati-snehaḥ putra-dārāṃś ca lālayan
analyzed: vigata ātma gati snehaḥ putra dārān ca lālayan

original: BhP_04.28.010/1 gandharva-yavanākrāntāṃ kāla-kanyopamarditām
analyzed: gandharva yavana ākrāntām kālakanyā upamarditām

original: BhP_04.28.010/2 hātuṃ pracakrame rājā tāṃ purīm anikāmataḥ
analyzed: hātum pracakrame rājā tām purīm a nikāmataḥ

original: BhP_04.28.011/1 bhaya-nāmno 'grajo bhrātā prajvāraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
analyzed: bhaya nāmnaḥ agrajaḥ bhrātā prajvāraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.011/2 dadāha tāṃ purīṃ kṛtsnāṃ bhrātuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: dadāha tām purīm kṛtsnām bhrātuḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_04.28.012/1 tasyāṃ sandahyamānāyāṃ sapauraḥ saparicchadaḥ
analyzed: tasyām sandahyamānāyām sa pauraḥ sa paricchadaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.012/2 kauṭumbikaḥ kuṭumbinyā upātapyata sānvayaḥ
analyzed: kauṭumbikaḥ kuṭumbinyāḥ upātapyata sa anvayaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.013/1 yavanoparuddhāyatano grastāyāṃ kāla-kanyayā
analyzed: yavana uparuddha āyatanaḥ grastāyām kālakanyayā

original: BhP_04.28.013/2 puryāṃ prajvāra-saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pura-pālo 'nvatapyata
analyzed: puryām prajvāra saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pura pālaḥ anvatapyata

original: BhP_04.28.014/1 na śeke so 'vituṃ tatra puru-kṛcchroru-vepathuḥ
analyzed: na śeke saḥ avitum tatra puru kṛcchra uru vepathuḥ

original: BhP_04.28.014/2 gantum aicchat tato vṛkṣa- koṭarād iva sānalāt
analyzed: gantum aicchat tatas vṛkṣa koṭarāt iva sa analāt

original: BhP_04.28.015/1 śithilāvayavo yarhi gandharvair hṛta-pauruṣaḥ
analyzed: śithila avayavaḥ yarhi gandharvaiḥ hṛta pauruṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.015/2 yavanair aribhī rājann uparuddho ruroda ha
analyzed: yavanaiḥ aribhiḥ rājan uparuddhaḥ ruroda ha

original: BhP_04.28.016/1 duhitṝḥ putra-pautrāṃś ca jāmi-jāmātṛ-pārṣadān
analyzed: duhitṝḥ putra pautrān ca jāmi jāmātṛ pārṣadān

original: BhP_04.28.016/2 svatvāvaśiṣṭaṃ yat kiñcid gṛha-kośa-paricchadam
analyzed: sva tva avaśiṣṭam yat kiñcid gṛha kośa paricchadam

original: BhP_04.28.017/1 ahaṃ mameti svīkṛtya gṛheṣu kumatir gṛhī
analyzed: aham mama iti svīkṛtya gṛheṣu kumatiḥ gṛhī

original: BhP_04.28.017/2 dadhyau pramadayā dīno viprayoga upasthite
analyzed: dadhyau pramadayā dīnaḥ viprayoge upasthite

original: BhP_04.28.018/1 lokāntaraṃ gatavati mayy anāthā kuṭumbinī
analyzed: loka antaram gatavati mayi anāthā kuṭumbinī

original: BhP_04.28.018/2 vartiṣyate kathaṃ tv eṣā bālakān anuśocatī
analyzed: vartiṣyate katham tu eṣā bālakān anuśocatī

original: BhP_04.28.019/1 na mayy anāśite bhuṅkte nāsnāte snāti mat-parā
analyzed: na mayi anāśite bhuṅkte na asnāte snāti mad parā

original: BhP_04.28.019/2 mayi ruṣṭe susantrastā bhartsite yata-vāg bhayāt
analyzed: mayi ruṣṭe su santrastā bhartsite yata vāc bhayāt

original: BhP_04.28.020/1 prabodhayati māvijñaṃ vyuṣite śoka-karśitā
analyzed: prabodhayati mā a vijñam vyuṣite śoka karśitā

original: BhP_04.28.020/2 vartmaitad gṛha-medhīyaṃ vīra-sūr api neṣyati
analyzed: vartma etat gṛhamedhīyam vīrasūḥ api neṣyati

original: BhP_04.28.021/1 kathaṃ nu dārakā dīnā dārakīr vāparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: katham nu dārakāḥ dīnāḥ dārakīḥ vā aparāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_04.28.021/2 vartiṣyante mayi gate bhinna-nāva ivodadhau
analyzed: vartiṣyante mayi gate bhinna nāvaḥ iva udadhau

original: BhP_04.28.022/1 evaṃ kṛpaṇayā buddhyā śocantam atad-arhaṇam
analyzed: evam kṛpaṇayā buddhyā śocantam a tad arhaṇam

original: BhP_04.28.022/2 grahītuṃ kṛta-dhīr enaṃ bhaya-nāmābhyapadyata
analyzed: grahītum kṛta dhīḥ enam bhaya nāmā abhyapadyata

original: BhP_04.28.023/1 paśuvad yavanair eṣa nīyamānaḥ svakaṃ kṣayam
analyzed: paśu vat yavanaiḥ eṣa nīyamānaḥ svakam kṣayam

original: BhP_04.28.023/2 anvadravann anupathāḥ śocanto bhṛśam āturāḥ
analyzed: anvadravan anupathāḥ śocantaḥ bhṛśam āturāḥ

original: BhP_04.28.024/1 purīṃ vihāyopagata uparuddho bhujaṅgamaḥ
analyzed: purīm vihāya upagataḥ uparuddhaḥ bhujaṅgamaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.024/2 yadā tam evānu purī viśīrṇā prakṛtiṃ gatā
analyzed: yadā tam eva anu purī viśīrṇā prakṛtim gatā

original: BhP_04.28.025/1 vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ prasabhaṃ yavanena balīyasā
analyzed: vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ prasabham yavanena balīyasā

original: BhP_04.28.025/2 nāvindat tamasāviṣṭaḥ sakhāyaṃ suhṛdaṃ puraḥ
analyzed: na avindat tamasā āviṣṭaḥ sakhāyam suhṛdam puras

original: BhP_04.28.026/1 taṃ yajña-paśavo 'nena saṃjñaptā ye 'dayālunā
analyzed: tam yajña paśavaḥ anena saṃjñaptāḥ ye a dayālunā

original: BhP_04.28.026/2 kuṭhāraiś cicchiduḥ kruddhāḥ smaranto 'mīvam asya tat
analyzed: kuṭhāraiḥ cicchiduḥ kruddhāḥ smarantaḥ amīvam asya tat

original: BhP_04.28.027/1 ananta-pāre tamasi magno naṣṭa-smṛtiḥ samāḥ
analyzed: ananta pāre tamasi magnaḥ naṣṭa smṛtiḥ samāḥ

original: BhP_04.28.027/2 śāśvatīr anubhūyārtiṃ pramadā-saṅga-dūṣitaḥ
analyzed: śāśvatīḥ anubhūya ārtim pramadā saṅga dūṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.028/1 tām eva manasā gṛhṇan babhūva pramadottamā
analyzed: tām eva manasā gṛhṇan babhūva pramadā uttamā

original: BhP_04.28.028/2 anantaraṃ vidarbhasya rāja-siṃhasya veśmani
analyzed: anantaram vidarbhasya rāja siṃhasya veśmani

original: BhP_04.28.029/1 upayeme vīrya-paṇāṃ vaidarbhīṃ malayadhvajaḥ
analyzed: upayeme vīrya paṇām vaidarbhīm malayadhvajaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.029/2 yudhi nirjitya rājanyān pāṇḍyaḥ para-purañjayaḥ
analyzed: yudhi nirjitya rājanyān pāṇḍyaḥ parapurañjayaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.030/1 tasyāṃ sa janayāṃ cakra ātmajām asitekṣaṇām
analyzed: tasyām sa cakre ātmajām asita īkṣaṇām

original: BhP_04.28.030/2 yavīyasaḥ sapta sutān sapta draviḍa-bhūbhṛtaḥ
analyzed: yavīyasaḥ sapta sutān sapta draviḍa bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.031/1 ekaikasyābhavat teṣāṃ rājann arbudam arbudam
analyzed: ekaikasya abhavat teṣām rājan arbudam arbudam

original: BhP_04.28.031/2 bhokṣyate yad-vaṃśa-dharair mahī manvantaraṃ param
analyzed: bhokṣyate yad vaṃśa dharaiḥ mahī manvantaram param

original: BhP_04.28.032/1 agastyaḥ prāg duhitaram upayeme dhṛta-vratām
analyzed: agastyaḥ prāk duhitaram upayeme dhṛta vratām

original: BhP_04.28.032/2 yasyāṃ dṛḍhacyuto jāta idhmavāhātmajo muniḥ
analyzed: yasyām dṛḍha cyutaḥ jātaḥ idhmavāha ātmajaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_04.28.033/1 vibhajya tanayebhyaḥ kṣmāṃ rājarṣir malayadhvajaḥ
analyzed: vibhajya tanayebhyaḥ kṣmām rājarṣiḥ malayadhvajaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.033/2 ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ sa jagāma kulācalam
analyzed: ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇam sa jagāma kula acalam

original: BhP_04.28.034/1 hitvā gṛhān sutān bhogān vaidarbhī madirekṣaṇā
analyzed: hitvā gṛhān sutān bhogān vaidarbhī madirā īkṣaṇā

original: BhP_04.28.034/2 anvadhāvata pāṇḍyeśaṃ jyotsneva rajanī-karam
analyzed: anvadhāvata pāṇḍya īśam jyotsnā iva rajanīkaram

original: BhP_04.28.035/1 tatra candravasā nāma tāmraparṇī vaṭodakā
analyzed: tatra candravasā nāma tāmraparṇī vaṭodakā

original: BhP_04.28.035/2 tat-puṇya-salilair nityam ubhayatrātmano mṛjan
analyzed: tad puṇya salilaiḥ nityam ubhayatra ātmanaḥ mṛjan

original: BhP_04.28.036/1 kandāṣṭibhir mūla-phalaiḥ puṣpa-parṇais tṛṇodakaiḥ
analyzed: kanda aṣṭibhiḥ mūla phalaiḥ puṣpa parṇaiḥ tṛṇa udakaiḥ

original: BhP_04.28.036/2 vartamānaḥ śanair gātra- karśanaṃ tapa āsthitaḥ
analyzed: vartamānaḥ śanais gātra karśanam tapaḥ āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.037/1 śītoṣṇa-vāta-varṣāṇi kṣut-pipāse priyāpriye
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa vāta varṣāṇi kṣudh pipāse priya apriye

original: BhP_04.28.037/2 sukha-duḥkhe iti dvandvāny ajayat sama-darśanaḥ
analyzed: sukha duḥkhe iti dvandvāni ajayat samadarśanaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.038/1 tapasā vidyayā pakva- kaṣāyo niyamair yamaiḥ
analyzed: tapasā vidyayā pakva kaṣāyaḥ niyamaiḥ yamaiḥ

original: BhP_04.28.038/2 yuyuje brahmaṇy ātmānaṃ vijitākṣānilāśayaḥ
analyzed: yuyuje brahmaṇi ātmānam vijita akṣa anila āśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.039/1 āste sthāṇur ivaikatra divyaṃ varṣa-śataṃ sthiraḥ
analyzed: āste sthāṇuḥ iva ekatra divyam varṣa śatam sthiraḥ

original: BhP_04.28.039/2 vāsudeve bhagavati nānyad vedodvahan ratim
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati na anyat veda udvahan ratim

original: BhP_04.28.040/1 sa vyāpakatayātmānaṃ vyatiriktatayātmani
analyzed: sa vyāpaka tayā ātmānam vyatirikta tayā ātmani

original: BhP_04.28.040/2 vidvān svapna ivāmarśa- sākṣiṇaṃ virarāma ha
analyzed: vidvān svapne iva āmarśa sākṣiṇam virarāma ha

original: BhP_04.28.041/1 sākṣād bhagavatoktena guruṇā hariṇā nṛpa
analyzed: sākṣāt bhagavatā uktena guruṇā hariṇā nṛpa

original: BhP_04.28.041/2 viśuddha-jñāna-dīpena sphuratā viśvato-mukham
analyzed: viśuddha jñāna dīpena sphuratā viśvatomukham

original: BhP_04.28.042/1 pare brahmaṇi cātmānaṃ paraṃ brahma tathātmani
analyzed: pare brahmaṇi ca ātmānam param brahma tathā ātmani

original: BhP_04.28.042/2 vīkṣamāṇo vihāyekṣām asmād upararāma ha
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ vihāya īkṣām asmāt upararāma ha

original: BhP_04.28.043/1 patiṃ parama-dharma-jñaṃ vaidarbhī malayadhvajam
analyzed: patim parama dharma jñam vaidarbhī malayadhvajam

original: BhP_04.28.043/2 premṇā paryacarad dhitvā bhogān sā pati-devatā
analyzed: premṇā paryacarat hitvā bhogān sā pati devatā

original: BhP_04.28.044/1 cīra-vāsā vrata-kṣāmā veṇī-bhūta-śiroruhā
analyzed: cīra vāsāḥ vrata kṣāmā veṇī bhūta śiroruhā

original: BhP_04.28.044/2 babhāv upa patiṃ śāntā śikhā śāntam ivānalam
analyzed: babhau upa patim śāntā śikhā śāntam iva analam

original: BhP_04.28.045/1 ajānatī priyatamaṃ yadoparatam aṅganā
analyzed: a jānatī priyatamam yadā uparatam aṅganā

original: BhP_04.28.045/2 susthirāsanam āsādya yathā-pūrvam upācarat
analyzed: su sthira āsanam āsādya yathāpūrvam upācarat

original: BhP_04.28.046/1 yadā nopalabhetāṅghrāv ūṣmāṇaṃ patyur arcatī
analyzed: yadā na upalabheta aṅghrau ūṣmāṇam patyuḥ arcatī

original: BhP_04.28.046/2 āsīt saṃvigna-hṛdayā yūtha-bhraṣṭā mṛgī yathā
analyzed: āsīt saṃvigna hṛdayā yūtha bhraṣṭā mṛgī yathā

original: BhP_04.28.047/1 ātmānaṃ śocatī dīnam abandhuṃ viklavāśrubhiḥ
analyzed: ātmānam śocatī dīnam abandhum viklava aśrubhiḥ

original: BhP_04.28.047/2 stanāv āsicya vipine susvaraṃ praruroda sā
analyzed: stanau āsicya vipine su svaram praruroda sā

original: BhP_04.28.048/1 uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha rājarṣe imām udadhi-mekhalām
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha rājarṣe imām udadhi mekhalām

original: BhP_04.28.048/2 dasyubhyaḥ kṣatra-bandhubhyo bibhyatīṃ pātum arhasi
analyzed: dasyubhyaḥ kṣatrabandhubhyaḥ bibhyatīm pātum arhasi

original: BhP_04.28.049/1 evaṃ vilapantī bālā vipine 'nugatā patim
analyzed: evam vilapantī bālā vipine anugatā patim

original: BhP_04.28.049/2 patitā pādayor bhartū rudaty aśrūṇy avartayat
analyzed: patitā pādayoḥ bhartuḥ rudatī aśrūṇi avartayat

original: BhP_04.28.050/1 citiṃ dārumayīṃ citvā tasyāṃ patyuḥ kalevaram
analyzed: citim dāru mayīm citvā tasyām patyuḥ kalevaram

original: BhP_04.28.050/2 ādīpya cānumaraṇe vilapantī mano dadhe
analyzed: ādīpya ca anumaraṇe vilapantī manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_04.28.051/1 tatra pūrvataraḥ kaścit sakhā brāhmaṇa ātmavān
analyzed: tatra pūrvataraḥ kaścid sakhā brāhmaṇaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_04.28.051/2 sāntvayan valgunā sāmnā tām āha rudatīṃ prabho
analyzed: sāntvayan valgunā sāmnā tām āha rudatīm prabho

original: BhP_04.28.052/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.28.052/1 kā tvaṃ kasyāsi ko vāyaṃ śayāno yasya śocasi
analyzed: kā tvam kasya asi kaḥ vā ayam śayānaḥ yasya śocasi

original: BhP_04.28.052/2 jānāsi kiṃ sakhāyaṃ māṃ yenāgre vicacartha ha
analyzed: jānāsi kim sakhāyam mām yena agre vicacartha ha

original: BhP_04.28.053/1 api smarasi cātmānam avijñāta-sakhaṃ sakhe
analyzed: api smarasi ca ātmānam a vijñāta sakham sakhe

original: BhP_04.28.053/2 hitvā māṃ padam anvicchan bhauma-bhoga-rato gataḥ
analyzed: hitvā mām padam anvicchan bhauma bhoga rataḥ gataḥ

original: BhP_04.28.054/1 haṃsāv ahaṃ ca tvaṃ cārya sakhāyau mānasāyanau
analyzed: haṃsau aham ca tvam ca ārya sakhāyau mānasāyanau

original: BhP_04.28.054/2 abhūtām antarā vaukaḥ sahasra-parivatsarān
analyzed: abhūtām antarā vaukaḥ sahasra parivatsarān

original: BhP_04.28.055/1 sa tvaṃ vihāya māṃ bandho gato grāmya-matir mahīm
analyzed: sa tvam vihāya mām bandho gataḥ grāmya matiḥ mahīm

original: BhP_04.28.055/2 vicaran padam adrākṣīḥ kayācin nirmitaṃ striyā
analyzed: vicaran padam adrākṣīḥ kayācid nirmitam striyā

original: BhP_04.28.056/1 pañcārāmaṃ nava-dvāram eka-pālaṃ tri-koṣṭhakam
analyzed: pañca ārāmam nava dvāram eka pālam tri koṣṭhakam

original: BhP_04.28.056/2 ṣaṭ-kulaṃ pañca-vipaṇaṃ pañca-prakṛti strī-dhavam
analyzed: ṣaṣ kulam pañca vipaṇam pañca prakṛti strīdhavam

original: BhP_04.28.057/1 pañcendriyārthā ārāmā dvāraḥ prāṇā nava prabho
analyzed: pañca indriya arthāḥ ārāmāḥ dvāraḥ prāṇāḥ nava prabho

original: BhP_04.28.057/2 tejo-'b-annāni koṣṭhāni kulam indriya-saṅgrahaḥ
analyzed: koṣṭhāni kulam indriya saṅgrahaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.058/1 vipaṇas tu kriyā-śaktir bhūta-prakṛtir avyayā
analyzed: vipaṇaḥ tu kriyāśaktiḥ bhūtaprakṛtiḥ avyayā

original: BhP_04.28.058/2 śakty-adhīśaḥ pumāṃs tv atra praviṣṭo nāvabudhyate
analyzed: śakti adhīśaḥ pumān tu atra praviṣṭaḥ na avabudhyate

original: BhP_04.28.059/1 tasmiṃs tvaṃ rāmayā spṛṣṭo ramamāṇo 'śruta-smṛtiḥ
analyzed: tasmin tvam rāmayā spṛṣṭaḥ ramamāṇaḥ a śruta smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_04.28.059/2 tat-saṅgād īdṛśīṃ prāpto daśāṃ pāpīyasīṃ prabho
analyzed: tad saṅgāt īdṛśīm prāptaḥ daśām pāpīyasīm prabho

original: BhP_04.28.060/1 na tvaṃ vidarbha-duhitā nāyaṃ vīraḥ suhṛt tava
analyzed: na tvam vidarbha duhitā na ayam vīraḥ suhṛd tava

original: BhP_04.28.060/2 na patis tvaṃ purañjanyā ruddho nava-mukhe yayā
analyzed: na patiḥ tvam purañjanyāḥ ruddhaḥ nava mukhe yayā

original: BhP_04.28.061/1 māyā hy eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yat pumāṃsaṃ striyaṃ satīm
analyzed: māyā hi eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yat pumāṃsam striyam satīm

original: BhP_04.28.061/2 manyase nobhayaṃ yad vai haṃsau paśyāvayor gatim
analyzed: manyase nā ubhayam yat vai haṃsau paśya āvayoḥ gatim

original: BhP_04.28.062/1 ahaṃ bhavān na cānyas tvaṃ tvam evāhaṃ vicakṣva bhoḥ
analyzed: aham bhavān na ca anyaḥ tvam tvam eva aham vicakṣva bhoḥ

original: BhP_04.28.062/2 na nau paśyanti kavayaś chidraṃ jātu manāg api
analyzed: na nau paśyanti kavayaḥ chidram jātu manāk api

original: BhP_04.28.063/1 yathā puruṣa ātmānam ekam ādarśa-cakṣuṣoḥ
analyzed: yathā puruṣaḥ ātmānam ekam ādarśa cakṣuṣoḥ

original: BhP_04.28.063/2 dvidhābhūtam avekṣeta tathaivāntaram āvayoḥ
analyzed: dvidhā bhūtam avekṣeta tathā eva antaram āvayoḥ

original: BhP_04.28.064/1 evaṃ sa mānaso haṃso haṃsena pratibodhitaḥ
analyzed: evam sa mānasaḥ haṃsaḥ haṃsena pratibodhitaḥ

original: BhP_04.28.064/2 sva-sthas tad-vyabhicāreṇa naṣṭām āpa punaḥ smṛtim
analyzed: svasthaḥ tad vyabhicāreṇa naṣṭām āpa punar smṛtim

original: BhP_04.28.065/1 barhiṣmann etad adhyātmaṃ pārokṣyeṇa pradarśitam
analyzed: barhiṣman etat adhyātmam pārokṣyeṇa pradarśitam

original: BhP_04.28.065/2 yat parokṣa-priyo devo bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: yat parokṣa priyaḥ devaḥ bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.001/0 prācīnabarhir uvāca
analyzed: prācīnabarhiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.29.001/1 bhagavaṃs te vaco 'smābhir na samyag avagamyate
analyzed: bhagavan te vacaḥ asmābhiḥ na samyak avagamyate

original: BhP_04.29.001/2 kavayas tad vijānanti na vayaṃ karma-mohitāḥ
analyzed: kavayaḥ tat vijānanti na vayam karma mohitāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.002/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.29.002/1 puruṣaṃ purañjanaṃ vidyād yad vyanakty ātmanaḥ puram
analyzed: puruṣam purañjanam vidyāt yat vyanakti ātmanaḥ puram

original: BhP_04.29.002/2 eka-dvi-tri-catuṣ-pādaṃ bahu-pādam apādakam
analyzed: eka dvi tri catuṣpādam bahu pādam a pādakam

original: BhP_04.29.003/1 yo 'vijñātāhṛtas tasya puruṣasya sakheśvaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ a vijñāta āhṛtaḥ tasya puruṣasya sakhā īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.29.003/2 yan na vijñāyate pumbhir nāmabhir vā kriyā-guṇaiḥ
analyzed: yat na vijñāyate pumbhiḥ nāmabhiḥ vā kriyā guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.004/1 yadā jighṛkṣan puruṣaḥ kārtsnyena prakṛter guṇān
analyzed: yadā jighṛkṣan puruṣaḥ kārtsnyena prakṛteḥ guṇān

original: BhP_04.29.004/2 nava-dvāraṃ dvi-hastāṅghri tatrāmanuta sādhv iti
analyzed: nava dvāram dvi hasta aṅghri tatra amanuta sādhu iti

original: BhP_04.29.005/1 buddhiṃ tu pramadāṃ vidyān mamāham iti yat-kṛtam
analyzed: buddhim tu pramadām vidyāt mama aham iti yat kṛtam

original: BhP_04.29.005/2 yām adhiṣṭhāya dehe 'smin pumān bhuṅkte 'kṣabhir guṇān
analyzed: yām adhiṣṭhāya dehe asmin pumān bhuṅkte akṣabhiḥ guṇān

original: BhP_04.29.006/1 sakhāya indriya-gaṇā jñānaṃ karma ca yat-kṛtam
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ indriya gaṇāḥ jñānam karma ca yat kṛtam

original: BhP_04.29.006/2 sakhyas tad-vṛttayaḥ prāṇaḥ pañca-vṛttir yathoragaḥ
analyzed: sakhyaḥ tad vṛttayaḥ prāṇaḥ pañca vṛttiḥ yathā uragaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.007/1 bṛhad-balaṃ mano vidyād ubhayendriya-nāyakam
analyzed: bṛhat balam manaḥ vidyāt ubhaya indriya nāyakam

original: BhP_04.29.007/2 pañcālāḥ pañca viṣayā yan-madhye nava-khaṃ puram
analyzed: pañcālāḥ pañca viṣayāḥ yat madhye nava kham puram

original: BhP_04.29.008/1 akṣiṇī nāsike karṇau mukhaṃ śiśna-gudāv iti
analyzed: akṣiṇī nāsike karṇau mukham śiśna gudau iti

original: BhP_04.29.008/2 dve dve dvārau bahir yāti yas tad-indriya-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: dve dve dvārau bahis yāti yaḥ tad indriya saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.009/1 akṣiṇī nāsike āsyam iti pañca puraḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: akṣiṇī nāsike āsyam iti pañca puraḥ kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.009/2 dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaḥ karṇa uttarā cottaraḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ uttarā ca uttaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.010/1 paścime ity adho dvārau gudaṃ śiśnam ihocyate
analyzed: paścime iti adhas dvārau gudam śiśnam iha ucyate

original: BhP_04.29.010/2 khadyotāvirmukhī cātra netre ekatra nirmite
analyzed: khadyota āvis mukhī ca atra netre ekatra nirmite

original: BhP_04.29.010/3 rūpaṃ vibhrājitaṃ tābhyāṃ vicaṣṭe cakṣuṣeśvaraḥ
analyzed: rūpam vibhrājitam tābhyām vicaṣṭe cakṣuṣā īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.29.011/1 nalinī nālinī nāse gandhaḥ saurabha ucyate
BhP_04.29.011/2 ghrāṇo 'vadhūto mukhyāsyaṃ vipaṇo vāg rasavid rasaḥ
analyzed: ghrāṇaḥ avadhūtaḥ mukhya āsyam vipaṇaḥ vāc rasa vid rasaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.012/1 āpaṇo vyavahāro 'tra citram andho bahūdanam
analyzed: āpaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ atra citram andhaḥ bahu udanam

original: BhP_04.29.012/2 pitṛhūr dakṣiṇaḥ karṇa uttaro devahūḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: pitṛ hūḥ dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ uttaraḥ deva hūḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.013/1 pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca śāstraṃ pañcāla-saṃjñitam
analyzed: pravṛttam ca nivṛttam ca śāstram pañcāla saṃjñitam

original: BhP_04.29.013/2 pitṛ-yānaṃ deva-yānaṃ śrotrāc chruta-dharād vrajet
analyzed: pitṛyānam deva yānam śrotrāt śrutadharāt vrajet

original: BhP_04.29.014/1 āsurī meḍhram arvāg-dvār vyavāyo grāmiṇāṃ ratiḥ
analyzed: āsurī meḍhram arvāc dvār vyavāyaḥ grāmiṇām ratiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.014/2 upastho durmadaḥ prokto nirṛtir guda ucyate
BhP_04.29.015/1 vaiśasaṃ narakaṃ pāyur lubdhako 'ndhau tu me śṛṇu
analyzed: vaiśasam narakam pāyuḥ lubdhakaḥ andhau tu me śṛṇu

original: BhP_04.29.015/2 hasta-pādau pumāṃs tābhyāṃ yukto yāti karoti ca
analyzed: hasta pādau pumān tābhyām yuktaḥ yāti karoti ca

original: BhP_04.29.016/1 antaḥ-puraṃ ca hṛdayaṃ viṣūcir mana ucyate
analyzed: antaḥpuram ca hṛdayam viṣūciḥ manaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_04.29.016/2 tatra mohaṃ prasādaṃ vā harṣaṃ prāpnoti tad-guṇaiḥ
analyzed: tatra moham prasādam vā harṣam prāpnoti tad guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.017/1 yathā yathā vikriyate guṇākto vikaroti vā
analyzed: yathā yathā vikriyate guṇa aktaḥ vikaroti vā

original: BhP_04.29.017/2 tathā tathopadraṣṭātmā tad-vṛttīr anukāryate
analyzed: tathā tathā upadraṣṭā ātmā tad vṛttīḥ anukāryate

original: BhP_04.29.018/1 deho rathas tv indriyāśvaḥ saṃvatsara-rayo 'gatiḥ
analyzed: dehaḥ rathaḥ tu indriya aśvaḥ saṃvatsara rayaḥ agatiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.018/2 dvi-karma-cakras tri-guṇa- dhvajaḥ pañcāsu-bandhuraḥ
analyzed: dhvajaḥ pañca asu bandhuraḥ

original: BhP_04.29.019/1 mano-raśmir buddhi-sūto hṛn-nīḍo dvandva-kūbaraḥ
BhP_04.29.019/2 pañcendriyārtha-prakṣepaḥ sapta-dhātu-varūthakaḥ
BhP_04.29.020/1 ākūtir vikramo bāhyo mṛga-tṛṣṇāṃ pradhāvati
analyzed: ākūtiḥ vikramaḥ bāhyaḥ mṛgatṛṣṇām pradhāvati

original: BhP_04.29.020/2 ekādaśendriya-camūḥ pañca-sūnā-vinoda-kṛt
BhP_04.29.021/1 saṃvatsaraś caṇḍavegaḥ kālo yenopalakṣitaḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ caṇḍa vegaḥ kālaḥ yena upalakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.021/2 tasyāhānīha gandharvā gandharvyo rātrayaḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: tasya ahāni iha gandharvāḥ gandharvyaḥ rātrayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.021/3 haranty āyuḥ parikrāntyā ṣaṣṭy-uttara-śata-trayam
analyzed: haranti āyuḥ parikrāntyā ṣaṣṭi uttara śata trayam

original: BhP_04.29.022/1 kāla-kanyā jarā sākṣāl lokas tāṃ nābhinandati
analyzed: kāla kanyā jarā sākṣāt lokaḥ tām na abhinandati

original: BhP_04.29.022/2 svasāraṃ jagṛhe mṛtyuḥ kṣayāya yavaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: svasāram jagṛhe mṛtyuḥ kṣayāya yavana īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.29.023/1 ādhayo vyādhayas tasya sainikā yavanāś carāḥ
analyzed: ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ tasya sainikāḥ yavanāḥ carāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.023/2 bhūtopasargāśu-rayaḥ prajvāro dvi-vidho jvaraḥ
BhP_04.29.024/1 evaṃ bahu-vidhair duḥkhair daiva-bhūtātma-sambhavaiḥ
analyzed: evam bahuvidhaiḥ duḥkhaiḥ daiva bhūta ātma sambhavaiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.024/2 kliśyamānaḥ śataṃ varṣaṃ dehe dehī tamo-vṛtaḥ
analyzed: kliśyamānaḥ śatam varṣam dehe dehī tamaḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.025/1 prāṇendriya-mano-dharmān ātmany adhyasya nirguṇaḥ
analyzed: prāṇa indriya manaḥ dharmān ātmani adhyasya nirguṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.025/2 śete kāma-lavān dhyāyan mamāham iti karma-kṛt
analyzed: śete kāmalavān dhyāyan mama aham iti karma kṛt

original: BhP_04.29.026/1 yadātmānam avijñāya bhagavantaṃ paraṃ gurum
analyzed: yadā ātmānam a vijñāya bhagavantam param gurum

original: BhP_04.29.026/2 puruṣas tu viṣajjeta guṇeṣu prakṛteḥ sva-dṛk
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tu viṣajjeta guṇeṣu prakṛteḥ svadṛś

original: BhP_04.29.027/1 guṇābhimānī sa tadā karmāṇi kurute 'vaśaḥ
analyzed: guṇa abhimānī sa tadā karmāṇi kurute avaśaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.027/2 śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ lohitaṃ vā yathā-karmābhijāyate
analyzed: śuklam kṛṣṇam lohitam vā yathākarma abhijāyate

original: BhP_04.29.028/1 śuklāt prakāśa-bhūyiṣṭhā lokān āpnoti karhicit
analyzed: śuklāt prakāśa bhūyiṣṭhā lokān āpnoti karhicit

original: BhP_04.29.028/2 duḥkhodarkān kriyāyāsāṃs tamaḥ-śokotkaṭān kvacit
analyzed: duḥkha udarkān kriyā āyāsān tamaḥ śoka utkaṭān kvacid

original: BhP_04.29.029/1 kvacit pumān kvacic ca strī kvacin nobhayam andha-dhīḥ
analyzed: kvacid pumān kvacid ca strī kvacid na ubhayam andha dhīḥ

original: BhP_04.29.029/2 devo manuṣyas tiryag vā yathā-karma-guṇaṃ bhavaḥ
analyzed: devaḥ manuṣyaḥ tiryak vā yathākarma guṇam bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.030/1 kṣut-parīto yathā dīnaḥ sārameyo gṛhaṃ gṛham
analyzed: kṣudh parītaḥ yathā dīnaḥ sārameyaḥ gṛham gṛham

original: BhP_04.29.030/2 caran vindati yad-diṣṭaṃ daṇḍam odanam eva vā
analyzed: caran vindati yat diṣṭam daṇḍam odanam eva vā

original: BhP_04.29.031/1 tathā kāmāśayo jīva uccāvaca-pathā bhraman
analyzed: tathā kāma āśayaḥ jīvaḥ uccāvaca pathā bhraman

original: BhP_04.29.031/2 upary adho vā madhye vā yāti diṣṭaṃ priyāpriyam
analyzed: upari adhas vā madhye vā yāti diṣṭam priya apriyam

original: BhP_04.29.032/1 duḥkheṣv ekatareṇāpi daiva-bhūtātma-hetuṣu
analyzed: duḥkheṣu ekatareṇa api daiva bhūta ātma hetuṣu

original: BhP_04.29.032/2 jīvasya na vyavacchedaḥ syāc cet tat-tat-pratikriyā
BhP_04.29.033/1 yathā hi puruṣo bhāraṃ śirasā gurum udvahan
analyzed: yathā hi puruṣaḥ bhāram śirasā gurum udvahan

original: BhP_04.29.033/2 taṃ skandhena sa ādhatte tathā sarvāḥ pratikriyāḥ
analyzed: tam skandhena saḥ ādhatte tathā sarvāḥ pratikriyāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.034/1 naikāntataḥ pratīkāraḥ karmaṇāṃ karma kevalam
analyzed: na ekāntataḥ pratīkāraḥ karmaṇām karma kevalam

original: BhP_04.29.034/2 dvayaṃ hy avidyopasṛtaṃ svapne svapna ivānagha
analyzed: dvayam hi avidyā upasṛtam svapne svapne iva anagha

original: BhP_04.29.035/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
analyzed: arthe hi a vidyamāne api saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: BhP_04.29.035/2 manasā liṅga-rūpeṇa svapne vicarato yathā
analyzed: manasā liṅga rūpeṇa svapne vicarataḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.29.036/1 athātmano 'rtha-bhūtasya yato 'nartha-paramparā
analyzed: atha ātmanaḥ artha bhūtasya yatas anartha paramparā

original: BhP_04.29.036/2 saṃsṛtis tad-vyavacchedo bhaktyā paramayā gurau
BhP_04.29.037/1 vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti-yogaḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti yogaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.037/2 sadhrīcīnena vairāgyaṃ jñānaṃ ca janayiṣyati
analyzed: sadhrīcīnena vairāgyam jñānam ca janayiṣyati

original: BhP_04.29.038/1 so 'cirād eva rājarṣe syād acyuta-kathāśrayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ acirāt eva rājarṣe syāt acyuta kathā āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.038/2 śṛṇvataḥ śraddadhānasya nityadā syād adhīyataḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ śraddadhānasya nityadā syāt adhīyataḥ

original: BhP_04.29.039/1 yatra bhāgavatā rājan sādhavo viśadāśayāḥ
analyzed: yatra bhāgavatāḥ rājan sādhavaḥ viśada āśayāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.039/2 bhagavad-guṇānukathana- śravaṇa-vyagra-cetasaḥ
BhP_04.29.040/1 tasmin mahan-mukharitā madhubhic- caritra-pīyūṣa-śeṣa-saritaḥ paritaḥ sravanti
analyzed: tasmin mahat mukharitāḥ madhu bhid caritra pīyūṣa śeṣa saritaḥ paritas sravanti

original: BhP_04.29.040/2 tā ye pibanty avitṛṣo nṛpa gāḍha-karṇais tān na spṛśanty aśana-tṛḍ-bhaya-śoka-mohāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ye pibanti a vitṛṣaḥ nṛpa gāḍha karṇaiḥ tān na spṛśanti aśana tṛṣ bhaya śoka mohāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.041/1 etair upadruto nityaṃ jīva-lokaḥ svabhāvajaiḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ upadrutaḥ nityam jīva lokaḥ svabhāva jaiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.041/2 na karoti harer nūnaṃ kathāmṛta-nidhau ratim
analyzed: na karoti hareḥ nūnam kathā amṛta nidhau ratim

original: BhP_04.29.042/1 prajāpati-patiḥ sākṣād bhagavān giriśo manuḥ
analyzed: prajāpati patiḥ sākṣāt bhagavān giriśaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_04.29.042/2 dakṣādayaḥ prajādhyakṣā naiṣṭhikāḥ sanakādayaḥ
analyzed: dakṣa ādayaḥ prajādhyakṣāḥ naiṣṭhikāḥ sanaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.043/1 marīcir atry-aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
analyzed: marīciḥ atri aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ

original: BhP_04.29.043/2 bhṛgur vasiṣṭha ity ete mad-antā brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: bhṛguḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ iti ete madantāḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.044/1 adyāpi vācas-patayas tapo-vidyā-samādhibhiḥ
analyzed: adyā api vācaspatayaḥ tapaḥ vidyā samādhibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.044/2 paśyanto 'pi na paśyanti paśyantaṃ parameśvaram
analyzed: paśyantaḥ api na paśyanti paśyantam parameśvaram

original: BhP_04.29.045/1 śabda-brahmaṇi duṣpāre caranta uru-vistare
analyzed: śabdabrahmaṇi duṣpāre carantaḥ uru vistare

original: BhP_04.29.045/2 mantra-liṅgair vyavacchinnaṃ bhajanto na viduḥ param
BhP_04.29.046/1 sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ satataṃ deha-poṣaṇe
analyzed: sarveṣām eva jantūnām satatam deha poṣaṇe

original: BhP_04.29.046/2 asti prajñā samāyattā ko viśeṣas tadā nṛṇām
analyzed: asti prajñā samāyattā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tadā nṛṇām

original: BhP_04.29.047/1 labdhvehānte manuṣyatvaṃ hitvā dehādy-asad-graham
analyzed: labdhvā iha ante manuṣya tvam hitvā deha ādi asat graham

original: BhP_04.29.047/2 ātma-sṛtyā vihāyedaṃ jīvātmā sa viśiṣyate
analyzed: ātma sṛtyā vihāya idam jīvātmā sa viśiṣyate

original: BhP_04.29.046/1 yadā yasyānugṛhṇāti bhagavān ātma-bhāvitaḥ
analyzed: yadā yasya anugṛhṇāti bhagavān ātma bhāvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.046/2 sa jahāti matiṃ loke vede ca pariniṣṭhitām
analyzed: sa jahāti matim loke vede ca pariniṣṭhitām

original: BhP_04.29.047/1 tasmāt karmasu barhiṣmann ajñānād artha-kāśiṣu
analyzed: tasmāt karmasu barhiṣman ajñānāt artha kāśiṣu

original: BhP_04.29.047/2 mārtha-dṛṣṭiṃ kṛthāḥ śrotra- sparśiṣv aspṛṣṭa-vastuṣu
analyzed: mā artha dṛṣṭim kṛthāḥ śrotra sparśiṣu a spṛṣṭa vastuṣu

original: BhP_04.29.048/1 svaṃ lokaṃ na vidus te vai yatra devo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: svam lokam na viduḥ te vai yatra devaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.048/2 āhur dhūmra-dhiyo vedaṃ sakarmakam atad-vidaḥ
analyzed: āhuḥ dhūmra dhiyaḥ vedam sakarmakam a tad vidaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.049/1 āstīrya darbhaiḥ prāg-agraiḥ kārtsnyena kṣiti-maṇḍalam
analyzed: āstīrya darbhaiḥ prāc agraiḥ kārtsnyena kṣiti maṇḍalam

original: BhP_04.29.049/2 stabdho bṛhad-vadhān mānī karma nāvaiṣi yat param
analyzed: stabdhaḥ bṛhat vadhāt mānī karma na avaiṣi yat param

original: BhP_04.29.049/3 tat karma hari-toṣaṃ yat sā vidyā tan-matir yayā
analyzed: tat karma hari toṣam yat sā vidyā tanmatiḥ yayā

original: BhP_04.29.050/1 harir deha-bhṛtām ātmā svayaṃ prakṛtir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: hariḥ dehabhṛtām ātmā svayam prakṛtiḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.29.050/2 tat-pāda-mūlaṃ śaraṇaṃ yataḥ kṣemo nṛṇām iha
analyzed: tad pāda mūlam śaraṇam yatas kṣemaḥ nṛṇām iha

original: BhP_04.29.051/1 sa vai priyatamaś cātmā yato na bhayam aṇv api
analyzed: sa vai priyatamaḥ ca ātmā yatas na bhayam aṇu api

original: BhP_04.29.051/2 iti veda sa vai vidvān yo vidvān sa gurur hariḥ
analyzed: iti veda sa vai vidvān yaḥ vidvān sa guruḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_04.29.052/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.29.052/1 praśna evaṃ hi sañchinno bhavataḥ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: praśnaḥ evam hi sañchinnaḥ bhavataḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_04.29.052/2 atra me vadato guhyaṃ niśāmaya suniścitam
analyzed: atra me vadataḥ guhyam niśāmaya su niścitam

original: BhP_04.29.053/1 kṣudraṃ caraṃ sumanasāṃ śaraṇe mithitvā
analyzed: kṣudram caram sumanasām śaraṇe mithitvā

original: BhP_04.29.053/2 raktaṃ ṣaḍaṅghri-gaṇa-sāmasu lubdha-karṇam
analyzed: raktam ṣaḍaṅghri gaṇa sāmasu lubdha karṇam

original: BhP_04.29.053/3 agre vṛkān asu-tṛpo 'vigaṇayya yāntaṃ
analyzed: agre vṛkān asutṛpaḥ a vigaṇayya yāntam

original: BhP_04.29.053/4 pṛṣṭhe mṛgaṃ mṛgaya lubdhaka-bāṇa-bhinnam
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe mṛgam mṛgaya lubdhaka bāṇa bhinnam

original: BhP_04.29.054 /1 asyārthaḥ sumanaḥ-sama-dharmaṇāṃ strīṇāṃ śaraṇa āśrame puṣpa-madhu-gandhavat
analyzed: asya arthaḥ sumanaḥ sama dharmaṇām strīṇām śaraṇe āśrame puṣpa madhu gandhavat

original: kṣudratamaṃ kāmya-karma-vipākajaṃ kāma-sukha-lavaṃ jaihvyaupasthyādi vicinvantaṃ
analyzed: kṣudratamam kāmya karma vipāka jam kāma sukha lavam jaihvī aupasthya ādi vicinvantam

original: mithunī-bhūya tad-abhiniveśita-manasaṃ ṣaḍaṅghri-gaṇa-sāma-gītavad atimanohara-vanitādi-janālāpeṣv
analyzed: mithunībhūya tad abhiniveśita manasam ṣaḍaṅghri gaṇa sāma gīta vat ati manohara vanitā ādi jana ālāpeṣu

original: atitarām atipralobhita-karṇam agre vṛka-yūthavad ātmana āyur harato 'ho-rātrān tān
analyzed: atitarām ati pralobhita karṇam agre vṛka yūtha vat ātmanaḥ āyuḥ harataḥ ahar rātrān tān

original: kāla-lava-viśeṣān avigaṇayya gṛheṣu viharantaṃ pṛṣṭhata eva parokṣam anupravṛtto
analyzed: kāla lava viśeṣān a vigaṇayya gṛheṣu viharantam pṛṣṭhatas eva parokṣam

original: lubdhakaḥ kṛtānto 'ntaḥ śareṇa yam iha parāvidhyati tam imam ātmānam aho rājan bhinna-hṛdayaṃ draṣṭum arhasīti
analyzed: lubdhakaḥ kṛtāntaḥ antar śareṇa yam iha parāvidhyati tam imam ātmānam aho rājan bhinna hṛdayam draṣṭum arhasi iti

original: BhP_04.29.055/1 sa tvaṃ vicakṣya mṛga-ceṣṭitam ātmano 'ntaś
analyzed: sa tvam vicakṣya mṛga ceṣṭitam ātmanaḥ antar

original: BhP_04.29.055/2 cittaṃ niyaccha hṛdi karṇa-dhunīṃ ca citte
analyzed: cittam niyaccha hṛdi karṇadhunīm ca citte

original: BhP_04.29.055/3 jahy aṅganāśramam asattama-yūtha-gāthaṃ
analyzed: jahi aṅganā āśramam asattama yūtha gātham

original: BhP_04.29.055/4 prīṇīhi haṃsa-śaraṇaṃ virama krameṇa
analyzed: prīṇīhi haṃsa śaraṇam virama krameṇa

original: BhP_04.29.056/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_04.29.056/1 śrutam anvīkṣitaṃ brahman bhagavān yad abhāṣata
analyzed: śrutam anvīkṣitam brahman bhagavān yat abhāṣata

original: BhP_04.29.056/2 naitaj jānanty upādhyāyāḥ kiṃ na brūyur vidur yadi
analyzed: na etat jānanti upādhyāyāḥ kim na brūyuḥ viduḥ yadi

original: BhP_04.29.057/1 saṃśayo 'tra tu me vipra sañchinnas tat-kṛto mahān
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ atra tu me vipra sañchinnaḥ tad kṛtaḥ mahān

original: BhP_04.29.057/2 ṛṣayo 'pi hi muhyanti yatra nendriya-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ api hi muhyanti yatra na indriya vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.058/1 karmāṇy ārabhate yena pumān iha vihāya tam
analyzed: karmāṇi ārabhate yena pumān iha vihāya tam

original: BhP_04.29.058/2 amutrānyena dehena juṣṭāni sa yad aśnute
analyzed: amutra anyena dehena juṣṭāni sa yat aśnute

original: BhP_04.29.059/1 iti veda-vidāṃ vādaḥ śrūyate tatra tatra ha
analyzed: iti veda vidām vādaḥ śrūyate tatra tatra ha

original: BhP_04.29.059/2 karma yat kriyate proktaṃ parokṣaṃ na prakāśate
analyzed: karma yat kriyate proktam parokṣam na prakāśate

original: BhP_04.29.060/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.29.060/1 yenaivārabhate karma tenaivāmutra tat pumān
analyzed: yena eva ārabhate karma tena eva amutra tat pumān

original: BhP_04.29.060/2 bhuṅkte hy avyavadhānena liṅgena manasā svayam
analyzed: bhuṅkte hi avyavadhānena liṅgena manasā svayam

original: BhP_04.29.061/1 śayānam imam utsṛjya śvasantaṃ puruṣo yathā
analyzed: śayānam imam utsṛjya śvasantam puruṣaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.29.061/2 karmātmany āhitaṃ bhuṅkte tādṛśenetareṇa vā
analyzed: karma ātmani āhitam bhuṅkte tādṛśena itareṇa vā

original: BhP_04.29.062/1 mamaite manasā yad yad asāv aham iti bruvan
analyzed: mama ete manasā yat yat asau aham iti bruvan

original: BhP_04.29.062/2 gṛhṇīyāt tat pumān rāddhaṃ karma yena punar bhavaḥ
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt tat pumān rāddham karma yena punar bhavaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.063/1 yathānumīyate cittam ubhayair indriyehitaiḥ
analyzed: yathā anumīyate cittam ubhayaiḥ indriya īhitaiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.063/2 evaṃ prāg-dehajaṃ karma lakṣyate citta-vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: evam prāk deha jam karma lakṣyate citta vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.29.064/1 nānubhūtaṃ kva cānena dehenādṛṣṭam aśrutam
analyzed: na anubhūtam kva ca anena dehena adṛṣṭam aśrutam

original: BhP_04.29.064/2 kadācid upalabhyeta yad rūpaṃ yādṛg ātmani
analyzed: kadācid upalabhyeta yat rūpam yādṛś ātmani

original: BhP_04.29.065/1 tenāsya tādṛśaṃ rāja liṅgino deha-sambhavam
analyzed: tena asya tādṛśam rāja liṅginaḥ deha sambhavam

original: BhP_04.29.065/2 śraddhatsvānanubhūto 'rtho na manaḥ spraṣṭum arhati
analyzed: śraddhatsva ananubhūtaḥ arthaḥ na manaḥ spraṣṭum arhati

original: BhP_04.29.066/1 mana eva manuṣyasya pūrva-rūpāṇi śaṃsati
analyzed: manaḥ eva manuṣyasya pūrvarūpāṇi śaṃsati

original: BhP_04.29.066/2 bhaviṣyataś ca bhadraṃ te tathaiva na bhaviṣyataḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ ca bhadram te tathā eva na bhaviṣyataḥ

original: BhP_04.29.067/1 adṛṣṭam aśrutaṃ cātra kvacin manasi dṛśyate
analyzed: adṛṣṭam aśrutam ca atra kvacid manasi dṛśyate

original: BhP_04.29.067/2 yathā tathānumantavyaṃ deśa-kāla-kriyāśrayam
analyzed: yathā tathā anumantavyam deśa kāla kriyā āśrayam

original: BhP_04.29.068/1 sarve kramānurodhena manasīndriya-gocarāḥ
analyzed: sarve krama anurodhena manasi indriya gocarāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.068/2 āyānti bahuśo yānti sarve samanaso janāḥ
analyzed: āyānti bahuśas yānti sarve samanasaḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_04.29.069/1 sattvaika-niṣṭhe manasi bhagavat-pārśva-vartini
analyzed: sattva eka niṣṭhe manasi bhagavat pārśva vartini

original: BhP_04.29.069/2 tamaś candramasīvedam uparajyāvabhāsate
analyzed: tamaḥ candramasi iva idam uparajya avabhāsate

original: BhP_04.29.070/1 nāhaṃ mameti bhāvo 'yaṃ puruṣe vyavadhīyate
analyzed: na aham mama iti bhāvaḥ ayam puruṣe vyavadhīyate

original: BhP_04.29.070/2 yāvad buddhi-mano-'kṣārtha- guṇa-vyūho hy anādimān
analyzed: yāvat buddhi manaḥ akṣa artha guṇa vyūhaḥ hi anādimān

original: BhP_04.29.071/1 supti-mūrcchopatāpeṣu prāṇāyana-vighātataḥ
analyzed: supti mūrcchā upatāpeṣu prāṇāyana vighātataḥ

original: BhP_04.29.071/2 nehate 'ham iti jñānaṃ mṛtyu-prajvārayor api
analyzed: na īhate aham iti jñānam mṛtyu prajvārayoḥ api

original: BhP_04.29.072/1 garbhe bālye 'py apauṣkalyād ekādaśa-vidhaṃ tadā
analyzed: garbhe bālye api a pauṣkalyāt ekādaśavidham tadā

original: BhP_04.29.072/2 liṅgaṃ na dṛśyate yūnaḥ kuhvāṃ candramaso yathā
analyzed: liṅgam na dṛśyate yūnaḥ kuhvām candramasaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.29.073/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
analyzed: arthe hi a vidyamāne api saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: BhP_04.29.073/2 dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne anartha āgamaḥ yathā

original: BhP_04.29.074/1 evaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ liṅgaṃ tri-vṛt ṣoḍaśa vistṛtam
analyzed: evam pañcavidham liṅgam trivṛt ṣoḍaśa vistṛtam

original: BhP_04.29.074/2 eṣa cetanayā yukto jīva ity abhidhīyate
analyzed: eṣa cetanayā yuktaḥ jīvaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: BhP_04.29.075/1 anena puruṣo dehān upādatte vimuñcati
analyzed: anena puruṣaḥ dehān upādatte vimuñcati

original: BhP_04.29.075/2 harṣaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cānena vindati
analyzed: harṣam śokam bhayam duḥkham sukham ca anena vindati

original: BhP_04.29.076/1 bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe dayā jīveṣv akuṇṭha-jñānam ātmani
analyzed: bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe dayā jīveṣu akuṇṭha jñānam ātmani

original: BhP_04.29.076/2 yadi syād ātmano bhūyād apavargas tu saṃsṛteḥ
analyzed: yadi syāt ātmanaḥ bhūyāt apavargaḥ tu saṃsṛteḥ

original: BhP_04.29.076/1 yathā tṛṇa-jalūkeyaṃ nāpayāty apayāti ca
analyzed: yathā tṛṇajalūkā iyam na apayāti apayāti ca

original: BhP_04.29.076/2 na tyajen mriyamāṇo 'pi prāg-dehābhimatiṃ janaḥ
analyzed: na tyajet mriyamāṇaḥ api prāk deha abhimatim janaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.077/1 adṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭavan naṅkṣed bhūtaṃ svapnavad anyathā
analyzed: adṛṣṭam dṛṣṭa vat naṅkṣet bhūtam svapna vat anyathā

original: BhP_04.29.077/2 bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyac ca suptaṃ sarva-raho-rahaḥ
analyzed: bhūtam bhavat bhaviṣyat ca suptam sarva rahorahaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.077/1 yāvad anyaṃ na vindeta vyavadhānena karmaṇām
analyzed: yāvat anyam na vindeta vyavadhānena karmaṇām

original: BhP_04.29.077/2 mana eva manuṣyendra bhūtānāṃ bhava-bhāvanam
analyzed: manaḥ eva manuṣya indra bhūtānām bhava bhāvanam

original: BhP_04.29.078/1 yadākṣaiś caritān dhyāyan karmāṇy ācinute 'sakṛt
analyzed: yadā akṣaiḥ caritān dhyāyan karmāṇi ācinute asakṛt

original: BhP_04.29.078/2 sati karmaṇy avidyāyāṃ bandhaḥ karmaṇy anātmanaḥ
analyzed: sati karmaṇi avidyāyām bandhaḥ karmaṇi anātmanaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.079/1 atas tad apavādārthaṃ bhaja sarvātmanā harim
analyzed: atas tat apavāda artham bhaja sarva ātmanā harim

original: BhP_04.29.079/2 paśyaṃs tad-ātmakaṃ viśvaṃ sthity-utpatty-apyayā yataḥ
analyzed: paśyan tad ātmakam viśvam sthiti utpatti apyayāḥ yatas

original: BhP_04.29.080/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.29.080/1 bhāgavata-mukhyo bhagavān nārado haṃsayor gatim
analyzed: bhāgavata mukhyaḥ bhagavān nāradaḥ haṃsayoḥ gatim

original: BhP_04.29.080/2 pradarśya hy amum āmantrya siddha-lokaṃ tato 'gamat
analyzed: pradarśya hi amum āmantrya siddha lokam tatas agamat

original: BhP_04.29.081/1 prācīnabarhī rājarṣiḥ prajā-sargābhirakṣaṇe
BhP_04.29.081/2 ādiśya putrān agamat tapase kapilāśramam
analyzed: ādiśya putrān agamat tapase kapila āśramam

original: BhP_04.29.082/1 tatraikāgra-manā dhīro govinda-caraṇāmbujam
analyzed: tatra ekāgra manāḥ dhīraḥ govinda caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_04.29.082/2 vimukta-saṅgo 'nubhajan bhaktyā tat-sāmyatām agāt
analyzed: vimukta saṅgaḥ anubhajan bhaktyā tad sāmya tām agāt

original: BhP_04.29.083/1 etad adhyātma-pārokṣyaṃ gītaṃ devarṣiṇānagha
analyzed: etat adhyātma pārokṣyam gītam deva ṛṣiṇā anagha

original: BhP_04.29.083/2 yaḥ śrāvayed yaḥ śṛṇuyāt sa liṅgena vimucyate
analyzed: yaḥ śrāvayet yaḥ śṛṇuyāt sa liṅgena vimucyate

original: BhP_04.29.084/1 etan mukunda-yaśasā bhuvanaṃ punānaṃ
analyzed: etat mukunda yaśasā bhuvanam punānam

original: BhP_04.29.084/2 devarṣi-varya-mukha-niḥsṛtam ātma-śaucam
BhP_04.29.084/3 yaḥ kīrtyamānam adhigacchati pārameṣṭhyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ kīrtyamānam adhigacchati pārameṣṭhyam

original: BhP_04.29.084/4 nāsmin bhave bhramati mukta-samasta-bandhaḥ
analyzed: na asmin bhave bhramati mukta samasta bandhaḥ

original: BhP_04.29.085/1 adhyātma-pārokṣyam idaṃ mayādhigatam adbhutam
analyzed: adhyātma pārokṣyam idam mayā adhigatam adbhutam

original: BhP_04.29.085/2 evaṃ striyāśramaḥ puṃsaś chinno 'mutra ca saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: evam striyā āśramaḥ puṃsaḥ chinnaḥ amutra ca saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.001/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.30.001/1 ye tvayābhihitā brahman sutāḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: ye tvayā abhihitāḥ brahman sutāḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.001/2 te rudra-gītena hariṃ siddhim āpuḥ pratoṣya kām
analyzed: te rudra gītena harim siddhim āpuḥ pratoṣya kām

original: BhP_04.30.002/1 kiṃ bārhaspatyeha paratra vātha kaivalya-nātha-priya-pārśva-vartinaḥ
analyzed: kim bārhaspatya iha paratra vā atha kaivalya nātha priya pārśva vartinaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.002/2 āsādya devaṃ giriśaṃ yadṛcchayā prāpuḥ paraṃ nūnam atha pracetasaḥ
