analyzed: āsādya devam giriśam yadṛcchayā prāpuḥ param nūnam atha pracetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.003/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.30.003/1 pracetaso 'ntar udadhau pitur ādeśa-kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: pracetasaḥ antar udadhau pituḥ ādeśa kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.003/2 apa-yajñena tapasā purañjanam atoṣayan
analyzed: apayajñena tapasā purañjanam atoṣayan

original: BhP_04.30.004/1 daśa-varṣa-sahasrānte puruṣas tu sanātanaḥ
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasra ante puruṣaḥ tu sanātanaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.004/2 teṣām āvirabhūt kṛcchraṃ śāntena śamayan rucā
analyzed: teṣām āvirabhūt kṛcchram śāntena śamayan rucā

original: BhP_04.30.005/1 suparṇa-skandham ārūḍho meru-śṛṅgam ivāmbudaḥ
analyzed: suparṇa skandham ārūḍhaḥ meru śṛṅgam iva ambudaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.005/2 pīta-vāsā maṇi-grīvaḥ kurvan vitimirā diśaḥ
analyzed: pīta vāsāḥ maṇi grīvaḥ kurvan vitimirāḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.006/1 kāśiṣṇunā kanaka-varṇa-vibhūṣaṇena
analyzed: kāśiṣṇunā kanaka varṇa vibhūṣaṇena

original: BhP_04.30.006/2 bhrājat-kapola-vadano vilasat-kirīṭaḥ
analyzed: bhrājat kapola vadanaḥ vilasat kirīṭaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.006/3 aṣṭāyudhair anucarair munibhiḥ surendrair
analyzed: aṣṭa āyudhaiḥ anucaraiḥ munibhiḥ sura indraiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.006/4 āsevito garuḍa-kinnara-gīta-kīrtiḥ
analyzed: āsevitaḥ garuḍa kinnara gīta kīrtiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.007/1 pīnāyatāṣṭa-bhuja-maṇḍala-madhya-lakṣmyā
analyzed: pīna āyata aṣṭa bhuja maṇḍala madhya lakṣmyā

original: BhP_04.30.007/2 spardhac-chriyā parivṛto vana-mālayādyaḥ
analyzed: spardhat śriyā parivṛtaḥ vanamālayā ādyaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.007/3 barhiṣmataḥ puruṣa āha sutān prapannān
analyzed: barhiṣmataḥ puruṣaḥ āha sutān prapannān

original: BhP_04.30.007/4 parjanya-nāda-rutayā saghṛṇāvalokaḥ
analyzed: parjanya nāda rutayā sa ghṛṇā avalokaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.008/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_04.30.008/1 varaṃ vṛṇīdhvaṃ bhadraṃ vo yūyaṃ me nṛpa-nandanāḥ
analyzed: varam vṛṇīdhvam bhadram vaḥ yūyam me nṛpa nandanāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.008/2 sauhārdenāpṛthag-dharmās tuṣṭo 'haṃ sauhṛdena vaḥ
analyzed: sauhārdena apṛthak dharmāḥ tuṣṭaḥ aham sauhṛdena vaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.009/1 yo 'nusmarati sandhyāyāṃ yuṣmān anudinaṃ naraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ anusmarati sandhyāyām yuṣmān anudinam naraḥ

original: BhP_04.30.009/2 tasya bhrātṛṣv ātma-sāmyaṃ tathā bhūteṣu sauhṛdam
analyzed: tasya bhrātṛṣu ātma sāmyam tathā bhūteṣu sauhṛdam

original: BhP_04.30.010/1 ye tu māṃ rudra-gītena sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitāḥ
analyzed: ye tu mām rudra gītena sāyam prātar samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.010/2 stuvanty ahaṃ kāma-varān dāsye prajñāṃ ca śobhanām
analyzed: stuvantī aham kāma varān dāsye prajñām ca śobhanām

original: BhP_04.30.011/1 yad yūyaṃ pitur ādeśam agrahīṣṭa mudānvitāḥ
analyzed: yat yūyam pituḥ ādeśam agrahīṣṭa mudā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.011/2 atho va uśatī kīrtir lokān anu bhaviṣyati
analyzed: atha u vaḥ uśatī kīrtiḥ lokān anu bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_04.30.012/1 bhavitā viśrutaḥ putro 'navamo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ
analyzed: bhavitā viśrutaḥ putraḥ anavamaḥ brahmaṇaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.012/2 ya etām ātma-vīryeṇa tri-lokīṃ pūrayiṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ etām ātma vīryeṇa trilokīm pūrayiṣyati

original: BhP_04.30.013/1 kaṇḍoḥ pramlocayā labdhā kanyā kamala-locanā
analyzed: kaṇḍoḥ pramlocayā labdhā kanyā kamala locanā

original: BhP_04.30.013/2 tāṃ cāpaviddhāṃ jagṛhur bhūruhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ
analyzed: tām ca apaviddhām jagṛhuḥ bhūruhāḥ nṛpa nandanāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.014/1 kṣut-kṣāmāyā mukhe rājā somaḥ pīyūṣa-varṣiṇīm
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāmāyāḥ mukhe rājā somaḥ pīyūṣa varṣiṇīm

original: BhP_04.30.014/2 deśinīṃ rodamānāyā nidadhe sa dayānvitaḥ
analyzed: deśinīm rodamānāyāḥ nidadhe sa dayā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.015/1 prajā-visarga ādiṣṭāḥ pitrā mām anuvartatā
analyzed: prajā visarge ādiṣṭāḥ pitrā mām anuvartatā

original: BhP_04.30.015/2 tatra kanyāṃ varārohāṃ tām udvahata mā ciram
analyzed: tatra kanyām varārohām tām udvahata mā ciram

original: BhP_04.30.016/1 apṛthag-dharma-śīlānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vaḥ sumadhyamā
analyzed: apṛthak dharma śīlānām sarveṣām vaḥ sumadhyamā

original: BhP_04.30.016/2 apṛthag-dharma-śīleyaṃ bhūyāt patny arpitāśayā
analyzed: apṛthak dharma śīlā iyam bhūyāt patnī arpita āśayā

original: BhP_04.30.017/1 divya-varṣa-sahasrāṇāṃ sahasram ahataujasaḥ
analyzed: divya varṣa sahasrāṇām sahasram ahata ojasaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.017/2 bhaumān bhokṣyatha bhogān vai divyāṃś cānugrahān mama
analyzed: bhaumān bhokṣyatha bhogān vai divyān ca anugrahān mama

original: BhP_04.30.018/1 atha mayy anapāyinyā bhaktyā pakva-guṇāśayāḥ
analyzed: atha mayi anapāyinyā bhaktyā pakva guṇa āśayāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.018/2 upayāsyatha mad-dhāma nirvidya nirayād ataḥ
analyzed: upayāsyatha mad dhāma nirvidya nirayāt atas

original: BhP_04.30.019/1 gṛheṣv āviśatāṃ cāpi puṃsāṃ kuśala-karmaṇām
analyzed: gṛheṣu āviśatām ca api puṃsām kuśala karmaṇām

original: BhP_04.30.019/2 mad-vārtā-yāta-yāmānāṃ na bandhāya gṛhā matāḥ
analyzed: mad vārttā ayātayāmānām na bandhāya gṛhāḥ matāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.020/1 navyavad dhṛdaye yaj jño brahmaitad brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: navya vat hṛdaye yat jñaḥ brahma etat brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.020/2 na muhyanti na śocanti na hṛṣyanti yato gatāḥ
analyzed: na muhyanti na śocanti na hṛṣyanti yatas gatāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.021/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.30.021/1 evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ puruṣārtha-bhājanaṃ janārdanaṃ prāñjalayaḥ pracetasaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam puruṣa artha bhājanam janārdanam prāñjalayaḥ pracetasaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.021/2 tad-darśana-dhvasta-tamo-rajo-malā girāgṛṇan gadgadayā suhṛttamam
analyzed: tad darśana dhvasta tamaḥ rajaḥ malāḥ girā agṛṇan gadgadayā suhṛttamam

original: BhP_04.30.022/0 pracetasa ūcuḥ
analyzed: pracetasaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.30.022/1 namo namaḥ kleśa-vināśanāya nirūpitodāra-guṇāhvayāya
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ kleśa vināśanāya nirūpita udāra guṇa āhvayāya

original: BhP_04.30.022/2 mano-vaco-vega-puro-javāya sarvākṣa-mārgair agatādhvane namaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ vacaḥ vega purojavāya sarva akṣa mārgaiḥ agata adhvane namaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.023/1 śuddhāya śāntāya namaḥ sva-niṣṭhayā manasy apārthaṃ vilasad-dvayāya
analyzed: śuddhāya śāntāya namaḥ sva niṣṭhayā manasi apārtham vilasat dvayāya

original: BhP_04.30.023/2 namo jagat-sthāna-layodayeṣu gṛhīta-māyā-guṇa-vigrahāya
analyzed: namaḥ jagat sthāna laya udayeṣu gṛhīta māyā guṇa vigrahāya

original: BhP_04.30.024/1 namo viśuddha-sattvāya haraye hari-medhase
analyzed: namaḥ viśuddha sattvāya haraye harimedhase

original: BhP_04.30.024/2 vāsudevāya kṛṣṇāya prabhave sarva-sātvatām
analyzed: vāsudevāya kṛṣṇāya prabhave sarva sātvatām

original: BhP_04.30.025/1 namaḥ kamala-nābhāya namaḥ kamala-māline
analyzed: namaḥ kamalanābhāya namaḥ kamala māline

original: BhP_04.30.025/2 namaḥ kamala-pādāya namas te kamalekṣaṇa
analyzed: namaḥ kamala pādāya namaḥ te kamala īkṣaṇa

original: BhP_04.30.026/1 namaḥ kamala-kiñjalka- piśaṅgāmala-vāsase
analyzed: namaḥ kamala kiñjalka piśaṅga amala vāsase

original: BhP_04.30.026/2 sarva-bhūta-nivāsāya namo 'yuṅkṣmahi sākṣiṇe
analyzed: sarva bhūta nivāsāya namaḥ ayuṅkṣmahi sākṣiṇe

original: BhP_04.30.027/1 rūpaṃ bhagavatā tv etad aśeṣa-kleśa-saṅkṣayam
analyzed: rūpam bhagavatā tu etat aśeṣa kleśa saṅkṣayam

original: BhP_04.30.027/2 āviṣkṛtaṃ naḥ kliṣṭānāṃ kim anyad anukampitam
analyzed: āviṣkṛtam naḥ kliṣṭānām kim anyat anukampitam

original: BhP_04.30.028/1 etāvat tvaṃ hi vibhubhir bhāvyaṃ dīneṣu vatsalaiḥ
analyzed: etāvat tvam hi vibhubhiḥ bhāvyam dīneṣu vatsalaiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.028/2 yad anusmaryate kāle sva-buddhyābhadra-randhana
analyzed: yat anusmaryate kāle sva buddhyā abhadra randhana

original: BhP_04.30.029/1 yenopaśāntir bhūtānāṃ kṣullakānām apīhatām
analyzed: yena upaśāntiḥ bhūtānām kṣullakānām api īhatām

original: BhP_04.30.029/2 antarhito 'ntar-hṛdaye kasmān no veda nāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: antarhitaḥ antar hṛdaye kasmāt naḥ veda na āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.030/1 asāv eva varo 'smākam īpsito jagataḥ pate
analyzed: asau eva varaḥ asmākam īpsitaḥ jagataḥ pate

original: BhP_04.30.030/2 prasanno bhagavān yeṣām apavargaḥ gurur gatiḥ
analyzed: prasannaḥ bhagavān yeṣām apavargaḥ guruḥ gatiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.031/1 varaṃ vṛṇīmahe 'thāpi nātha tvat parataḥ parāt
analyzed: varam vṛṇīmahe atha api nātha tvat paratas parāt

original: BhP_04.30.031/2 na hy antas tvad-vibhūtīnāṃ so 'nanta iti gīyase
analyzed: na hi antar tvad vibhūtīnām saḥ anantaḥ iti gīyase

original: BhP_04.30.032/1 pārijāte 'ñjasā labdhe sāraṅgo 'nyan na sevate
analyzed: pārijāte añjasā labdhe sāraṅgaḥ anyat na sevate

original: BhP_04.30.032/2 tvad-aṅghri-mūlam āsādya sākṣāt kiṃ kiṃ vṛṇīmahi
analyzed: tvad aṅghri mūlam āsādya sākṣāt kim kim vṛṇīmahi

original: BhP_04.30.033/1 yāvat te māyayā spṛṣṭā bhramāma iha karmabhiḥ
analyzed: yāvat te māyayā spṛṣṭāḥ bhramāmaḥ iha karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.033/2 tāvad bhavat-prasaṅgānāṃ saṅgaḥ syān no bhave bhave
analyzed: tāvat bhavat prasaṅgānām saṅgaḥ syāt naḥ bhave bhave

original: BhP_04.30.034/1 tulayāma lavenāpi na svargaṃ nāpunar-bhavam
analyzed: tulayāma lavena api na svargam na apunarbhavam

original: BhP_04.30.034/2 bhagavat-saṅgi-saṅgasya martyānāṃ kim utāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: bhagavat saṅgi saṅgasya martyānām kim uta āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.035/1 yatreḍyante kathā mṛṣṭās tṛṣṇāyāḥ praśamo yataḥ
analyzed: yatra īḍyante kathāḥ mṛṣṭāḥ tṛṣṇāyāḥ praśamaḥ yatas

original: BhP_04.30.035/2 nirvairaṃ yatra bhūteṣu nodvego yatra kaścana
analyzed: nirvairam yatra bhūteṣu na udvegaḥ yatra kaścana

original: BhP_04.30.036/1 yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣād bhagavān nyāsināṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt bhagavān nyāsinām gatiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.036/2 saṃstūyate sat-kathāsu mukta-saṅgaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: saṃstūyate sat kathāsu mukta saṅgaiḥ punar punar

original: BhP_04.30.037/1 teṣāṃ vicaratāṃ padbhyāṃ tīrthānāṃ pāvanecchayā
analyzed: teṣām vicaratām padbhyām tīrthānām pāvana icchayā

original: BhP_04.30.037/2 bhītasya kiṃ na roceta tāvakānāṃ samāgamaḥ
analyzed: bhītasya kim na roceta tāvakānām samāgamaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.038/1 vayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavan bhavasya priyasya sakhyuḥ kṣaṇa-saṅgamena
analyzed: vayam tu sākṣāt bhagavan bhavasya priyasya sakhyuḥ kṣaṇa saṅgamena

original: BhP_04.30.038/2 suduścikitsyasya bhavasya mṛtyor bhiṣaktamaṃ tvādya gatiṃ gatāḥ sma
analyzed: su duścikitsyasya bhavasya mṛtyoḥ bhiṣaktamam tvā adya gatim gatāḥ sma

original: BhP_04.30.039/1 yan naḥ svadhītaṃ guravaḥ prasāditā viprāś ca vṛddhāś ca sad-ānuvṛttyā
analyzed: yat naḥ su adhītam guravaḥ prasāditāḥ viprāḥ ca vṛddhāḥ ca sadā anuvṛttyā

original: BhP_04.30.039/2 āryā natāḥ suhṛdo bhrātaraś ca sarvāṇi bhūtāny anasūyayaiva
analyzed: āryāḥ natāḥ suhṛdaḥ bhrātaraḥ ca sarvāṇi bhūtāni anasūyayā eva

original: BhP_04.30.040/1 yan naḥ sutaptaṃ tapa etad īśa nirandhasāṃ kālam adabhram apsu
analyzed: yat naḥ su taptam tapaḥ etat īśa nirandhasām kālam adabhram apsu

original: BhP_04.30.040/2 sarvaṃ tad etat puruṣasya bhūmno vṛṇīmahe te paritoṣaṇāya
analyzed: sarvam tat etat puruṣasya bhūmnaḥ vṛṇīmahe te paritoṣaṇāya

original: BhP_04.30.041/1 manuḥ svayambhūr bhagavān bhavaś ca ye 'nye tapo-jñāna-viśuddha-sattvāḥ
analyzed: manuḥ svayambhūḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ ca ye anye tapaḥ jñāna viśuddha sattvāḥ

original: BhP_04.30.041/2 adṛṣṭa-pārā api yan-mahimnaḥ stuvanty atho tvātma-samaṃ gṛṇīmaḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pārāḥ api yat mahimnaḥ stuvanti atha u tu ātma samam gṛṇīmaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.042/1 namaḥ samāya śuddhāya puruṣāya parāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ samāya śuddhāya puruṣāya parāya ca

original: BhP_04.30.042/2 vāsudevāya sattvāya tubhyaṃ bhagavate namaḥ
analyzed: vāsudevāya sattvāya tubhyam bhagavate namaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.043/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.30.043/1 iti pracetobhir abhiṣṭuto hariḥ prītas tathety āha śaraṇya-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: iti pracetobhiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ hariḥ prītaḥ tathā iti āha śaraṇya vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.043/2 anicchatāṃ yānam atṛpta-cakṣuṣāṃ yayau sva-dhāmānapavarga-vīryaḥ
analyzed: an icchatām yānam atṛpta cakṣuṣām yayau svadhāmā an apavarga vīryaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.044/1 atha niryāya salilāt pracetasa udanvataḥ
analyzed: atha niryāya salilāt pracetasaḥ udanvataḥ

original: BhP_04.30.044/2 vīkṣyākupyan drumaiś channāṃ gāṃ gāṃ roddhum ivocchritaiḥ
analyzed: vīkṣya a kupyan drumaiḥ channām gām gām roddhum iva ucchritaiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.045/1 tato 'gni-mārutau rājann amuñcan mukhato ruṣā
analyzed: tatas agni mārutau rājan amuñcat mukhataḥ ruṣā

original: BhP_04.30.045/2 mahīṃ nirvīrudhaṃ kartuṃ saṃvartaka ivātyaye
analyzed: mahīm nirvīrudham kartum saṃvartakaḥ iva atyaye

original: BhP_04.30.046/1 bhasmasāt kriyamāṇāṃs tān drumān vīkṣya pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: bhasmasāt kriyamāṇān tān drumān vīkṣya pitāmahaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.046/2 āgataḥ śamayām āsa putrān barhiṣmato nayaiḥ
analyzed: āgataḥ śamayām āsa putrān barhiṣmataḥ nayaiḥ

original: BhP_04.30.047/1 tatrāvaśiṣṭā ye vṛkṣā bhītā duhitaraṃ tadā
analyzed: tatra avaśiṣṭāḥ ye vṛkṣāḥ bhītāḥ duhitaram tadā

original: BhP_04.30.047/2 ujjahrus te pracetobhya upadiṣṭāḥ svayambhuvā
analyzed: ujjahruḥ te pracetobhyaḥ upadiṣṭāḥ svayambhuvā

original: BhP_04.30.048/1 te ca brahmaṇa ādeśān māriṣām upayemire
analyzed: te ca brahmaṇaḥ ādeśāt māriṣām upayemire

original: BhP_04.30.048/2 yasyāṃ mahad-avajñānād ajany ajana-yonijaḥ
analyzed: yasyām mahat avajñānāt ajani ajana yoni jaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.049/1 cākṣuṣe tv antare prāpte prāk-sarge kāla-vidrute
analyzed: cākṣuṣe tu antare prāpte prāc sarge kāla vidrute

original: BhP_04.30.049/2 yaḥ sasarja prajā iṣṭāḥ sa dakṣo daiva-coditaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sasarja prajāḥ iṣṭāḥ sa dakṣaḥ daiva coditaḥ

original: BhP_04.30.050/1 yo jāyamānaḥ sarveṣāṃ tejas tejasvināṃ rucā
analyzed: yaḥ jāyamānaḥ sarveṣām tejaḥ tejasvinām rucā

original: BhP_04.30.050/2 svayopādatta dākṣyāc ca karmaṇāṃ dakṣam abruvan
analyzed: svayā upādatta dākṣyāt ca karmaṇām dakṣam abruvan

original: BhP_04.30.051/1 taṃ prajā-sarga-rakṣāyām anādir abhiṣicya ca
analyzed: tam prajā sarga rakṣāyām anādiḥ abhiṣicya ca

original: BhP_04.30.051/2 yuyoja yuyuje 'nyāṃś ca sa vai sarva-prajāpatīn
analyzed: yuyoja yuyuje anyān ca sa vai sarva prajāpatīn

original: BhP_04.31.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.001/1 tata utpanna-vijñānā āśv adhokṣaja-bhāṣitam
analyzed: tatas utpanna vijñānāḥ āśu adhokṣaja bhāṣitam

original: BhP_04.31.001/2 smaranta ātmaje bhāryāṃ visṛjya prāvrajan gṛhāt
analyzed: smarantaḥ ātmaje bhāryām visṛjya prāvrajan gṛhāt

original: BhP_04.31.002/1 dīkṣitā brahma-satreṇa sarva-bhūtātma-medhasā
analyzed: dīkṣitāḥ brahmasatreṇa sarva bhūta ātma medhasā

original: BhP_04.31.002/2 pratīcyāṃ diśi velāyāṃ siddho 'bhūd yatra jājaliḥ
analyzed: pratīcyām diśi velāyām siddhaḥ abhūt yatra jājaliḥ

original: BhP_04.31.003/1 tān nirjita-prāṇa-mano-vaco-dṛśo jitāsanān śānta-samāna-vigrahān
analyzed: tān nirjita prāṇa manaḥ vacaḥ dṛśaḥ jita āsanān śānta samāna vigrahān

original: BhP_04.31.003/2 pare 'male brahmaṇi yojitātmanaḥ surāsureḍyo dadṛśe sma nāradaḥ
analyzed: pare amale brahmaṇi yojita ātmanaḥ sura asura īḍyaḥ dadṛśe sma nāradaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.004/1 tam āgataṃ ta utthāya praṇipatyābhinandya ca
analyzed: tam āgatam te utthāya praṇipatya abhinandya ca

original: BhP_04.31.004/2 pūjayitvā yathādeśaṃ sukhāsīnam athābruvan
analyzed: pūjayitvā yathādeśam sukha āsīnam atha abruvan

original: BhP_04.31.005/0 pracetasa ūcuḥ
analyzed: pracetasaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_04.31.005/1 svāgataṃ te surarṣe 'dya diṣṭyā no darśanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: svāgatam te sura ṛṣe adya diṣṭyā naḥ darśanam gataḥ

original: BhP_04.31.005/2 tava caṅkramaṇaṃ brahmann abhayāya yathā raveḥ
analyzed: tava caṅkramaṇam brahman abhayāya yathā raveḥ

original: BhP_04.31.006/1 yad ādiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śivenādhokṣajena ca
analyzed: yat ādiṣṭam bhagavatā śivena adhokṣajena ca

original: BhP_04.31.006/2 tad gṛheṣu prasaktānāṃ prāyaśaḥ kṣapitaṃ prabho
analyzed: tat gṛheṣu prasaktānām prāyaśas kṣapitam prabho

original: BhP_04.31.007/1 tan naḥ pradyotayādhyātma- jñānaṃ tattvārtha-darśanam
analyzed: tat naḥ pradyotaya adhyātma jñānam tattva artha darśanam

original: BhP_04.31.007/2 yenāñjasā tariṣyāmo dustaraṃ bhava-sāgaram
analyzed: yena añjasā tariṣyāmaḥ dustaram bhava sāgaram

original: BhP_04.31.008/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.008/1 iti pracetasāṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān nārado muniḥ
analyzed: iti pracetasām pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān nāradaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_04.31.008/2 bhagavaty uttama-śloka āviṣṭātmābravīn nṛpān
analyzed: bhagavati uttamaśloke āviṣṭa ātmā abravīt nṛpān

original: BhP_04.31.009/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.009/1 taj janma tāni karmāṇi tad āyus tan mano vacaḥ
analyzed: tat janma tāni karmāṇi tat āyuḥ tat manaḥ vacaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.009/2 nṛṇāṃ yena hi viśvātmā sevyate harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: nṛṇām yena hi viśvātmā sevyate hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_04.31.010/1 kiṃ janmabhis tribhir veha śaukra-sāvitra-yājñikaiḥ
analyzed: kim janmabhiḥ tribhiḥ vā iha śaukra sāvitra yājñikaiḥ

original: BhP_04.31.010/2 karmabhir vā trayī-proktaiḥ puṃso 'pi vibudhāyuṣā
analyzed: karmabhiḥ vā trayī proktaiḥ puṃsaḥ api vibudha āyuṣā

original: BhP_04.31.011/1 śrutena tapasā vā kiṃ vacobhiś citta-vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: śrutena tapasā vā kim vacobhiḥ citta vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_04.31.011/2 buddhyā vā kiṃ nipuṇayā balenendriya-rādhasā
analyzed: buddhyā vā kim nipuṇayā balena indriya rādhasā

original: BhP_04.31.012/1 kiṃ vā yogena sāṅkhyena nyāsa-svādhyāyayor api
analyzed: kim vā yogena sāṅkhyena nyāsa svādhyāyayoḥ api

original: BhP_04.31.012/2 kiṃ vā śreyobhir anyaiś ca na yatrātma-prado hariḥ
analyzed: kim vā śreyobhiḥ anyaiḥ ca na yatra ātma pradaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_04.31.013/1 śreyasām api sarveṣām ātmā hy avadhir arthataḥ
analyzed: śreyasām api sarveṣām ātmā hi avadhiḥ arthataḥ

original: BhP_04.31.013/2 sarveṣām api bhūtānāṃ harir ātmātmadaḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām api bhūtānām hariḥ ātmā ātma daḥ priyaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.014/1 yathā taror mūla-niṣecanena tṛpyanti tat-skandha-bhujopaśākhāḥ
analyzed: yathā taroḥ mūla niṣecanena tṛpyanti tad skandha bhuja upaśākhāḥ

original: BhP_04.31.014/2 prāṇopahārāc ca yathendriyāṇāṃ tathaiva sarvārhaṇam acyutejyā
analyzed: prāṇa upahārāt ca yathā indriyāṇām tathā eva sarva arhaṇam acyuta ijyā

original: BhP_04.31.015/1 yathaiva sūryāt prabhavanti vāraḥ punaś ca tasmin praviśanti kāle
analyzed: yathā eva sūryāt prabhavanti vāraḥ punar ca tasmin praviśanti kāle

original: BhP_04.31.015/2 bhūtāni bhūmau sthira-jaṅgamāni tathā harāv eva guṇa-pravāhaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni bhūmau sthira jaṅgamāni tathā harau eva guṇa pravāhaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.016/1 etat padaṃ taj jagad-ātmanaḥ paraṃ sakṛd vibhātaṃ savitur yathā prabhā
analyzed: etat padam tat jagadātmanaḥ param sakṛt vibhātam savituḥ yathā prabhā

original: BhP_04.31.016/2 yathāsavo jāgrati supta-śaktayo dravya-kriyā-jñāna-bhidā-bhramātyayaḥ
analyzed: yathā asavaḥ jāgrati supta śaktayaḥ dravya kriyā jñāna bhidā bhrama atyayaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.017/1 yathā nabhasy abhra-tamaḥ-prakāśā bhavanti bhūpā na bhavanty anukramāt
analyzed: yathā nabhasi abhra tamaḥ prakāśāḥ bhavanti bhūpāḥ na bhavanti anukramāt

original: BhP_04.31.017/2 evaṃ pare brahmaṇi śaktayas tv amū rajas tamaḥ sattvam iti pravāhaḥ
analyzed: evam pare brahmaṇi śaktayaḥ tu amū rajaḥ tamaḥ sattvam iti pravāhaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.018/1 tenaikam ātmānam aśeṣa-dehināṃ kālaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ pareśam
analyzed: tena ekam ātmānam aśeṣa dehinām kālam pradhānam puruṣam para īśam

original: BhP_04.31.018/2 sva-tejasā dhvasta-guṇa-pravāham ātmaika-bhāvena bhajadhvam addhā
analyzed: sva tejasā dhvasta guṇa pravāham ātma eka bhāvena bhajadhvam addhā

original: BhP_04.31.019/1 dayayā sarva-bhūteṣu santuṣṭyā yena kena vā
analyzed: dayayā sarva bhūteṣu santuṣṭyā yena kena vā

original: BhP_04.31.019/2 sarvendriyopaśāntyā ca tuṣyaty āśu janārdanaḥ
analyzed: sarva indriya upaśāntyā ca tuṣyati āśu janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.020/1 apahata-sakalaiṣaṇāmalātmany aviratam edhita-bhāvanopahūtaḥ
analyzed: apahata sakala eṣaṇā amala ātmani aviratam edhita bhāvanā upahūtaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.020/2 nija-jana-vaśa-gatvam ātmano 'yan na sarati chidravad akṣaraḥ satāṃ hi
analyzed: nija jana vaśa ga tvam ātmanaḥ ayat na sarati chidra vat akṣaraḥ satām hi

original: BhP_04.31.021/1 na bhajati kumanīṣiṇāṃ sa ijyāṃ harir adhanātma-dhana-priyo rasa-jñaḥ
analyzed: na bhajati ku manīṣiṇām saḥ ijyām hariḥ a dhana ātma dhana priyaḥ rasajñaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.021/2 śruta-dhana-kula-karmaṇāṃ madair ye vidadhati pāpam akiñcaneṣu satsu
analyzed: śruta dhana kula karmaṇām madaiḥ ye vidadhati pāpam akiñcaneṣu satsu

original: BhP_04.31.022/1 śriyam anucaratīṃ tad-arthinaś ca dvipada-patīn vibudhāṃś ca yat sva-pūrṇaḥ
analyzed: śriyam anucaratīm tad arthinaḥ ca dvipada patīn vibudhān ca yat sva pūrṇaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.022/2 na bhajati nija-bhṛtya-varga-tantraḥ katham amum udvisṛjet pumān kṛta-jñaḥ
analyzed: na bhajati nija bhṛtya varga tantraḥ katham amum udvisṛjet pumān kṛtajñaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.023/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.023/1 iti pracetaso rājann anyāś ca bhagavat-kathāḥ
analyzed: iti pracetasaḥ rājan anyāḥ ca bhagavat kathāḥ

original: BhP_04.31.023/2 śrāvayitvā brahma-lokaṃ yayau svāyambhuvo muniḥ
analyzed: śrāvayitvā brahma lokam yayau svāyambhuvaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_04.31.024/1 te 'pi tan-mukha-niryātaṃ yaśo loka-malāpaham
analyzed: te api tad mukha niryātam yaśaḥ loka mala apaham

original: BhP_04.31.024/2 harer niśamya tat-pādaṃ dhyāyantas tad-gatiṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: hareḥ niśamya tad pādam dhyāyantaḥ tad gatim yayuḥ

original: BhP_04.31.025/1 etat te 'bhihitaṃ kṣattar yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān
analyzed: etat te abhihitam kṣattar yat mām tvam paripṛṣṭavān

original: BhP_04.31.025/2 pracetasāṃ nāradasya saṃvādaṃ hari-kīrtanam
analyzed: pracetasām nāradasya saṃvādam hari kīrtanam

original: BhP_04.31.026/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.026/1 ya eṣa uttānapado mānavasyānuvarṇitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ uttānapadaḥ mānavasya anuvarṇitaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.026/2 vaṃśaḥ priyavratasyāpi nibodha nṛpa-sattama
analyzed: vaṃśaḥ priyavratasya api nibodha nṛpa sattama

original: BhP_04.31.027/1 yo nāradād ātma-vidyām adhigamya punar mahīm
analyzed: yaḥ nāradāt ātma vidyām adhigamya punar mahīm

original: BhP_04.31.027/2 bhuktvā vibhajya putrebhya aiśvaraṃ samagāt padam
analyzed: bhuktvā vibhajya putrebhyaḥ aiśvaram samagāt padam

original: BhP_04.31.028/1 imāṃ tu kauṣāraviṇopavarṇitāṃ kṣattā niśamyājita-vāda-sat-kathām
analyzed: imām tu kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitām kṣattā niśamya ajita vāda sat kathām

original: BhP_04.31.028/2 pravṛddha-bhāvo 'śru-kalākulo muner dadhāra mūrdhnā caraṇaṃ hṛdā hareḥ
analyzed: pravṛddha bhāvaḥ aśru kalā ākulaḥ muneḥ dadhāra mūrdhnā caraṇam hṛdā hareḥ

original: BhP_04.31.029/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.029/1 so 'yam adya mahā-yogin bhavatā karuṇātmanā
analyzed: saḥ ayam adya mahā yogin bhavatā karuṇā ātmanā

original: BhP_04.31.029/2 darśitas tamasaḥ pāro yatrākiñcana-go hariḥ
analyzed: darśitaḥ tamasaḥ pāraḥ yatra akiñcana gaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_04.31.030/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_04.31.030/1 ity ānamya tam āmantrya viduro gajasāhvayam
analyzed: iti ānamya tam āmantrya viduraḥ gajasāhvayam

original: BhP_04.31.030/2 svānāṃ didṛkṣuḥ prayayau jñātīnāṃ nirvṛtāśayaḥ
analyzed: svānām didṛkṣuḥ prayayau jñātīnām nirvṛta āśayaḥ

original: BhP_04.31.031/1 etad yaḥ śṛṇuyād rājan rājñāṃ hary-arpitātmanām
analyzed: etat yaḥ śṛṇuyāt rājan rājñām hari arpita ātmanām

original: BhP_04.31.031/2 āyur dhanaṃ yaśaḥ svasti gatim aiśvaryam āpnuyāt
analyzed: āyuḥ dhanam yaśaḥ svasti gatim aiśvaryam āpnuyāt
